tsn: Ditlhopha di le tlhano tsa badiragatsi di diragatsa ka nako e le nngwe kwa bobogelong jwa kwa Muizenberg.

en: Some of the highlights every year are productions by the De La Bat School for the Deaf that uses South African Sign Language and shows by the Pioneer School for the Visually Impaired.
tsn: Moletlo ono, o o tswelelang go godisa bokgoni jwa tsa botshelo ka go tsepa Puisokwalo, dikwalo le botsweretshi, o bogelwa gape kwa Russia, Estonia le Malawi.

en: Teamwork at its best!
tsn: Mo dingwageng tse di fetileng e nnile yona porogerama ya terama ya bašwa e kgolo ya Shakespeare.

en: A super congrats to this talented cast!
tsn: Dingwe tsa dintlhakgolo ngwaga mongwe le mongwe, ke metshameko e e tlisiwang ke ba sekolo sa De La Bat sa Bosusu e e dirisang puo ya diatla ya Aforikaborwa, le metshameko e e diragadiwang ke ba kwa Pioneer School for the Visually Impaired.

en: The Academy Awards are really touted as one of the most important sparkly nights delivering glamour, Ehrlich, who is dressing a celebrity for an Oscars party, said.
tsn: Tiro e e tshwaraganetsweng ka natla!

en: And I think it’s safe to say that after the year that we’ve all endured that a little bit of glamour and a little bit of sparkle is needed.
tsn: Masego go setlhopha se se nang le talente se!

en: Among Ehrlich’s selection of dresses are classic intricately embroidered gowns, sparkling sequined dresses and a tailored suit looks she expects to see at the Oscars.
tsn: Dikgele tsa Akatemi di lebeletswe e le nngwe ya masigo a a botlhokwa thata a a tlisang bontle. Go bua Ehrlich yo o apesang mongwe wa batho ba ba tumileng kwa moletlong wa di Oscar.

en: With no red carpet to walk down so far this awards season, many celebrities have dressed up and posed sometimes in their gardens for pre-event shoots.
tsn: Mme ke akanya gore go botlhokwa gore ke re, morago ga ngwaga o re nnileng le ona, dilo tse di tsabakelang le tse dintle di a tlhokega.

en: (The BAFTA) ceremony at an empty Royal Albert Hall certainly gave pause for thought and put the emphasis squarely on talent, while reminding us of the joys of cinema.
tsn: Gareng ga mesese e e tlhophilweng ke Ehrlich, go na le mesese e e tsabakelang le sutu e e rokilweng bontle tse a solofelang go di bona kwa moletlong wa di Oscar.

en: South African crime fiction author, Deon Meyer, has received Frances’s top cultural award, Chevailer des Arts et des Lettres or Knight in the Order of Arts and Letters.
tsn: Ka ntlha ya fa go sena khapete e e khibidu e go tlaa tsamaiwang mo godimo ga yona mo setlheng se sa kabelo ya dikgele, baitsegi ba ba ntsi ba ne ba apara diaparo tsa bona tse dintle mme ba tsaya ditshwantsho mo di tshimong tsa bona pele moletlo o simolola.

en: French ambassador to South Africa Aurlien Lechevallier bestowed the award on him on behalf of the French President, at Glenelly Estate in Stellenbosch.
tsn: Moletlo wa (BAFTA) kwa ntlo lehalahaleng ya Royal Albert e e lolea  o dirile gore motho a akanye mme a tlhome mogopolo mo taleteng, o ntse o re gakolola gape ka monate wa baesekopo.

en: Meyer has published 15 novels and three short story collections.
tsn: Mokwadi wa dibuka tsa ditlhamane tsa bosenyi, Deon Meyer, o amogetse sekgele sa maemo a a kwa godimo sa kwa France se se bidiwang Chevailer des Arts et des Lettres kgotsa Knight in the Order of Arts and Letters.

en: His books have been translated into 27 languages and published in more than 40 countries.
tsn: Moemedi wa France mo Aforikaborwa, Aurlien, Lechevallier, o mo neetse sekgele se mo boemong jwa moporesitente wa kwa France kwa dikagong tsa Glenell kwa Stellenbosch.

en: His appointment as Knight of Arts and Letters is in recognition of his work and his special relationship with France, reflected in many of his books.
tsn: Meyer o phasaladitse di padi di le 15 le dikgankgutshwe di le tharo.

en: Meyer has described the honour as humbling.
tsn: Dibuka tsa gagwe di fetoleletswe mo dipuong di le 27 mme di phasaladitswe mo dinageng tse di fetang 40.

en: Britain’s Queen Elizabeth, the world’s oldest monarch, turns 95 on Wednesday, but there will be no public celebrations of an occasion that comes just days after she bade a sad farewell to her husband of seven decades at his funeral.
tsn: Go tlhomiwa ga gagwe jaaka mogaka wa tsa botsweretshi le makwalo ke ka ntlha ya fa ba batla go akgola tiro ya gawe tiro le kgolagano e e kgethegileng e a nang le yona le France. Seo se tlhagelela mo dibukeng tsa gagwe dintsi tsa gagwe.

en: Prince Philip, whom Elizabeth married in 1947, died on April 9 at the age of 99.
tsn: Meyer o tlhalositse tlotla e jaaka sengwe se dirang gore a nne le boikokobetso.

en: The royals paid their final respects to the family’s patriarch at his funeral on Saturday at Windsor Castle.
tsn: Kgosigadi Elizabeth wa kwa Britain, Kgosigadi e e di fetang tsotlhe ka dingwaga, o tshwara dingwaga di le 95 ka Laboraro, mme ga go kitla go nna le mekete ya setšhaba e e tlaa latelang malatsi morago ga go boloka monna wa gagwe wa masome a dingwaga di le 7.

en: Because of COVID-19 restrictions, the queen sat alone during the sombre service for Philip, who she had described as her strength and stay.
tsn: Kgosana Phillip, yo Elizabeth a nyalaneng le ena ka ngwaga wa 1947, o tlhokafetse fa Moranang a tlhola malatsi a le 9, a na le dingwaga di le 99.

en: Elizabeth, who is also the world’s longest-reigning monarch, will be at the castle for her birthday, which traditionally passes off with little or no ceremony.
tsn: Segosi se file kgosi ya sona tlotla ya bona ya bofelo kwa phitlhong ya gagwe ka Lamatlhatso kwa Windsor Castle.

en: However, this year, with the royals marking two weeks of mourning, it will pass off with even less public show: there will be no gun salutes at the Tower of London nor the capital’s Hyde Park which usually occur on the queen’s birthday.
tsn: Ka ntlha ya dikgoreletsi tsa COVID-19, Kgosigadi e ne e ntse e le nosi na nako ya tirelo ya phitlho ya ga Philip, yo a mo tlhalositseng jaaka motho yo o neng a mo fa maatla.

en: The queen also has an official birthday, which is usually celebrated with greater pomp on the second Saturday in June.
tsn: Elizabeth, yo e leng kgosigadi e e busitseng nako e telele lefatshe ka bophara, o tlabo a le kwa ntlong ya gagwe ya segosi ka letsatsi la gagwe la matsalo, le le tlaa fetang fela kwa ntle ga gore go nne le moletlo.

en: Philips’s death has robbed Elizabeth of her closest and most trusted confidante, who had been beside her throughout her record-breaking 69-year reign.
tsn: Le gale monongwaga, jaaka segosi se na le dibeke di le pedi se le mo khutsafalong, le tlaa feta fela kwa ntle ga tlhagiso e kgolo go tswa mo setšhabeng: Ga go kitla go nna le moletlo wa dithunya tsa kakgolo kwa toreng ya kwa London kgotswa kwa motsengmogolo wa Hyde Park, o gantsi o diragalang ka letsatsi la botsalo la ga kgosigadi.

en: It also came just as she grappled with one of the gravest crises to hit the royal family in decades, allegations of racism and neglect by it from her grandson Prince Harry and Meghan, his American wife.
tsn: Kgosigadi e na gape le letsatsi la matsalo la semmuso, le gantsi le ketekiwang ka kgalalelo e kgolo ka Lamatlhatso wa bobedi wa Seetebosigo.

en: Newspapers have suggested that family members would be visiting the queen over the coming days to ensure she would not be left alone while mourning her late husband.
tsn: Loso lwa ga Phillip lo amogile Elizabeth motho yo o neng a mo tshepile thata, yo o neng a dula a mo tshegeditse dingwaga di le 69 tsa go busa ga gagwe.

en: A Buckingham Palace spokesperson declined to comment, saying all family matters after the funeral would be private.
tsn: Gape le tlile ka nako e a neng a mekamekana le bothata jo bogolo jo bo fetang mathata otlhe a a kileng a nna teng kwa lelapeng la bogosi mo dingwagasomeng tse di fetileng, ditatofatso tsa bosemorafe le go itlhokomolosa go tswa go setlogolwana sa gagwe, kgosana Harry le Meghan, mosadi wa gagwe kwa Amerika.

en: Elizabeth, who was born on April 21, 1926, in Bruton Street, central London, grew up not expecting to become queen.
tsn: Makwalodikgang a tshitsinya gore maloko a lelapa a tlaa etela kgosigadi mo malatsing a a tlang, go netefatsa gore ga a nne a le nosi fa a santse a le mo khutsafalong ya moswi mogatse.

en: Her father, George VI, only took the crown when his elder brother Edward VIII abdicated in 1936 to marry American divorcee Wallis Simpson.
tsn: Mmueledi wa ntlo ya segosi wa kwa Buckingham o ganne go tshwaela. A re merero yotlhe ya morago ga phitlho ga e kitla e buiwa mo pepeneneng.

en: She ascended to the throne in 1952 at the age of 25, and surpassed her great-great-grandmother Queen Victoria as Britain’s longest reigning monarch in September 2015.
tsn: Elizabeth, yo o tshotsweng ka la 21 Moranang, ka ngwaga wa 1926, kwa mmileng wa Bruton, kwa bogareng jwa London, o godile a sa solofela go nna kgosigadi.

en: Elizabeth is also queen of 15 former British colonies including Canada, Australia and New Zealand.
tsn: Rraagwe, George VI, o tsere bogosi fela fa morwarraagwe yo mogolo, Edward VIII a ne a rola maikarabelo a gagwe ka ngwaga wa 1936 go ya go nyala mosadi wa kwa Amerika yo o neng a tswa mo lenyalong Wallis Simpson.

en: Protesting Free State artists have ended their 40-day sit-in at the Performing Arts Centre of the Free State in Bloemfontein after the appointment of interim acting CEO, Sharon Snell.
tsn: O tsere bogosi ka ngwaga wa 1952, a le dingwaga di le 25, mme o  fetile mmaagwemogologolwane, kgosigadi Victoria ka go nna kgosigadi e e busitseng nako e e telele go di feta tsotlhe kwa Britain ka Lwetse 2015.

en: Artists have been protesting against alleged corruption and mismanagement at the centre.
tsn: Kgosigadi Elizabeth gape ke kgosigadi ya maloba ya dikoloni di le 15 tsa kwa Britain, tse di akaretsang Canada, Australia le New Zealand.

en: They demanded the implementation of the 2018 Morar report, which implicated senior staff members at the Centre as well as a board member.
tsn: Batsweretshi ba kwa Foreisetata ba ba nang le dingongorego ba isitse kwa bokhutlong malatsi a le 40 a go dula kwa senthareng ya ditiragatso kwa Foreisetata, kwa Bloemfontein morago ga go tlhomiwa ga nama o sa tshwere wa nakwana, Sharon Snell.

en: They also wanted the sacking of the acting PACOFS CEO, Meshack Xaba, who is allegedly implicated in the investigation report.
tsn: Batsweretshi ba ne ba ngongorega kgatlhanong le bobodu le tsamaiso e e sokameng kwa senthareng.

en: Free State artists demand relief funds and an end to graft.
tsn: Ba gateletse topo ya bona ya go tsenngwa tirisong ga raporoto ya Morar ya 2018, e mo go yona go amegang maloko a badiri a a kwa godimo kwa senthareng ga mmogo le leloko la Boto.

en: The Free State Coordinator of the Cultural and Creative Industries Federation, Mbuyiselo Nqodi, says they welcome Snell’s appointment.
tsn: Ba ne ba batla gape le gore Mokhuduthamagamogolo wa nama o sa tshwere wa PACOFS, Meshack Xaba , yo o amegang mo raporotong ya patlisisong, a lelekiwe.

en: We will give the new CEO a chance to be able to settle in and be able to see what else she is going to do in terms of advancing what were complaining about.
tsn: Batsweretshi ba kwa Foreisetata ba lopa thuso ya matlole le gore megagaru e ye kwa bokhutlong.

en: But it is not entirely on her hands because this week we are getting a report from the Portfolio Committee on their visits and what and how they concluded with the institution on what to do.
tsn: Mookamedi wa kwa Foreisetata wa bokopano jwa setso le tsa botlhami, Mbuyiselo Nqodi a re ba amogetse go tlhomiwa gwa ga Snells.

en: But end of this week, we are going to get that report we understand that it going to be a long process the issue of the disciplining of Mr Xaba.
tsn: Re tlaa naya Mokhuduthamagamogolo yo mošwa tšhono ya go tsena mo tirong ya gagwe le go kgona go bona gore ke eng se a ka se dirang go tsweletsa pele dingongorego tsa rona.

en: In late March, the group had demanded decisive intervention from government.
tsn: Mme ga go mo diatleng tsa gagwe gotlhelele ka gonne mo bekeng e, re amogela pego go tswa go Komiti ya Photefolio ka ga diketelo tsa bona le gore ke tshwetso e fe e ba e tsereng le setheo ka se ba tshwanetseng go se dira.

en: On Sunday, the threatened to intensify their action until their demands are met.
tsn: Mme kwa bokhutlong jwa beke e, re tlile go fitlhelela raporoto eo. Re tlhaloganya gore tlha ya go kgalema Rre Xaba e tlile go nna thulaganyo e telele.

en: The Ditsobotla Local Municipality in Lichtenburg in the North West says it’ll step up security at the local cemetery, following the theft of a bust of Boer War General, Koos De La Rey, over the weekend.
tsn: Ka mafelo a kgwedi ya Mopitlwe, setlhopha se se gateletse topo ya tsereganyo  go tswa mo pusong.

en: Heritage Potchefstroom has raised serious concern about the theft.
tsn: Ka Sontaga, ba dirile matshosetsi a go atolosa kgato ya bona go fitlhelela ditlhokego tsa bona di amogelwa.

en: It is believed that the copper bust was stolen with the aim of melting it.
tsn: Mmasepala wa selegae wa Ditsobotla wa kwa Lichtenburg mo kgaolong ya Bokone Bophirima wa re o tlaa oketsa tshireletso kwa mabitleng a selegae go latela bogodu jwa sefikantswe sa tlhogo ya Ntwa ya Maburu Koos De la Rey, mo mafelong a beke.

en: De La Rey was a general during the second Anglo-Boer War and was shot and killed by police in September 1914, when they mistook him for a member of a criminal gang.
tsn: Ngwaoboswa ya Potchefstroom e kaile fa e tshwenyegile thata ka bogodu jo.

en: Heritage Potchefstoom Chairperson, Johan Wolfvaart, says incidents such as these lead to the erosion of the country’s history.
tsn: Go dumelwa gore sefikantswe se sa kopore se utswitswe ka maikaelelo a go se gakolosa.

en: It illustrates the narratives of South African history and of course the most important thing about it that we must learn from it.
tsn: De La Rey e ne e le mogenerale ka nako ya Ntwa ya Bobedi ya Maburu le Maesimane mme o ne thuntshiwa le go bolawa ke sepodisi ka kgwedi ya Lwetse, ka ngwaga wa 1914 fa ba ne ba akanya gore ke leloko la segongwana sa bosenyi.

en: So the loss of every heritage site or building is a complete lost to the people of South Africa basically.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa Ngwaoboswa ya kwa Potchefstroom Johan Wolfvaart, a re ditiragalo tse di jaaka tseno, di nyeletsa hisetori ya naga ya rona.

en: So that is why it must be preserved, explains Wolfvaart.
tsn: Di bontsha ditiragalo tsa hisetori ya Aforikaborwa mme selo sa botlhokwa thata ka ga tsona ke gore re tshwanetse go ithuta go tswa mo go tsona.

en: The Federasie van Afrikaanse Kultuurvereniginge(FAK) has indicated that they will sponsor a replica of the bust made from material that has no economic value.
tsn: Ka jalo, tatlhegelo ya lefelo lengwe le lengwe la ngwaoboswa ke tatlhegelo e kgolo thata go batho ba Aforikaborwa.

en: The CEO of FAK Dr Danie Langner says they will also assist to repair the grave.
tsn: Ka jalo, le tshwanetse go somarelwa, go tlhalosa Wolfvaart.

en: We will repair the grave with the replica of General De La Rey later this year with the help of Jack Miller, adds Langner.
tsn: Federasie van Afrikaanse Kultuurvereniginge (FAK) e kaile fa e tlaa fana ka sefikantswe se sengwe se se tshwanang le se, se se dirilweng ka didiriswa tse di senang boleng jwa ikonomi.

en: The Ditsobotla Local Municipality in Lichtenburg says it will ensure that the graves are fenced in order to curb theft and vandalism.
tsn: Mokhuduthamagamogolo wa FAK Ngaka Danie Langner, a re ba tlaa thusa le go baakanya lebitla.

en: Spokesperson Pius Batsile says they have never had security at the grave site as they’ve never had cases of vandalism before.
tsn: Re tlaa baakanya lebitla la ga Mogenerale De la Rey moragonyana monongwaga ka thuso ya ga Jack Miller, Langner o a oketsa.

en: There has been never a security at that grave side because we have not experienced any vandalism before.
tsn: Mmasepala wa selegae wa Ditsobotla kwa Lichtenburg wa re o tlaa netefatsa gore mabitla a a kampelwa go fokotsa bogodu le tshenyo.

en: That is why it has been a shortfall; actually an oversight from our side.
tsn: Mmueledi Pius Batsile a re ba ne ba se na tshireletso mo lefelong le ka ntlha ya fa ba ne ba ise ba itemogele dikgetse tsa bosenyi.

en: But moving forward, we are intending we are going to put proper security at that side, says Batsile.
tsn: Ga go ise go nne le tshireletso kwa mabitleng ka ntlha ya fa re ise re itemogele tshenyo epe.

en: North West police says no criminal case has been registered yet.
tsn: Ke ka moo e ntseng e tlhaela; tota tota ke go tlhoka tlhokomelo go tswa ka mo letlhakoreng la rona.

en: Reporting by Syllvester Serame.
tsn: Mme go ya pele, re ikaeletse gore re tlile go tsenya tshireletsego e e kwa godimo kwa lefelong leo, go bua Batsile.

en: The Federation for Afrikaans Culture Organisations (FAK) is still hoping to find the bronze bust of Boer General Koos de la Rey.
tsn: Sepodise sa Bokone Bophirima sa re ga go na kgetse ya bosenyi e e setseng e kwadisitsweng.

en: The bust was stolen from his grave in the Lichtenburg cemetery, in the North West, at the weekend.
tsn: Pego ka Syllvester Serame.

en: The bronze bust of the iconic South African Boer War leader was made in 1917.
tsn: Mokgatlho wa Federation for Afrikaans Culture (FAK), o santse o na le tsholofelo ya gore o tlaa bona sefikantswe sa ga Mogenerale Koos De la Rey.

en: The grave was also vandalised.
tsn: Sefikantswe se se utswitswe kwa lebitleng la gagwe, kwa dirapeng tsa kwa Lichtenburg kwa Bokone Bophirima, ka mafelo a beke.

en: A case of theft and vandalism has been opened by the FAK.
tsn: Sefikantswe sa boronse sa mogaka wa Aforikaborwa wa Ntwa ya Maburu se dirilwe ka ngwaga wa 1917.

en: Project manager at the FAK, Johan Janse van Vuuren, says the loss of the bronze bust is a tragedy.
tsn: Lebitla le lona le sentswe.

en: He says they are visiting all scrap metal businesses in the area in an attempt to locate the stolen artefact.
tsn: Kgetse ya bogodu le bosenyi e butswe ke mokgatlho wa FAK.

en: Van Vuuren says even if they find the original bust, they have already commissioned an artist to make a replica from less valuable material to restore the grave.
tsn: Motsamaisa diporojeke kwa FAK, Johan Janse van Vuuren, a re tatlhegelo ya sefikantswe se sa boronse ke masetlapelo.

en: He says heritage sites are becoming targets for vandals.
tsn: A re ba tlaa etela dikgwebo tsotlhe tse di dirang ka ditshipi mo tikologong eo, ka maiteko a go bona gore a ba ka se bone sefikantswe se se utswitsweng se.

en: Afrikaners are quite angry at this stage.
tsn: Van Vuuren a re le fa ba ka bona sefikantswe se, ba setse ba thapile motaki yo o tlaa dirang sefikantswe se se tshwanang le se, ka tiriso ya didiriswa tsa boleng jo bo kwa tlase gore ba kgone go baakanya lebitla.

en: We are at a place where it’s a bad situation for us but we aren’t giving up.
tsn: A re mafelo a ngwaoboswa a setse a fetogile mafelo a borukutlhi.

en: We are going forward and if our heritage sites get vandalised we will make a plan to restore it.
tsn: MaAforikanere a galefile thata mo nakong e.

en: Anyone with information about the whereabouts of the bust are requested to contact the police.
tsn: Re a lemoga gore maemo a, a maswe mo go rona mme ga re kitla re ineela.

en: The involvement of women in traditional male circumcision is back in the spotlight.
tsn: Re gatela kwa pele mme fa mafelo a rona a ngwaoboswa a ka senngwa, re tla dira thulaganyo ya gore re a baakanye.

en: The protracted debate has been revived by the recently released book titled Zajik Izinto by author Siphokazi Vannessa Mpofu.
tsn: Mongwe le mongwe yo o nang le tshedimosetso ya gore sefikantswe se se ka bonwa kae, o kopiwa go ikgolaganya le sepodisi.

en: Mpofu believes the involvement of women in this rite of passage of Xhosa boys into men could save lives as some of the initiates die during this ritual.
tsn: Go nna le seabe ga basadi mo setsong sa banna sa bogwera go boetse gape mo pepeneng.

en: Every year, during the initiation season the Eastern Cape Province experiences deaths of initiates.
tsn: Ngangisano e, e tsoseleditswe bošwa ke go gololwa ga buka ya setlhogo se se reng Zajik Izinto, e e kwadilweng ke Siphokazi Vannessa Mpofu.

en: Mpofu says it is up to each generation to choose whether to build or destroy.
tsn: Mpofu o dumela gore go tsaya karolo ga basadi mo moetlong o wa fa basimane ba maXhosa ba fetoga go nna banna, go ka boloka matshelo ka ntlha ya fa bangwe ba  bagwerisiwa ba tlhokafalela kwa meetlong oo.

en: She maintains that women can play a crucial role in changing the status quo.
tsn: Ngwaga mongwe le mongwe, ka nako ya setlha sa bogwera, porofense ya Kapa Botlhaba e itemogela dintsho tsa bagwerisiwa.

en: I am a firstborn girl and a firstborn girl in our tradition is considered as a man, as someone who speaks and negotiates with his brothers.
tsn: Mpofu a re go mo diatleng tsa setšhaba go tlhopha gore a ba a aga kgotsa ba a senya.

en: Mpofu says the generational gap between parents and their children often leads to misunderstandings.
tsn: A o dumela gore basadi ba ka tshameka karolo e e botlhokwa mo go fetoleng maemo a ga jaana.

en: Somehow, we clash. Us and our children.
tsn: Ke ngwana wa ntlha wa mosetsana mme go ya ka setso sa rona, ngwana wa ntlha wa mosetsana o  tsewa jaaka monna, jaaka mongwe yo o buang le go buisana le bo morwarragwe.

en: We clash because of the times.
tsn: Mpofu a re phatlha ya dingwaga e e leng teng fa gare ga batsadi le bana ba bona go le gantsi e dira gore ba se tlhaloganyane sentle.

en: So, we need to communicate about things.
tsn: Ka dinako tse dingwe, re ga re dumalane. Rona le bana ba rona.

en: We need to sit down and understand each other as parents and the children of today for the generations to come.
tsn: Ga re dumalane ka ntlha ya dinako.

en: Whatever we are doing, we are doing to correct the things that we did not like that were done by our parents for the generations to come.
tsn: Ka jalo, re tlhoka go buisana ka ga dilo tse.

en: The idea of women becoming involved is gaining traction.
tsn: Re tshwanetse go nna fa fatshe le go tlhaloganyana jaaka batsadi le bana ba gompieno, re direla le ba ba latelang.

en: Cultural Activist, Mncedi Liwani says women have a significant role in traditional circumcision.
tsn: Sengwe le sengwe se re se dirang, re se direla go siamisa dilo tse re neng re sa di rate, tseo di neng di dirwa ke batsadi ba rona. Re direla ba ba santseng ba tla.

en: What we are accepting is the intervention of mothers that they must come to the fore and culturally, they have a responsibility, especially in the Xhosa culture.
tsn: Kakanyo ya gore basadi ba nne le seabe e simolola go nna tlhotlheletso.

en: They have a responsibility whilst they are growing these boys.
tsn: Molwela-setso, Mncedi Liwani a re, basadi ba na le seabe se se botlhokwa mo gwerisiweng ga setso.

en: They are giving them guidance for them to be proper men.
tsn: Se re se na go amogela ke tsereganyo ya bomme, ya gore ba tshwanetse go tla pele mme go ya ka setso, ba na le maikarabelo, segolobogolo ka setso sa maXhosa.

en: Now, if the women of this country could embrace their responsibility, first of becoming mothers to our boys, and we, as men, can take and teach them how to be good men, if ever we can do such, I think we will be in a good position to say, parents of our time have produced a good fabric of society.
tsn: Ba na le maikarabelo fa ba ntse ba godisa basimane ba.

en: Traditional leaders say women have always been part of this rite of passage, but with limitations.
tsn: Ba ba naya dikaelo tsa gore e nne banna ba ba maleba.

en: Chairperson of the Eastern Cape House of Traditional Leaders, Chief Langa Mavuso says, Mothers prepare boys for medical fitness of initiates, whether or not they do not have underlying diseases and so on, the beer is prepared by women, the diet for initiates is prepared by women and everything that would make sure that the boy becomes well, it is a woman that drives that, even the grass cutting for thatching the house is done by women.
tsn: Jaanong, fa basadi ba naga e ba ka amogela maikarabelo a bona, a ntlha e le a go nna bomme mo basimaneng ba rona, mme rona jaaka banna, re ba rute go nna banna ba ba siameng, fa re ka dira jalo, ke akanya gore re tla bo re le mo maemong a a botoka a gore re ka re, batsadi ba dinako tsa rona ba agile setšhaba se se siameng.

en: So, it is not correct to say women do not have a role in initiation.
tsn: Baeteledipele ba setso ba re basadi kgale ba simolotse go nna karolo ya moetlo, mme ka tsela e e lekanyeditsweng.

en: The pandemic is also creating difficulties with the custom.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa Ntlo ya Baeteledipele ba Setso kwa Kapa Botlhaba, Kgosi Langa Mavuso A re, bo mme ba baakanya basimane gore ba itekanele mo mebeleng, ba na le malwetse kgotsa ba sena ona. Bojalwa bo dirwa ke basadi, dijo tsa bagwerisiwa di rulaganngwa ke basadi, seo se ne se tlaa netefatsa gore ngwana wa mosimane o nna sentle, ke mosadi yo o tlhotlheletsang seo. Le go segiwa ga bojang jo bo rulelang ntlo, go dirwa ke basadi.

en: With the winter initiation season cancelled last year while the summer initiation season was suspended halfway due to a high infection rate among initiates in December, a decision is still to be made about the coming winter season.
tsn: Ka jalo, go fosagetse gore re re basadi ga ba na seabe mo thulaganyong ya bogwera.

en: Jose Maponyane, the centre manager of Boulders Mall in Midrand, says the incident of him arguing with a customer was taken out of context.
tsn: Leroborobo le lona le tlhola mathata mo moetlong o.

en: This was heard during a hearing at the CRL Commission, where Maponyane appeared to tell his side of the story, following a complaint by Ndebele activist, Thando Mahlangu.
tsn: Ka ntlha ya fa bogwera jo bo tsenang ka setlha sa mariga bo tlogetswe mo ngwageng o o fetileng, fa jo bo tsenang ka setlha sa selemo jona bo emisitswe nakwana ka ntlha ya seelo sa tshwaetso e e kwa godimo ya bagwerisiwa ka Sedimonthole, tshwetso e sa ntse e tlaa tsewa ka setlha se se latelang sa mariga.

en: In March, Maponyane allegedly forced Mahlangu to leave the mall for being dressed in traditional regalia.
tsn: Jose Maponyane, motsamaisi wa senthara ya Boulders kwa Midrand , a re tiragalo ya go ngangisana ga gagwe le modirisi ga e tsewa ka mokgwa o e diragetseng ka ona.

en: Mahlangu was inside a store at the mall when he was told that his dress code was inappropriate.
tsn: Kgang e, e utlwilwe ka nako ya theetso kwa khomišheneng ya CRL, koo Maponyane a tlhageletseng gona go bua letlhakore la gagwe la kgang, go latela ngongorego e e tlhagisitsweng ke molweladiphetogo wa Kwa Ndebele, Thando Mahlangu.

en: Maponyane was suspended shortly after a video of the altercation went viral on social media.
tsn: Ka kgwedi ya Mopitlwe, Maponyane o ile a pateletsa Mahlangu gore a tswe ka mmolo ka ntlha ya fa a ne a apere diaparo tsa setso.

en: The CRL Commission summoned Maponyane to allow him the opportunity to explain the sequence of events that occurred at the Boulders Mall on 24 March.
tsn: Mahlangu o ne a le ka mo gore ga lebenkele kwa mmolong fa a ne a bolelelwa gore moaparo wa gagwe ga o a lolama.

en: Maponyane told the commission that he apologised profusely for the incident, however, he feels that the incident was taken out of context when the argument got heated.
tsn: Maponyane o ne a emisiwa nakwana morago ga gore bidio e e bontshang kgotlhang e aname mo mafaratlhatlheng.

en: I would like to take this opportunity to extend my sincere apology to Mr Mahlangu with regard to the humiliation and pain and suffering occurred as a result of the incident that happened on the 24th.
tsn: Khomišhene ya CRL e biditse Maponyane go mo naya tshono ya go tlhalosa tatelano ya ditiragalo tse di diragetseng kwa mmolong wa Boulders ka di 24 tsa kgwedi ya Mopitlwe.

en: It’s unfortunate that the incident was misinterpreted as I had a cordial discussion with Mr Mahlangu before the video was taken, which was taken out of context.
tsn: Maponyane o boleletse Khomišhene gore o  ikopetse maitshwarelo ka tiragalo e, le fa go le jalo, o ne a ikutlwa ekete tiragalo e, e tserwe ka tsela e seng yona fa ngangisano ya bona e ne e ya magoletsana.

en: I deeply regret the incident except that the treatment of Mr Mahlangu was totally devoid of principles of human dignity and equality that underpins our constitution.
tsn: Ke rata go tsaya tšhono e go romela maitshwarelo a me kwa go Rre Mahlangu malebana le kutlobotlhoko le tshotlego e a itemogetseng yona ka ntlha ya tiragalo e e diragetseng ka di 24.

en: Maponyane says that prior to the video being taken, he had a cordial conversation with Mahlangu where he asked him to cover up more of his body because other customers were feeling uncomfortable around him.
tsn: Go a swabisa gore tiragalo e, ga e a tlhalosiwa ka tsela e e diragetseng ka yona gonne ke nnile le dipuisano le Rre Mahlangu pele ga kgatiso ya bidio e e tlhageletseng ka tsela e e seng yona.

en: He says Mahlangu then repeatedly refused to cover up his body and thats when he asked him to leave when the video was taken.
tsn: Ke ikotlhaela tiragalo e e diragatseng thata kwa ntle ga gore tshwaro ya ka Rre Mahlangu e ne e sena seriti sa botho le tekatekano e e tshegetsang Molaotheo wa rona.

en: The security came back to me and said, Sir, the gentleman refuses to cover and then I was obligated, as a centre manager, to go and address the situation.
tsn: Maponyane a re, pele ga go gatisiwa ga bidio e, o nnile le puisano e e siameng le Mahlangu fa a ne a mo kopa go fitlha dikarolo tse dingwe tsa mmele wa gagwe ka gonne badirisi ba bangwe ba ne ba ikutlwa ba sa phuthuloga gaufi le ene.

en: So, I went there and had a cordial discussion with Mr Mahlangu.
tsn: A re Mahlangu o ne a gana go fitlha dikarolo tse dingwe tsa mmele wa gagwe mme ke teng fa a mo kopileng teng gore a tsamaye fa bidio e ne e tsewa.

en: When I asked him to cover because this is a public space, he said no, I am not going to cover because it is my tradition and I said, but you are exposing your underwear and an argument ensued.
tsn: Mosireletsi o ne a boela kwa go nna mme a re, rra, Rre yo o gana go ikatega mme ke ne ka patelesega, jaaka ke le motsamaisi wa Senthara, go samagana le maemo.

en: I then said this is a public space and there are kids in the mall and people are already complaining and if you don’t want to, then I will have to ask security to escort you out.
tsn: Ka jalo, ke ne ka ya koo mme ka nna le dipuisano tse di siameng le Rre Mahlangu.

en: CRL Chairperson, Professor David Mosoma, says it pains him to have seen such a heated argument over traditional attire.
tsn: Fa ke ne ke mo kopa gore a ikatege ka ntlha ya fa a le mo lefelong la setšhaba, o rile nnyaa, ga ke kitla ke ikatega ka gonne se ke setso sa me, mme nna ka re, fela o tlhagisitse diaparo tsa gago tsa fa teng, ke fa ngangisano e simolotseng teng foo.

en: I sit here with a very painful heart because I would have expected this behaviour or this interaction not between people who themselves have suffered so much in the loss of their culture and their identity.
tsn: Ke ne ka re, lefelo le ke lefelo la setšhaba mme go na le bana mo mmolong o, gape batho le bona ba setse ba simolotse go ngongorega. Fa o sa batle, ke tlaa tshwanelwa ke go kopa mosireletsi a go ntshetse kwa ntle.

en: Mosoma says the commission will study all the evidence of the incident and then make remedial recommendations later in April.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa CRL, Moporofesara David Mosoma a re, go mo utlwisa botlhoko gore a bo a bone ngangisano e e tletseng tšhakgalo jalo ka ntlha ya diaparo tsa setso.

en: Discussion on preserving and celebrating African culture and history.
tsn: Ke dutse fa ka pelo e e utlwileng botlhoko thata ka gonne ke ne ke sa solofela maitsholo kgotsa kgolagano ya mofuta o magareng ga batho ba ba sotlegileng thata ka ntlha ya go latlhegelwa ke setso le boitshupo jwa bona.

en: Crowds will return to Madrid’s Las Ventas bullring for the first time since the start of the coronavirus pandemic next month for a charity bullfight to raise money for matadors left jobless by COVID-19, officials said on Saturday.
tsn: Mosoma a re, khomišhene e tlaa buisa bosupi jotlhe jwa tiragalo eo mme e dire dikatlenegiso kwa bofelong jwa kgwedi ya Moranang.

en: Almost all of Spain’s bullrings, or plazas, have remained closed for the last year due to lockdown restrictions plunging the controversial spectacle and its matadors into financial crisis.
tsn: Puisano ka ga go somarela le go itumelela setso sa Seaforika le hisetori.

en: A maximum of 6,000 people will be allowed in to watch the May 2 bullfight, Madrids regional government said.
tsn: Matshwititshwiti a batho a tlaa boela kwa La Ventas kwa Madrid lwantlha fa e sale go simolola leroborobo la mogare wa corona, mo kgweding e e latelang go ya go bogela ntwa ya dipoo e e tlaa tshwarwang go kgobokanya madi a go thusa batho ba ba lwang le dipoo ba COVID-19 e batlogetseng ba sena ditiro. Go buile batlhankedi ka Lamatlhatso.

en: That is equivalent to 40% capacity as the arena is considered the world’s most important bullring by fans.
tsn: Mesako ya go lwa le dipoo ya kwa Spain fa e sale e tswadilwe mo ngwageng o o fetileng ka ntlha ya dikgoreletsi tsa kiletsomesepele tse di tsentseng batho ba ba lwang le dipoo mo mathateng a ditšhelete.

en: Face masks will be mandatory and strict social distancing measures will be in place at the event.
tsn: Palogodimo ya batho ba le 6,000, ba tlaa letlwa go bogela ntwa ya dipoo e e tlaa diragalang ka la 2 Motsheganong. Go bua kgaolo ya puso ya kwa Madrid.

en: Major bullfighting festivals such as San Isidro, Sevillas April Fair, and Pamplonas San Fermin in July were cancelled last year, with bulls being sent from ranches straight to the slaughterhouse.
tsn: Se se lekana le 40% jaaka baetleetsi ba tsaya lefelo leo jaaka mosako o o botlhokwa thata lefatshe ka bophara.

en: But even before lockdown bans brought bullfighting to a virtual standstill, the traditional emblem of Spanish culture had been struggling for survival in recent years.
tsn: Dimaseke e tlaa nna patelesego mme dikgato tse di gagametseng tsa go katogana di tlaa tsenngwa tirisong kwa moletlong eno.

en: Attitudes towards bullfighting differ among Spaniards with some considering it an essential part of the culture while others say it is a cruel spectacle.
tsn: Meletlo ya dintwa tsa dipoo e megolo e e jaaka San Isidro, Sevillas, April Fair le Pamplonas San Fermin ka kgwedi ya Phukwi e ne ya phimolwa mo ngwageng o o fetileng, mme dipoo di ne tsa tlosiwa kwa dipolaseng, tsa romelwa ka tlhamalalo kwa matlhabelong.

en: A 2019 poll for El Espaol, an online newspaper, found 56.4% of Spaniards opposed bullfighting, while 24.7% supported it and 18.9% were indifferent.
tsn: Fela le pele ga dithibelo tsa kiletsomesepele di dira go dintwa tsa dipoo di eme tsi, letshwao la setso sa kwa Spain le ne le ntse le thatafalelwa ke go itsetsepela mo dingwageng tse di fetileng.

en: Stellenbosch Wine Routes celebrated its 50th anniversary this year, a milestone it shares with the birth of the South African wine tourism industry.
tsn: Maikutlo kgatlhanong le ntwa ya dipoo a a farologana magareng ga baagi ba kwa Spain, fa bangwe ba e tsaya jaaka karolo e e botlhokwa ya setso sa bona, mme ba bangwe ba re ke tiragalo e e setlhogo.

en: The Wine Route was developed in 1971.
tsn: Go ya ka potsolotso ya 2019 malebana le El Espaol, kuranta ya mo  mafaratlhatlheng e fitlhetse gore, 56.4% ya baagi ba Spain e kgatlhanong le ntwa ya dipoo, fa 24.7% e ne e e tshegetsa mme 18.9% yona e e itlhokomolositse.

en: Offering the highest density of premium wines in the country, Stellenbosch Wine Routes paved the way for the creation of the country’s wine tourism industry
tsn: Stellenbosch Wine Routes e ne e keteka segopotso sa ngwaga wa bo 50 monongwaga, phitlhelelo e e botlhokwa e e e tlhakanetseng le intaseteri ya bojanala ya beine mo Aforikaborwa.

en: The industry contributes R7.2 billion to GDP annually.
tsn: The wine route e tlhamilwe ka ngwaga wa 1971.

en: Johan Malan from the Simonsig Estate says the wine route has grown tremendously over the years, attracting overseas and local guests.
tsn: Jaaka e le yona e e nang le palo e e kwa godimo ya karolotuelo ya dibeine mo nageng, Stellenbosch Wine Routes e tlhagoletse ba intaseteri ya bojanala ya beine tsela.

en: I think the biggest visionary that happened in these 50 years is the fact that it helped to spread the culture of wine drinking.
tsn: Intaseteri e, e tsenya dibilione di le R7.2 go GDP ngwaga le ngwaga.

en: And also what happened later is the fact that restaurants started up on the wine estates, brought the food and wine together and that made Stellenbosch the culinary capital of South Africa.
tsn: Johan Malan wa kwa Simonsig Estate a re wine route e godile thata mo dingwageng tse di fetileng, mme e ngoka baeng ba kwa moseja le ba selegae.

en: If you look at the top 10 restaurants in the country, four are based on the Stellenbosch wine route.
tsn: Ke akanya gore ponelopele e kgolo e e diragetseng mo dingwageng tse 50 tse, ke ntlha ya gore e thusitse go anamisa setso go nwa beine.

en: The UK bids a final farewell to Prince Philip at a ceremonial funeral.
tsn: Mme gape se se diragetseng morago ga moo, ke ntlha ya gore diresetšhurente simolotse go nna le ditsha tsa beine, di kopantse dijo le beine mmogo mme seo se dirile gore Stellenbosch e nne khepetlele ya dijo ya Aforikaborwa.

en: Prince Philip died last week Friday at Windsor Castle with the Queen reportedly by his side.
tsn: Fa o ka lebelela diresetšhurente tse di mo maemong a ntlha a a 10 mo nageng ya rona, di le nne tsa tsona, di ikaegileng mo tseleng ya beine ya kwa Stellenbosch

en: Meghan, the wife of Britain’s Prince Harry, will watch the funeral of Prince Philip at her home in California on Saturday after she was advised by her doctor not to travel while pregnant, a source familiar with the situation said.
tsn: UK e laela Kgosana Phillip kwa phitlhong.

en: Meghan will watch as Harry walks in procession behind the coffin of the 99-year-old husband of Queen Elizabeth and alongside other members of the royal family, including his father Prince Charles and brother Prince William.
tsn: Prince Phillip o tlhokafetse mo bekeng e e fetileng ka Labotlhano kwa ntlong ya segosi kwa Windsor, a na le kgosigadi mo letlhakoreng la gagwe.

en: The funeral, to be held at the St George’s Chapel in Windsor Castle where Harry and Meghan married in 2018, will mark the first time the prince has met his family since the couple gave an explosive interview to Oprah Winfrey in March.
tsn: Meghan, mosadi wa ga kgosana Harry wa ko Britain, o tla lebelela phitlho ya ga Kgosana Phillip kwa legaeng la gagwe kwa California ka Lamatlhatso morago ga fa a eleditswe ke ngaka ya gagwe gore a seka a tsaya maeto ka ntlha ya fa a imile, motswedi o itse maemo a a rialo.

en: In it they accused one unnamed royal of making a racist remark and said Meghan’s pleas for help when she felt suicidal had been ignored.
tsn: Meghan o tlaa lebelela jaaka Harry a tsamaya le mokoloko kwa moraga ga lekase la monna wa ga kgosigadi Elizabeth wa dingwaga di le 99 mmogo le maloko a mangwe a lelapa la segosi, go akaretsa le rraagwe Kgosana Charles le morwarragwe, kgosana William.

en: The source, who spoke on the condition of anonymity, said Meghan, known officially as the Duchess of Sussex, had hoped to attend the funeral
tsn: Phitlho e e tlaa tshwarwelwang kwa kerekeng ya St George kwa ntlong ya segosi kwa Windsor, kwa Harry le Meghan ba nyalaneng teng ka 2018, e tla nna  lwa ntlha kgosana e kopana le ba lelapa la gagwe morago ga gore ena le mogatse ba tshware dipotsolotso le Oprah Winfrey ka kgwedi ya Mopitlwe.

en: but she was not cleared for travel by her physician.
tsn: Mo dipotsolotsong tseo, ba latofaditse mongwe wa lelapa sa segosi, yo ba sa mmitsang ka leina, ka go dira tshwaelo ya bosemorafe mme a re, kopo ya ga  Meghan ya go thusiwa fa a ne a na le maikutlo a go tsaya botshelo jwa gagwe, e ikgatholositswe.

en: Much media attention will focus on the royal’s behaviour towards Harry.
tsn: Motswedi, yo kopileng go nna tlhokaina, o rile Meghan, yo o itsegeng jaaka mosadi wa semmuso wa Sussex, o ne a solofetse go tsenela phitlho.

en: The two princes will walk in the procession behind Philip’s four children and separated by their cousin Peter Phillips.
tsn: Fela ngaka ya gagwe ga e a mo letla gore a tseye maeto.

en: Harry and Meghan moved to Los Angeles and quit royal duties last year.
tsn: Bontsi jwa bobegadikgang bo tlaa tsepamisa megopolo mo maitsholong a maloko a segosi kgatlhanong le Harry.

en: The couple also provided a wreath that included flowers such as the national flower of Greece to represent Philip’s heritage, and Sea Holly to reflect his ties to the navy.
tsn: Dikgosana tse pedi di tlaa tsamaya ka mokoloko kwa morago ga bana ba ga Phillip ba le bane mme ba tlaa kgaoganngwa ke ntsalaabona, Peter Phillips.

en: The card was handwritten by Meghan.
tsn: Harry le Meghan ba fudugetse kwa Los Angeles mme ba lesa ditiro tsa bona tsa segosi mo ngwageng o o fetileng.

en: When Prince Philip’s coffin is conveyed to church for his funeral service, it will be taken in a specially-commissioned Land Rover that the British royal himself helped design.
tsn: Banyalani bano ba tsamaisitse kgare e e neng e akaretsa malomo a a tshwanang le lelomo la kwa Greece go bontsha ngwao ya ga Phillip, le lelomo le le bidiwang “Sea Holly” go bontsha kgolagano ya gagwe le sesole sa kwa lewatleng.

en: Philip, the husband of Queen Elizabeth, died last week aged 99 and his funeral will be held entirely at Windsor Castle on Saturday, with no public allowed.
tsn: Karata e ne e kwadilwe ka letsogo ke Meghan.

en: Although the event has been scaled down because of COVID-19 restrictions, many traditional elements will remain, with a military procession inside the castle and pallbearers from units with close links to Philip.
tsn: Fa lekase la ga kgosana Phillip le isiwa kwa kerekeng go ya go simolola tirelo ya phitlho ya gagwe, le tlaa tsewa ka sejanaga se se kgethegileng sa Land Rover, se kgosana e ya kwa Britain e nnileng le seabe mo go tlhamiweng ga sona.

en: However, in place of the usual hearse, Philip’s body will be taken from its current resting place to St Georges Chapel on a Land Rover Defender which has been modified to carry a coffin  in keeping with Philips original plans for the funeral.
tsn: Phillip, monna wa ga kgosigadi Elizabeth, o tlhokafaletse mo bekeng e e fetileng a le dingwaga di le 99 mme phitlho ya gagwe e tlaa tshwarelwa kwa ntlong ya segosi kwa Windsor ka Lamatlhatso, mme setšhaba ga se a letlelelwa.

en: Prime Minister Boris Johnson told parliament on Monday it was fitting that Philip would be taken to his final resting place on a Land Rover, with a long wheelbase and a capacious rear cabin, which the prince had helped design.
tsn: Le fa dilo tse dintsi tse di amang tirelo e di fokoditswe ka ntlha ya dikgoreletsi tsa COVID-19, dikarolo tse dintsi tsa setso di tlaa nna teng. Go tlaa nna le mokoloko wa sesole mo gare ga ntlo ya segosi, le batho ba ba tlaa tshwarang lekase go tswa kwa diyuniting tse di nang le kgolagano e e tseneletseng go Philip.

en: The Jaguar Land Rover will be used to transport the coffin of Britain’s Prince Philip.
tsn: Le fa go le jalo, mo boemong jwa koloi ya ditopo e e tlwaelegileng, mmele wa ga Phillip o tlaa tsewa go tswa kwa lefelong la ona la boikhutso, go ya kwa kerekeng ya St George ka sejanaga sa Land Rover Defender e e fetotsweng gore e kgone go pega lekase ka maikaelelo a go tsamaisana le dithulaganyo tsa ga Phillip tsa phitlho.

en: South African jazz pianist, Moses Taiwa Molelekwa, would have turned 48 today.
tsn: Tonakgolo Boris Johnson o boleletse palamente ka Mosupologo gore, go ne go le matshwanedi gore Phillip a isiwe kwa lefelong la gagwe la bofelo la boikhutso ka sejanaga sa Land Rover, se kgosana e nnileng le seabe mo tlhamiweng ga sona.

en: He died 20 years ago.
tsn: Sejanaga sa Jaguar Land Rover se tlaa dirisiwa go tsamaisa lekase la kgosana Phillip wa kwa Britain.

en: On 13 February 2001, the bodies of Molelekwa and his wife Florence Mtoba were found in an office which they shared in Johannesburg.
tsn: Moletsi wa piano wa mmino wa Jazz mo Aforikaborwa, Moses Taiwa Molelekwa, o ka bo a tshwere dingwaga di le 48 gompieno.

en: They had an eight-year-old son at the time.
tsn: O tlhokafetseng dingwaga di le 20 tse di fetileng.

en: His father, Jerry, says he’s still struggling to find closure.
tsn: Ka di 13 tsa kgwedi ya Tlhakole 2001, mmele wa ga Molelekwa le wa mosadi wa gagwe Florence Mtoba, e fitlhetswe kwa ofising e ba neng ba e tlhakanetse kwa Johannesburg.

en: It’s easy for people to say just find closure.
tsn: Ba ne ba na le morwa wa dingwaga di le robedi ka nako e.

en: It’s not a robot you know. Its emotions you know
tsn: Rraagwe, Jerry, a re o santse a retelelwa ke go lebala.

en: So, I still have a lot of questions and they’ve not been addressed even in the report.
tsn: Go bonolo mo bathong gore ba go reye ba re, lebala.

en: The conclusion is that he killed his wife and then killed himself, but I don’t see any substance to that.
tsn: Ga e se roboto wa itse. Ke maikutlo.

en: When I look at the report, it doesn’t state actually, just gives a statement but its not saying this is the object that was used, says Molelekwa.
tsn: Ka jalo ke sa ntse ke na le dipotso di le dintsi mme ga di ise di arabiwe mo raporotong.

en: A music academy has established in his honour.
tsn: Bokhutlo ke gore, o bolailwe mosadi wa gagwe mme a ipolaya, fela ga ke bone moko wa kgang eo.

en: Molelekwa played with the likes of the late Miriam Makeba and Jonas Gwangwa in the 1980s.
tsn: Fa ke lebelela raporoto e, ga e tlhalose tota tota, e neela polelo fela mme ga e kae gore sebetsa se se dirisitsweng ke se, go bua Molelekwa.

en: Molelekwa named Herbie Hancock, Bheki Mseleku and Abdullah Ibrahim as major influences on his music.
tsn: Akatemi ya mmino e tlhomilwe go mo tlotla.

en: Thembelihle Dunjana says Molelekwa’s music lives through young artists.
tsn: Molelekwa o ne a diragatsa le batho ba ba tshwanang le bo Miriam makeba le Jonas Gwangwa ka dingwaga tsa bo 1980.

en: Queen Elizabeth will bid a final farewell to Prince Philip, her husband of more than seven decades, at a ceremonial funeral on Saturday, with the nation set to fall silent to mark the passing of a pivotal figure in the British monarchy.
tsn: Molelekwa o kaile Herbie Hancock, Bheki Mseleku le Abdullah Ibrahim jaaka batho ba ba nnileng le tlhotlheletso e kgolo mo mminong wa gagwe.

en: There will be no public procession, all the congregation will wear masks, and the queen, who says the death has left a huge void, will sit alone.
tsn: Thembelihle Dunjana a re mmino wa ga Molelekwa o tshela mo bathong ba bašwa.

en: She’s the queen, she will behave with the extraordinary dignity and extraordinary courage that she always does.
tsn: Kgosigadi Elizabeth o tlaa laela kgosana Phillip la bofelo, monna wa gagwe wa masome a dingwaga a a fetang supa, kwa tirelo phitlhong ka Lamatlhatso, le setšhaba se tlaa nna le motsotso wa tidimalo go tlotla loso lwa motho yo o tlotlegileng mo mmusong wa bobusaesi wa kwa Britain.

en: And at the same time, she is saying farewell to someone to who she was married for 73 years, said Justin Welby, the Archbishop of Canterbury, who will help officiate at the service.
tsn: Ga go kitla go nna le mokoloko wa setšhaba, phuthego yotlhe e tlaa apara dimaseke mme Kgosigadi, yo o reng loso lo tlogetse phatlha e kgolo thata, o tlaa nna e le nosi.

en: He said he expected the funeral to resonate with the millions of people around the world who have lost loved ones during the pandemic.
tsn: Ke kgosigadi, o tlaa itshola ka seriti le bopelokgale jaaka a dira ka metlha.

en: I think there will be tears in many homes because other names will be on their minds, faces they’ve lost that they don’t see again, funerals they couldn’t go to as many haven’t been able to go to this one because it is limited to 30 in the congregation, he said.
tsn: Ka yona nako eo, o laela motho yo o neng a le mo lenyalong le ena dingwaga di le 73, go bua Justin Welby, Mobishopomogolo wa Canterbury, yo o tlaa thusang ka tsamaiso ya tirelo.

en: That will break many a heart.
tsn: O rile o solofetse fa phitlho e tlaa nyalelana le dimilione tsa batho go ralala lefatshe, ba ba latlhegetsweng ke batho ba ba ba ratang ka nako ya leroborobo.

en: He called on the British public to pray for the monarch.
tsn: Ke akanya gore go tla nna le dikeledi mo magaeng a le mantsi ka ntlha ya fa maina a mangwe a tlaa tla mo megopolong ya bona,  difatlhego tse di ba latlhegetseng tse ba sa tlholeng ba di bona, diphitlho tse ba paletsweng ke go ya kwa go tsona jaaka ba le bantsi ba paletswe ke go tla mo go e ka ntlha ya gore e lekanyeditswe phuthego ya batho ba le 30, a rialo.

en: Philip, the Duke of Edinburgh, who had been by his wife’s side throughout her record-breaking 69-year reign, died peacefully at the age of 99 last week at the castle where the royal couple had been staying during a recent lockdown.
tsn: Seo se tlaa roba dipelo di le dintsi.

en: A decorated Royal Navy veteran of World War Two, his funeral, much of which was planned in meticulous detail by the prince himself, has a strong military feel, with personnel from across the armed forces playing prominent roles.
tsn: O ne a kopa setšhaba go rapelela bogosi.

en: Army bands, Navy pipers and Royal Marine buglers will take part, while his coffin will be conveyed from its resting place inside the castle to the chapel on the back of a specially-converted Land Rover that he helped design himself.
tsn: Phillip, kgosana ya kwa Edinburgh, yo o nnileng mo letlhakoreng la mosadi wa gagwe mo dingwageng di le 69 tsa puso, o tlhokafetse ka kagiso a le dingwaga di le 99 mo bekeng e e fetileng kwa ntlong ya segosi, kwa balekane ba ba neng ba nna teng ka nako ya kiletsomesepele.

en: At 1400 GMT, before the service starts, there will be a minutes silence.
tsn: Mogaka wa sesole sa kwa Lewatle sa Ntwa ya Lefatshe ya Bobedi, yo o nang le maitemogelo a mantsi, phitlho ya gagwe, e e neng e rulagantswe ka maatlametlo ke kgosana ba boene,  e na le ponagalo e kgolo ya sesole, le badiri ba sesole ba ba tshamekang karolo e kgolo thata.

en: The congregation will be limited to members of the royal family and Philips family, with no place for political figures such as Prime Minister Boris Johnson, who will watch the event on television where it will be broadcast live.
tsn: Masole a dibente le sesole sa kwa Lewatleng ba tlaa tsaya karolo, fa lekase la gagwe lona le tlaa tsewa go tloga kwa lefelong la lona la boikhutso ka mo teng ga ntlo ya segosi, go ya kwa kerekeng, le pegilwe mo godimo ga koloi e e kgethegileng ya Land Rover, e a nnileng le seabe mo go dirweng ga yona.

en: The entire event will be held within the walls of Windsor Castle and the public have been asked not to congregate outside or at any other royal residences to show their respects.
tsn: Ka 1400 GMT, pele a ga tirelo e simololaa, go tlaa nna le metsotso wa tidimalo.

en: With a reputation for a tough, no-nonsense attitude and a propensity for occasional gaffes, Philip was credited with helping his wife, who he married in 1947, modernise the monarchy in the changing post-war period, and to deal with the many crises that befell the institution.
tsn: Phuthego e tlaa bo e lekanyeditswe go maloko a lelapa le ba lelapa la ga Philip. Ga go kitla go nna le lefelo la bodulo la borradipolotiki ba ba tshwanang le Tonakgolo Boris Johnson, yo o tla lebelelang tirelo mo thelebišeneng, mo e tlabo e gasiwa teng.

en: Last month, the royals faced their greatest such tumult in decades when Prince Harry, grandson of Elizabeth and Philip, gave an explosive interview to Oprah Winfrey with his wife Meghan, who is not attending the funeral as she is heavily pregnant and was advised not to travel.
tsn: Tiragalo yotlhe e tlaa tshwarelwa ka fa gare ga dipota tsa ntlo ya segosi kwa Windsor mme setšhaba se kopilwe go se kgobokane kwa ntle kgotsa kwa dingwe tsa dikago tsa segosi go bontsha tlotlo.

en: This is a funeral.
tsn: Jaaka motho yo o neng a itsege a le bosilo ebile a tlotlegile thata, Phillip o ne a kaiwa fa a ne a thusa mosadi wa gagwe yo a mo nyetseng ka ngwaga wa 1947, ka go ntšhwafatsa bobusaesi morago ga nako ya dintwa, le samagana le mathata a mantsi a a tlhagileng kwa bogosing.

en: The arrangements have been agreed, and they represent her majesty’s wishes.
tsn: Mo kgweding e e fetileng, ba bogosi ba itemogetse mathata a mantsi a ba iseng ba itemogeleng  ona mo dingwagasomeng fa Kgosana Harry, setlogolo sa ga Elizabeth le Phillip, a ne a fana ka potsolotso go Oprah Winfrey le mosadi wa gagwe Meghan, yo a sa kgonang go nna teng kwa phitlhong ka ntlha ya fa imile e bile a eleditswe gore a se tseye maeto.

en: The palace has emphasised that while the occasion would have the due pageantry that marks the passing of a senior royal, it remained an occasion for a mourning family to mark the passing of a husband, father, grandfather and great-grandfather.
tsn: Se ke phitlho.

en: The couples second son Prince Andrew has said his mother was being stoical in the face of a loss that she had described as having left a huge void in her life.
tsn: Dithulaganyo di dirilwe ka tumalano, mme di tsaisana le dikeletso tsa kgosana.

en: It’s a great loss, he said
tsn: Ba lefelo ba bogosi ba gateletse gore, le fa tirelo e nnile le susupo sa gore go tlhokafetse motho yo mogolo kwa bogosing, e nnile tirelo ya go fa ba lelapa nako go hutsafalela go tlhokafala ga ga Rre wa lelapa, rremogolo le rremogologolwana

en: I think the way I would put it is, we’ve lost almost the grandfather of the nation.
tsn: Morwa wa bobedi wa balekane ba, Kgosana Andrew o rile mmaagwe o ne a bontsha e motho o tiileng le fa a lebagane le tatlhegelo e a tlhalositseng fa e mo tlogetse ka phatlha e kgolo mo botshelong jwa gagwe.

en: Garrett Bradleys award-winning documentary Time may be about incarceration, but, according to the director, its really a love story.
tsn: Yona ke tatlhegelo e kgolo, a rialo

en: The Oscar-nominated film follows Fox Rich over several decades as she fights for her jailed husband Rob, serving a 60-year sentence for a bank robbery the couple carried out in the 1990s, to be released from prison in Louisiana.
tsn: Ke akanya gore tsela e nka e bayang ka yona ke gore, re latlhegetswe ke rremogolo wa setšhaba sotlhe.

en: I went into the project with the intention of extending the conversation around incarceration from a woman’s point of view, from a family’s point of view, Bradley told Reuters in an interview from California.
tsn: Dokumentari e e gapileng sekgele ya ga Garrett Bradley, Time, e ka tswa e bua ka botshelo jwa kwa kgolegelong, mme, go ya ka motsamaisi, yona tota ke kgang e e buang ka lorato.

en: I would say that Time is first and foremost a love story that’s rooted in Fox Rich, the family matriarch who dedicates 21 years of her life and her family’s life to re-uniting her family.
tsn: Filimi e e tlhophilweng go gapa sekgele sa Oscar e, e sala Fox Rich morago mo dingwagasomeng di le mmalwa fa a lwela  monna wa gagwe, yo a atlholetsweng dingwaga di le 60 kwa kgolegelong ka ntlha ya tsietso ya banka e balekane ba ba e dirileng ka dingwaga tsa bo 1990, gore a gololwe kwa kgolegelong ya kwa Louisiana.

en: Following a previous film on the same theme, Bradley began filming Time with Rich and her sons in 2017 with the aim of releasing a 13-minute short.
tsn: Ke ne ka tsena mo porojekeng ka maikaelelo a go atolosa dipuisano ka ga botshelo jwa kwa kgolegelong go tswa mo letlhakoreng la me jaaka motho wa mosadi. Bradley o boleletse Reuters mo dipotsolotsong kwa California.

en: On the last day, Rich, who served a three-and-a-half-year sentence for the robbery, gave her more than 100 hours of her own footage to use.
tsn: Ke tla re “Time” ke kgang ya lerato, e e ikaegileng mo go Fox Rich, motho wa lelapa yo o neelang ka dingwaga di le 21 tsa botshelo jwa gagwe le botshelo jwa lelapa la gagwe gore a kgone go kopanya ba lelapa la gagwe gape.

en: The result is old video diaries woven in with recent material, in which Rich is seen caring for her family over the years without her husband around.
tsn: Fa re latela filimi e e fitileng, e e nang le moono o o tshwanang le wa filimi e, Bradley simolotse go gatisa “Time” le Rich le basimane ba gagwe ka 2017 ka maikaelelo a go golola filimi ya bokhutshwane jwa metsotso e le 13.

en: I like to think that there isn’t anything in the film that doesn’t speak to love and to unity and self-definition, Bradley said.
tsn: Ka letsatsi la bofelo, Rich, yo o ntseng kwa kgolegelong dingwaga di le tharo le halofo ka ntlha ya borukhutlhi, o mo file kgatiso ya diura tse di fetang 100 gore a e dirise.

en: Facebook Incs independent oversight board said on Friday it had extended the timeline for deciding whether to uphold former US President Donald Trump’s indefinite suspension from Facebook and Instagram.
tsn: Dipholo tsa teng ke dibidio tsa kgale  tse di ntšhwafaditsweng, tse mo go tsona, Rich a bonwang a tlhokomela ba lelapa la gagwe mo dingwageng tse di fetileng kwa ntle ga monna wa gagwe.

en: The board, created by Facebook in response to criticism over its handling of problematic content, wrote in a tweet that it would announce the decision in the coming weeks.
tsn: Ke rata go akanya gore ga go sepe mo filiming e, se se sa bueng ka lorato le tshwaragano le go itlhalosa gore o mang. Bradley o buile jalo.

en: Facebook indefinitely blocked Trump’s access to his Facebook and Instagram accounts over concerns of further violent unrest following the January 6 storming of the US Capitol by his supporters.
tsn: Boto ya bookamedi e e ikemetseng ya Facebook e rile ka Labotlhano, e okeditse nako ya go swetsa gore a e tlaa tshegetsa go sekegiwa ga moporesidente wa maloba wa kwa US, Donald Trump kwa Facebook le Instagram kgotsa nnyaa.

en: It later handed the case to the board.
tsn: Boto e, e e tlhamilweng ke Facebook go tsibogela lenyatso ka ntlha ya mokgwa o ka ona ba tsamaisitseng dikgang tsa bona tse di bakang mathata, e kwadile Tweet e e tlhalosang gore ba tlaa tlhagisa tshwetso ya bona mo dikgweding tse di tlang.

en: The board, which would usually have 90 days to make a decision, had been expected to announce its ruling in the coming days.
tsn: Facebook e ile ya thibela Trump go dirisa diakhaonto tsa ga gagwe tsa Facebook le Instagram ka ntlha ya matshwenyego a tswelelo ya tirisodikgoka morago ga gore baemanokeng ba gagwe ba tlhasele US Capitol ka kgwedi ya Ferikgong.

en: But the board said its extension of the cases public comment period meant it needed more time to review the input.
tsn: E ne ya romela kgetse kwa botong morago ga nakwana.

en: The board has said it had received more than 9 000 comments on the Trump case, more than for any other case.
tsn: Boto e ka gale e nang le malatsi a le 90 go tsaya tshwetso, e ne e solofetswe go dira kitsiso ka ga katlholo ya yona mo malatsing a a tlang.

en: Singer and actress Jennifer Lopez and former New York Yankees baseball star Alex Rodriguez called off their engagement because we are better as friends, announcing the breakup on Thursday just months after denying their four-year relationship was on the rocks.
tsn: Mme boto e rile, katoloso ya yona ya nako ya ditshwaelo ya setšhaba, e ba bontshitse gore ba tlhoka nako e ntsi go sekaseka ditshwaelo.

en: We have realised we are better as friends and look forward to remaining so, Lopez, 51, also known by her nickname J.Lo, and Rodriguez, 45, known as A-Rod, said in a joint statement.
tsn: Boto e rile ya re, e  amogetseng ditshwaelo tse di fetang 9 000 ka palo mo kgetseng ya ga Trump. Ditshwaelo tse di fetang tse ba kileng ba fitlhela mo dikgetseng tse dingwe.

en: The African Continental Free Trade Area is a project of the African Union (AU).
tsn: Seopedi le modiragatsi Jennifer Lopez, le naledi ya beisebolo ya maloba ya New York Yankees Alex Rodriguez, ba kgaotse tumalano ya bona ya go nyalana ka ntlha ya gore “re botoka fa re le ditsala fela” o buile jalo ka Labone fa a ne a dira kitsiso ya kgaogano ya bona dikgwedi morago ga go ganela gore kamano ya bona e mo mathateng.

en: Founded in 2018, it’s described as a framework through which to deliver inclusive and sustainable growth.
tsn: Re lemogile gore re botoka fa re le ditsala fela, mme re solofela go tlaa nna go ntse jalo. Lopez wa dingwaga di le 51 yo o itsegeng ka la J.Lo , le Rodriguez wa dignwaga di le 45, yo o itsegeng ka la A-Rod, ba buile jalo mo setatamenteng se se kopanetsweng.

en: By July 2019, 54 of the AUs 55 member states had signed the agreement, with Eritrea the only holdout.
tsn: Kontinente ya Aforika free trade ke porojeke ya kitlano ya Aforika (AU)

en: While negotiations are still ongoing, the trade agreement officially commenced on 1 January this year.
tsn: E e tlhomilweng ka ngwaga wa (2018) e tlhalositswe jaaka setlamo se se tlileng go kgontsha go dira tirelo e e akaretsang kgolo e e tsepameng.

en: The idea is that it will be rolled out over three phases.
tsn: Ka kgwedi ya Phukwi 2019, maloko a masome a matlhano le bone (54) a AU ba saenetse tumalano le Eritrea

en: The World Bank imagines it as a means to lift 30 million people out of extreme poverty.
tsn: Fa dipuisano di ntse di tswelela, tumalano ya trade e ne ya thankgolla semmuso ka tsatsi la ntlha la Ferikgong monongwaga.

en: But will it?
tsn: Kakanyo ke gore e tla tsenngwa tirisong mo dikgatong di le tharo.

en: The experience of the EU could help show the way both in terms of the upside, as well as potential pitfalls.
tsn: Banka ya lefatshe ka bophara e nagana gore e tlile go ntsha batho ba ka nna di millione di le masome a mararo mo lehumeng le le tseneletseng.

en: In terms of success, the EU has contributed to the advancement of peace and reconciliation, democracy and human rights in Europe.
tsn: A mme e tla dira jalo?

en: It has also promoted economic convergence between its wealthier and poorer constituent parts.
tsn: Maitemogelo a AU a ka thusa go bontsha tsela e e yang kwa pele, ke kgonego e e tlaa nnang teng ya go se tswele pele.

en: When the EU was awarded the 2012 Nobel Peace Prize the committee argued that through well-aimed efforts and by building up mutual confidence, historical enemies can become close partners.
tsn: Go ya ka Katlego, EU e nnile le seabe mo tsweletsong e e kwa setlhoeng ya kagiso le kutlwano le poelano, temokerasi le ditshwanelo tsa batho kwa Yuropa.

en: It highlighted a number of achievements including the EUs contribution to the introduction of democracy in Greece, Spain and Portugal, the strengthening of democracy in
tsn: E tokafaditse ikonomi magareng ga ba bahumi le ba dikobo dikhutshwane mo dikarolong dingwe tsa molaotheo.

en: Eastern Europe and overcoming the division between East and West as well as ethnically based national conflicts.
tsn: Fa EU e ne e tlotlomadiwa/newa sekgele sa kagiso ka 2012 komiti ya  e ne ya tlhalosa gore ka maikemisetso le thotloetsoka go aga maikaelelo a a tshwanang, manaba a kgale a ka kgona go dirisana mmogo.

en: In terms of pitfalls, the EU has seen its fair share of detractors and crises.
tsn: E tlhagisitse diphitlhelelo di le mmalwa go akaretsa seabe sa EU mo kitsisong ya temokerasi kwa Greece, Spain le Portugal, go gagamadiwa ga temokemisi kwa Botlha ba jwa Europe le go fenya kgaoganyo magareng ga Botlhaba le Bophirima ka bogare, ga mmogo le dikgotlhang tse di leng teng tsa bosetšhaba.

en: For example, questions were asked about its heavyhanded response during the Greek debt crisis and more recently about its response to the Covid-19 pandemic.
tsn: Mo ntlheng ya diphoso, EU iponetse mathata a a rileng ka boyona.

en: But the EU has shown great resilience even in the face of losing one of its largest members, the UK, through Brexit.
tsn: Sekao, go ne ga bodiwa ka ga tsenelelo e e bokete mabapi le Karabo ya bona fa Greece e ne e na le mathata a dikotlolo le tse dingwe gape maloba ka ga Karabo ya  leroborobo la COVID-19.

en: Before becoming full members of the EU, candidate countries have had to meet strict criteria in terms of governance and economic conditions amongst other factors.
tsn: Mme EU e bontshitse kgotlelelo e e gakgamatsang le fa ba ne ba latlhegelwa ke maloko a bone ka bontsi kwa UK, ka ga Brexit.

en: Its exclusivity is part of the reason for its success.
tsn: Pele e ka nna mongwe wa maloko a EU ka  botlalo, baemedi ba naga ba ne ba tshwanelwa ke go fitlhelela maemo/melao e e gagaetseng go ya ka puso le maemo a ikonomi magareng ga tse dingwe.

en: The main objectives of Africa’s free trade area are to  create a single continental market for goods and services, with free movement of businesspersons and investments.
tsn: Go farologana ga yona ke karolo ya lebaka la katlego ya yona.

en: There are tantalising opportunities for the plucking.
tsn: Maikaelelo magolo a thereiti ya Aforika ke go tlhola mmaraka o le mongwe go ralala kontinente ya dithoto le ditirelo ka go tlhola metsamao e e lokologileng ya bagwebi le babeeletsi.

en: Currently, a massively underperforming Africa accounts for just 2% of global trade.
tsn: Go di tshono tse di namatshang.

en: The United Nations Conference on Trade and
tsn: Ga jaana Afroika e e sa ntsheng tse dikgatlisang ka ga global trade go ralala naga e ntsha di peresente di le pedi fela.

en: Development (UNCTAD)suggests that, if the trade pact is fully implemented, the GDP of most African countries could rise by 1% to 3% once all tariffs are removed
tsn: Khonferense ya ditshaba kopano ka ga kgwebisano le tlhabololo (UNCTAD) e tsitsinya gore,fa e le gore le fa kgwebisano e ka tsenngwa tirisong ka botlalo,GDP ya bontsi jwa dinaga tsa Aforika e ka tlhatloga ka peresente e le nngwe go ya go diperesente di le tharo fa di  tlhotlhwa di tloswa.

en: The World Bank estimates the pact will boost regional income by 7%, or $450 billion, speed up wage growth for women, and lift wages by 10.3% for unskilled workers and 9.8% for skilled workers.
tsn: Banka ya lefatshe e lekanyetsa gore e tla matlafatsa ikonomi ya kgaolo ka dipereesente di le supa kgotsa di dolara tsa dibilione di le 450, e tla itlhaganedisa dituelo tsa basadi ka diperesente di le 10.3 go badiri ba ba senang bokgoni, 19 diperesente di le 9.8 go badiri ba ba nang le bokgoni

en: Some thorny issues still need to be thrashed out.
tsn: Dintlha dingwe tse di matswakabele di santse di tlhoka go sekasekwa.

en: These include bringing down existing tariffs.
tsn: Tse di akaretsa go isiwa kwa tlase ga ditlhotlhwa tse di leng teng.

en: For example, oranges imported from South Africa for sale in a supermarket in Kenya currently attract a 25% tariff.
tsn: Seka, dinamune tse di rometsweng go tswa Aforikaborwa, tse di ka rekiswang kwa lebenkeleng kwa Kenya, ga jaana di ngoka diperesente di le tsa tuelo.

en: Another unresolved issue is finding consensus over rules of origin.
tsn: Ntlha e nngwe e e sa rarabololwang ke go fitlhelela tumalano ka ga melao ya tlhago.

en: Africa needs to overcome some other challenges too.
tsn: Aforikaborwa e tlhoka go fenya dikgwetlho tse dingwe.

en: A temporary spike in prices should not instigate a removal of stimulatory policies from central banks.
tsn: Tlhatlogo ya ditlhotlhwa ya nakwana ga e a tshwanela go tlisa go phimolwa ga dipholisi go tswa mo dibankeng.

en: Our report focuses on this precise issue
tsn: Pegelo ya rona e tsepamisa mogopolo mo kgannyeng eno.

en: Among the key findings, governments failed to adopt key measures to enhance accountability.
tsn: Gareng ga diphitlhelelo tse dikgolo, puso e retelelwa ke go tsaya dikgato tse di botlhokwa go tokafatsa maikarabelo.

en: We will continue to work together and support each other on our shared businesses and projects, Lopez and Rodriguez said.
tsn: Re tlaa tswelela go dira mmogo le go tshegetsana mo dikgwebong le diporojeke tsa rona tse re di tlhakanetseng, Lopez le Rodriguez ba buile jalo.

en: One of the biggest celebrity couples in the United States for the past four years and sometimes known in the media as J-Rod, Lopez and Rodriguez said they would largely remain mum about the split out of respect for their children from previous relationships.
tsn: Bangwe ba balekane ba ba neng ba tumile thata kwa United States mo dingwageng di le nne tse di fetileng e bile ka dinako dingwe ba ne ba itsege mo bobegadikgannyeng ka la J-Rod, Lopez le Rodriguez ba rile, ga ba kitla ka tsosa modumo ka kgaogano ya bona, se, e le go tlotla bana ba bona, ba ba nnileng le bona mo dikgolaganong tsa bona tse di fetileng.

en: We wish the best for each other and one another’s children.
tsn: Re eleletsana masego mme re eleletsa le bana ba rona masego.

en: Out of respect for them, the only other comment we have to say is thank you to everyone who has sent kind words and support, Lopez and Rodriguez said.
tsn: Ka ntlha ya tlotlo e re nang le yona mo go bona, tshwaelo e le nngwe fela e re nang le yona ke gore, re leboga mongwe le mongwe yo o re romeletseng mafoko a kemonokeng, Lopez le Rodriguez ba buile jalo.

en: In March, they denied reports they had split, saying they were working through some things.
tsn: Ka kgwedi ya Mopitlwe, ba ganetsane le dipegelo tsa gore ba kgaogane, ba kaya fa ba santse ba samagane le dilo dingwe.

en: At the time, celebrity website TMZ, the New York Posts Page Six and multiple entertainment sites cited unidentified sources close to the couple as saying the pair had called off their engagement.
tsn: Ka nako eo, webosaete ya batho ba ba tumileng TMZ, tsebe ya borataro ya The New York Posts, le diwebosaete tse dingwe tsa boitapoloso di umakile fa metswedi mengwe, e e atamelaneng thata le balekane ba, e kaile fa ba setse ba kgaotse kgolagano ya bona.

en: Rodriguez and the Love Don’t Cost a Thing singer, who sang at US President Joe Bidens inauguration in January, began dating in early 2017 and announced their engagement in March 2019.
tsn: Rodriguez le seopedi sa “Love don’t cost a thing”, yo o neng a opela kwa tlhomong ya moporesidente Joe Biden ka Ferikgong, ba simolotse go ratana ka ngwaga wa 2017 mme ba dira kitsiso ka maikaelelo a bona a go nyalana ka Mopitlwe ka 2019.

en: Late last year, Lopez said the couple had postponed their wedding twice because of the pandemic.
tsn: Kwa bofelong jwa ngwaga o o fetileng, Lopez o rile ba buseditse lenyalo la bona kwa morago gabedi ka ntlha ya leroborobo.

en: She began her career as a dancer and a singer and produced and starred in the 2019 movie Hustlers.
tsn: O simolotse tiro ya gagwe jaaka sebini le seopedi mme a tlhagisa le go diragatsa mo filiming ya Hustler ya 2019.

en: She has appeared in other movies and on television.
tsn: O tlhageletse mo difiliming tse dingwe le mo thelebišeneng.

en: Rodriguez retired in 2016 after a 22-year career in which he hit 696 home runs, placing him fourth on Major League Baseball’s all-time home run list.
tsn: Rodriguez rotse tiro ka 2016 morago ga go dira dingwaga di le  22 mo a neng a fitlheletse di run di le 696, tse di mmeileng mo maemong a bone a lenaane la batshameki ba ba tlhwatlhwa ba beisebolo.

en: In Nashville, Tennessee, the traditional home of country songs, the Academy of Country Music will hold its annual awards show on Sunday, incorporating small venue live broadcasts from classic genre landmarks.
tsn: Kwa Nashville, Tennessee, legae ya dipina tsa mmino wa Country, Akatemi ya mmino wa Country e tlaa tshwara moletlo wa dikgele wa ngwaga le ngwaga ka Sontaga, go tsenyeletsa le mafelo a mannye a kgaso .

en: With the coronavirus pandemic still ongoing, for a second year the awards will take place in multiple smaller sites around Nashville rather than the usual Las Vegas venue.
tsn: Jaaka fa leroborobo la Corona le santse le tswelela, o ke ngwaga wa bobedi o moletlo wa dikgele o tlaa tshwarelwang kwa dikarolong tse di farologaneng go dikologa Nashville go na le lefelo le le tlwaelegileng la kwa Las Vegas.

en: The 56th ACM Awards will, however, feature mostly in-person performances before live audiences including at Nashville’s emblematic Grand Ole Opry House.
tsn: Moletlo wa dikgele wa ACM wa bo 56 ona, o tlaa akaretsa ditiragatso tsa kanamana, kwa go tlabong go na le bobogedi gona, go akaretsa le kwa ntlong ya Grand Ole Opry kwa Nashville.

en: The ACM award show is set to air Sunday at 8 p.m. ET (0000 GMT) on CBS and Paramount+, with a line-up of more than two dozen performers, including co-hosts Keith Urban and Mickey Guyton, as well as genre stars Luke Bryan, Kenny Chesney, Maren Morris and Luke Combs.
tsn: Moletlo wa Kabelo ya dikgele wa ACM, o tlaa bontshiwa ka  Sontaga ka 8 P.M. ET (0000 GMT) mo CBS le Paramount +, mme o tla bo o na le badiragatsi ba le bantsi go akaretsa bathusa batsaimaisi e leng, Keith Urban  le mickey Guyton, gammogo le dinaledi tse di tshwanang le Luke Bryan, Kenny Chesney, Maren Maurice le Luke Combs.

en: Urban, the 2019 Entertainer of the Year winner, returns after hosting last year, while ACM nominee Guyton will be the first Black woman to host the ceremony.
tsn: Urban, mofenyi wa sekgele sa modigatsi wa ngwaga ka 2019, o boile gape morago ga go nna motsaisi mo ngwageng o o fetileng, fa motlhophiwa wa ACM, Guyton ena e tla nna mosadi wa ntlha wa montsho go tshwara moletlo.

en: I’m beyond thrilled to be co-hosting with my friend Mickey, Urban said in a statement.
tsn: Ke itumetse thata gore ke be tlile go tsamaisa moletlo le tsala ya me, Urban, go bua Mickey mo setatamenteng.

en: I love that everyone will get to see her infectious energy and uber creative spirit in full light.
tsn: Ke rata gore mongwe le mongwe o tlaa kgona go bona matlhagatlhaga a gagwe le mowa gagwe wa botlhami ka botlalo.

en: Guyton’s performance of her critically acclaimed song What Are You Gonna Tell Her at last years show featured Urban as a surprise guest on piano.
tsn: Tiragatso ya ga Guyton ya pina ya gagwe e e tumileng thata “What Are You Gonna Tell Her” kwa moletlong wa ngwaga o o fetileng, e ne e a akareditse Urban jaaka motshemeki wa piano.

en: She was nominated for new female artist of the year and will sing her single, Black Like Me.
tsn: O ne a tlhophilwe go ikgapela sekgele sa modiragatsi yo mošwa wa mosadi wa ngwaga, mme o tlaa opela pina ya gagwe “Black like me”.

en: Morris and Chris Stapleton lead this years nominations, with six each.
tsn: Morris le Chris ba eteletse pele dipalo tsa batho ba ba tlhophilweng mo ngwageng o, ka ditlhopho di le thataro mongwe le mongwe.

en: Morris got nods for The Bones as both song of the year and single of the year.
tsn: Morris o tlhophetswe The Bones jaaka pina ya ngwaga le ngwaga.

en: Stapleton, a nominee for both best male artist and entertainer, is also up for song of the year for Starting Over as both artist and songwriter.
tsn: Stapleton, yo o tlhophetsweng sekgele sa seopedi le motsweretshi yo o gaisang wa monna, o tlhophetswe gape le pina ya ngwaga ka pina ya gagwe ya Starting Over jaaka sebini le mokwadi wa dipina.

en: Miranda Lambert follows with five nominations.
tsn: Miranda Lambert o latela ka ditlhopho di le tlhano.

en: She is the most nominated female artist in the Academy history, with a total of 68 in her lifetime.
tsn: O ke mosadi yo o mo tlhophileng go ba feta botlhe mo hisetoring ya Akatemi, ka palogotlhe ya 68 mo botshelong jwa gagwe.

en: This time around, her Blue Bird is nominated for single, video and song of the year.
tsn: Mo nakong e, “Blue Bird” ya gagwe e tlhophetswe go ikgapela sekgele sa pina ya ngwaga le bidio ya ngwaga.

en: The 2020 show saw an unprecedented tie for entertainer of the year between Carrie Underwood and Thomas Rhett.
tsn: Moletlo wa 2020 o itemogetse maleka a di boutu mo sekgeleng sa  modiragatsi wa ngwaga magareng ga Carrie Underwood le Thomas Rhett.

en: Rhett has been nominated for the same award this year, alongside previous winner Bryan, as well as Combs, Stapleton and Eric Church.
tsn: Rhett o tlhophetswe sona sekgele seo gape ngwaga o, mmogo le mofenyi wa maloba Bryan, gammogo le Combs, Stapleton le Eric Church.

en: Sweden is facing an acute shortage of sperm for assisted pregnancy as would-be donors avoid hospitals during the coronavirus pandemic, halting inseminations in large parts of the healthcare system and driving up waiting times by years.
tsn: Sweden e lebane le tlhokego e kgolo ya peo ya bonna e e thusang bomme go ima jaaka baabi go tila maokelo mo leroborobong le la mogare wa corona, se se diegisa thulaganyo ya tsenngwa ga peo ya monna mosading, mo dikarolong tse dikgolo tsa tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo, mme se, se oketsa palo ya dingwaga tsa go leta.

en: We’re running out of sperm.
tsn: Re felelea ke peo ya bonna.

en: We’ve never had so few donors as during the last year, said Ann Thurin Kjellberg, head of the reproduction unit at Gothenburg’s University Hospital.
tsn: Re nnile le baabi ba le mmalwa thata mo tsamaong ya ngwaga o o fetileng, go bua Ann  Thurin Kjellberg , Tlhogo ya Yuniti ya go atisa kwa bookelong jwa University kwa Gothenburg.

en: The shortage has meant waiting times for assisted pregnancy have shot up from around six months to an estimated 30 months in the past year, possibly longer, doctors familiar with the matter told Reuters.
tsn: Tlhaelo e, e kaya gore dinako tsa go emela thuso ya ga ima di oketsegile, tloga ka go leta dikgwedi di le thataro go bokana ka dikgwedi di le 30 mo ngwageng o o fetileng, gongwe go feta, dingaka tse di itseng ka ga morero o di boleletse Reuters.

en: Its stressful that we can’t get a clear time or date for treatment, said Elin Bergsten, a 28-year-old maths teacher from southern Sweden.
tsn: Go a tlhobaetsa gore re be re sa kgone go bo nako e e siameng kgotsa letlha la kalafi, go bua Elin Bergsten, morutabana wa dipalo wa dingwaga di le 28 go tswa kwa Borwa jwa Sweden.

en: Two years ago, Bergsten and her husband learned he was unable to produce semen, and the pair immediately applied for assisted pregnancy.
tsn: Dingwaga di le pedi tse di fetileng, Bergsten le monna wa gagwe ba lemogile fa a kgone go a sa kgone go ntsha matute a bonna, mme bobedi jo jwa dira kopo ya go thusiwa ka go ima.

en: She was due to have her second cycle of insemination before her treatment was indefinitely delayed due to the shortage.
tsn: O ne a tshwanetse go ya kwa logatong lwa bobedi lwa kimiso ya gagwe pele ga ba itemogela tiego ka ntlha ya tlhaelo ya kalafi.

en: It’s a national phenomenon. Thurin Kjellberg said.
tsn: Ke bothata jwa bosetšhaba. Go bua Thurin Kjellberg.

en: We’ve run out in Gothenburg and Malmo, they will soon run out in Stockholm, she added, naming the three most populous areas of the country.
tsn: Re feletswe mo Gothenburg le Malmo, Stockholm le yona e tlile go felelwa e se kgale, a oketsa ka go umaka mafelo a le mararo a a itsegeng mo nageng.

en: Beyond public healthcare providers, there are also private clinics in Sweden which are able to circumvent shortages by buying sperm from abroad.
tsn: Go feta Batlamedi ba tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo, go na gape le ditleliniki tsa poraefete kwa Sweden tse di kgonang go thibela tlhaelo e ka go reka peo ya bonna go tswa kwa moseja wa mawatle.

en: But assisted pregnancy treatment there often costs as much as 100 000 Swedish crowns ($11 785), making it unaffordable for many.
tsn: Mme thuso ya boimana koo go le gantsi e tlhoka madi a a kana ka 100 000 Swedish crowns ($11 785),  e e dirang gore batho ba le bantsi ba palelwe ke go e fitlhelela.

en: Assisted pregnancy is free within Sweden’s national health service.
tsn: Thuso ya boimana ga e duelelwe kwa tirelong ya Bosetšhaba ya Boitekanelo kwa Sweden.
