en: The Nordic countries and Belgium have the highest assisted conception rates in the world, in terms of availability of cycles per million of population, according to the European Society of Human Reproduction and Embryology.
tsn: Dinaga tsa kwa Nordic le Belgium di na le kelo ya thuso ya boimana e e kwa godimo mo lefatsheng, go ya ka go nna teng ga ka dimilione tsa batho, go ya ka setsheo sa Setšhaba sa Human Reproduction le Embryology kwa Europe.

en: Under Swedish law, a sperm sample can only be used by a maximum of six women.
tsn: Ka fa tlase ga molao wa kwa Sweden, sampole ya peo ya bonna e ka dirisiwa fela ke basadi ba le barataro ka palo.

en: Most donated sperm in Sweden has reached this legal capacity, meaning that in many areas, assisted pregnancy is only available for women who have used a specific sperm sample before.
tsn: Bontsi jwa palo ya peo ya bonna e go neelanwang ka yona kwa Sweden e se setse e fitlheletse bokgoni jwa semolao, mo go rayang gore mo dikgaolong tse dintsi, thuso ya boimana e fitlhelwa fela ke basadi ba ba dirisitseng sampole e e rileng ya peo ya bonna mo nakong e e fetileng.

en: Margareta Kitlinski, who runs the reproduction unit at Skane University Hospital, the largest such clinic in Sweden, said it takes around eight months to process a donor due to the many tests involved, and that many samples fail to become viable donations due to common problems in freezing.
tsn: Margareta Kitlinski, yo o tsamaisang yuniti ya go atisiwa ga batho kwa bookelo jwa Unibesitithi kwa Skane, tleliniki ya mofuta o e e di fetang tsotlhe kwa Sweden, o rile go ka tsaya dikgwedi di le robedi go rulaganya moabi wa peo ya bonna ka ntlha ya diteko di le dintsi tse di dirwang, le gore disamopole di le dintsi di feleletsa di sa kgone go dirisiwa ka ntlha ya mathata a a tlwaelegileng a go gatsela.

en: If you have 50 men contact you, at best only half of them could be donors, Kitlinski said.
tsn: Fa o na le banna ba le 50 ba ba ikgolaganyang le wena, ke halofo fela ya bone e e ka kgonang go abelana ka peo ya bonna. Go bua Kitlinski.

en: Some Swedish regions have taken to social media to encourage potential male donors, but with varying results.
tsn: Dingwe tsa dikgaolo tsa kwa Sweden di tsene mo mafaratlhatlheng go rotloetsa banna go abelana ka peo ya bonna, mme dipholo tsa gona di a farologana.

en: In the meantime, the shortage lingers.
tsn: Mo nakong e, tlhaelo e a tswelela.

en: We need to go on TV and tell Swedish men to come forward, Thurin Kjellberg said.
tsn: Re tlhoka go ya kwa thelebišeneng go ya go bolelela banna ba mo Sweden gore ba iponagatse, Thurin Kjellberg a rialo.

en: The story of a Ndebele man clad in traditional regalia being asked to leave a mall has come full circle.
tsn: Kgang ya monna wa mo Ndebele yo o neng a kopiwa go tswa ka mmolo e bontsha e ya bokhutlong.

en: A video of his encounter at the mall went viral late last month.
tsn: Bidio ya tiragalo ya gagwe ya kwa mmolong e ne e aname mo inthaneteng mo kgweding e e fetileng.

en: The matter is now in front of the CRL Rights Commission, which has described the incident as a national crisis.
tsn: Morero o jaanong o beilwe fa pele ga Khomišhene ya Ditshwanelo ya CRL, e e tlhalositseng fa tiragalo e ama setšhaba sotlhe.

en: Thando Mahlangu was confronted by the Boulders Mall Centre Manager, Jose Maponyane, inside the Clicks Store and was told that the Ndebele traditional attire he was wearing was neither decent nor appropriate.
tsn: Thando Mahlangu o ne a tobiwa ke Molaodi wa kwa mmolong wa Boulders, Jose Maponyane ka fa gare ga lebenkele la Clicks mme a mmolelela gore diaparo tsa setso tsa seNdebele tse a di apereng ga di na seriti e bile ga di maleba.

en: Maponyane could be heard in the video saying he would not condone the outfit at in my mall.
tsn: Maponyane o utlwagetse mo bidiong a re, ga a kitla a letla moaparo wa mofuta oo mo mmolong wa gagwe.

en: Lets cut the long story short, we’ve got a right of admission.
tsn: Tlaa re kgaole kanelo e telele, re na le tshwanelo ya tsena.

en: I don’t condone this in my mall.
tsn: Ga ke letlelele se mo mmolong wa me.

en: So, ngicela uphume (please leave), Mapoyane could be heard saying.
tsn: Ka jalo ke kopa o tsamaye, Maponyane o utlwagetse a bua jalo.

en: Mahlangu was quick to remind Maponyane that his attire was African in Africa, to which Maponyane insisted that the attire was not descend in a public space.
tsn: Mahlangu o nnile bonako go gakolola Maponyane gore o apere moaparo wa Seaforika mo Aforika. Ke fa Maponyane a ka gatelela gore moaparo oo e ne e se wa go ka aparwa mo lefelong la batho botlhe.

en: The mall management has since said it regrets the humiliation suffered by Mahlangu and has since suspended the implicated centre manager.
tsn: Botsaimaisi jwa mmolo bo rile bo maswabi ka se se diragaletseng Mahlangu mme ba sekegile motsamaisi wa senthara e e amegang.

en: Saddest reality in Africa, I was subjected to inside the @Clicks_SA store at The Boulders Shopping Center.
tsn: Nnete e e botlhoko mo Aforikaborwa, e ke itemogetseng yona kwa gare ga lebenkele la Click kwa Mmolong wa Boulders .

en: Only because of the center manager, who said it was his shopping complex.
tsn: Ka ntlha fela ya motsamaisi yo o rileng ke mmolo wa gagwe.

en: I was told that I’m wearing inappropriate I must go & Omega risk solutions harassed me.
tsn: Ke ne ka bolelelwa gore moaparo wa me ga o a letlelesega mme ke tshwanetse go tsamaya. Omega risk solutions e ntshwere makgwakgwa.

en: The 35-year-old cultural activist says this wasn’t his first humiliation.
tsn: Molwelasetso wa dingwaga di le 35 a re, e ne e se lwantlha a itemogela nyenyefatso ya mofuta o.

en: The whole experience took me back to the incident that happened of a Gautrain.
tsn: Maitemogolo ao a mpuseditse morago kwa tiragalong e e diragetseng kwa Gautrain.

en: , I was once kicked out of a Gautrain, for wearing isiNdebele traditional attire and speaking in isiNdebele, for believing in isiNdebele.
tsn: Ke ne ka lelekiwa kwa Gautrain ka ntlha ya fa ke ne ke apere diaparo tsa setso tsa seNdebele, ke bua isiNdebele e bile ke dumela mo puong ya isiNdebele.

en: Redefine Properties, which owns the Boulders Mall in Midrand, says it has personally apologised to Mahlangu.
tsn: Redefine Properties, e e tshwereng mmolo wa Boulders kwa Midrand, ba re ba ikopetse maitshwarelo kwa go Mahlangu ka bobona.

en: The commission today summoned Redefine Properties to a hearing to find out what remedial action they are taking following the incident.
tsn: Khomišhene gompieno e biditse Redefine Properties go nna teng kwa theetsong go batlisisa gore ke kgatotshiamiso efe e ba e tsereng go latela tiragalo e.

en: Company CEO, Andrew Konig says they are conducting an internal investigation.
tsn: Moeteledipele wa setlamo, Andrew Konig a re ba ikaeletse go dira dipatlisiso mo teng ga setheo.

en: We deeply regret the incident and we have taken a lot of remedial action and this incident has held up a mirror for us to reflect on all our actions and our staffs actions.
tsn: Re ikwatlhaela tiragalo e thata mme re tsere dikgato di le dintsi go siamisa tiragalo eno. Tiragalo eno e re tshwaretse seipone se re tlaa itebang mo go sona, go bona maitshwaro a rona le a badiri ba rona.

en: We have publicly acknowledged that Redefine has distanced itself from the centre ‘managers actions and we do not condone what happened and we understand that Mr Mahlangu and his lady partner were treated inappropriately.
tsn: Re amogetse mo phatlalatseng gore Redefine e itlhaotse mo maitshwarong a motsamaisi mme ga re tsamaisane le se se diragetseng, e bile re tlhaloganya gore Rre Mahlangu le molekane wa gagwe ba ne ba tsholwa ka tsela e e sa amogelesegeng.

en: Konig said the Property group had also personally apologised to Thando Mahlangu as well as the Ndebele Council for the incident.
tsn: Konig o rile setlhopha se ikopetse maitshwarela kwa go Thando Mahlangu ka namana gammogo le Khansele ya seNdebele ka ga tiragalo e.

en: We have directly engaged with Mr Mahlangu and his advisors and Thursday was our last engagement with them and on Friday, a delegation of Redefine went to the royal council and we sat with the council and we humbled ourselves and paid deep respect to the Ndebele nation, as well as apologised for the incident at The Boulders.
tsn: Re ikgolagantse ka tlhamalalo le Rre Mahlangu le bagakolodi ba gagwe. Re buile le bona labofelo ka Labone mme ka Labotlhano, setlhopha sa kwa Redefine se ile kwa khanseleng ya morafe mme re ntse fa fatshe le Khansele, ka boikobo mme ra tlotla setšhaba sa maNdebele le go ikopela maitshwarelo ka tiragalo e e diragetseng kwa The Boulders.

en: We are happy to report that we left feeling that we achieved our objective to seek atonement for our actions.
tsn: Re itumelela go bega gore re tsamaile re na le  maikutlo a gore re fitlheletse maikaelelo a rona a go batla go lefisa melato ya diphoso tsa rona.

en: CRL Chairperson, Professor David Mosoma says the commission will speak to all the parties involved in the incident and then make remedial recommendations later this month.
tsn: Modulasetilo wa CRL, Moporofesara David Mosoma a re Khomišhene e tlaa buisana le botlhe ba ba amegang mo tiragalong eo mme e dire dikatlenegiso tsa go siamisa diphoso moragonyana mo kgweding eno.

en: The importance of this is to ensure that there is a cultural diverse appreciation of cultures and religions.
tsn: Botlhokwa jwa seno ke go netefatsa gore go na le kanaanelo ya ditso le ditumelo tse di farologaneng.

en: We think, on the basis of that, we will not be able to give recommendations today, because we need to speak to Mr Maponyane and we request you to bring him on the 19th.
tsn: Re akanya gore mo ntlheng e, ga re kitla re kgona go neelana ka dikatlanegiso gompieno ka gonne re tlhoka go bua le Rre Maponyane, mme re kopa gore o tle le ene ka la di 19.

en: So, on that day, we will focus on him and the issues the commissioners have raised to try and understand where he is coming from.
tsn: Ka jalo, mo letsatsing leo, re tlaa tlhoma mogopolo mo go ena le dintlha tse di tlhagisitsweng ke bakomišhenara go leka go tlhaloganya gore o tswa kwa kae.

en: Advocacy organisation Global Citizen has called on governments, businesses, and philanthropists to pledge more funds to help get at least two billion COVID-19 vaccine doses for lower-income countries amid the pandemic.
tsn: Setheo sa Tshegetso ya baagi, Global Citizen se ipileditse go puso, dikgwebo, le badiramolemo go go thusa ka matlole a a tlaa thusang go bona meento ya COVID-19 e e ka nnang dibilione tse pedi ka palo kwa dinageng tse di nang le lotseno le le kwa tlase ka nako ya leroborobo.

en: Reports indicate that several African countries may not receive enough COVID-19 vaccines to achieve herd immunity against the coronavirus.
tsn: Dipegelo di supa gore, go na kgonego ya gore dinaga tsa Aforika di le mmalwa di se amogele meento e e lekaneng ya COVID-19 e e tlaa thusang go fitlhelela tshireletsego kgatlhanong le mogare wa Corona.

en: Global Citizen says donations to raise money for COVID-19 vaccines can be made during the global streaming concert on May the 8th.
tsn: Global Citizen ya re kgobokanyo ya madi ya meento ya COVID-19 e ka dirwa ka nako ya konsarata ka la 8 Motsheganong.

en: Singers, Jennifer Lopez, Selena Gomez, the Foo Fighters and Eddie Vedder will be among those due to appear in the Vax Live Concert.
tsn: Diopedi, Jennifer Lopez, Selena Gomez, Foo Fighters le Eddie Vedder ke ba bangwe ba ba tlaa tlhagelelang kwa Konsarateng ya VAX.

en: Global Citizen Director for Southern and East Africa, Chebet Chikumbu, says the event is in a broadcast format.
tsn: Motsamaisi wa Global Citizen wa kwa Borwa le Botlhaba jwa Aforika, Chebet Chikumbu a re tiragalo e, e tlaa tlhagisiwa ka mokgwa wa kgaso.

en: We have been able to collaborate with world leaders, artists, the business community and powered by our global citizens to ensure that we can witness a financial commitment being made towards this very important endeavour.
tsn: Re kgonne go dirisana le baeteledipele ba lefatshe, batsweretshi, bagwebi mme re fiwa maatla ke baagi ba lefatshe ka bophara go netefatsa gore re ka kgona go bona seitlamo sa madi se dirwa mo moletlong o o botlhokwa o.

en: Global Citizen is calling for equitable vaccine rollout.
tsn: Global Citizen e ikopela gore lenaneo la moento e simololwe.

en: VAX LIVE: The Concert to Reunite the World will be hosted by singer Selena Gomez and also feature the Foo Fighters and Eddie Vedder, according to organiser Global Citizen, an international advocacy group.
tsn: Vax nna: Go dira mmogo go reunite lefatshe e tla nna e e neng e tshwerwe ke seopedi selena gomez mme gape go na le foo fighters le Eddie Vedder. Go ya ka kgaisano ya lefatshe la Boditšhabatšhaba la Bobueledi, baagi.

en: VAX LIVE: The Concert to Reunite the World will be hosted by singer Selena Gomez and also feature the Foo Fighters and Eddie Vedder, according to organiser Global Citizen, an international advocacy group.
tsn: VAX LIVE: Konsatara ya go kopanya lefatshe e tlaa tshwerwa ke seopedi Selena Gomez mme o tlaa e tshwaraganela le Foo Fighters le Eddie Vedder. Se ke go go ya ka motsamaisi wa Global Citizen, setlhopha sa boditšhabatšhaba sa Bobueledi.

en: This is really an opportunity to call on world leaders to make sure that the 27 million heroic healthcare workers around the world that don’t yet have access to a vaccine can get access over the coming months, Global Citizen Chief Executive Hugh Evans told Reuters.
tsn: Se ke tšhono ya go kopa baeteledipele ba lefatshe go netefatsa gore di le dimilione di le 27 tsa bagaka  ba e leng badiri ba tlhokomelo ya boitekanelo go ralala lefatshe lotlhe, ba ba iseng ba bone moento, ba tlaa o bona mo dikgweding tse di tlang. Mokhuduthamaga wa Global Citizen Hugh Evans o boleletse Reuters.

en: The event will also campaign for fair and equal access to vaccines for all.
tsn: Moletlo ono e tla nna le letsholo la phitlhelelo e e lekanang le e e siameng ya meento go botlhe.

en: The reality is that right now many of the wealthiest nations are starting to stockpile vaccines, said Evans, adding the broadcast would urge nations to donate excess doses and give financial support to the Covax facility, backed by the World Health Organisation (WHO) and the Global Alliance for Vaccines and Immunization (GAVI).
tsn: Nnete ke gore gona jaanong bontsi jwa dinaga tse di humileng di simolola go reka meento ka bontsi. Go bua Evans a oketsa ka gore kgaso e tlaa rotloetsa ditšhaba go aba meento e mengwe le go neelana ka kemonokeng ya matlole go setlamo sa Covax, ka thuso ya ke Mokgatlho wa Lefatshe wa Boitekanelo (WHO) le mokgatlho wa lefatshe wa meento (GAVI).

en: Covax aims to secure 2 billion vaccine doses for lower-income countries by the end of 2021.
tsn: Covax E ikaelela go fitlhelela meento e le dibilione di le pedi go ya kwa dinageng tsa lotseno le le kwa tlase fa ngwaga wa 2021 o ya kwa bokhutlong.

en: The great news is there have already been many nations around the world that are starting to donate doses, Evans said.
tsn: Dikgang tse di monate ke gore, go setse go na le dinaga di le dintsi mo lefatsheng ka bophara tse di setse di simolotse go aba meento, Evans a bua jalo.

en: Australia, for example, donated a million doses to Papua New Guinea.
tsn: Sekao, Australia e abile meento e le milione ka palo go Papua Guinea.

en: We know the Norwegian government decided to make a donation of doses.
tsn: Re a itse gore puso ya kwa Norway e sweditse go aba meento.

en: There’s really great momentum that is building, he added.
tsn: Go tota go na le batho ba le bantsi ba ba bontshang kgatlhego, a tlaleletsa.

en: It’s been reported that most African countries will not have enough COVID-19 vaccine doses to vaccinate the at least 60% of their populations needed to achieve herd immunity and defeat the virus.
tsn: Go begwa fa bontsi jwa dinaga tsa Aforika di se kitla di nna le meento e e lekaneng ya COVID-19 go enta diperesente di le 60 tsa batho tse di tlhokegang go fitlhelela maemo a go thibela tswenwa ke mogare le go o fedisa.

en: As a result, Global Citizen is calling on governments, companies and philanthropists to pledge more funds to get at least two billion COVID-19 vaccine doses, as well as tests and treatments, to lower-income countries to safeguard their citizens.
tsn: Ka jalo, Global Citizen e ikuela go puso, ditlamo le badiramolemo go thusa ka matlole a a tlaa dirisetswang go bona dibilione di le pedi tsa meento ya COVID-19, gammogo le diteko le kalafi kwa dinageng tsa lotseno le le kwa tlase go sireletsa baagi ba tsona.

en: To this end, the Vax Live concert, a first of its kind, will get under way in May.
tsn: Mo ntlheng e, konsarata ya VAX, ya ntlha ya mofuta wa yone, e tla nna simolola ka kgwedi ya Motsheganong.

en: It is a global broadcast event to call on world leaders to commit to equitable distribution of the COVID-19 vaccine, so that we can end the pandemic for everyone, everywhere.
tsn: Ke moletlo wa boditšhabatšhaba o o tlaa gasiwang go ikuela go baeteledipele ba lefatshe go itlama gore ba tlaa netefatsa kabo e e lekalekanang ya meento ya COVID-19 moento, gore re tle re kgone go khutlisa leroborobo mo go mongwe le mongwe, gongwe le gongwe.

en: Chebet Chikumbu who is Global Citizens Regional Director for East and Southern Africa shares more.
tsn: Chebet Chikumbu, yo e leng Mokaedi wa kgaolo ya Borwa le Botlhaba jwa Aforika o tlhalosa go le gontsi.

en: Britain’s Queen Elizabeth returned to royal duties on Tuesday, four days after the death of her husband, Prince Philip, in an event to mark the retirement of her households most senior official, PA Media reported.
tsn: Kgosigadi Elizabeth wa kwa Britain o boetse kwa ditirong tsa gagwe tsa morafe ka Labobedi, malatsi a le mane morago ga go tlhokafala ga mogatse, Kgosana Phillip, mo tiragalong ya go tshwaya go rola tiro ya gagwe semmuso. PA media e begile jalo.

en: The Queen hosted a ceremony as the Earl Peel stepped down as Lord Chamberlain, the report added.
tsn: Kgosigadi o ne a tshwere moletlo fa Earl Peel a ne a rola tiro jaaka Lord chamberlain, pegelo e tlhalosa gape.

en: Philip, who had been at the Queen’s side throughout her 69-year reign, died at Windsor Castle on Friday, aged 99.
tsn: Phillip, yo o neng a le mo letlhakoreng la ga kgosigadi dingwaga di le 69 tsa puso ya gagwe, o tlhokafaletse kwa ntlong ya segosi kwa Windsor ka Labotlhano, a na le dingwaga di le99.

en: His funeral will be held on Saturday.
tsn: Phitlho ya gagwe e tlaa tshwarwa ka Lamatlhatso.

en: The Duke of Edinburgh, as he was officially known, married Elizabeth in 1947.
tsn: Kgosana  ya Edinburgh, jaaka a ne a itsege, o nyetse Elizabeth ka ngwaga wa 1947.

en: In recent years, the Queen has reduced her official engagements and passed many royal duties and patronages to Prince Charles, his son William and other senior royals.
tsn: Mo dingwageng di le mmalwa tse di fetileng, Kgosigadi o fokoditse dikgolagano tsa gagwe tsa semmuso mme a fetisetsa maikarabelo go Kgosana Charles, morwa wa gagwe William le bagolwane ba bangwe mo segosing.

en: But she still carries out the most symbolic royal duties, such as the opening of parliament.
tsn: Fela o sa ntse a diragatsa ditiro tse dingwe tsa segosi, jaaka ya pulo ya palamente.

en: Prince William, second in line to the British throne, hailed his late grandfather Prince Philip for his dutiful service ahead of his funeral on Saturday.
tsn: Kgosana William, yo o latelang mo maemong a bobedi a go tsaya bogosi, o bakile rremogolo wa gagwe kgosana Phillip, ka tiro ya gagwe e e tswileng diatla pele ga phitlho ya gagwe ka Lamatlhatso.

en: William, known as the Duke of Cambridge, said Philip was an extraordinary man whose life had been defined by service, but that he would have wanted members of the royal family to get on with their jobs.
tsn: William, yo o itsegeng jaaka kgosana ya Cambridge, o rile Phillip e ne e le monna yo o sa tlwaelesegang, yo botshelo jwa gagwe bo neng bo tlhaloswa ke ditiro tsa gagwe, mme o ne a ka rata go bona ba lelapa la segosi ba tswelela ka ditiro tsa bone.

en: I will miss my Grandpa, but I know he would want us to get on with the job, William, 38, said in a statement on Monday.
tsn: Ke tlaa tlhologelelwa rremogolo, mme ke a itse gore o ne a ka batla gore re tswelele pele ka tiro, William, 38, o buile jalo ka Mosupologo.

en: My grandfather was an extraordinary man and part of an extraordinary generation.
tsn: Rremogolo ene e ne e le monna yo o kgethegileng e bile e le karolo ya  setlhopha sa batho ba ba kgethegileng.

en: William said he felt lucky to have had Philips’s example to guide him, and praised his grandfather for showing great kindness to his wife, Catherine, Duchess of Cambridge.
tsn: William a re o ne a ikutlwa a le lesego gore a be a nnile le Philip jaaka sekao sa go mo kaela, mme a akgola rremogolo wa gagwe ka go bontsha bopelonomi jo bogolo go mosadi wa gagwe, Catherine, kgosigadi ya kwa Cambridge.

en: Philip, husband of Britain’s Queen Elizabeth II who had been at her side throughout her 69-year reign, died at Windsor Castle on Friday, aged 99.
tsn: Phillip, monna wa kgosigadi ya kwa Britain, Kgosigadi Elizabeth II, yo o neng a le mo letlhakoreng la gagwe dingwaga di le 69 tsa puso ya gagwe, o tlhokafaletse kwa ntlong ya bogosi kwa Windsor ka Labotlhano, a le dingwaga di le 99.

en: Harry, sixth in line to the throne, will quarantine in accordance with coronavirus guidelines so that he can attend the ceremonial funeral at Windsor Castle.
tsn: Harry, yo e leng wa borataro mo moleng wa go tsaya bogosi, o tla ikgapela kwa thoko go latela dikaelo tsa mogare wa corona gore a kgone go tsenela phitlho kwa ntlong ya segosi kwa Windsor.

en: Prince Harry returns to UK ahead of Prince Philips funeral.
tsn: Kgosana Harry o boela kwa UK pele ga phitlho ya ga Kgosana Phillip.

en: The couple left Britain for a new life in the United States after a public rift with the royal family and a falling-out with the tabloid press.
tsn: Banyalani bano ba tlogile kwa Britain go ya go aga botshelo jo bošwa kwa United States morago ga kgotlhang ya phatlalatsa e ba nnile le yona le ba lelapa la segosi, le go sa utlwaneng ga bona le bobegakgang.

en: On Monday, Harry praised Philip for his devotion to granny Queen Elizabeth II, and described the late duke as a mischievous host who could captivate his guests with unpredictable remarks.
tsn: Ka Mosupologo, Harry o ne a akgolela Phillip go ineela ga gagwe go mmemogolo wa gagwe e leng

en: Prince William and Prince Harry pay tribute to their grandfather.
tsn: Kgosigadi Elizabeth II, mme a tlhalosa kgosana e e tlhokafetseng e jaaka moamogedi yo o matlhajana wa baeng, yo o kgonang go tshwara baeng ka ditshwaelo tsa gagwe tse o sa di solofelang

en: Colourful lanterns and ornate Ramadan decorations filled the streets of Jerusalem on Monday as Palestinians prepared for a holy month freer of COVID-19 restrictions than at the height of the pandemic.
tsn: Kgosana William le Kgosana Harry ba tlotla rremogolo wa bona.

en: Ahead of Ramadans expected start on Tuesday, the mood in the Old City was far more joyful than last year when prayers were suspended at the Dome of the Rock and Al-Aqsa Mosque, Islams third holiest site.
tsn: Mabone a a mebalabala le mekgabisa ya Ramadan, di ne di tladitse mebila ya Jerusalema ka Mosupologo fa Mapalesetina ba ne ba rulaganyetsa kgwedi e e boitshepo e e senang melawana ya thibelo ya COVID-19 gona le ka nako ya fa leroborobo le nele tseneletse thata.

en: Although Jerusalem is still without foreign tourists, far more people were roaming the Old City, where shops reported brisk business.
tsn: Pele ga Ramadan e ka simolola ka Labobedi jaaka go solofetswe, mowa o o renang mo toropong ya bogologolo o ne o tletse boitumelo thata go feta wa ngwaga o o fetileng fa dithapelo di ne di emisitswe nakwana kwa The Dome of the Rock le mmoseke wa Al-Aqsa, lefelo la boraro le le boitshepo la kwa Islam.

en: Because of coronavirus, the situation has been bad for the merchants and the people.
tsn: Le mororo Jerusalem e sa ntse e sena bajanala ba dinaga di sele, go na le batho ba le bantsi ba ba sasankang mo toropong ya Old City, kwa mabenkele a begileng gona gore kgwebo e a tsamaya.

en: Now with the coronavirus vaccination, the situation got better, said one shopper, Mohammad Abu Sbeih.
tsn: Ka ntlha ya mogare wa Corona, seemo se ntse se se sentle go barekisi le batho.

en: Israel has included Palestinians in East Jerusalem in its swift rollout of vaccines.
tsn: Jaanong ka ntlha ya moento wa mogare wa corona, maemo a botoka, Go bua mongwe wa bareki, Mohammad Abu Sbeih.

en: It annexed the eastern half of the city after capturing it along with the West Bank in the 1967 Middle East war.
tsn: Iseraele e akareditse Mapalesetina kwa Botlhaba jwa Jerusalema mo tlhagisong ya yona ya meento .

en: But it is unclear if Palestinians from the occupied West Bank will be able to come to Al-Aqsa during Ramadan, as in previous years.
tsn: E mametleletse halofo ya toropo ya kwa botlhaba morago ga e go tshola mmogo le Banka ya kwa Bophirima ka ntwa ya kwa bogareng jwa botlhaba ka ngwaga wa  1967.

en: An Israeli military official said no decision had been made on holiday permits.
tsn: Ga go itsiwe gore a Mapalesetina go tswa kwa West Bank ba tlaa kgona go tla kwa Al-Aqsa ka nako ya Ramadan, jaaka mo dingwageng tse di fetileng.

en: The situation may be complicated by the far slower pace of vaccinations carried out by the Palestinian authorities than in Israel, which has faced international calls to ensure that Palestinians are inoculated.
tsn: Sesole sa semmuso ga Iseraele se rile ga go tshwetso e e dirilweng mo malatsing a boikhutso.

en: In the occupied West Bank, the Palestinian Authority said it would allow more shops to open at night and for Ramadan night prayers to be held in mosques, except on the busiest day of the week, Friday, when they would take place outside.
tsn: Maemo a ka nna a tlhakatlhakanngwa ke bathati ba kwa Palesetina ka tsela e ba tsamaisang meento ka bonya ka teng gona le kwa Israel, e e lebaneng le megala go ya kwa dinageng di sele go netefatsa gore Mapalesetina a a entiwa.

en: But it imposed a COVID-19 night-time curfew on movements between cities, villages and refugee camps.
tsn: Kwa West Bank, baokamedi ba kwa Palesetina ba rile ba tlaa letla mabenkele a mangwe go bula bosigo le gore dithapelo tsa Ramadan di tshwarelwe kwa Mosques, ntle le ka letsatsi la beke le le nang le mekgape e mentsi, Labotlhano, kwa di tlaa diragalelang kwa ntle.

en: It also banned restaurants from holding iftars the breaking of the fast at sunset  and stores selling sweet pastries from opening their doors to customers, saying they could only make deliveries.
tsn: Mme e tsentse tirisong melawana ya metsao ya bosigo ya COVID-19 magareng ga ditoropokgolo, metse le dikampa.

en: In Gaza, shoppers filled markets despite a recent threefold increase in daily infections.
tsn: Gape e iletsa diresetšhurente go rekisa dijo tse Mamoseleme ba di jang morago ga go nna ka tlala letsatsi lotllhe le mabenkele a a rekisang dipheiseteri go bulela bareki ba ona dikgoro, ba re ba ka nna ba ba isetsa tsona kwa magaeng a bona.

en: That forced the Gaza health authorities to close schools, impose night curfews and ban large gatherings, but fell short of a total lockdown.
tsn: Kwa Gaza, bareki ba tladitse mebaraka le fa go na le koketsego ya bošeng ya ditshwaetso tsa letsatsi le letsatsi.

en: This year, we brought goods from Egypt and China, and there is a massive turnout by people, said storekeeper Hatem El-Helo as loudspeakers echoed with Egyptian songs celebrating Ramadan.
tsn: Seo se pateleditse bothati jwa boitekanelo le dikolo, go tsenya tirisong thibelo ya metsamao ya bosigo le go kganela dikokoano tse dikgolo, mme ba paletswe ke tswala naga gotlhelele.

en: People want to bring joy into their homes.
tsn: Monongwaga, re tlile ka dithoto go tswa kwa Egepeto le China, mme go na le tsibogelo e e kwa godimo ya batho, go bua motsaisa lebenkele, Hatem El Helo fa dipikara di ne di letsa mmino wa kwa Egepeto go ketekiwa Ramadan.

en: Scrolling through the comments made on YouTube on Fela Anikulapo-Kutis music, one comes across remarks such as: The greatest unknown musician who ever lived, Why isn’t Fela’s music more widely known?
tsn: Batho ba batla go tlisa boitumelo mo magaeng a bona.

en: His music beats everything I’ve ever heard before and why am I so late to this?
tsn: Fa o lebeletse ditshwaelo tse di dirilweng mo YouTube ka ga mmino wa ga Fela Anikulap-Kutis, o tlaa fitlhela ditshwaelo tse di jaaka: Seopedi se se segolo se sa sa itsiweng, se se kileng sa tshela. Go reng mmino wa ga Fela o sa itsege thata?

en: The truth is that during Fela’s extraordinary lifetime, the Nigerians notoriety as an engaged citizen fighting for social justice was what usually attracted attention  and not his music .
tsn: Mmino wa gagwe o gaisa sengwe le sengwe se ke kileng ka se utlwa, le gona, goreng ke le thari jaana mo go se?

en: His public persona as a cultural renegade, an incorrigible iconoclast and social rebel hugged the headlines.
tsn: Nnete ke gore ka nako ya ga Fela ya botshelo, Go itsege ga MoNigeria yo jaaka moagi yo o neng a lwela bosiamisi jwa loago, ke sona se se neng se ngoka batho gantsi, e seng mmino wa gagwe.

en: Not his intoxicating blend of Yoruba trance music, highlife-derived harmonies and African American funk and jazz.
tsn: Maitshwaro a gagwe mo phatlalatseng jaaka motsuolodi wa tsa setso, ke ona a neng a tshwere ditlhogo tsa dikgang.

en: He was artistically ahead of his time.
tsn: Eseng mmino wa gagwe o o tlhakantseng mmino wa Seyoruba le mmino wa Jazz Seafrorika wa kwa Amerika.

en: And nearly 30 years since his passing, the world is still playing catch up.
tsn: O ne a le kwa pele thata fa go tliwa mo go tsa botsweretshi.

en: Fela was a social and cultural misfit during the prime years of his career.
tsn: Dingwaga tse di yang kwa go tse 30 fa e sale a tlhokafala, lefatshe le santse le leka go mo fitlhelela.

en: He was blacklisted on radio.
tsn: Fela e ne e le yo o nnisegeng mo tsa loago le setso  ka nako ya boiphediso jwa gagwe.

en: The DJs who played his records were considered brave.
tsn: O ne a phimotswe mo seyalemoweng.

en: These defiant on-air personalities included Lagos Jacob Akinyemi Johnson (JAJ), who broke the mould in the 1980s.
tsn: Bagasi ba ba neng ba tshameka direkoto tsa gagwe ba ne ba tsewa jaaka batho ba ba sebete.

en: It also didn’t help matters that Fela’s complex music compositions sometimes ran for over half an hour.
tsn: Bagasi ba ba neng ba roba molao ba, ba akaretsa Jacob Akinyemi Johnson (JAJ), yo o robileng molao ka dingwaga tsa bo 1980.

en: According to Fela, the value of music exceeded its entertainment appeal.
tsn: Se sengwe se se neng se sa thuse ke gore botlhami jwa mmino wa ga Fela ka dinako tse dingwe, o ne tshameka nako e e fetang halofo ya ura.

en: In his view, music had a spiritual dimension and so commercial considerations were secondary.
tsn: Go ya ka Fela, boleng jwa mmino bo ne feta mokgwa o o mmino o ne o bonagala ka teng mo go itumediseng batho.

en: As I wrote in a recent essay, his temperament was uncompromising.
tsn: Go ya ka kakanyo ya gagwe, mmino o ne o na le letlhakore la semowa, ka jalo, kgwebo e ne e latela mo logatong lwa bobedi.

en: Fela Kuti is one of many prominent names nominated for induction into the prestigious Rock and Roll Hall of Fame this year.
tsn: Jaaka ke kwadileng mo tlhamong ya me ya sešheng, mekgwa ya gagwe e ne e tebile thata e bile e ka se fetoge.

en: Other big-name acts include Tina Turner, Foo Fighters and Iron Maiden.
tsn: Fela Kuti ke lengwe la maina a a itsegeng thata, a a tlhophilweng go tsenngwa mo “Hall of Fame” ya mmino wa Rock & Roll ngwaga ono.

en: We are already late in catching on during his colourful lifetime.
tsn: Maina a mangwe a magolo a akaretsa Tina Turner, Foo Fighters le Iron Maiden.

en: It does feel embarrassing.
tsn: Re setse re le kwa morago ga nako ka go fitlhelela ditiro tse a di dirileng ka nako ya gagwe e e itumedisang mo botshelong.

en: But now there’s an opportunity, with the benefit of hindsight, to revaluate, redefine and bestow his due accolades.
tsn: Go tlhabisa ditlhong.

en: Kuti’s recent nomination for a spot in the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame is a great start.
tsn: Mme jaanong go na le tšhono ya gore re ka boela kwa morago ra tlhalosa le go neelana ka dikabelo tsa gagwe tse di mo tshwanetseng.

en: The common mans middle finger
tsn: Tlhopho ya ga Kuti ya bošeng jaana ya go bona phatlha mo “Hall of Fame” ya mmino wa Rock & Roll ke tshimologo e ntle.

en: Fela was special and he stood out in his music, lifestyle and activism.
tsn: Monwana yo o mo magareng wa monna yo o tlwaeleging.

en: There he was, always uniquely dressed in embroidered brocades and African-inspired prints.
tsn: Fela e ne e le motho yo o kgethegileng seo se tlhageletse mo tirong ya gagwe ya mmino, mokgwa wa go tshela le bolweladiphetogo jwa gagwe.

en: Fela Kuti performed on stage with his band Egypt 80.
tsn: O kare ke a mmona, o ne a dula a apere diaparo tsa gagwe tse di kgabisitsweng ka mekgabisa ya Seaforika.

en: There was none like him then, and even now.
tsn: Fela Kuti o diragaditse mo seraleng le bente ya gagwe, Egypt 80.

en: Fela was an avatar, an anomaly and a pioneer all at once.
tsn: Ga go na ope yo o neng a tshwana le ena mo malobeng, le jaanong ga a yo.

en: And the ripples he left in his wake are still felt around the world.
tsn: Fela e ne e le motsayakarolo, motho yo o sa tlwaelegang le mothei wa dilo ka nako e le yosi.

en: Fela was difficult to love.
tsn: Mme diphetogo tse a di tlogetseng di santse di bonagala lefatshe ka bophara.

en: He always seemed too hot to handle.
tsn: Go ne go le boima go rata Fela .

en: He seemed out of place and was uncompromising in his art, politics and vision.
tsn: O ne ka gale a bonala e le motho yo o sa tshwaregeng bonolo.

en: He was wild, uncontrollable and spontaneous.
tsn: O ne a bontsha okare ga a a phuthologa mme a tebile mabapi le botsweretshi jwa gagwe, dipolotiki le pono.

en: This was a guy who had the sheer audacity to marry 27 women in a single day.
tsn: O ne a le tlhaga, a sa laolege mme a dira se a se akantseng, ka nako e a e akantseng.

en: He was accommodating to a fault.
tsn: Yo, ke monna yo o nnileng le sebete sa go nyala basadi ba le 27 mo letsatsing le le lengwe.

en: Hoodlums and common criminals were often able to seek and find refuge under his protection.
tsn: O ne a kgona go amogela phoso.

en: He found joy in poking at the finer sensibilities of decent society.
tsn: Disenyi tse di tlwaelegileng di ne di kgona go batla le go bona polokesego ka fa tlase ga tshireletso ya ya gagwe.

en: Fela was born middle-class, but on many occasions, he rejected classism.
tsn: O ne a bona Boitumelo mo go lekeng baagi ba setšhab ba ba nang le seriti.

en: He reportedly used luxury Mercedes Benz cars as transport for firewood, spinach and other indignities, to demystify affluence.
tsn: Fela o belegwe a itsholetse, mme mo mabakeng a mantsi, o ne a gana kgethololo.

en: Due to his behaviour, his music was shunned by polite society and the political class.
tsn: Go begwa fa a ne a dirisa dikoloi tsa monobonobo tsa Mercedes Benz jaaka dipalangwa go ya go batla dikgong, spinatšhe le tse dingwe, go bontsha fa khumo e se sepe.

en: Instead, he became famous for his serial transgressions, arrests, state-sanctioned physical assaults, 300 court appearances and spells of imprisonment.
tsn: Ka ntlha ya maitsholo a gagwe, mmino wa gagwe o ne o itlhokomolosiwa ke setšhaba se se maitseo le borradipolotiki.

en: He always referred to himself as abami eda, meaning the weird one.
tsn: Go na le moo, o ne a itsege ka melato ya gagwe, dikgolego, dikgwatiso tsa mmele, go tlhagelela kwa kgotlatshekelo makgetlho a le 300 le go tlhagisa metswedi ya kwa kgolegelong.

en: It was true.
tsn: O ne a tlhola a ipitsa ka abami eda, e e kayang “yo o sa tlwaelesegang”

en: He was as weird as they come, and wasn’t afraid to revel in it.
tsn: E ne e le nnete.

en: And now, his robust life has become myth.
tsn: O ne a sa tlwaelega e le tota e bile a sa tshabe go bontsha seo.

en: All we have left is a legacy of astonishing music.
tsn: Le jaanong, botshelo jwa gagwe o kare sengwe se se iseng se nne teng.

en: We must now develop the language and critical tools to describe and analyse the potency of his work.
tsn: Se re setseng ka sona fela ke boswa jwa mmino wa gagwe.

en: We must also begin to honour his music and cultural accomplishments.
tsn: Jaanong re tshwanetse go tlhama puo le didiriswa tse di leng botlhokwa go tlhalosa le go sekaseka tiro ya gagwe.

en: Fela’s Afrobeat’s legacy.
tsn: Gape re tshwanetse go simolola go tlotla mmino wa gagwe o le diphitlhelelo tsa gagwe tsa setso.

en: There are reservations about how appropriate Fela’s possible induction into the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame is.
tsn: Boswa jwa ga Fela jwa mmino.

en: He created a genre of music that defies standard systems of categorisation.
tsn: Go na le dipelaelo tsa gore go tsenngwa ga ga Fela kwa “Hall of Fame” ya mmino wa Rock & Rock go maleba go le kana kang.

en: It was the only way he could create art.
tsn: O tlhamile mofuta wa mmino o o nnileng kgatlhanong le tsamaiso e e tlwaelegileng.

en: A tricky legacy.
tsn: E ne e le mokgwa o le mongwe fela o a ka diramg botsweretshi ka ona.

en: It comprises a seductive fusion of diverse musical genres, politics, pan-Africanism, eroticism and funky, spirited grooves and attitudes.
tsn: Boswa jo bo gakang.

en: You cannot separate one from the other.
tsn: E le mefuta e e farologaneng ya mmino le motswako o o sa tlwaelegang, dipolotiki, mmoni wa Seaforika, dipina tsa semowa le maikutlo.

en: And that is why his fans and imitators can only come up with a shallower, globally acclaimed subgenre  Afrobeats.
tsn: O ka se di aroganye.

en: Although, Felas work influenced todays Afrobeats, it is still a reduction of the original form.
tsn: Ke ka ga moo balatedi le baetsisi ba gagwe ba kgona go tla fela ka mmino wa Afro o lolea o o tumileng lefatshe ka bophara.

en: Theres a wide gulf between Afrobeat and Afrobeats.
tsn: Le mororo mmino wa ga Fela o rotloeditse mmino wa gompieno wa Afro, e sa ntse e le phokotso ya mmino wa kwa tshimologong.

en: Felas work stands out in terms of musical proficiency, ideological rigour and spiritual potency.
tsn: Go na le pharologano e kgolo magareng ga Afrobeat le Afrobeats.

en: Judgement in the matter between DJ Nkosinathi Maphumulo, popularly known as Black Coffee, and former wife Mbalenhle Mlotshwa has been reserved.
tsn: Tiro ya ga Fela e a itlhaola ka ntlha ya bokgoni jwa gagwe jwa mmino le tumelo ya semowa.

en: The Randburg Magistrates Court heard an application for a protection order, preventing Black Coffee from entering his former marital home.
tsn: Katlholo mo kgetseng e e magareng ga DJ Nkosinathi Maphumulo, yo o itsegeng thata ka la Black Coffee, le mosadi Mbalenhle Mlotshwa e beetswe kwa thoko.

en: Mlotshwa, popularly known as Enhle Mbali, applied for the protection order after she accused Maphumulo of domestic violence.
tsn: Kgotlatshekelo ya bomagiseterata ya kwa Randburg, e utlwile kopo ya taelo ya tshireletso, go thibela Black Coffee go tsena kwa legaeng la gagwe la maloba la lenyalo.

en: The two took to the courts following an alleged altercation in their home in March.
tsn: Mlotshwa, yo o itsegeng thata ka la Enhle Mbali, o dirile kopo ya Taelo ya Tshireletso morago ga go latofatsa Maphumulo ka tirisodikgoka ya tsa selegae.

en: Maphumulo allegedly slapped Enhle Mbali on the wrist after a disagreement.
tsn: Bobedi jo bo ile kwa kgotlatshekelo morago ga kgotlhang e ba nnileng le yona kwa legaeng la bona ka kgwedi ya Mopitlwe.

en: It is believed Maphumulo was unhappy with a birthday celebration held at the home.
tsn: Go kaiwa fa Maphumulo a faphotse Enhle Mbali mo letsogong morago ga go sa utlwaneng.

en: Individuals, who came to support the actress, took a stance against Gender-Based Violence.
tsn: Go dumelwa fa Maphumulo a ne a sa itumelela mokete wa letsatsi la matsalo le le neng le tshwaretswe kwa gae.

en: Family representative, Themba Mhinga, says Mlotshwa is seeking protection from the courts.
tsn: Batho ba ba neng ba tlile go tshegetsa modiragatsi wa thelebišhene, ba bontshitse fa ba le kgatlhanong le tirisodikgoka e e ikaegileng ka bong.

en: We believe that it is essential right now for all women, regardless of whether they have been to court or not, to be supported if they and when they come across any issue that is gender-based violence relate, explains Dr Moetse.
tsn: Moemedi wa lelapa, Themba Mhinga a re Mlotshwa o batla tshireletso go tswa kwa dikgotlatshekelo.

en: The DJ is opposing the protection order.
tsn: Re dumela gore go botlhokwa jaanong go basadi botlhe, go sa kgathalasege gore a ba ya kwa kgotlatshekelo kgotsa nnyaa, go engwa nokeng fa ba kopana le mathata mangwe le mangwe a a tsamaelanang le tirisodikgoka e e ikaegileng ka bong, go tlhalosa Ngk Moetse.

en: Nature conservation officials have finally been able to determine the gender of the baby white rhino that was born at the Rietvlei Nature Reserve in Pretoria two weeks ago.
tsn: DJ o ganetsana le taelo ya tshireletso.

en: The calf is a male and will be named Alpha.
tsn: Batsamaisi ba tshomarelo ba feleleditse ba kgonne go bona bong jwa tshukudu e e tshweu e e belegetsweng kwa Rietvlei kwa Pretoria dibeke tse pedi tse di fetileng.

en: Rietvlei Nature Reserve discovers a newborn rhino calf.
tsn: Namane e, e tonanyana mme e tlaa bidiwa Alpha.

en: MMC for Environmental and Agricultural Management in the City of Tshwane, Dana Wannenburg, says rhino names are determined alphabetically, and Alpha is the first to be born since the last name, Zulu, was allocated.
tsn: Lefelo la tlhago la kwa Rietvlei le itemogetse namane ya tshukudu e e sa tswang go tsalwa

en: Currently, Alphas mother, India, is keeping him well away from humans.
tsn: MMC wa tsa Tikologo le Botsamaisi jwa temothuo mo toropong ya Tshwane, Dana Wannenburg, a re maina a ditshukudu a abiwa go ya ka tatelano ya ditlhaka, mme Alpha ke ena wa ntlha go belegwa, fa e sale go ne go abilwe leina la Zulu mo nakong e e fetileng.

en: But as we head into the winter months, and with conservation officials running a supplementary feeding programme, young Alpha will become more used to human contact.
tsn: Ga jaana, mmaagwe Alpha, India, o dira tiro e ntle go mo sireletsa mo bathong.

en: It will become much easier for the public to see him when they visit the reserve, adds Wannenburg.
tsn: Fela jaaka re lebile kwa dikgweding tsa mariga, mme batlhankedi ba tshomarelo ba simolotse go tsamaisa lenaneo la phepo ya tlaleletso, Alpha o tlaa simolola go tlwaela batho.

en: The reserve said last week that Alphas birth reflected the success of their Rhino Conservation Programme, which dates back to the 80s.
tsn: Go tla nna bonolo go setšhaba go mo bona fa ba etetse Rasefe, Wannenburg o a tlaleletsa.

en: The South African-made documentary My Octopus Teacher has won the British Academy Film Awards (BAFTA) for Best Documentary.
tsn: Rasefe e rile mo bekeng e e fetileng, tsalo ya ga Alpha e bontshitse katlego ya lenaneo la bona la go somarela ditshukudu, le le simolotseng ka di dingwaga tsa bo 1980.

en: The awards presentation ceremony, held in London, had no audience due to COVID-19 restrictions and was streamed live.
tsn: Lenaneo la tshedimosetso la mo Aforikaborwa “My Octopus Teacher” le ikgapetse sekgele sa akatemi sa difilimi (BAFTA) jaaka lenaneo la tshedimosetso le le gaisang.

en: We would like to dedicate this award to the nomadic community who so generously welcomed us into their lives, Zhao, who won the director category, said in her acceptance speech.
tsn: Moletlo wa tlhagiso ya dikabelo, yo o neng o tshwaretswe kwa London, o ne o sena babogedi ka ntlha ya dikgoreletsi tsa COVID-19 mme o ne o lebilwe mo mafaratlhatlheng.

en: Thank you for showing us that ageing is a beautiful part of life, a journey that we should all cherish and celebrate.
tsn: Re batla go lebisa sekgele se kwa baaging ba Nomadland, ba ba re amogetseng mo matshelong a bona ka dipelo tse ditshweu.  Zhao, yo o gapileng sekgele sa ka fa tlase ga setlhopha sa bokaedi, o ne a tlhalosa mo puong ya gagwe ya kamogelo ya sekgele.

en: How we treat our elders says a lot of about who we are as a society and we need to do better.
tsn: Re lebogela fa o re bontshise gore go tsofala ke karolo e ntle ya botshelo le gore rotlhe re tshwanetse go e e itumelela le go e keteka.

en: Outstanding British film went to #MeToo revenge movie Promising Young Woman, which also won original screenplay.
tsn: Tsela e re tshwarang bagolo ba rona ka yona, e tlhalosa go le gontsi gore re le morafe, re bo mang mme re tshwanetse go dira botoka.

en: The academy also paid tribute to Prince Philip, Queen Elizabeth’s husband, who died on Friday, aged 99.
tsn: Filimi ya kwa Britain e e mantlhotlho e tserwe ke “Me Too” filimi ya ipusolosetso “Promising Young Woman”, e e ikgapetseng gape le sekgele sa tlhagiso.

en: Philip was named BAFTAs first president in 1959.
tsn: Akatemi e gape e akgola e ile ya akgola kgosana Phillip, monna wa ga kgosigadi Elizabeth yo o tlhokafetseng ka Labotlhano, a le dingwaga di le 99.

en: His grandson Prince William is BAFTAs current president.
tsn: Phillip o ne a bewa jaaka moporesidente wa ntlha wa BAFTA ka 1959.

en: Brokeback Mountain and Life of Pi director Ang Lee received the BAFTA Fellowship, the academy’s top honour, for his contribution to film.
tsn: Setlogolo sa gagwe Kgosana William, ke ena moporeditente wa BAFTA wa ga jaana.

en: Prince Harry arrived back in Britain on Sunday ahead of his grandfathers funeral in Windsor, the Sun newspaper reported, citing an eye witness.
tsn: Mokaedi wa “Brokeback Mountain” le “Life of Pi”, Ang Lee, o amogetse sekgele sa BAFTA a go tlhaba baakatemi-bagolo botlhale, tlotla ya maemo a a kwa godimo, ya go nna le seabe ga gagwe mo filiming.

en: Andrew joined his siblings Charles, Anne and Edward in saying they had taken strength from the outpouring of affection and would rally around their mother in her time of grief.
tsn: Kgosana Harry o gogogile kwa Britain ka Sontaga pele ga phitlho ya ga rremogolo wa gagwe kwa Windsor, kuranta ya letsatsi la Sontaga e begile fa e ikutlwetse ka motho yo iponetseng ka matlho.

en: You know it’s going to happen
tsn: Andrew o kopanetse puo le bonnaawe, Charles, Anne le Edward fa ba ne ba re ba bone maatla go tswa mo loratong le ba le bontshitsweng mme ba tlaa tshegetsa mmaabona mo nakong e ya kutlobotlhoko.

en: but you are never really ready, Anne said in a statement.
tsn: O a itse gore e tlile go diragala.

en: Andrew called his father a remarkable man after he left a private church service in Windsor, near where Philip died on Friday aged 99.
tsn: Mme ga o dule o le malala a laotswe. Anne o buile jalo mo puong ya gagwe.

en: I think the way I would put it is we’ve lost almost the grandfather of the nation.
tsn: Andrew o biditse rraagwe monna yo o makatsang morago ga go tswa kwa tirelong ya kereke ya poraefete kwa Windsor, gaufi le fa Phillip a tlhokafaletseng teng ka Labotlhano, a le dingwaga di le 99.

en: Prince Edward echoed that, saying: He might have been our father, grandfather, father-in-law but he meant so much to so many other people.
tsn: Ke akanya e tlaa e baya ka mokgwa wa gore, re latlhegetswe ke rraagwemogolo wa setšhaba.

en: Edwards wife, Sophie, told well-wishers of Philips final moments.
tsn: Kgosana Edward o ne a dumalana le ena fa a ne a re: A ka tswa e ne e le rraarona, rremogolo wa rona rre wa rona ka lenyalo mme o ne a le botlhokwa thata le mo bontsing jwa batho ba bangwe.

en: It was right for him.
tsn: Mosadi wa ga Edward, Sophie, o ne a bolelela bagomotsi ka ditiragalo tsa bofelo tsa ga Phillip.

en: It was so gentle.
tsn: E ne e mo tshwanetse.

en: It was just like somebody took him by the hand and off he went, she said.
tsn: E ne e le bonolo thata.

en: Very, very peaceful.
tsn: E ne e kare motho mongwe o tsere ka seatla mme a tsamaya fela jalo, a rialo.

en: And that’s all you want for somebody isn’t it?
tsn: E e tletse kagiso thata.

en: US pays tribute to Prince Phillip.
tsn: Mme ke sona se o ka batleng motho seo, a ga go a nna jalo?

en: Andrew has rarely been seen in public since he stepped down from official duties in 2019 over the controversy surrounding his association with the disgraced late US financier Jeffrey Epstein.
tsn: US e akgola kgosana Phillip.

en: At Canterbury Cathedral, the Archbishop of Canterbury prayed for those who found that the death of the Duke of Edinburgh, as Philip was officially known, had left a very great gap in their lives.
tsn: Andrew o ntse a bonagala sewelo mo setšhabeng fa e sale a tlogela ditiro tsa gagwe tsa semmuso ka 2019, ka ntlha ya kgolagano ya gagwe e e tlhabisang ditlhong le rraditšhelete wa kwa US, moswi Jefferey Epstein.

en: As part of eight days of national mourning, people gathered outside Windsor Castle and other royal palaces to leave flowers, while religious and political leaders expressed support for the queen, the world’s oldest and longest-reigning monarch.
tsn: Kwa kerekeng ya Canterbury, Mobishopomogolo wa Canterbury o rapeletse ba ba lemogileng gore loso lwa Kgosana ya Edinburgh, jaaka Phillip o ne a itsege, le tlogetse phatlha e kgolo mo matshelong a bona.

en: A note attached to a Royal Navy peak cap left amongst flowers at Windsor, a tribute to Philips service in the navy, read: God bless you Sir, you were an example to us all.
tsn: Jaaka karolo ya malatsi a le robedi a kutlhobotlhoko ya bosetšhaba, batho ba ne ba kokoana kwa ntle ga ntlo ya segosi kwa Windsor, go tlogela malomo, fa baeteledipele ba bodumedi le ba sepolitiki ba bontshitse tshegetso go kgosigadi, e e leng Kgosigadi e e di fetang tsotlhe ka dingwaga e bile e busitse nako e telele.

en: A Greek prince, Philip married Elizabeth in 1947, five years before she ascended to the throne.
tsn: Pampitshana e e neng e kgomareditswe mo kepeseng ya sesole sa kwa Lewatleng, e e neng e leng mo gare ga malomo kwa Windsor, go akgola tirelo ya ga Philips ya sesole sa kwa Lewatleng e ne e buisega jaana: Modimo a go tshegofatse rra, o ne o le sekao mo go rona rotlhe.

en: The prince will be given a ceremonial royal funeral rather than a state funeral.
tsn: Kgosana ya Mogerika, Phillip o nyetse Elizabeth ka 1947, dingwaga di le tlhano pele a tsaya setulo sa bogosi.

en: There will be no public processions, and it will be held entirely within the grounds of Windsor Castle and limited to 30 mourners.
tsn: Kgosana e e tlaa newa phitlho ya segosi go na le phitlho ya semmuso.

en: Prime Minister Boris Johnson will not attend.
tsn: Ga go kitla go nna le mekoloko ya setšhaba, mme e tlaa tshwarelwa gotlhelele kwa mabaleng a ntlo ya segosi kwa Windsor, ka palo ya batho e e lekanyeditsweng go 30.

en: Former British Prime Minister John Major, who was in office from 1990 to 1997 and who was guardian to Princes William and Harry after their mother Diana died, said he hoped the funeral would help reunite the family after it was rocked last month by an interview given by Harry and his wife Meghan to Oprah Winfrey.
tsn: Tonakgolo Boris Johnson ga a kitla a nna teng.

en: During the interview, Meghan said her pleas for help while she felt suicidal were ignored and that an unnamed member of the family had asked how dark their unborn childs skin might be.
tsn: Tonakgolo ya maloba John Major, yo o neng a le mo ofising go tloga ka ngwaga wa 1990 go fitlha ka ngwaga wa 1997, yo e neng e le motlhokomedi wa dikgosana, William le Harry morago ga loso lwa mmaabona, Diana, o rile o  solofela fa phitlho e tlaa thusa go kopanya lelapa le gape morago ga gore le tsikinngwe mo kgweding e e fetileng ke dipotsolotso tse di neetsweng ke Harry le mosadi wa gagwe Meghan go Oprah Winfrey.

en: Harry will return from the United States, where the couple now live, to attend the funeral while Meghan, who is pregnant with their second child, will not, on her doctors advice.
tsn: Ka nako ya dipotsolotso, Meghan o rile kopo ya gagwe ya thuso fa a ne a tlelwa ke maikutlo a go ipolaya e ikgatholositswe, le gore mongwe wa leloko la lelapa yo o sa bidiwang ka leina, o ne a botsa gore letlalo la ngwana wa bona yo o iseng a bonwe le tlaa tla le ntshofetse go le kana kang.

en: The friction that we are told has arisen is a friction better ended as speedily as possible, Major said.
tsn: Harry o tlaa boela kwa United States, kwa balekane ba ba dulang gone go tsenela phitlho, fa Meghan, yo a imileng ngwana wa bona wa bobedi a se kitla a ya ka ntlha ya kgakololo ya ngaka ya gagwe.

en: Condolence messages are pouring in on social media following the death of AKAs fiance.
tsn: Kgotlhang e re bolelelwang gore e tsogile, ke kgotlhang e e tshwanetseng go fedisiwa ka bonako jo bo ka kgonagalang, Major a rialo.

en: The 22-year-old passed away on Sunday morning in Cape Town.
tsn: Melaetsa ya kgomotso e tsena ka bontsi mo mafaratlhatlheng morago ga go tlhokafala ga molekane wa ga AKA.

en: While unconfirmed reports have pointed to a suicide, the Forbes and Tembe families did not divulge Anele Tembe’s cause of death but only said she had been in a tragic incident.
tsn: Mosetsana yow a dingwaga di le 22 o tlhokafetse ka Latshipi kwa Cape Town.

en: The families have issued a statement expressing regret over her death describing it as untimely.
tsn: Le fa dipegelo di supile fa a ipolaile, lelapa la ga Forbes le la ga Tembe ga ba a upulola sebakwa sa loso mme se ba se buile fela ke gore go nnile le tiragalo e e setlhogo.

en: The families say they are still in shock.
tsn: Malapa a rebotse setatamente se se tlhagisang go swaba ga bona ka loso lwa gagwe, le ba tlhalositseng fa le ba tshoganyeditse.

en: Tembe’s body was found on a street in Cape Town.
tsn: Malapa a re ba sa ntse ba le mo letshogong.

en: She allegedly jumped to her death from the top of a hotel building.
tsn: Mmele wa ga Tembe o fitlhetswe mo mmileng kwa Cape Town.

en: Police have opened an inquest docket.
tsn: Go kaiwa fa a wetse mo losong la gagwe go tswa kwa kagong e e kwa godimo ya Hotele.

en: Tembe’s fiancé, Kiernan Forbes, known to his fans as AKA, is said to be inconsolable.
tsn: Sepodisi se butse dokete ya ditlhotlhomiso.

en: The Tembe and Forbes families described Anele as an exceptional and gifted young woman who had a promising life ahead of her.
tsn: Molekane wa ga Tembe, Kiernan Forbes, yo o itsegeng go balatedi ba gagwe jaaka AKA, o tlhalosiwa fa a gomotsege.

en: Tembe is said to have had depression and had tried taking her life last year but didn’t go through with it after the police intervened.
tsn: Ba lelapa la ga Tembe le Forbes ba tlhalositse Anele jaaka mosadi yo o kgethegileng, yo o nang le talente e bile a le mošwa, yo botshelo jwa gagwe bo neng bo tletse ditsholofetso.

en: This is literally just last night at @ayepyep CPT .
tsn: Go kaiwa fa Tembe a ne a na le kgatelelo ya maikutlo e bile a lekile go tsaya botshelo jwa gagwe mo ngwageng o o fetileng mme a palelwa morago ga gore sepodisi se mo tlhage thuso.

en: I can confirm that rapper AKA’s fiance Nellie was involved in a fatal incident in Capetown.
tsn: Se se diragetse maabane bosigo kwa ayepyep CPT.

en: The rappers management is not at liberty to share any further details and have requested that we give the family time to deal with the shock.
tsn: Nka netefatsa gore sebini sa mmino wa Rap AKA le molekane wa gagwe Nellie ba tlhagetswe ke kotsi e e masisi kwa Capetown.

en: I’m told AKA is grief stricken.
tsn: Botsamaisi jwa sebini sa mmino wa Rap ga bo a letlelesega  go abelana ka dintlha dipe go ya pele mme ba kopile gore ba lelapa ba newe nako ya go samagana le letshogo.

en: South Africans have been sending condolences to the artist and both families.
tsn: Ke bolelelwa gore AKA o iteilwe ke kutlobotlhoko.

en: Some have even thrown witchcraft accusations, against AKAs former love interests, into the mix.
tsn: Maaforikaborwa a ntse a romela melaetsa ya matshediso go motsweretshi le malapa ka bobedi.

en: A claim slated by many, who even urged the accused women to sue.
tsn: Bangwe ba ntse ba latlhela ditatofatso tsa boloi kgatlhanong le mokapelo wa ga AKA wa maloba mo kgannyeng e.

en: Can you guys leave Zinhle out of AKA situation for once please?
tsn: Tatofatso e e kgadilweng ke ba le bantsi, e e dirileng gore mosadi yo o latofadiwang a suwe.

en: You cant even spell her name correct.
tsn: Ke kopa gore lo ntsheng Zinhle mo mererong ya ga AKA gangwe fela ka tsweetswee?

en: Please leave Zinhle and Bonang out of this Nellie situation Lets be respectful
tsn: O palelwa le ke peleta leina la gagwe ka tsela e e nepagetseng

en: And let the loved ones handle this in peace.
tsn: Tsweetswee tlogelang go tsenya Zinhle le Bonang mo kgannyeng ya ga Nellie. A re nneng le tlotlo

en: People saying there’s no way Nellie could’ve committed suicide considering she was about to get married and seemed happy shows how much people don’t understand depression
tsn: Mme re tlogeleng baratiwa ba bona ba samagane kgang e ka kagiso.

en: We are a sad generation with happy pictures
tsn: Batho ba bantsi ba ba reng ga go kgonege go Nellie a ka ipolaya ka ntlha ya fa a ne a tlile go nyalwa e bile a bontsha a itumetse, ba bontsha ka moo batho ba sa tlhalogeng bolwetse jwa kgatelelo ya maikutlo ka teng.

en: This Nellie situation makes me realize that you can lose someone you love at any time.
tsn: Re setšhaba se se utlwileng botlhoko mme se bontsha se itumetse mo ditshwantshong.

en: It’s really important to appreciate them while they’re still alive
tsn: Seemo se sa ga Nellie se ntemotshitse gore o ka latlhegelwa ke mongwe yo o mo ratang ka nako nngwe le nngwe.

en: Mega, my heart bleeds for you
tsn: Go botlhokwa tota go ba itumelela fa ba sa ntse  ba tshela.

en: Truth is, people are silently going through a lot.
tsn: Mega, pelo ya me e go utlwetse botlhoko.

en: Be kind always, because everyone is fighting a battle no one knows about, and above all else, take care of your mental health.
tsn: Nnete ke gore, batho ba feta mo dilong tse dintsi ka setu.

en: Nellie your life is something else.
tsn: Nna pelontle ka gale, ka ntlha ya gore mongwe le mongwe o lwa ntwa e e sa itseweng ke ope, mme mo godimo ga tsotlhe, tlhokomela boitekanelo jwa tlhaloganyo ya gago.

en: RIP Nellie. This song made me understand the love u gave Kiernan.
tsn: Nellie botshelo jwa gago ke selo sengwe.

en: Nellie looked so happy.
tsn: Robala ka kagiso Nellie. Pina e e dira gore ke tlhaloganye lorato le o le neetseng Kiernan.

en: If she was depressed, you wouldn’t know. which goes to show that you never really know what someone is dealing with.
tsn: Nellie o ne a lebega a itumetse thata.

en: I pray for her family, friends, AKA and everyone who was close to her.
tsn: Fa a ne a sotlega mo moweng, o ne o ka se itse. Se se tswelelang go bontsha gore o ka se itse gore motho o samagane le eng.

en: Just like that?
tsn: Ke rapelela ba lelapa la gagwe, ditsala , AKA le mongwe le mongwe yo o neng a gaufi le ene.

en: My condolences to her family and Kiernan Forbes.
tsn: Fela jalo?

en: May God strengthen you all.
tsn: Matshediso a me go ba lelapa la gagwe le Kiernan Forbes.

en: I’m out of words.
tsn: Modimo a lo maatlafatse lotlhe.

en: Condolences to Tembe and Kiernan families. RIP Nellie .
tsn: Ke feletswe ke mafoko.

en: I don’t even want to imagine what Kiernan is going through right now.
tsn: Matshediso go ba lelapa la ga Tembe le la ga Kiernan. Robala ka kagiso Nellie.

en: That one, destroys me more.
tsn: Ga ke batle le go nagana gore Kiernan o ikutlwa janga ga jaana.

en: A Kimberley woman, in the Northern Cape, has started a project dubbed Beanies for KH.
tsn: Seo se nkutlwisa botlhoko le go feta.

en: The project knits beanies, booties and blankets for premature babies born at Robert Sobukwe Hospital.
tsn: Mosadi wa kwa Kimberley kwa Kapa Bokone, o simolotse porojeke e e bidiwang Beanies for KH.

en: Due to its success, orphanages, and social service centres are also now benefiting.
tsn: Porojeke e, e loga ditlhoro, ditlhako le dikobo tsa bana ba ba belegweng pele ga nako kwa bookelong jwa Robert Sobukwe.

en: Judi Jooste’s friend started the project to suppress her cigarette cravings, by knitting.
tsn: Ka ntlha ya katlego ya yona, magae a dikhutsana le ditirelo tsa loago le bona e ba tswetse mosola.

en: In no time she had stacks of little beanies and jerseys for premature babies.
tsn: Tsala ya ga Judi Joostes o simolotse porojeke go itebatsa ka keletso ya gagwe ya sekerete, ka go loga.

en: Ten years later, the project has grown and is now donating toiletry packs to mothers.
tsn: Mo nakong e se kae, ke fa a setse a kgobokantse dijeresi le ditlhoronyana tsa bana ba ba belegweng pele ga nako.

en: When you have a premature baby, you don’t know in advance that you’re going to be in hospital for up to three months.
tsn: Morago ga dingwaga di le lesome, porojeke e setse e godile mme jaanong e abelana ka dipakete tsa didiriswa tsa go tlhapa go bomme.

en: They run out of toiletries, out of everything.
tsn: Fa o na le ngwana le yo o belegweng pele ga nako, ga o itse go sa le gale gore o tlile go nna kwa bookelong dikgwedi tse fitlhang go di le tharo.

en: Then we started asking TJE communities for donations of toiletries to make up a little package consisting of basic things like things that we take for granted, deodorants, the toothbrush.
tsn: Ba felela ke didiriswa tsa go tlhapa. Ba felelwa ke sengwe le sengwe.

en: We don’t think about those but when you are in hospital, especially now in COVID times, no one can come and visit you.
tsn: Morago ga moo re ne ra simolola go kopa baagi ba TJE go abelana ka didiriswa tsa go tlhapa, go dira pakete e le nnye e e tsentseng dilwana tse re sa di tseyeng tsia jaaka ditlolo le maratšhe a go tlhapa meno.

en: They can’t bring you this stuff and you can’t even go out for basic things that will make your life easier, says Jooste who is leading the project.
tsn: Ga re akanye ka dilo tseo, fela fa o le kwa bookelong, segolobogolo jaanong ka nako ya COVID, ga go ope yo o ka kgonang go tla go go etela.

en: Jooste says old-age homes around Kimberley have joined hands with her.
tsn: Ba ka se kgone go go tlisetsa dilo tse, mme le wena o ka se kgone go tswa o ya go reka ditlhokego tse di ka dirang botshelo jwa gago bonolo, Go bua Jooste yo o eteletseng porojeke pele.

en: Elderly women knit these little jerseys and blankets for leisure, but wool is in short supply.
tsn: Jooste a re magae a bagodi mo Kimberley ba thusana le ena.

en: There were ladies who started knitting projects in the old age homes.
tsn: Basadi ba ba godileng ba loga dijeresi le dikobo tse di nnye tse ka nako ya bona ya maitiso, fela kgwele ya go loga e a tlhaela.

en: They realise that if they bring those ladies out of their rooms to sit in a lounge and to be social, they become much brighter, much more involved and happier.
tsn: Go ne go na le bomme ba ba simolotseng diporojeke tsa go loga mo magaeng a batsofe.

en: So then, we started asking for wool and that is, at this stage also, a big need, a ball of wool, explains Jooste.
tsn: Ba lemoga gorego ntsha bomme ba mo diphaposing tsa bona, go nna mo phaposing ya bonno le ba bangwe, go dira gore ba kgone go tsaya karolo mme ba lebega ba itumetse.

en: Apart from clothing premature babies, the project also donates knitted dolls to Robert Sobukwe’s oncology childrens ward.
tsn: Ka jalo, re simolotse go kopa kgwele ya go loga, e mo kgatong e, e leng tlhokego e kgolo thata. Go  tlhalosa Jooste.

en: Report by Motlalepule Morake:
tsn: Kwa ntle ga go apesa masea a a bonweng pele ga nako, porojeke eno gape e abelana ka dimpopi tse di logilweng kwa wateng ya bana ya kankere kwa bookelong jwa Robert Sobukwe.

en: Beanies for KH is an initiative aimed at helping premature babies.
tsn: Pegelo ka Motlalepule Morake: Beanies for KH ke letsholo le le thusang bana ba ba bonweng pele ga nako.

en: American music star Taylor Swift released a re-recording of her 2008 hit album Fearless on Friday, as the Grammy Award winner seeks to take back control of her early catalogue.
tsn: Naledi ya mmino ya kwa Amerika, Taylor swift o golotse kgatiso ya mmino wa gagwe wa 2008, “Fearless” ka Labotlhano, jaaka mofenyi yow a sekgele sa Grammy a batla go tsaya taolo lenaane la gagwe la sešweng.

en: Fearless (Taylors Version) features 26 tracks, including six previously unreleased songs from the vault.
tsn: Fearless (ya ga Taylor) e na le dipina di le 26, go akaretsa le dipina di le thataro tse di neng di sa gololwa go tswa kwa diseifing.

en: It has all of the original albums 13 songs and six more from the records platinum version.
tsn: E na le dialebamo di le tsa kwa tshimologong, dipina di le 13 le di le thataro go tswa kwa rekotong ya polatinamo.

en: It also features single Today Was a Fairytale and a remix bonus track of Love Story (Taylors Version) by Swedish producer Elvira.
tsn: E tsenyeleditse gape le pina e e reng “Today was a Fairytale” le pina e e tswakantsweng ya kanelo lorato (Thanolelo ya gaTaylor) e e dirilweng ke montshakuno wa kwa Sweden, Elvira.

en: It was the night things changed, Swift wrote to her 153 million Instagram followers announcing the albums release.
tsn: Ke bosigo jo dilo di fetogileng ka jona, Swift o kwaletse balatedi ba gagwe ba Instagram ba le dimilone di le 153, a ba begela ka kgololo ya alebamo ya gagwe.

en: The 31-year-old, who has won 11 Grammy Awards, said in February she would release a re-recording of Fearless following a long-running dispute with her former record company Big Machine and music executive Scooter Braun over the rights to some of her biggest hits.
tsn: Mosadi yo wa dingwaga di le 31, yo o fentseng dikgele tsa Grammy di le 11, o rile ka kgwedi ya Tlhakole, o tlaa golola kgatiso ya “Fearless” morago ga ntwa e telele e a nnileng le yona le setlamo sa gagwe sa direkoto sa mo malobeng se se bidiwang Big Machine le khuduthamaga wa mmino, Scooter Braun, ka ga ditshwanelo dingwe tsa dipina tsa gagwe tse dikgolo.

en: Braun bought Big Machine in 2019 after Swift left the label in 2018 for a new deal with Universal Music Group.
tsn: Braun o rekile setlamo sa Big Machine ka 2019 morago ga gore Swift a tlogele setlamo ka 2018, mme a ya go dira le setlamo sa Universal Music Group.

en: Last year, he sold Swift’s master recordings to a private equity company in a deal reported to be worth more than $300 million.
tsn: Mo ngwageng o o fetileng, o rekisitse swifts Masetase ya ga Swift go setlamo sa poraefete mo tumalanong e e begilweng e le ya dimilione tsa didolara tse di fetang 300.

en: Swift released Fearless as an 18-year-old and the album, her second, catapulted her to global stardom as well as winning her the coveted album of the year award at the Grammys.
tsn: Swift golotse alebamo ya Fearless fa a ne a le dingwaga di le 18, e leng ya gagwe wa bobedi, e e mo dirileng naledi ya lefatshe mmogo le go mo dira mofenyi wa sekgele sa alebamo ya ngwaga kwa dikabelong tsa Grammy.

en: Critics said her fans would be pleased with the re-recording, with the singer staying loyal to the original version 13 years on.
tsn: Basekaseki ba rile balatedi ba gagwe ba tlaa itumelela kgatiso e nngwe gape, fa seopedi se bontshitse go ikanyega go rekoto ya pele, morago ga dingwaga di le 13.

en: Music website NME said the re-recording celebrates and stays true to Swifts Fearless-era.
tsn: Webosaete ya mmino NME ya re, kgatiso e e keteka le go nna nnete mo go Swift ka dinako tsa gagwe tsa Fearless.

en: Production here is crisper and warmer than that of the original, and Swifts vocals are, understandably, more mature, it wrote.
tsn: Ntshokuno fano e monatšana e bile e bothitonyana go feta ya pele, lentswe la ga Swift le lona, mo go tlhaloganyesegang, le utlwa e le la motho yo godileng. E kwadile jalo

en: Listening back to the whole album has a similar effect to reading back an old diary especially as these songs are steeped in nostalgia given the prominence on first release.
tsn: Go boela kwa morago o reetsa alebamo yotlhe, go tshwana fela le go boela kwa morago o ya go buisa bukatsatsi ga bogologolo, segolobogolo ka gore dipina tse di baka tlhologelelo ka ntlha ya tuma ga tsona mo kgololong ya tsona ya ntlha.

en: The archbishop of Chiles capital Santiago, Celestino Aos, has been hospitalised after testing positive for the coronavirus, the Roman Catholic Church in Chile wrote in a statement posted on Twitter on Saturday.
tsn: Mobišhopo wa Chiles capital Santiago, Celestino Aos, o amogetswe kwa bookelong morago ga gore diteko tsa gagwe tsa mogare wa corona di bontshe fa a tshwaetsegile. Kereke ya Roman Catholic kwa Chile e kwadile mo setatamenteng se se phasaladitsweng mo Twitter ka Lamatlhatso.

en: Aos, 76, and Monsignor Alberto Lorenzelli, the auxiliary bishop of Santiago, were confirmed by the church as having tested positive for COVID-19 earlier this week.
tsn: Aos wa dingwaga di le 76, le Monsignor Alberto Lorenzelli, Mobišhopo wa kwa Santiago, go netefaditswe kwa kerekeng fa ba tshwaeditswe ke COVID-19 go sa le gale mo bekeng e.

en: Both had received two doses of the Sinovac vaccine being administered by the Chilean health authorities, the church said, with the second dose administered on March 11.
tsn: Bobedi jwa bona bo ne bo filwe moento wa Sinovac o o tsamaisiwang ke bothati jwa boitekanelo jwa Chilean. Kereke e buile jalo, mme moento wa bobedi o tlaa tsamaisiwa ka la 11 Mopitlwe.

en: The church said in its Saturday statement that Aos was admitted to a university hospital in the capital on medical advice and in a preventive manner.
tsn: Kereke e buile mo setatamente sa yona sa Lamatlhatso gore, Aos o amogetswe kwa bookelong jwa Yunibesithi kwa khepetleleng go bona kgakololo ya bongaka le ditsela tsa thibelo.

en: Although the effects of the disease are moderate, they need to be addressed with specialised equipment to avoid possible complications, the statement said, adding that Lorenzelli’s condition had not changed.
tsn: Le fa ditlamorago tsa bolwetse e se tse di masisi go le kalo, di tlhoka go rarabololwa ka didiriswa tse di marara go tila kgonego ya tlhakatlhakano, setatamente se kaile jalo, se tlaleletsa ka gore maemo a ga Lorenzelli ga a ise a fetoge.

en: A recent study by the University of Chile of national vaccination data and contagion rates suggested that the Sinovac vaccine was 54% effective at preventing coronavirus contagion two weeks after two doses are administered.
tsn: Patlisiso ya bošeng jaana ya Yunibesithi ya Chile ya tshedimosetso ya meento ya Bosetšhaba le kelo ya tshwaetsego, e tshitshintse gore moento wa Sinovac o na diperesente di le 54 tsa bokgoni jwa go thibela tshwaetsego ya mogare wa corona dibeke di le pedi moraga ga go tswewa ga meento e mebedi.

en: A broader, real-world study of the efficacy of the Sinovac and Pfizer vaccines being administered in Chiles rapid mass vaccination campaign will be published in the coming week by the government.
tsn: Thuto e e akaretsang ya lefatshe, ya katlego ya tsamaiso ya letsholo la meento ya Sinovac le Pfizer kwa Chiles, e tlaa phasaladiwa ke puso mo bekeng e e tlang.

en: Aos, who is from Spain, was appointed Santiago’s archbishop by Pope Francis in December 2019 as the Vatican sought to turn the page on a sexual abuse scandal that has shaken its standing and eroded support in the conservative Latin American nation.
tsn: Aos, yo o tswang kwa Spain, o ne a tlhomiwa jaaka Mobišhopo wa kwa Santiago ke Mopapa Francis ka Sedimonthole ka 2019 jaaka kereke e ne e batla go fetola tsebe mo morerong  wa tshotlako ya thobalano e e tsikintseng kemo ya yona le go latlhegelwa ke baema nokeng mo setšhabeng sa ma Latin a kwa Amerika.

en: Aos’s predecessor, Cardinal Ricardo Ezzati, faces multiple charges that he helped cover up sexual abuse of children by Chilean clergymen.
tsn: Mobišhopo yo o neng a tshwere pela ga Aos, e leng Ricardo Ezzati, o lebagane le ditatofatso di le dintsi tsa go leka thusa bipa thotlako ya bana ya thobalano e e dirilweng ke banna ba kwa Chilean.

en: He denies the charges.
tsn: O ganetsana le ditatofatso.

en: South Africa’s largest urban nature reserve, the Rietvlei Nature Reserve, discovered a new born rhino calf this past week.
tsn: Resefe ya Aforikaborwa e kgolo ya tlhago ya metsesetoropo, The Rietvlei Nature Reserve, e lemogile namane ya tshukudu e tshotsweng mo bekeng e e fetileng.

en: The reserve is ecstatic over its new discovery.
tsn: Resefe e itumeletse thibololo e ntšhwa e thata.

en: Rhinos are endangered in South Africa because of obviously poaching.
tsn: Matshelo a ditshukudu a mo kotsing mo Aforikaborwa ka ntlha ya batho ba ba di tsomang.

en: So its very good that they are breeding.
tsn: Ka jalo go go ntle thata gore di a tsala.

en: You know rhinos breed every three years.
tsn: O a itse gore tshukudi e tsala gagwe mo dingwageng di le tharo.

en: The mother would have a calf maybe every three years and then shell chase the old baby away, then shell have a new baby. So they don’t breed like every year.
tsn: Mme o tlaa nna le namane gongwe gangwe mo dingwageng di le tharo mme o tlaa leleka ngwana yo mogolo, mme a nne le lesea le lešwa ka jalo ga di tsale ngwaga le ngwaga.

en: So it takes long for them to have calves, so its very important, says Conservationist, Jeanri Weidenman.
tsn: Ka jalo, go tsaya nako e e telele gore di tsale dinamane, mme go botlhokwa thata, go bua Jeanri Weidenman.

en: The calf’s gender is yet to be determined as its mother is still overprotective.
tsn: Bong jwa namane bo santse bo tlaa tlhomamisiwa ka ntlha ya fa mme wa yona a santse a e sireleditse thata.

en: As soon as that mother is not overprotective anymore, she will come out with that calf into the areas.
tsn: Fa mme wa yona a sa tlhole a e sireleditse thata, o tlaa tswela le namane kwa mafelong a mangwe.

en: But people are really driving into Rietvlei, seeing all the different rhinos and the species that we’ve got here, says Environment and Agriculture MMC, Dana Wanenburg.
tsn: Mme batho ba a eta mo Rietvlei, ba bona ditshukudu tsotlhe tse di farologaneng le mefuta e mengwe ya diphologolo tse re nang le tsona fa. Go bua MMC wa tsa tikologo le temothuo, Dana Wanenburg.

en: Despite interruptions by COVID-19 in 2020, 394 rhinos were still poached.
tsn: Le fa go nnile le tsenogare ya COVID-19 ka 2020, ditshukudi di le 394 di santse di bolaiwe ke batsumi.

en: This is, however, a sharp decline in poaching, the lowest in 10 years, according to the Department of Environment Forestry and Fisheries 2020 Rhino Poaching Report.
tsn: Le fa go le jalo, se ke phokotso e e kgolo mo go tsumiweng ga ditshukudu, palo e e kwa  thata mo dingwageng di le 10, go ya ka raporoto ya Lefapha la tikologo ya Dikgwa le Bodirelatlhapi ya ngwaga wa 2020.

en: The Rietvlei Nature Reserve only had one encounter with poachers back in 2018.
tsn: Resefe ya tlhago ya kwa Rietvlei e nnile le maitemogelo a le mangwe fela le batsumi ba ditshukudu la 2018.

en: As a precautionary measure, they dehorn their rhinos.
tsn: Jaaka kgato ya thibelo, ba ntsha ditshukudu tsa bona dinaka.

en: We haven’t had any incident in the past two years with poaching.
tsn: Ga re ise re itemogelo go tsomiwa ga ditshukudo mo dingwageng tse pedi tse di fetileng.

en: We’ve been very lucky.
tsn: Re nnile lesego thata.

en: We’ve been dehorning the rhinos and we’ve been upping our security as well, explains Weidenman.
tsn: Re ntse re tlosa ditshukudu dinaka mme gape re ntse re gagamatsa tshireletsego ya rona, go tlhalosa Weidenman.

en: Visitor numbers at the reserve remain limited due to COVID-19 regulations.
tsn: Palo ya baeng kwa resefeng e a lekanyediwa ka ntlha ya melawana ya COVID-19.

en: Britain’s Prince Charles paid a personal tribute on Saturday to his dear papa Prince Philip, saying the royal family missed him enormously and that the 99-year-old would have been amazed at the touching reaction across the world to his death.
tsn: Kgosana ya kwa Britain, Charles o file rraagwe yo o rategang, Kgosana Phillip tlotla ka Lamatlhatso. A re ba lelapa la bogosi ba mo tlhologeletswe thata le gore rre yo wa dingwaga di le 99, o kabo a gakgamaditswe ke mokgwa o lefatsheng lotlhe le tsibogetseng loso lwa gagwe ka teng.

en: As you can imagine, my family and I miss my father enormously. Charles, the couples eldest son and heir to the throne, said outside his Highgrove House home in west England.
tsn: Jaaka o ka akanya, nna le ba lelapa la me re tlhologeletswe rre thata. Charles, morwa yo mogolo le mojaboswa wa balekane ba, o buile jalo kwa ntle ga legae la gagwe kwa Highgrove, kwa Bophirima jwa England.

en: My dear papa was a very special person who I think above all else would have been amazed by the reaction and the touching things that have been said about him and from that point of view we are, my family, deeply grateful for all that.
tsn: Rre wa me yo o rategang e ne e le motho yo o kgethegileng, yo ke akanyang gore gareng ga dilo tshotlhe, o kabo a gakgamaditswe ke ke tsibogo ya batho le dilo tse dintle tse di builweng ka ga ene, mme mo ntlheng eo, re le ba lelapa, re lebogela tsotlhe tse.

en: It will sustain us in this particular loss and at this particularly sad time.
tsn: Se se tlaa re tshegetsa mo tatlhegelong e, le mo nakong e e botlhoko e

en: Tributes continue to pour in for the late Prince Philip.
tsn: Melaetsa ya matshidiso ya ga kgosana Phillip e tswelela go romelwa.

en: At the conclusion of the service, Philip will be interred in the Royal Vault.
tsn: Kwa bokhutlong jwa tirelo ya phitlho, Phillip o tlaa tsenngwa mo lebokosong la bogosi.

en: Exact details of who will attending were not released, but among those present will be Harry, the Duke of Sussex, whose explosive interview with Oprah Winfrey alongside Meghan last month plunged the royal family into its greatest crisis in decades.
tsn: Dintlha tsa ba ba tlaa tsenelang tirelo ga di kitla di gololwa, mme mo go ba ba tlaa nnang teng, ke kgosana Harry, Kgosana ya Sussex, yo dipotsolotso tsa gagwe tsa kgwedi e e fetileng le Oprah Winfrey, mmogo le Meghan, di tsentseng lelapa la bogosi mo mathateng a le iseng le tsene mo go ona mo dingwagakgolo tse di fetileng.

en: Bustling New York City may not seem a bee-friendly place, but its high-rise rooftops and tiny gardens are buzzing with honey makers threatened by pesticides in rural areas.
tsn: Toropokgolo ya New York e ka tswa e sa bontshe e le toropo e e ratang dinotshe, mme dikago tsa teng tse di kwa godimo le ditshimo tse dinnye di tletse ka badiri ba mamepe ba ba tlhaselwang ke dibolayadisenyi mo mafelong a magae.

en: About 2.4 million Italian honeybees waited in a white van to be taken to their new homes early Friday.
tsn: Dimilione di ka nna 2.4 tsa dinotshe tsa mamepe tsa kwa Italy, di ne di letile mo koloing e tshweu go isiwa kwa magaeng a tsona a mašwa go sale gale ka  Labotlhano.

en: It was parked near the Dakota Apartments by Central Park, where John Lennon’s widow Yoko Ono has lived since 1973.
tsn: E ne e eme gaufi le dikago tsa Dakota kwa Central Park, kwa motlholagadi wa ga John Lennon, Yoko Ono, o ntse a dula teng fa e sale ka ngwaga wa 1973.

en: This is the first year that we’ve done this outside The Dakota, said Andrew Cot, president of the New York City Beekeepers Association.
tsn: Ono ke ngwaga wa ntlha re dira seno kwa ntle ga Dakota, go bua Andrew Cot, Moporesidente wa mokgatlho wa dinotshe wa kwa toropokgolo ya New York.

en: We heard that Yoko likes honey.
tsn: Re utlwile gore Yoko o rata mamepe.

en: Cot, who founded Andrews Honey, drove up from Georgia to deliver the bees.
tsn: Cot, yo o simolotseng “Andrew’s Honey”, o kgweeditse go tswa kwa Georgia a isa dinotshe.
