en: The van held 200 wood and screen packages, each with about 12 000 bees.
tsn: Koloi e ne e pegile dikgong le dipakete tsa sekereni di le 200, nngwe le e nngwe ya tsona e tshwere dinotshe di le 12 000.

en: A steady stream of beekeepers lined up to pick up their 3 lb packages which cost $159 or $205, depending on when they placed their order.
tsn: Bontsi jwa batshwara dinotshe ba ne ba letile go bona diphuthelwana tsa bona tsa boleng jwa didolara di le 159 kgotsa 205, go ya fela ka gore ba tsentse kopa ya bona leng.

en: Bees are sold by weight, like cheese, he said.
tsn: Dinotshe di rekisiwang ka boima, jaaka kase, o buile jalo.

en: Some buyers stuffed the packages in bags, while Ray Sage strapped two boxes of bees to his bicycle to ride to his hive on the Lower East Side.
tsn: Bangwe ba bareki ba tsentse diphuthelwana tsa bona mo dikgetseng, fa Ray Sage ena a ne a gokelela mabokoso a mabedi a dinotshe mo baesekeleng ya gagwe go ya kwa mosimeng wa gagwe kwa Botlhaba.

en: I have to just ride really slowly and carefully.
tsn: Ke tshwanetse go kgweetsa  fela ka iketlo le ka kelotlhoko.

en: Sometimes I think of it as I’m training to be Danish and I never become Danish, he said.
tsn: Ka dinako tse dingwe ke akanya ka yona jaaka e kete ke ikatisetsa go nna Danish, mme ga nke ke nna Danish, a rialo.

en: The number of urban beekeepers has grown quickly, with many hives now found on the rooftops of skyscrapers and office buildings, Cote said.
tsn: Palo ya batshwara dinotshe ba kwa metsesetoropong e oketsegile ka bonako, ka ditshimo tse di ntsi tsa dinotshe tse di bonwang kwa dikagong tse di kwa godimo le kwa dikagong tsa dikantoro, Cote o buile jalo.

en: New York legalised beekeeping in 2010 and has hundreds of registered hives, according to the Department of Health.
tsn: New York e letleletse go tshwarwa ga dinotshe go nna mo molaong ka 2010 mme e na le makgolo a mesima e e kwadisitsweng go ya ka Lefapha la Boitekanelo.

en: Bee populations are in sharp decline worldwide, partly because of excessive pesticides and chemicals in rural areas, and a lack of crop variety.
tsn: Dipalo tsa dinotshe di a fokotsega mo lefatsheng ka bophara, ka ntlha ya go gasiwa ga dibolayadisenyi le dikhemikhale mo mafelong a magae, le tlhokego ya dijalo tse di farologaneng.

en: New York does not have this problem, making it a healthy bee habitat, said Alan Markowitz, a Bronx resident who is a beekeeper at La Finca del Sur Community Garden, run by women of colour.
tsn: New York ga e na bothata jo, se se e dira lefelo le le  itekanetseng la manno a dinotshe, go bua Alan Markowitz, yo e leng moagi wa kwa Bronx e bile e le motshwara dinotshe kwa tshingwaneng ya baagi kwa La Finca del Sur, e e  tsamaiswang ke basadi ba mmala.

en: A third of what you put in your mouth needs a pollinator.
tsn: Nngwetharong ya se o se tsenyang mo molomong wa gago e tlhoka mmudula peo.

en: And in the city, believe it or not, bees do well because there’s less pesticides generally, said the former farmer.
tsn: Fela mo toropong, o dumela kgotsa o sa dumele, dinotshe di dira sentle ka gonne go na le diboladisenyi di le mmalwa ka kakaretso, go bua molemi wa maloba.

en: Having a lot of variety is wonderful for bees.
tsn: Go nna le mefuta e e farologaneng go siametse dinotshe.

en: A website and memorial mosaic benches have been unveiled at Jubilee Square in Simons Town in Cape Town to mark the forced removal of people under the apartheid eras Group Areas Act.
tsn: Webosaete le Segopotso sa dibanka tsa Mosaiki di sirolotswe kwa Jubilee Square kwa Toropong ya Simons kwa Kapa, go tshwaya go ntshiwa ka dikgoka ga batho, ka fa tlase ga molao tlhaolele wa setlhopha wa mafelo.

en: Simons Town was declared a white area in 1967, although forced removals started taking place two years earlier.
tsn: Toropo ya Simons e ne e itsege jaaka toropo ya basweu ka 1967, le fa dikhuduso tsa pateletso di simolotse go diragala dingwaga di le pedi pele ga foo.

en: Residents from Luyolo, Red Hill, Dido Valley and Glencairn were forcefully relocated to the Cape Flats.
tsn: Baagi go tswa kwa Luyolo, Red Hill, Dido Valley le Glencairn, ba fuduseditswe ka dikgoka kwa Cape Flats.

en: A place where people from all races lived, worked and played.
tsn: Lefelo le kwa batho ba merafe yotlhe ba neng ba phela, ba dira e bile ba tshameka.

en: This is how former residents of areas including Red Hill, Dido Valley, the Kloof, Glencairn and Luyolo Village remember Simons Town.
tsn: O, ke mokgwa o ka ona baagi ba maloba ba Red Hill, Dido Valley, The Kloof, Glencairn le motse wa Luyolo ba gakologelwang Simons Town.

en: That’s until the Group Areas Act ripped them away from the place they called home.
tsn: Se, ke go fitlhelela molao Group Areas o ba tseela lefelo le ba neng ba le bitsa legae.

en: Thousands of people were forcefully moved to various areas across the Cape Flats.
tsn: Diketekete tsa batho ba ne ba fudusetswa ka dikgoka kwa mafelong a a farologaneng go ralala Cape Flats.

en: These include Ocean View, Grassy Park and Gugulethu.
tsn: Tseno di akaretsa Ocean View, Gassy Park le Gugulethu.

en: Today, the Simons Town Museum, together with the Phoenix Committee unveiled the benches and also a website, to memorialise the injustice of the forced removals and to honour those whose lives were irrevocable changed.
tsn: Gompieno, musiamo wa Simons Town, mmogo le Komiti ya kwa Phoenix, ba sirolotse dibanka ga mmogo le webosaete, go dira segopotso sa go tlhoka bosiamisi ga ditloso tsa pateletso le go tlotla bao matshelo a bona fetotsweng ka dikgoka..

en: Simons Town Museum and former resident Margaret Constant says: I was probably 7 or 8 years old when we got forcibly removed out of Simons Town.
tsn: Moagi wa maloba wa Simons Town, Margaret Constant a re: Ke dumela fa ke ne ke le dingwaga di le 7 kgotsa 8 fa re ne re ntshiwa ka dikgoka kwa Simons Town.

en: And for me, it was very hard because when we moved to Ocean View, we had no freedom, into a flat and we stayed in the middle.
tsn: Mo go nna go ne go le boima thata ka gonne fa re ne re fudugela kwa Ocean View, re ne re se na kgololosego, mo kagong eo, re ne re dutse mo magareng.

en: My dad’s brother still stayed at the municipal cottages, and every holiday, I used to go back because I couldn’t handle the fact that I was forced out of Simons Town which was a community where everybody knew one another.
tsn: Monnaawe rre o ne a e tswelela go dula kwa dikamoreng tsa mmasepala, lengwe le lengwe la malatsi a boikhutso, ke ne ke tlwaetse go boela morago ka ntlha ya gore ke ne ke ntshitswe ka dikgoka kwa Simons Town, e e neng e le toropo ya batho ba ba itsaneng botlhe.

en: It was safe and everybody knew each other.
tsn: Go ne go bololokesegile mme mongwe le mongwe o ne a itse mongwe le mongwe.

en: The mosaic benches, which depict specific streets from which people were evicted, were unveiled by some of the former residents affected by the forced removals.
tsn: Dibanka tsa Mosaike, tse di bontshang mebila e e rileng, e batho ba ne ntshiwa ka pateletso mo go yona, di ne tsa bulwa ka baagi ba ba neng ba amilwe ke ditloso tsa pateletso.

en: Mzimkhulu Mamptua, a former Luyolo resident says: It was terrible to be quite honest.
tsn: Mzimkhulu Mamptua, moagi wa kwa Luyolo wa maloba a re: Go ne go le bosula thata go bua nnete.

en: Because when I noticed good people are being taken into trucks that couldn’t even take everything, people’s belongings, it was the one thing that broke my heart.
tsn: Ka ntlha ya gore fa ke lemoga gore batho ba ba siameng ba tserwe ka dilori, tse di neng di sa kgone le go tsaya dilo tsotlhe, dithoto tsa batho, e ne e le selo se le sengwe se se neng sa roba pelo ya me.

en: I was 7 at that time in 1965, I was born in 1958 when I had a tricycle, you know a bicycle with one wheel in the front and two at the back, it couldn’t fit in the bakkie.
tsn: Ke ne ke na le dingwaga di le 7 ka nako eo ka 1965, Ke belegwe ka ngwaga wa 1958. Fa ke ne ke na le teraesekele, o itse baesekele e e nang le lebili le le lengwe mo pele le a le mabedi kwa morago, e ne e sa kgone go lekana mo beneng.

en: We are remembering the forced removal of people under the apartheid eras Group Areas Act.
tsn: Re gopola go tlosiwa ga batho ka dikgoka ka fa tlase ga molao wa tlhaolele setlhopha sa mafelo.

en: Simons Town is rich in maritime history and home to the largest naval base in South Africa.
tsn: Simons Town e humile ka hisetori ya tsa dikepe mme ke legae la dikepe tsa sesole le legolo go a gaisa otlhe mo Aforikaborwa.

en: But some believe not enough has been done to preserve the history of the forced removals.
tsn: Mme ba bangwe ba dumela gore ga go a dirwa mo go lekaneng go boloka hisetori ya dikhuduso tsa pateletso.

en: Or the injustices of apartheid on communities who once lived here.
tsn: Kgotsa go tlhoka bosiamisi ga tlhaolele mo baaging ba ba kileng b anna fa.

en: Former residents have been encouraged to contribute to the website to preserve their history.
tsn: Baagi ba maloba ba rotloediwa go nna le seabe mo webosaeteng go boloka hisetori ya bone.

en: Popular medical doctor and broadcaster, Sindi van Zyl, has passed on.
tsn: Ngaka e e itsegeng le mogasi, Sindi, van Zyl, o tlhokafetse.

en: The 45-year-old had been in hospital for a while after contracting COVID-19 in February.
tsn: Mosadi yo wa dingwaga di le 45 o ntse kwa bookelong sebakanyana morago ga go tshwaetswa ke COVID-19 ka Tlhakole.

en: Dr Sindi couldn’t breathe on her own and was on life support.
tsn: Ngaka Sindi o ne a sa kgone go hema ka boene mme  o ne tshegeditswe ke metšhine.

en: She passed away on Saturday morning in Johannesburg.
tsn: O tlhokafetse ka Lamatlhatso phakela kwa Johannesburg.

en: Dr Sindi’s passing leaves all of us cold and sad.
tsn: Loso lwa ga ngaka Sindi lo re tlogela re tsidifetse e bile re utlwile botlhoko rotlhe.

en: She lived an exemplary life of giving, selflessness and grace.
tsn: O tshetse le botshelo jo bo nnileng sekao mo bathong, ka go nna pelotshweu le boutlwelobotlhoko.

en: To her family, especially her kids,  condolences.
tsn: Go ba lelapa la gagwe, segolobogolo bana ba gagwe, matshediso.

en: We share your loss.
tsn: Re na le lona mo kutlobotlhokong e.

en: South Africans recently banded together and raised money to assist with her medical bills, which were piling up due to the high cost of being on a ventilator.
tsn: Maaforikaborwa a ne a kopana mmogo go kokoanya madi a go thusa go duela sekoloto sa gagwe sa kwa bookelong, se se neng se oketsega ka ntlha ya tlhotlhwa e e kwa godimo ya go nna mo motšhineng o o thusang go hema

en: They raised close to R1.5 million.
tsn: Ba kokoantse bokana ka dimilione di le 1.5 tsa diranta.

en: The Van Zyl family humbly thank everyone who stood together with them recently to help raise funds for Sindi’s hospital bill, in addition to the national outpour of prayer, love and support for her, says her family in a statement confirming her passing.
tsn: Ba lelapa la ga Van Zyl ba  leboga botlhe ba ba neng ba eme mmogo le bone go thusa go kgobokanya matlole a go duela sekoloto sa ga Sindi sa kwa bookelong, mo godimo ga dithapelo tse di tswang mo setšhabeng, lerato le kemonokeng e ba mo fileng yona, go bua ba lelapa la gagwe mo setatamenteng se se netefatsang go tlhokafala ga gagwe.

en: What a devastating loss!
tsn: A tatlhegelo e e makatsang!

en: Dr Sindi’s generosity & kindness made Twitter a safer community for many of us.
tsn: Bopelotshweu le bopelonomi jwa ga Dr Sindi bo dirile Twitter gore lefelo le le bolokesegileng go bontsi jwa rona.

en: She shared her full humanity with us and was a reminder that compassion is more important than being right.
tsn: O re bontshitse botho jwa gagwe mme  o ne a re gopotsa gore kutlwelobotlhoko e botlhokwa thata go feta go nna o nepagetse.

en: May Gods Grace comfort her loved ones.
tsn: A tshegofatso ya Modimo e aparele baratiwa ba gagwe.

en: May she rest in peace.
tsn: A a robale ka kagiso.

en: Van Zyl became popular by using her medical knowledge to challenge taboos around HIV and Aids as well as educate social media users on health matters.
tsn: Van Zyl o ne a tuma ka go dirisa kitso ya gagwe ya bongaka go gwetlha meila e e leng teng ka ga bolwetse jwa HIV le AIDS mmogo le go ruta badirisi ba mafaratlhatlha ka tsa boitekanelo.

en: She also offered support and advice to those who reached out to her for help.
tsn: Gape o ne a fana ka thuso le kgakololo go ba ba neng ba tla kwa go ena go kopa thuso.

en: I had the pleasure of meeting her a few years ago.
tsn: Ke nnile le lesego la go kopana le ena dingwaga di le mmalwa tse di fetileng.

en: Had lunch with her & her husband.
tsn: Re jele dijo tsa motshegare le ene le monna wa gagwe.

en: I was touched by the love she radiated.
tsn: Ke ne ka amiwa ke ka mokgwa o a neng a na le lorato ka ona.

en: A truly beautiful soul.
tsn: Motho yo o nang le mowa o montle e le ruri.

en: Much love to Marinus, her kids, family & friends.
tsn: Lorato go Marinus, bana ba gagwe, lelapa le ditsala.

en: She was loved, is loved.
tsn: O ne a ratiwa, o a ratiwa.

en: Love and light to the Van Zyl’s.
tsn: Lerato le lesedi go ba ga Van Zyl.

en: Not only was she a beacon of love and light on her Kaya FM show Sidebar with Sindi and all her social media platforms, but she genuinely loved and gave endlessly to all she knew with grace and kindness.
tsn: E ne e se fela letshwao la lerato le lesedi mo lananeong la gagwe la kwa Khaya FM, “Sidebar With Sindi”, le mo mmedieng wa botsalano, mme o ne  a le lorato e bile abelana ka bopelonomi.

en: She modelled the love and grace that she knew in Jesus, adds her family.
tsn: O ne a bontsha lorato le Tshegofatso tse a neng a di itse go tswa mo Modimong. Go tlaleletsa ba lelapa la gagwe.

en: Van Zyl is also known for her love for her family and beautiful things.
tsn: Van Zyl gape o itsiwe lorato le a nang le lona go ba lelapa la gagwe le go rata dilo tse dintle.

en: The self-proclaimed lover of things leaves behind her husband Marinus and two children, Nandi and Manie.
tsn: Mosadi yo o neng a ipitsa Morata dilo, o tlogela monna wa gagwe, Marinus, le bana ba le babedi, Nandi le Manie.

en: Her family has asked for prayer and privacy as it mourns her passing.
tsn: Ba lelapa la gagwe ba kopile dithapelo le go fiwa sebaka sa go hutsafalela go tlhokafala ga gagwe.

en: Details of her memorial and funeral will be confirmed at a later stage.
tsn: Dintlha tsa gagwe tsa segopotso le phitlho di tlaa netefadiwa mo nakong e e tlang.

en: Today we are saddened to learn that Dr Sindi passed away.
tsn: Gompieno re utlwile botlhoko go utlhwa gore ngaka Sindi o tlhokafetse.

en: She was one of the most beautiful souls on Twitter and her life’s mission was to mend lives.
tsn: E ne mongwe wa batho ba ba nang le mowa o montle tota mo Twitter, mme maikaelelo a gagwe e ne e le go fetola matshelo a batho.

en: May her amazing soul rest in peace.
tsn: A mowa wa gagwe o montle o robele ka kagiso.

en: Its very seldom that you meet somebody who’s kindness goes past her smile.
tsn: Go sewelo thata gore o kopane le motho yo bopelonomi jwa gagwe bo fetang monyenyo wa gagwe.

en: What a genuinely beautiful soul, may Dr. Sindi van Zyl’s soul rest in beautiful peace.
tsn: Motho yo o neng a na le mowa o montle e le ruri. A  mowa wa ga Ngaka Sindi Van Zyl o robale ka kagiso.

en: We really loved everything she was about.
tsn: Re tota re ratile sengwe le sengwe se o ne a le ka ga sona.

en: A monkey sanctuary at Plettenberg Bay in the Southern Cape is ensuring that the animals in their care own the land they live on.
tsn: Lefelo la dikgabo kwa Plettenberg Bay, kwa Borwa jwa Kapa le netefatsa gore diruiwa tse di leng ka mo tlase ga tlhokomelo ya lona, di itumelela lefatshe le di tshelang mo go lona.

en: Monkey land Primate Sanctuary is the world’s first free-roaming, multi-species primate sanctuary, covering an area of 12 hectares of indigenous forest and providing ex-captive primates with a healthier, more natural lifestyle.
tsn: Monkey Land Primate Sanctuary ke lona lefelo la ntlha le diphologolo di kgonang go itsamaela ka phutologo mo go lona, le le akaretsang  diheketara di le 12 tsa dikgwa tsa tlholego mme le tlamela diphologolo tse ka mokgwa wa botshelo wa tlholego, o o itekanetseng.

en: Home to over 550 primates including gibbons, howler monkeys, vervet monkeys, langurs, sakis, capuchins, squirrel monkeys, spider monkeys, ring-tailed lemurs and the critically endangered black and white ruffed lemurs.
tsn: Ke legae go ditshwene di le 550 mme le akaretsa mefuta e mentsintsi e e farologaneng ya ditshewene.

en: Monkeylands Founder and CEO, Tony Blignaut, says due to the COVID-19 pandemic and crisis in the tourism industry, they realised future shareholders might not have the same passion for the animals they do and could decide to develop the land into something else.
tsn: Mosimolodi le moeteledipele wa Monkeylands, Tony Blignaut, A re ka ntlha ya leroborobo la COVID-19 le mathata mo intasetering ya bojanala, ba lemogile gore batsholadišere ba ba tlang ba ka nna ba se nne le phisego ya diphologolo jaaka bona mme ba ka swetsa go dirisetsa lefatshe leo sengwe se sele.

en: He says they are now busy with a Buy a square metre of land for primates campaign, to buy the 216 000 square metre property from the owners.
tsn: A re ga jaana, ba tshwaragane le letsholo la “Buy a square metre of land for primates” gore ba kgone go reka lefelo la bogolo jwa disekwere  sa metara di le 216 000 go tswa go beng ba lona.

en: The land-owning company gave us a bond to tide us over until we raise the money, which we are busy doing now through social media and anyway we can and its doing well.
tsn: Setlamo sa land-owning ne re bonto go lewa rona mo go fitlhela re tlhatlosa madi, mme jaanong re tshwaragane le go dira ka mmedia wa botsalano mme le fa go le jalo re ka yona le go dira sentle.

en: People are buying square metres, it only costs R90 to buy a square metre for the monkeys.
tsn: Batho ba ntse ba reka dikwere tsa metara, ditshenyegelo tsa go rekela dikgabo sekwere sa metara ke  R90 fela.

en: And that’s progressing at a rapid rate.
tsn: Mme seo se tsweletse pelo ka lobelo lo lo kwa godimo.

en: So that’s where we are now.
tsn: Ka jalo ke gone fa re leng teng foo ga jaana.

en: Its the first-ever land ownership deal for animals.
tsn: Ke lokgetlho lwa ntlha diphogolo di nna le lefatshe le e leng la tsona.

en: A monkey sanctuary at Plettenberg Bay in the Southern Cape, is ensuring that the animals in their care own the land
tsn: Lefelo la dikgabo kwa Plettenberg kwa Borwa jwa Kapa, le netefatsa gore diphologolo tse di leng ka fa tlase tlhokomelo ya lone di nna le lefatshe la tsone.

en: Posted by SABC News Western Cape on Friday, 9 April 2021.
tsn: E roometswe ke dikgang tsa SABC kwa Kapa Bophirima ka Labotlhano , 9 Moranang 2021.

en: It’s just a really sad moment, London resident Victoria Hasler told Reuters.
tsn: Ke nako e e utlwisang botlhoko thata ga jaana, moagi wa kwa London, Victoria Hasler o boleletse Reuters.

en: Wed known he had been ill for quite a long time and its just really sad.
tsn: Re ne re itse gore o bobotse lobaka lo lo telele, fela go tlhomola pelo.

en: And were just really sorry to the royal family for their sad news.
tsn: Mme re utlwelana botlhoko le ba lelapa la bogosi ka dikgang tse di botlhoko tse.

en: As news broke of Philips death, radio and television broadcasts were interrupted with the national anthem God Save The Queen.
tsn: Fa dikgang tsa loso lwa ga Phillip di ne di runya, dikgaso tsa radio le thelebišene di ne tsa emisiwa mme ga tshamekiwa pina ya bosetšhaba “God Save The Queen”

en: Union flags were half-masted at all royal residences and British government building.
tsn: Difolaga tsa kopano di ne di fofisetswa kwa tlase kwa matlong otlhe a segosi le kwa dikagong tsa puso tsa kwa Britain.

en: Very sad news.
tsn: A dikgang tse di botlhoko ruri.

en: He is a lovely guy and very sad for the monarchy, Adam Carr, a London resident, told Reuters.
tsn: Ke motho yo o lorato thata mme re utlwetse puso ya bobusaesi botlhoko. Adam Carr, moagi wa kwa London, o boleletse Reuters.

en: Philips sharp wit and dedication to his duty earned him widespread popularity in Britain, but he was also criticised for off-the-cuff racist and sexist remarks.
tsn: Bogale jwa ga Phillip le boineelo jwa gagwe mo tirong ya gagwe bo dirile gore a tume kwa Britain, mme gape o ne a na le go tshwaiwa diphoso ka go nna le bosemorafe le  go dira ditshwaelo ka bong.

en: Some people laid flowers beside a British flag outside Buckingham Palace and at the ancient walls of Windsor Castle, though the government urged people not to bring flowers to royal residences.
tsn: Batho ba bangwe ba beilwe malomo fa thoko ga folaga ya kwa Britain kwa ntlong ya segosi ya kwa Buckingham le kwa dipoteng tsa bogologolo tsa kwa ntlong ya segosi ya Windsor, le fa puso e ne e rotloeditse batho gore ba seke ba tlisa malomo kwa dikagong tsa bogosi.

en: With the safety and wellbeing of the public in mind, and in accordance with government guidelines, members of the public are asked not to gather in crowds, Buckingham Palace said.
tsn: Ka polokesego le boitekanelo jwa setšhaba mo tlhaloganyong, le go ya ka dikaelo tsa puso, baagi ba setšhaba ba kopilwe gore ba seke ba kokoana ka bontsi. Go bua ba ntlo ya segosi ya kwa  Buckingham.

en: Those wishing to express their condolences are asked to do so in the safest way possible, and not to gather at Royal Residences.
tsn: Ba ba nang le phisegelo ya go fetisa matshediso a bona ba kopiwa go dira jalo ka tsela e e babalesegileng thata, fela ba seke ba kokoana kwa dikagong tsa segosi.

en: A Cabinet Office spokesperson requested that floral tributes should not be laid at Royal Residences at this time.
tsn: Mmueledi wa kantoro ya kabinete o kopile gore malomo a matshediso a seka a bewa kwa dikagong tsa segosi ka nako e.

en: The funeral arrangements for Philip, who always dismissed unnecessary pomp during his lifetime, are yet to be confirmed by Elizabeth who remains at Windsor Castle.
tsn: Dithulaganyo tsa phitlho ya ga Phillip, yo ka gale o ne a tlhola a ikgatolosa tlotlomatso e e sa tlhokegeng ka nako ya botshelo jwa gagwe, di santse di tlaa netefadiwa ke Elizabeth, yo o saleng kwa ntlong ya bogosi kwa Windsor.

en: Details will be confirmed in due course.
tsn: Dintlha ka botlalo di tla netefadiwa mo tsamaong ya nako.

en: Social media users have taken to Twitter to share their favourite songs, movies and memories of the late American rapper and actor Earl Simmons, known by the stage name DMX.
tsn: Badirisi ba bobegakgang jwa loago ba tsene kwa Twitter go abelana ka dipina tsa mmamoratwa, difilimi le dikgopotso tsa seopedi sa mmino wa Rap sa kwa Amerika, Earl Simmons, yo o itsegeng ka leina la bodiratsi la DMX

en: DMX died on Friday after suffering a heart attack.
tsn: DMX o tlhokafetse ka Labotlhano morago ga go tlhaselwa ke bolwetse jwa pelo.

en: He was 50 years old.
tsn: O ne a na le dingwaga di le 50.

en: Some described his music as inspirational, while others said his songs were anthems that reminded them of their youth.
tsn: Bangwe ba tlhalositse mmino wa gagwe jaaka mmino o o nang le tlhotlheletso, mme ba bangwe ba re dipina tsa gagwe di tshwana le difela tse di ba gopotsang bošwa jwa bona.

en: One of my favorite performances in one of my favorite films was given by DMX.
tsn: Bodiragatsi jwa gagwe jo ke bo ratang thata, mo go e nngwe ya difilimi tse di ke ratang thata e diragaditswe ke DMX

en: If you haven’t seen BELLY in a while or at all, gift yourself with his talent in that film this weekend.
tsn: Fa o ise o bone BELLY mo nakong e telele kgotsa gotlhelele, Ineele ka mpho ya talente ya gagwe ka go bogela filimi e mafelo a beke.

en: Rest easy, Rest in Power, Rest in peace.
tsn: Robala ka bonolo, robala ka maatla, robala ka kagiso.

en: Thank you for the inspirational music through my youth.
tsn: Ke lebogela e e tlhotlheletso ya gago ka mmino ka dinako tsa me bošwa.

en: Condolences to the Earl Simmons family, the world just lost a legend.
tsn: Matshediso go ba lelapa la ga Earl Simmons, lefatshe le latlhegetswe ke mogaka.

en: So I'm not going to say goodbye my nigga.
tsn: Ka jalo ga ke tle gore tsamaya sentle tsala.

en: Instead, I would rather Focus on the time we spent together, that's what matters.
tsn: Bogolo ke tla tlhoma mogopolo mo nakong e re nnileng le yona mmogo. Ke sona se se botlhokwa seo

en: Hopefully you'll finally get to see Kato and your beloved grandma again.
tsn: Ke solofela gore o tla kgona go bona Kato le mmemogolo wa gago yo o mo ratang gape.

en: When Mike Tyson walked out to DMX's intro.
tsn: Fa Mike Tyson a a tswa mo kitsisong ya ga DMX.

en: The best walkout I have ever seen.
tsn: Motsamao o montle o ke neng ke simolola go o bona.

en: The energy and the ferocity will never be matched!
tsn: Maatla le bosetlhogo jo bo ka se nyalanngweng le sepe!

en: DMX was also known for his spiritual believes.
tsn: Dmx o ne a itsege gape ka ditumelo tsa gagwe tsa semoya.

en: It is said he always prayed before and after every live performance.
tsn: Gatwe o ne a tlhola a rapele pele le morago ga go tiragatso e nngwe le e nngwe ya gagwe.

en: This Prayer hits even harder now, hopefully he rests in the Lord's Bossom.
tsn: Thapelo e, e kaya go le gontsi thata jaanong, re solofela gore o robetse mo leseding la Morena.

en: He was one of the greatest artists to ever touch the mic.
tsn: E ne e le mongwe wa batsweretshi ba ba golo thata ba ba kileng ba diragatsa.

en: Hip hop is mourning today with the loss of such a legendary music icon.
tsn: Mmino wa Hip Hop o hutsafetse gompieno ka ntlha ya tatlhegelo ya mogaka yo wa mmino.

en: Magashule has made it very clear that he has no intention to step aside.
tsn: Magashule o beile mo phatlhalatseng gore ga a ikaelela go sekega tiro.

en: He was asked to consult different senior leaders of the party, (and) he only consulted those who support his idea of not stepping aside.
tsn: O ne a kopiwa go buisana le baeteledipelebagolo ba ba farologaneng ba lekoko, (fela) o tlhophile go kopana le ba ba tshegetsang ka kanyo ya gagwe ya go se sekege tiro.

en: So, they want to make this thing a technical issue, as if it is not clear, as if the criteria of who should step aside is not clear, whereas it is clear.
tsn: Ka jalo, ba ne ba batla go itshela moriti o o tsididi, ba itira e kete kgang ya go sekega tiro ga e a utlwala sentle, ntswang e sa tlhoke bosekaseko.

en: There is only one way in which someone can actually face charges.
tsn: Go na le tsela e le nngwe e motho a ka lebaganang le tsheko.

en: It is if they are charged by any of the authorities within South Africa, says Mathekga.
tsn: E kete ba latofadiwa ke mongwe wa bothati mo Aforikaborwa, go bua jalo Mathekga.

en: Supra Mahumapelo defiant.
tsn: Supra Mahumapelo o gogela kwa thoko.

en: Meanwhile, former ANC Chairperson and former Premier of the North West province Supra Mahumapelo says he is still a member of the party.
tsn: Re sa ntse re le foo, modulasetulo wa pele wa ANC le Moporimia wa pele wa porofense ya Bokone Bophirima Supra Mahumapelo a re o sa ntse e le leloko la lekoko.

en: Mahumapelo and acting North West Secretary of the ANC Women’s League, Bitsa Lenkopane, have lodged appeals against their five-year suspension from the governing party.
tsn: Mahumapelo le Mokwaledi wa nakwana wa Lekoko la Basadi la ANC mo Bokone Bophirima, Bitsa Lenkopane ba tsentse tletlebo kgatlhanong le dingwaga tse tlhano ba sekegilwe mo lekokong le le busang.

en: The two were found guilty of misconduct after allegedly convening a parallel meeting to that of the Interim Provincial Committee (IPC) in Mareetsane near Mahikeng in 2020.
tsn: Bobedi jo, bo bonwe molato wa maitsholomabe morago ga go tshwara kopano e e tsamaelanang le ya Komiti ya Nakwana ya Porofense kwa Mareetsane...... gaufi le Kwa Mafikeng ka 2020.

en: Supra speaks out following suspension from the ANC:
tsn: Supra o bua go tswa mo go tse di latelang tebang le go sekegwa mo lekokong le le busang:

en: Former President, Thabo Mbeki, says what many witnesses have told the Commission of Inquiry into State Capture shows that the African continent has serious leadership challenges.
tsn: Moporesitente wa pele, Thabo Mbeki, a re dipaki di le dintsi, di boleletse Khomišene ya Dipatlisiso tsa bogodu mo pusong fa kontinente ya Aforika e lebanwe ke dikgwetlho tsa boeteledipele.

en: He was delivering his annual lecture at the University of South Africa in Pretoria.
tsn: O ne a neelana ka puo ya gagwe kwa Yunibesiting ya Aforikaborwa kwa Pitori.

en: Mbeki, who also paid tribute to former UNISA Principal and Vice-Chancellor Professor Mandla Makhanya, said strong leadership with integrity and high ethical morals were needed on the continent.
tsn: Mbeki, yo le ena a neng a tlotlomatsa Tlhogo le Letsogo la Mokhanselara wa pele wa UNISA Moporofesara Mandla Makhanya, o rile boetapele jo bo tiileng ka seriti le maitsholo a a siameng a tlhokega mo kontinenteng.

en: In the context of the proceedings of the Zondo Commission on State Capture, in this particular challenge about leadership, much of the inability of the continent to maximise its huge potential can be ascribed to a death in the right caliber of leadership on our continent; honourable men and women of vision and integrity whose committed to their people and their countries, says the former South African president.
tsn: Mo bokaelong jwa dipegelo tsa Khomišene ya dipatlisiso tsa bogodu mo pusong, tebang le kgwetlho ya boeteledipele, segolo go retelelwa ga kontine mo go oketseng bokgoni jwa yona ke moka boeteledipele ba kontinente bo wetswe ke leru le le ntsho; banna le basadi ba ba tlotlotlegang e bile bana le pono le boineelo mo setšhabeng le naga ya bona, go bua jalo moporesidente wa pele wa Aforikaborwa.

en: On Thursday, African National Congress (ANC) President Cyril Ramaphosa conceded that the governing party was slow in its response to the allegations of state capture.
tsn: Ka Labone, Moporesidente wa Lekoko la Bosetšhaba (ANC) Cyril Ramaphosa o amogetse gore lekoko le le busang le nnile bonya go fetola ditatofatso tsa bosenyi mo pusong.

en: He expressed regret over the delay in instituting a probe into the Guptas influence on the executive through Parliaments committees in 2016.
tsn: O tlhagisitse se ka mowa o o kwa tlase mo go diegiseng dipatlisiso ka ga phokedi ya ba lelapa la ga Gupta mo dikomiting tsa Palamente ka 2016.

en: However, denied that this was due to deliberate resistance.
tsn: Le fa go le jalo, o latotse fa se e se ditiro tsa ka boomo.

en: Former Transnet Group CEO, Siyabonga Gama, will take the stand at the Zondo Commission on Friday.
tsn: Moeteledipele wa maloba wa setlhopha sa Transnet, Siyabinga Gama, o tlile go tlhagelela kwa Khomišene ya dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi mo pusong ka Labotlhano.

en: Former African National Congress (ANC) Chairperson and former Premier of the North West province Supra Mahumapelo says he is still a member of the party.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa maloba e bile e le tonakgolo ya maloba  ya Lekoko la Bosetšhaba le le busang (ANC) mo Bokone Bophirima Supra Mahumapelo a re o santse e leloko la lekoko.

en: Mahumapelo was reacting to his suspension from the party for five years by the disciplinary committee.
tsn: Mahumapelo o buelelela mo go sekegiweng ga gagwe mo lekokong dingwaga di le tlhano ke ba komiti ya kgalemo.

en: Mahumapelo and Acting Provincial Secretary of the ANC Women’s League Bitsa Lenkopane are both charged with misconduct, after allegedly convening a parallel meeting to that of the Interim Provincial Committee (IPC) in Mareetsane near Mahikeng in 2020.
tsn: Mahumapelo le Mokwaledi wa nakwana wa Lekoko la Basadi la ANC Bitsa Lenkopane ba latofatswa ka maitsholomabe morago ga go tshwara kopano e e tsamaelanang le ya Komiti ya Nakwana ya Porofence (IPC) kwa Mareetsane gaufi le kwa Mafikeng ka 2020.

en: He says he has appealed the verdict of the Interim Provincial Disciplinary Committee.
tsn: A re o tsentse boikuelo mabapi le tshwetso e e tserweng ke ba Komiti ya Nakwana ya kgalemo ya Porofense.

en: EXCLUSIVE: Supra Mahumapelo speaks out following suspension from the ANC:
tsn: Gareng ga tse dingwe: Supra Mahumapelo o bua ka tse di latelang mabapi le go sekegwa go tswa mo ANC:

en: Mahumapelo says the ANC should not suspend members who are being accused of corruption.
tsn: Mahumapelo a re ANC ga e a tshwanela go sekega maloko a a latofadiwang ka bonweenwee.

en: He says the step-aside resolution will divide the party.
tsn: A re mokgwa wa go rarabolola mathata ka go sekega o tlile go thuba lekoko.

en: When you look at that resolution, I think we made a mistake as the ANC.
tsn: Fa o lebelela tshwetso e, ke nagana gore re dirile phoso jaaka ANC.

en: We didn’t take the resolutions to the lawyers to scrutinise them and make sure that every resolution complies with the law.
tsn: Ga re a isa ditshwetso go babueledi go ditlhotlha le go netefatsa gore tshwetso e nngwe le e nngwe e dumalana le molao.

en: Look at what happened to Bongo.
tsn: Lebelela gore go diragetseng ka Bongo.

en: Bongo won the case.
tsn: Bongo o falotse kgetsi.

en: If Bongo was removed on the basis that he was formally charged.
tsn: Fa Bongo a ne a tlositswe ka ntlha ya gore o bonwe molato semmuso.

en: It would have been injustice on him, says Mahumapelo.
tsn: O ne a tlaabo a sa bona toka, go bua jalo Mahumapelo.

en: He made the comments during an exclusive interview with SABC News.
tsn: O dirile ditshwaelo ka nako e e kgethegileng ya potsotherisano le babegadikgang ba SABC.

en: Mahumapelo says members of the IPC hate him.
tsn: Mahumapelo a re maloko a Komiti ya Nakwana ya Porofense ba a moila.

en: There are some of the comrades who are in these structures, who hate me with passion, it’s not political its personal.
tsn: Go na le bangwe ba maloko mo komiting e, ba ba nkilang, ga se sepolotiki ke kgotlhang le motho.

en: The IPC has accused Mahumapelo of creating and promoting disunity among members of the party.
tsn: Komiti ya nakwana ya Porofense, e latofaditse Mahumapelo mabapi le go thuba kutlwano magareng ga maloko a lekoko.

en: Meanwhile, the ANC says it will outline the process of its step-aside resolution, for party members facing criminal charges, on Friday.
tsn: Re sa ntse re le foo, ANC ya re e tlile go thadisa thulaganyo ya bona ya tshwetso mabapi le go sekegwa ga maloko a a lebaganweng ke ditatofatso tsa bosenyi, ka Labotlhano.

en: The 30 day deadline for party leaders charged with corruption to step aside or face suspension from the party expires on Friday.
tsn: Letsatsi la masomeamararo ke letlha la bofelo la go sekegwa ga baeteledipele ba lekoko ba ba bonweng molato wa bosenyi mo lekokong, le fela ka Labotlhano.

en: They include ANC Secretary General, Ace Magashule and Member of Parliament, Bongani Bongo.
tsn: Go akarediwa le Mokwaledi Kakaretso wa ANC, Ace  Magashule le tokololo ya Palamente, Bongani Bongo.

en: The ANCs National Executive Council decided at the end of March to implement the resolution that was taken at the party’s 54th conference at Nasrec in 2017.
tsn: Khansele ya Khuduthamaga ya Bosetšhaba ya ANC e tsere tshwetso kgwedi ya Mopitlwe e ya fifing go tsenya tirisong tshwetso e e tserweng ke lekoko ka khonferense ya masomeamatlhano le bone kwa Nasrec ka 2017.

en: Party spokesperson Pule Mabe says the party will issue a statement on Friday.
tsn: Mmueledi wa lekoko Pule Mabe a re lekoko le tlile go neela ka pegelo ka Labotlhano.

en: We have spoken about the issue of 30 days.
tsn: Re setse re buile ka ga bothata ba malatsi a le masomeamararo.

en: We have a meeting with the National Working Committee on Monday.
tsn: Re na le kopano le Komiti ya Badiri ka Mosupologo.

en: We have an NEC on Saturday and we will issue a statement tomorrow outlining those processes, says Mabe.
tsn: Re na le NEC ka Lamatlhatso mme re tlile go neela pego ka moso e e thadisang dithulaganyo tseo, go bua jalo Mabe .

en: African National Congress (ANC) President Cyril Ramaphosa says he regrets that the party delayed investigating allegations of state capture through parliaments committees in 2016, but he denies that this was due to deliberate resistance.
tsn: Moporesidente wa Lekoko la Bosetšhaba (ANC) Cyril Ramaphosa a re o a ikotlhaya ka go diegisa dipatlisiso kgatlhanong le ditatofatso tsa bosenyi mo dikomiting tsa palamente ka 2016, mme o latola fa se e se ditiro tsa maikaelelo a go se dire jalo.

en: Testifying on his second day at the State Capture Commission as President of the ANC, Ramaphosa dealt with issues relating to political party funding, including his CR17 campaign, party discipline as well as efforts by the party to renew itself.
tsn: A neela ka bopaki ka letsatsi la gagwe la bobedi kwa Khomišeneng ya dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi mo pusong jaaka Moporesidente wa ANC, Ramaphosa o sugakgetsi tebang le mathata a a mabapi le matlole a lekoko, go akaretswa le letsholo la gagwe la CR17, maitsholo a lekoko mmogo le matsapa a lekoko la bolona go itlhabolola.   .

en: Ramaphosa has defended the need for Members of Parliament to toe the line, saying their seat is by virtue of the party’s ticket.
tsn: Ramaphosa o sireletsa tlhokego ya maloko a palamente go nna tsebe ntlha, a re maitsholo a bona ke ona a bayang lekoko mo maemong a a kwa godimo.

en: Summary of ANC President Cyril Ramaphosas testimony at the State Capture Inquiry.
tsn: Bosupi ba tshobokanyo ya ga Moporesidente wa ANC Cyril Ramaphosa ka nako ya tsheko.

en: Dealing with the issue of his ANC presidential campaign, Ramaphosa reiterated that the CR17 fund managers did not tell him who gave the campaign money as they did not want him to be beholden to donors.
tsn: Go samagana le ntlha ya gagwe ya letsholo la ANC, Ramaphosa o gateletse fa batsamaisi ba matlole ba CR17 ba molobetse gore ke mang yo a neelang letsholo le matlole ka ntlha ya fa ba ne bas a batle batsamaisi ba letlole ba ne ba sa mmolelela ba ba neetseng letsholo le matlole ka gonne ba ne ba sa batle a ipona molato go batho ba ba thusitseng ka matlole.

en: He denied reports that the campaign raised R1 billion which was used for buying votes from delegates attending the ANCs National Conference in December 2017.
tsn: O latotse fa letsholo le sa kgobokanya sedikadike sa diranta di le bilione (R1 billion) tse di dirisitsweng go reka ditlhopho go tswa mo baemeding ba ba neng ba le teng mo khonferenseng ya bosetšhaba ya ANC ka Sedimonthole wa 2017.

en: It was said a billion rands was raised.
tsn: Go kailwe fa didikadike tsa diranta di le dibilione tse di kgobokantsweng

en: It was never a billion rands.
tsn: E ne e se didikadike tsa diranta di le dibilione.

en: I am told that the money that was raised was some R300 million, but never a billion or so.
tsn: Ke boleletswe gore matlole a a neng a kgobokantswe e ne e le sedikadike sa diranta di le makgoloamararo (R300 million), e seng bilione kgotsa go feta.

en: I don’t know the facts because they literally kept it away from me.
tsn: Ga ke itse dintlha ka botlalo ka gonne ba ne ba tsweletse ka go e mpipela.

en: I said to my comrades right from the beginning I never want to be part of a campaign that is going to descend into all these deviant types of behaviours that we talk about in the ANC-like vote-buying.
tsn: Ke buile le baleloko kwa tshimologong gore ga ke batle go nna karolo ya letsholo le ditlamorago tsa lona di tlileng go goga leina la lekoko mo seretseng jaaka go tshwana le go rekwa ga ditlhopho mo ANC.

en: State Capture Inquiry: Ramaphosa on the party’s delay in investing the Gupta family.
tsn: Pegelo ya Dipatlisisa tsa bosenyi mo pusong: Ramaphosa mo ntlheng ya go diegisiwa ga peeletso mo lelapeng la ga Gupta.

en: The president went on to say that with increasing negative media coverage of the Gupta family and Bosasa, both of which made donations towards the ANC, and its election campaigns, should have been probed sooner.
tsn: Moporesidente o tsweletse ka gore ka ntlha ya go gola ga metswedi ya dikgang e e senolang dikakanyo tse di sa siamang tebang le ba lelapa la ga Gupta le Bosasa, e leng ba ba abetseng ANC le matsholo a yona a ditlhopho matlole, go ne go tshwanetswe  go dirwa dipatlisiso ka ponyo ya leitlho. .

en: In dealing with how to rid the party of fraud and corruption, Ramaphosa says the leadership has the will and the means to do so.
tsn: Mo go samaganeng le go fedisa bonweenwee le bosenyi mo lekokong, Ramaphosa a re boeteledipele bo na le thato le bokgoni ba go dira jalo.

en: Chairperson the difficulty has always been the person is charged then at the same time they are disciplined they stand trial and the disciplinary process has been done and concluded and they are found not guilty in court what do you then do you go back so for instance if the charge was theft in the ANC and the charge is theft in the state what then do you do when they are found not guilty, says Ramaphosa.
tsn: Modulasetulo, bothata ke gore motho o a latofatswa mme ka fa go le lengwe go suganwa le go diragatsa ditsela ya kgalemo mme kwa bokhutlong ga ba bonwe molato kwa kgotlatshekelo. Go dirwa eng, a go boelwa kwa morago, sekao fa e le gore molato ke wa bogodu mo ANC go dirwa eng fa e le gore balatofadiwa ga ba bonwe molato, go bua jalo Ramaphosa.

en: The ANC now requires those facing serious charges to step aside, clear their names and present themselves at the party’s Integrity Committee.
tsn: Ga jaana ANC e tlhoka go lebagana le ditatofatso tsa go sekegwa ga maloko mo lekokong, go phimolwe maina a bona le go ba tlhagisa mo Komiting ya Seriti sa lekoko.

en: Ramaphosa has ended his testimony as Head of the ANC.
tsn: Ramaphosa o feditse go neela bosupi ba gagwe jaaka tlhogo ya ANC.

en: He will appear to give evidence as Head of State at the end of May.
tsn: O tlile go neelana ka bopaki jaaka tlhogo ya naga fa kgwedi ya Motsheganong e ya fifing.

en: Herman Mashaba says the management of South Africa’s failing and ageing passenger rail services must be decentralised to allow qualified provinces and metros to operate rail services within their areas to provide services to the communities that they serve.
tsn: Herman Mashaba a re tsamaiso ya Aforikaborwa e a retelelwa e bile ditirelo tshegetso tsa bagodi  ditshwanetse tsa tlisiwa mo pepeneneng go letla diporofense tse di maleba le ditoropokogolo go dira ditirelo tshegetso mo mafelong a bona go neelana ka ditirelo go baagi ba di ba direlang.

en: 62.Mashaba visited the derelict Greenview Train Station, in Mamelodi East, in Pretoria on Thursday.
tsn: Mashaba o ne a ile kwa Boemelatereneng jwa Greenview, Botlhaba jwa Mamelodi kwa Pitori ka Labone.

en: He plans to ask Transport Minister Fikile Mbalula to investigate why the R102 million station is now derelict.
tsn: O rulaganya go botsa Tonakgolo ya Dipalangwa Fikile Mbalula go batlisisa gore ke goreng didikadike tsa diranta di le lekgolo le bobedi tsa milione di wela tlase.

en: The station was built in 2011 but never occupied even though the railway track that passes the station still carries passenger trains.
tsn: Seteišene se agilwe ka 2011 mme ga se ise se tsene mo tirisong le seporo se se fetang mo seteišeneng se santse se feta ka bapalami ba diterena.

en: Our President @Herman Mashaba just arrived at the Greenview train station in Mamelodi!
tsn: Moporesitente wa rona Herman Mashaba o gorogile kwa boemelatereneng jwa Greenview kwa Mamelodi.

en: The building of the Greenview Train station can be seen from a far, but close up, it is a dysfunctional shell with the roof, aluminium windows, door frames, steel, rail tracks and other trimmings stolen by criminals.
tsn: Kago ya Boemelaterena jwa Greenview e ka bonwa go tswa kgakala, mme gaufi, ke dithulelo tse di sa tlholeng di dira, matlhabaphefo, dipati,seporo le tse dingwe tse di utswitsweng ke disenyi.

en: The station that promised so much to the Mpomolong community, next to it, delivered more poverty.
tsn: Seteišene se se solofeditseng thata mo baaging ba Mpomolong, se tlisitse bodidi le go feta.

en: He says the private sector must also be given the opportunity to operate privatised rail services on the rail network.
tsn: A re lephata la poraefete le lona le tshwanetse go newa tšhono ya go tsamaisa ditirelo tsa poraefete mo seporong.

en: Mashaba says he was shocked when he heard about the Greenview Train Station.
tsn: Mashaba a re o ne a tshoga fa a fetsa go utlwile ka ga Boemelaterena ba Greenview.

en: When I was told about this, I said it’s not possible.
tsn: Fa ke ne ke bolelelwa ka ga se, ke rile se ga se kgonege.

en: Though I’ve experienced, more especially looking at our infrastructure, how the ANC government has destroyed our infrastructure over the last 27 years.
tsn: Le fa ke na le maitemogelo, segolobogolo fa re lebelela mafaratlhatlha a rona, gore puso ya ANC e sentse mafaratlhatlha a rona dingwaga di le 27.

en: As you’ve heard early on, well take it up with Minister of Transport Fikile Mbalula.
tsn: Jaaka o setse o utlwile go sa le gale re tlaa ikgolaganya le Tonakgolo ya Dipalangwa Fikile Mbalula.

en: The building of the Greenview Train Station was part of a R373-million investment of the Passenger Rail Agency of South Africa (PRASA) to double the rail tracks between Eerste Fabrieke and Greenview and upgrade the Mamelodi Gardens and Pienaarspoort stations.
tsn: Kago ya Boemelaterena ba Greenview ke nngwe dipeeletso tsa sedikadike sa diranta di le makgoloamararo le masomeasupa le boraro ya Setheo sa bapagamaterena mo Aforikaborwa go dira diporo magareng ga Eerste Fabrieke le Greenview le go tlhabolola ditshingwana tsa Mamelodi le diteišene tsa   Pienaarspoort.

en: Thabo Thobejane-Mphela is unemployed and has been living in an informal area adjoining the derelict station.
tsn: Thabo Thobejane-Mphela ke motlhokatiro e bile kgale a tshela mo lefelong le le sa tlhomamang gaufi seteišene.

en: He says if the project was finished it would have changed the lives of the community.
tsn: A re fa porojeke e, e ne e feditswe, e ne e ka tokafatsa kgotsa go fetola matshelo a baagi

en: Remember if the station works its job opportunity for others, says Thobejane-Mphela.
tsn: Gopola gore fa seteišene se ka tlisa tšhono ya tiro go ba bangwe, go bua jalo Thobejane-Mphela.

en: Thobejane-Mphela says the train station could have presented business opportunities for people and employment for cleaners and security guards.
tsn: Thobejane-Mphela a re boemelaterena bo ne bo tshwanetse go tlisa ditšhono tsa kgwebo mo bathong le baphephafatsi mmogo le badisadikago.

en: He says community members often have to travel far to get transport.
tsn: A re ka gale, baaga ba tshwanetse go tsamaya lobaka go fitlhelela sepagangwa.

en: They go far, there is the last station there, Pienaarspoort.
tsn: Ba ya kgakala go fitlha ka seteišene sa bofelo sa  Pienaarspoort.

en: But if the station was working, it was going to be easy, adds Thobejane-Mphela .
tsn: Fa seteišene  se se ne se dira, go ne go tlile go nna bonolo, go bua jalo Thobejane-Mphela.

en: Prasa indicated to SABC News they will only be able to comment later on the issue.
tsn: PRASA e senotse go babegadikgang ba SABC gore ba tlile go kgona go tshwaela moragonyana ka kgang eno.

en: Mashaba says across South Africa, formerly functional train stations have followed the route of Greenview, having either been gutted by criminals or have fallen into disrepair.
tsn: Mashaba a re go ralala Aforikaborwa, diteišene tse di dirang di tshwana fela le sa kwa Greenview, di tlhotlhorilwe ke disenyi kgotsa di wela go tlhatlhamologa.

en: African National Congress (ANC) President Cyril Ramaphosa has told the State Capture Commission of Inquiry that it is untrue that his election at the party’s 54th national conference in 2017 was bought.
tsn: Moporesidente wa Lekoko la Bosetšhaba (ANC) Cyril Ramaphose o boleletse Komiti ya Dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi gore ga se boammaaruri gore go tlhophiwa ga gagwe mo lekokong ka khonferense ya lekoko ya bolesometlhano le bone ka 2017 ga e a rekiwa.

en: Ramaphosa continues with his testimony on Thursday afternoon.
tsn: Ramaphosa o tswelela ka go neelana ka bopaki ka Labone thapama.

en: The African Christian Democratic Party (ACDP) has commended the private prosecution against National Assembly Speaker Thandi Modise.
tsn: Lekoko la Temokerasi la Tumelo ya Sekeresete mo mo Aforika le akgola tsheko ya poraefete kgatlhanong le Mmusakgotla wa Bosetšhaba Thandi Modise.

en: Modise is on trial for alleged animal cruelty that took place on her farm while she was still the Premier of the North West.
tsn: Modise o lebanwe ke tsheko mabapi le ditatofatso tsa bosetlhogo mo diphologolong kwa polaseng ya gagwe fa a ne a santse e le Tonakgolo ya Bokone Bophirima.

en: She is charged with six counts of animal cruelty relating to animals that died on her farm in 2014.
tsn: O latofatswa ka melato e le thataro e e amanang le bosetlhogo jwa diphologolo tse di suleng kwa polaseng ya gagwe ka 2014.

en: The party says this is both good stewardship and a demonstration that no one is above the law.
tsn: Lekoko la re se ke kgato e e maleba e bile e bontsha gore ga go ope yo o kwa godimo ga molao.

en: ACDP senior member of parliament Steve Swarts says the case reflects the highest form of accountability.
tsn: Leloko la ACDP Steve Swarts e bile e le tokololo ya palamente a re go bontsha go tlhokega maikarabelo a a magolo mo kgetseng e.

en: We as ACDP we believe that this is a measure of society to the most vulnerable including its animals, says Swarts.
tsn: Jaaka maACDP re dumela gore se ke sesupo sa go bontsha fa setšhaba se sa sireletsega go akaretsa le diphologolo tsa sona.

en: We also believe that none is above the law including the speaker of the national assembly-the honourable Thandi Modise, adds Swarts.
tsn: Re dumela gape gore ga go ope yo o kwa godimo ga molao, go akarediwa le Mmusakgotla wa Bosetšhaba Thandi Modise, Swarts o tlaleletsa ntlha ya gagwe.

en: Thandi Modise’s animal cruelty case back in court
tsn: Kgetse ya ga Thandi Modise mabapi le bosetlhogo jwa diphologolo e buseditswe kwa kgotlatshekelo.

en: African National Congress (ANC) President Cyril Ramaphosa has defended the need for party MPs to toe the party line.
tsn: Moporesidente wa Lekoko la Bosetšhaba le le busang (ANC) Cyril Ramaphosa o bontshitse tlhokego ya gore maloko a palamente ba lekoko ba tsamaisane le melawana le ditlhokego tsa lekoko.

en: Ramaphosa says it is practice the world over that parties exercise discipline over their members who are taken to Parliament on a party list and it is only in exceptional cases where he believes that members should vote with their conscience.
tsn: Ramaphosa a re ke tlwaelo lefatshe ka bophara gore makoko a diragatse meono ya bona mo malokong a a isiwang kwa palamenteng mo lenaaneng la lekoko e bile ke mabaka a a itlhaotseng fa a dumelang gore maloko ba tshwanetse go tlhopha go ya ka letswalo la bona.

en: The ANC President said a number of considerations need to be weighed up as a collective by the caucus.
tsn: Moporesidente wa ANC o buile ka ga dintlha tse tshwanetseng go elwa tlhoko mmogo ke komiti.

en: You have got to look very closely at the consequences of that action.
tsn: O tshwanetse go lebelela ka leitlho le le ntšhotšho ditlamorago tsa kgato e.

en: Because if you vote to remove a President in a vote of no confidence, what then ensues.
tsn: Ka gonne fa o tlhopha go tlosa Poresidente ka tlhopho ya go tlhoka boikanyego, ke eng gape se se latelang.

en: Members have to ask themselves, is that what we want and certainly if that is the desire that is collectively agreed to then that is what has be opted for, explains Ramaphosa.
tsn: Ramaphosa o tlhalosa fa maloko a tshwanetse go ipotsa, gore a ke se ba se batlang mme fa e le gore ke keletso ya se go dumalanweng ka sona go raya gore ke tshwetso e e tserweng.

en: The ANC President says the issue of political party discipline is controversial and continues to plague even mature democracies.
tsn: Moporesidente wa ANC a re kgang ya lekoko la sepolotiki mabapi le boitshwarontle ke ngangisano e bile e tswelela pele go nna tlhobaboroko mo temokerasing e e godileng.

en: Ramaphosa says a tension exists in South Africa’s constitutional framework that often makes the matter tricky to navigate.
tsn: Ramaphosa a re matsapa a a teng mo letlhomesong la molaotheo wa Aforikaborwa o o dirang gore kgang e e nne matswakabele go e fenenkolola.

en: Regret over Gupta Leaks
tsn: Maikotlhao mabapi le mathata a a tlileng le ba gaGupta.

en: Ramaphosa has also expressed regret that the ANC delayed in investigating state capture through Parliaments committees when the allegations first emerged.
tsn: Ramaphosa o tlhagisitse gape maikotlhao a gore ANC e diegile go dira dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi mo pusong go ya ka dikomiti tsa palamente ka ditatofatso tsa ntlha.

en: However, the President has denied that this was due to deliberate resistance.
tsn: Le fa go le jalo, Moresidente o ganetsane le ntlha ya gore se, se dirilwe ka maikaelelo.

en: Ramaphosa was responding to questions as to why the ANC chose to rebuff a proposal by the Democratic Alliance (DA) in March of that year that Parliament probe the allegations emerging from media reports on the Gupta family.
tsn: Ramaphosa o ne  fetola dipotso ts gore goreng ANC e ganne kopo ya lekoko la DA ka Mopitlwe ngwaga oo gore Palamente e upolole ka ga ditatofatso tse di tlhagelelang mo dipegelong tsa metswedi ya dikgang mabapi le ba lelapa la gaGupta.

en: The ANC at the time made a counter proposal that those who had any knowledge of the matter go to the police or the Public Protector.
tsn: ANC ka nako eo e tshitshintse gore bao ba nang le kitso mabapi le kgang e ba e go bula kgetsi kwa mapodiseng kgotsa Mosireletsi wa Setšhaba.

en: The thinking would have been which of the structures that we have in the state that would have greater effectiveness of investigating these matters and coming to a conclusion that prosecutorial processes should commence.
tsn: Go ne go tshwanetse gore go akanngwe gore ditheo di fe tse re nang le tsone mo nageng tse di ka bong di thusitse ka matsetseleko go batlisisa mathata le go dira diphitlhelelo tsa gore dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi di tshwanetse go simolola.

en: It was thought at the time that other institutions [like] the Public Protector, the South African Police Service (SAPS) may have had a better grip on all these matters, explains Ramaphosa.
tsn: Ramaphosa o tlhalosa fa go ne go akanngwa ka nako eo gore ditheo tse dingwe jaaka sa Tshireletso ya Setšhaba, Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforikaborwa (SAPS) di ne di ka nna le tharabololo e e botoka ya mathata a. le go nna a a botoka a grip ka ga dintlha tse, o tlhalosa jalo Ramaphosa.

en: On Wednesday, Ramaphosa said the governing party’s internal party funding guidelines were not suited for the time we live in.
tsn: Ka Laboraro, Ramaphosa o rile dikaelo tsa setlamo sa matlole sa lekoko le le busang di ne di sa tsamaisane le nako e ba tshelang mo go yona.

en: Ramaphosa dealt with the risks of corruption attached to the lack of transparency in the donations and funding political parties receive.
tsn: Ramaphosa o semagane le mathata a bosenyi a a amanang le tlhokego ya go baya dilo mo pepeneneng mabapi le diketleetso le matlole a lekoko le a amogelang.

en: He said this was why the Political Party Funding Act that came in force at the beginning of April, was necessary.
tsn: O rile ntlha e, ke yona e tlhotlheleditseng gore go tsenngwe molawana wa lekoko la sepolotiki wa tsamaiso ya matlole ka tshoganyetso, molawana o o tlhabetswe ke letsatsi Moranang a tlhola, jaaka go ne go tlhokega.

en: However, he added the funding of internal party campaigns needed to be looked at.
tsn: Le fa go le jalo, o tsweletse ka go akgela fa matsholo a matlole a lekoko a tlhoka go lebelelwa sentle.

en: Below is Ramaphosa’s opening statement made on Wednesday:
tsn: Fa tlase ke ntlha e e senotsweng ke Ramaphosa ka Laboraro:

en: African National Congress (ANC) President Cyril Ramaphosa has admitted that the ruling party was delayed in its reaction to emerging evidence on the Gupta family’s influence in the country.
tsn: Moporesidente wa Lekoko la Bosetšhaba le le busang (ANC) Cyril Ramaphosa o dumetse gore lekoko le le busang le diegile go tsereganya ka ga bopaki jo bo ribologileng mabapi le phokedi ya ba lelapa la gaGupta mo nageng.

en: Ramaphosa says the emails shedding light on this, known as the Gupta Leaks, had presented a flood of evidence, which required Parliament to begin its work on the matter.
tsn: Ramaphosa a re di e-meile di senola se mo pepeneneng mabapi le se se itsegeng jaaka Gupta Leaks, go senotswe bosupi jo bo bontshang tlhokego ya gore Palamente e simolole go sugana le mathata a.

en: Ramaphosa is testifying for a second day at the Commission of Inquiry into State Capture in his capacity as the leader of the governing party.
tsn: Ramaphosa o neelana ka bosupi mo letsatsing la gagwe kwa Khomišeneng ya Dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi mo pusong jaaka e le moeteledipele wa lekoko le le busang.

en: The Gupta leaks in 2017 presented a flood of evidence which could see the 2012 ANC National Conference resolution of more activist parliamentarians activated according to Ramaphosa
tsn: Ka 2017 ditshupetso tsa bag a Gupta di tlhagisa bosupi jo bogolo jo bo ka re busetsang kwa khonferenseng ya Bosetšhaba ya ANC ya go tlhaola bapalamente ba bolwantsha bosenyi, go ya ka Ramaphosa.

en: The Gupta leak emails were a flood of evidence that required the Parliament to start doing its work.
tsn: Di e-meile tsa ga Gupta di nnile bosupi jo bogolo jo bo tlhokang gore Palamente e simolole go dira tiro ya bona.

en: Ramaphosa says he regrets that the ANC delayed in investigating state capture through parliaments committees but denies that this was due to deliberate resistance.
tsn: Ramaphosa a re o maswabi gore ANC e diegisitse dipatlisiso go batlisisa ka ga bosenyi mo pusong mo dikomiting tsa palamente mme o ganela fa se e se ka maikaelelo.

en: Ramaphosa was responding to questions on why the ANC chose to rebuff a proposal by the DA in March of that year that parliament probe the allegations emerging from media reports on the Gupta family.
tsn: Ramaphosa  o ne  fetola dipotso tsa gore goreng ANC e ganne kopo ya lekoko la DA ka Mopitlwe ngwaga oo gore Palamente e upolole ka ga ditatofatso tse di tlhagelelang mo dipegelong tsa metswedi ya dikgang mabapi le ba lelapa la gaGupta.

en: The thinking would have been which of the structures that we have in the state that would have greater effectiveness of investigating these matters and coming to a conclusion that prosecutorial processes should comment it was through at the time that other institutions the Public Protector, the Police may have had a better grip on all these matters, he says.
tsn: Go ne go tshwanetse gore go akanngwe gore ditheo di fe tse re nang le tsone mo nageng tse di ka bong di thusitse ka matsetseleko go batlisisa mathata le go dira diphitlhelelo tsa gore dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi di tshwanetse go simolola, e ne ele ka nako eo gore ditheo tse dingwe jaaka sa Tshireletso ya Setšhaba, Sepodisi di ne di ka nna le tharabololo e e botoka ya mathata a, a rialo.

en: Ramaphosa says the emergence of the Gupta leaks had activated Parliament’s role to respond to the evidence.
tsn: Ramaphosa a re thibololo ya Gupta Leaks e tsentse Palamente matlhagatlhaga a go tsibogela bosupi jo.

en: Once these Gupta leak emails came out, it became clear to many of us that there needed to be a response of some sort.
tsn: Morago ga go bipologa ga di e-meile tsa Gupta leaks, go tlile mo pepeneneng gore bontsi jwa rona re tlhoka go tsibogela se ka mokgwa mongwe.

en: The ANC knew that it needed to get to the bottom of this on a number of other structures.
tsn: Lekoko la ANC le ne le itse gore go ne go tlhokega gore ba lebelele se go ya ka ditheo tse dingwe.

en: This would have been in line with what Parliament needed to do at that time because a flood of evidence was now becoming evident and available, explains President Ramaphosa.
tsn: Se, se ne se tshwanelwa ke go tsamaisana le se Palamente e neng e tlhoka go se dira ka nako eo ka gonne bosupi jo bo ne bo itlhalosa e bile bo le mo pepeneneng, go tlhalosa Ramaphosa.

en: On Wednesday, he was quizzed on the impact of cadre deployment.
tsn: Ka Laboraro, o ne a botsiwa ka ga seabe sa setlhopha sa bothapi.

en: Ramaphosa said he was not at the State Capture Commission to make excuses for the governing party or defend the indefensible.
tsn: Ramaphosa o rile o ne a se teng kwa khomišeneng ya dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi mo pusong go emelela lekoko le le busang kgotsa go ngangisana ka se se sa ngangisegeng.

en: The ANC has taken this position knowing that the organisation itself would be placed under great scrutiny and that the process of examining these matters will be difficult and painful for the ANC.
tsn: ANC e tsene mo maemong a, e itse gore mokgatlho ka bo ona o ka batlisisiwa le gore thulaganyo ya dipatlisiso e ka nna bokete le botlhoko mo ANC.

en: Nevertheless, the ANC maintains that this commission is a necessary part of the broader social effort of ending all forms of state capture and corruption, said Ramaphosa.
tsn: Le fa go ntse jalo, mokgatlho wa ANC o dumela gore Khomišine eno ke karolo e e botlhokwa ya dikakanyo tsa maiteko a go fedisa mefuta yotlhe ya bosenyi mo pusong, a rialo Ramaphosa.

en: Political analyst at the North West University, Professor Andre Duvenhage, says he expects a fight back from Supra Mahumapelo, following his five-year suspension from the ANC.
tsn: Moitseanape wa dipoletiki kwa Yunibesithing ya Bokone Bophirima, Moporofesara Andre Duvenhage, a re o solofetse boipusolosetso go tswa kwa go Supra Mahumapelo tebang le dingwaga di le tlhano a sekegilwe mo ANC.

en: Mahumapelo and the acting provincial secretary of the ANC Women’s League, Bitsa Lenkopane, were suspended from the governing party yesterday.
tsn: Mahumapelo le Mokwaledi wa nakwana wa Mokgatlho wa Basadi wa ANC, Bitsa Lenkopane, ba sekegilwe mo lekokong le le busang maabane.

en: They were both found guilty of misconduct for convening a parallel meeting to that of the Interim Provincial Committee in Mareetsane near Mahikeng last year.
tsn: Bobedi jo, bo ne ba bonwa molato ka maitsholomabe morago ga go tshwara kopano e e tsamaelanang le ya Komiti ya Nakwana ya Porofence (IPC) kwa Mareetsane gaufi le kwa Mafikeng ngogola.

en: Duvenhage says he foresees Mahumapelo and the so-called RET forces in the ANC forming a breakaway party from the ANC.
tsn: Duvenhage a re o bonelapele Mahumapelo le se se bidiwang RET forcers mo ANC go nna mathuga a digongwana go tswa mo lekokong la ANC.

en: He’s going to fight back, he’s going to mobilise.
tsn: O tlile go tliele go lwantsha se, o tlile go bolotsa letsholo.

en: I think, maybe a stronger scenario at this point is a break-away from the ANC.
tsn: Ke akanya gore, ntlha e e maatla mo lebakeng le ke go tswa mo ANC.

en: I think the room and the space, for the RET group is becoming smaller and smaller.
tsn: Ke akanya gore phaposing le manno, a setlhopha sa maRET e tsweletse go ngotlega.

en: And as a result of that, the option for them jumping ship is becoming bigger and bigger, says Duvenhage.
tsn: Ka ntlha e, ba na le tšhono e e kgolo ya go ka tlolela sekepe, go bua Duvenhage.

en: Political analyst, Barry Hanyane, believes Mahumapelo’s influence within the provincial ANC ranks has come to an end.
tsn: Moitseanape wa dipolotiki, Barry Hanyane, o dumela gore phokedi ya ga Mahumapelo mo Lekokong la porofense e ya kwa bokhutlong.

en: The former Premier has been put under the bus; even if he were to appeal it is pretty much the end of his influence in the province.
tsn: Tonakgolo ya maloba o sokelwa dirope, le fa a ne a ka dira boikuelo mme go a bontsha gore phokedi ya gagwe mo porofenseng e phirimilelwa ke letsatsi.

en: Even if he were to appeal, for a mere fact that he’s been cast out as someone who’s rebellious and someone where perhaps would want to revive suspended for five years from the ANC.
tsn: Le fa a ne a ka dira boikuelo, tebang le lebaka la gore o ntse a sekegilwe jaaka motsuolodi le mongwe yo a gongwe a batlang go tsosolosa tshekego ya gagwe ya dingwaga di le tlhano mo ANC.

en: Whether there’s an appeal or not, it spells a death knell for his political career especially in his province, says Hanyane.
tsn: Gore go na le boikuelo kgotsa nnyaa, se se tlhalosa bokhutlo jwa tiro ya gagwe ya sepolotiki, segolobogolo mo porofenseng ya gagwe, go bua jalo Hanyane.

en: Mahumapelo is expected to hold a press briefing on Thursday afternoon
tsn: Mahumapelo o solofetswe go tshwara kopano ya bobegakgang ka Labone thapama.

en: ANC alliance partners in the North West say they hope other members of the party will learn from Mahumapelo’s suspension that no one is above the party.
tsn: Mokgatlho wa badirammogo ba ANC mo Bokone Bophirima wa re ba solofela gore maloko a mangwe a lekoko ba tlaa ithuta go tswa mo go go sekegiweng ga ga Mahumapelo gore ga go ope yo a kwa godimo ga molao wa lekoko.

en: The African National Congress (ANCs) Mangaung region in the Free State has thrown its weight behind the National Executive Committees (NEC) resolution that members who are charged with corruption should step aside.
tsn: Lekoko la Bosetšhaba le le busang (ANCs) kwa Mangaung kwa Foreisetata  le dirisa dithata tsa bona le ba Komiti ya Khuduthamaga ya Bosetšhaba (NEC) ka tshwetso ya gore maloko a a bonweng molato wa bosenyi ba tshwanetse go sekegwa kwa thoko.

en: The Regions Deputy Convener, Sabelo Pitso, has told a media briefing at the party’s provincial headquarters in Bloemfontein that no one is above the ANC.
tsn: Motlatsamodulasetulo wa Dikgaolo, Sabelo Pitso, o boleletse bobegakgang kwa dikantorokgolo tsa kekoko mo porofenseng kwa Bloemfontein gore ga go ope yo o kwa godimo ga ANC.

en: He urged party members not to allow themselves to be manipulated by forces that are not willing to subject themselves to organisational discipline.
tsn: O rotloeditse maloko a lekoko gore ba seke ba letla go bipiwa ka bobi mo matlhong ke ba ba sa ikemisetsang go latela thulaganyo ya kgalemo.

en: True cadres of and members of the ANC always voluntarily subject themselves to organisational discipline.
tsn: Ditokololo tsa Mokgatlho wa ANC tsa boammaaruri ka gale ka go ithaopa go latela thulaganyo ya kgalemo.

en: This is exactly what Thabo Mbeki and Jacob Zuma did in the past irrespective of personal wishes and preferences.
tsn: Se, ke se Thabo Mbeki le Jacob Zuma ba sedirileng mo nakong e e fetileng go sa kgathalesege ka ga dikeletso tsa motho le dikgatlhegelo.

en: Once the NEC took a decision to recall them, they never sought to influence the gullible branches to cause confusion, disability and disorder, adds Pitso.
tsn: Fa NEC e tsaya tshwetso ya go ba bitsa, ga ba a ka ba batla go tlhotlheletsa tlhakatlhakano mo go ba bangwe go tlhola ketsaetsego, bogole le tlhakatlhakano, Pitso o gatisa ntlha ya gagwe.

en: In the Free State to date, three of the five regions have rejected the imminent stepping down of the party’s secretary-general Ace Magashule.
tsn: Kwa Foreisetata go fitlha ga jaana, le dikgaolo di le tlhano ga di inyalane le go rolwa tiro ga mokwaledimogolo wa lekoko Ace Magashule.

en: They are Fezile Dabi, Lejweleputswa and Maluti-A-Phofung.
tsn: Ke bo Fezile Dabi, Lejweleputswa le Maluti-A-Phofung.

en: The Fezile Dabi region has gone as far as threating to interdict the ANCs NECs step-aside decision.
tsn: Kgaolo ya Fezile Dabi e ile ya dira matshosetsi morago ga tshwetso ya ANCs NECs ya go rola Magashule tiro.

en: Magashule is one of ANC leaders who face fraud and corruption charges.
tsn: Magashule ke mongwe wa baeteledipele ba ANC b aba lebaganeng le bosenyi le bonweenwee.

en: Friday is D-Day for them to step down from their leadership positions.
tsn: Labotlhano ke letsatsi la bofelo la bona go rola tiro go tswa mo maemong a bona a boeteledipele.

en: Failure to do so will lead to their suspension from the governing party.
tsn: Go retelelwa ke go dira jalo, go tlile go dira gore ba sekegwe mo lekokong le le busang.

en: SABC News Samkele Maseko elaborates on the Fezile Dabi regions stance:
tsn: Mmegadikgang wa tsa polotiki mo SABC Samkele Maseko o lotolotsa ka ga maemo a kwa dikgaolong tsa   Fezile Dabi:

en: ANC President Cyril Ramaphosa is testifying for a second day at the State Capture Inquiry.
tsn: Moporesidente wa ANC Cyril Ramaphosa o neela bosupi ka letsatsi la bobedi kwa Khomišeneng ya dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi mo pusong.

en: Yesterday while answering questions on the impact of cadre deployment on the functioning of the state, Ramaphosa said a balance needs to be struck between establishing a professional public service and delivering, what he says, is the ANC’s developmental mandate.
tsn: Maabane fa a araba dipotso ka ga seabe sa setlhopha sa bothapi mo pusong, Ramaphosa o rile tekano e tshwanetse go dirwa magareng ga go tlhoma tirelo ya setšhaba ka mokgwa wa seporofešenale, se a se buang ke taelo ya ANC ya ditlhabololo.

en: He told the commission that appointments in the state should be made in an open manner so that state capture never again happens in South Africa.
tsn: O ne a bolelela Khomišene gore go tlhomiwa ga bone mo puso go tshwanetse go dirwa mo pontsheng gore puso e tlhaloganya se gape se diragala mo Aforikaborwa.

en: Today he is expected to answer questions about his 2017 ANC Presidential Campaign.
tsn: Gompieno o solofetswe go araba dipotso ka ga Letsholo la gagwe la boporesidente mo ANC ka 2017.

en: 1He will also be questioned about the Gupta brothers amid claims that they showered some ANC members with gifts and money.
tsn: O tlile go botsolotswa ka ga barwa Gupta mabapi le magatwe a gore ba ne ba reka maloko mangwe a lekoko ka dimpho le madi.

en: The alliance partners of the African National Congress (ANC) in the North West say they hope other members of the party will learn from Supra Mahumapelo’s suspension that no one is above the party.
tsn: Mokgatlho wa badirammogo ba Lekoko la Bosetšhaba (ANC) mo Bokone Bophirima ba re ba solofela gore maloko a mangwe a tlaa ithuta mo go sekegweng gag a Supra Mahumapelo gore ga go ope yo a kwa godimo ga lekoko.

en: The former chairperson of the ANC and the acting provincial secretary of the ANC Women’s League, Bitsa Lenkopane, were suspended for five years from the ANC on Wednesday.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa maloba wa ANC le Mokwaledi wa nakwana wa porofense wa Mokgatlho wa Basadi, Bitsa Lenkopane, ba sekegilwe dingwaga di le tlhano mo ANC ka Laboraro.

en: Cosatu Provincial Secretary, Kopano Konopi, says, we feel that it is high time the ANC becomes decisive on issues of discipline and demonstrate to all its members that discipline is something that must be obeyed in the ANC.
tsn: Mokwaledi wa Cosatu mo Porofenseng, Kopano Konopi a re o akanya gore ke nako e e maleba ya gore ANC e simolole go lebelela merero ya boitshwaro le go bontsha ditokololo tsotlhe tsa yona gore se ke selo se re tshwanetseng go se obamelwa mo ANC.

en: All the resolutions and constitution of the ANC must be respected, including the respect of the leadership that is leading the ANC at the time.
tsn: Ditshwetso tsotlhe le Molaotheo wa ANC di tshwanetse go tlotliwa, go akaretsa le boeteledipele jo bo kwa godimo jwa ANC ka nako eo.

en: We hope that members of the ANC will see that the ANC is serious in instilling discipline in the organisation, adds Konopi.
tsn: Re solofela gore maloko a Lekoko la ANC a tlaa bona gore ANC e tiisitse mo go kgaleng maitshwaromabe mo mo mokgatlhong, ga bua Konopi.

en: Sanco’s provincial secretary, Packet Seaketso says, it clearly shows that nobody is above the organisation.
tsn: Mokwaledi wa SANCO mo porofenseng, Packet Seaketso a re go mo pontsheng jaanong gore ga go ope yo o kwa godimo ga molao wa mokgatlho.

en: We are aware that they have a right to appeal their decision to the highest decision- making body, which is the national executive committee (NEC) disciplinary committee.
tsn: Re a itse gore ba na le tshwanelo ya go tsenya boikuela jwa bona kwa baokameding ba ditshwaetso, e leng Komiting ya Khuduthamaga ya Bosetšhaba (NEC) ya kgalemo.

en: But the fact of the matter is nobody can do as he pleases or as he wishes in the ANC, without the ANC taking a decision.
tsn: Boammaaruri jwa ntlha e ke gore ga go ope yo a ka itirelang boithatelo kgotsa jaaka a eletsa mo ANC, kwa ntle ga ANC go tsaya tshwetso.

en: Supra Mahumapelo is suspended from ANC for five years.
tsn: Supra Mahumapelo o sekegilwe mo ANC dingwaga di le tlhano.

en: Mahumapelo says he will respond to his suspension from the ANC in a media briefing on Thursday.
tsn: Mahumapelo a re o tlaa arabela tshekego ya gagwe kwa bobegakganngweng ka Labone.

en: He says he heard about his suspension through the media.
tsn: A re o utlwile ka ga tshekego ya gagwe go tswa mo metsweding ya dikgang.

en: Meanwhile, during his address to his supporters on Sunday, he accused the ANC of violating the Constitution, saying some of the party’s resolutions are in conflict with the law.
tsn: Re sa ntse re le foo, mo puong ya gagwe go baemanokeng ba gagwe ka Latshipi, o latofatsa ANC ka ga go gataka Molaotheo, ka gore dingwe tsa ditswhetso tsa lekoko ga di tsamaelane le molao.

en: He urged the ANC NEC to suspend its step-aside resolution until the party’s next national conference.
tsn: O tlhotlheleditse Mokgatlho wa ANC wa Khuduthamaga ya Bosetšhaba (NEC) ya dikgalemo go sekega tshwetso ya ona go fitlha ka Khonferense ya bosetšhaba e e latelang ya lekoko.

en: In the video below, Mahumapelo briefs branches on recent suspension of a number of prominent ANC members:
tsn: Mo bidiong e e fa tlase, Mahumapelo o loma makalana tsebe mabapi le go sekegwa ga maloko a a itsegeng a ANC:

en: The ANC leader in the Western Cape Provincial Legislature, Cameron Dugmore, has accused the DA of applying double standards in dealing with party members.
tsn: Moeteledipele wa ANC mo porofenseng ya Kapa Bophirima, Cameron Dugmore, o latofaditswe lekoko la DA ka go tsaya letlhakore mo go samaganeng le maloko a Lekoko.

en: This follows Bonginkosi Madikizelas resignation as the DA provincial leader and the Western Cape Transport MEC.
tsn: Se ke morago Bonginkosi Madikizelas a sena go rola tiro jaaka moeteledipele wa DA mo Porofenseng ya Kapa Bophirima le tonakgolo ya dipalangwa.

en: Madikizela falsely claimed that he had a B Com degree.
tsn: Madikizela o buile maaka a re o na le dikerii ya B Com.

en: 177. He’s said the so-called expos had everything to do with his ambitions to become the DAs Mayoral candidate.
tsn: O rile leano le amana le tsotlhe tse di ka ga maikaelelo a gagwe a go nna mmeiyara wa DA.

en: He was initially suspended for two weeks as party leader and provincial cabinet minister.
tsn: O ne a sekegwa dibeke tse pedi jaaka moeteledipele wa lekoko le mokabinete wa porofense.

en: Madikizela apologises for qualifications saga.
tsn: Madikizela o kopa go inelwe matsogo metsing mabapi le go bua maaka ka dithutego.

en: Dugmore says more consistency is required from the DA.
tsn: Dugmore a re boikanyego bo a tlhokega go tswa mo lekokong la DA

en: They have one way of dealing with Black leaders in the DA and another way of dealing with White leaders almost two separate standards that they apply nothing has been said about the allegations on Saldanha mayor in terms of the allegations that he fabricated his CV and we also know the history in George in the way that the DA dealt with mayor Malvin Naik, says Dugmore.
tsn: Ba na le tsela e nngwe ya go sugana le baeteledipele ba Bantsho mo DA e le tsela e nngwe ya go sugana le ba ba Basweu ke maphatha a le mabedi a a farologaneng a e leng gore a lebeletswe mme ga go sepe se se boletsweng ka ditatofatso go tonakgolo ya Saldanha go ya ka ditatofatso tsa go ipopela kgomo ya mmopa mo lokwaloikitsisong la gagwe mme gape re itse hisetori kwa George ka tsela e DA e semaganeng le tonakgolo Malvin Naik, ga bua Dugmore.

en: The DA in the Western Cape has welcomed Madikizela’s resignation.
tsn: Lekoko la DA kwa Kapa Bophirima le amogetse Madikizela mo tholong ya tiro.

en: DA Provincial Chairperson, Jaco Londt, says the provinces Community Safety Minister, Albert Fritz, will remain the acting provincial leader until the party elects an interim leader at its provincial council on May 29.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa DA wa porofense, Jaco Londt, a re Tonakgolo ya diporofense ya pabalesego ya baagi, Albert Fritz, o tlile go nna moeteledipele wa nama o sa tshwere wa porofense go fitlha lekoko le tlhopha moeteledipele wa lekoko le le busang ya nakwana ka Khansele ya Porofense ka Motsheganong 29.

en: Londt elaborates on the DAs view over Madikizela’s resignation.
tsn: Londt o tlaleletsa kakanyo ya lekoko la DA mo go roleng tiro ga ga Madikizela.

en: It is not yet clear why she stepped down from the position.
tsn: Ga go ise go tlhage mo pepeneneng gore ke goreng a rola tiro ya gagwe.

en: Her deputy, Arlene Adams, will assume her role.
tsn: Letsogo la gagwe, arlene Adams, o tlaa rwala ditlhako tsa gagwe.

en: African National Legislature (ANC) President Cyril Ramaphosa is expected to be quizzed about his 2017 ANC Presidential Campaign at the State Capture Commission in Johannesburg on Thursday.
tsn: Moporesidente wa Lekoko la Bosetšhaba le le busang (ANC), Cyril Ramaphosa o solofetswe go botsolotswa ka ga letsholo la gagwe la boporesidente ka 2017 kwa Khomišeneng ya Dipatlisiso tsa Bosenyi mo pusong kwa Johannesburg ka Labone.

en: In his testimony on Wednesday, Ramaphosa acknowledged that the ANC had not done enough to deal with the phenomenon of state capture when it first reared its head in 2011.
tsn: Mo bosuping jwa gagwe ka Laboraro, Ramaphosa o amogela gore ANC ga e a dira mo go lekaneng go sugana le bosenyi sa ntlha fa mosi o ne o simolola go kukuela ka 2011.

en: He also defended the cadre deployment policy of the governing party saying there was nothing wrong with it in principle.
tsn: O dibetse pholisi ya setlhopha sa bothapi sa lekoko le le busang ka gore go ne go sena molato mo molawaneng oo.

en: He alluded to the matter declaring that the guidelines for internal party funding are not suited for the present time and need revision.
tsn: O akgetse mo kgannyeng e a gatelela fa dikaelo tsa lekoko tsa matlole di se mo maemong a gajaana e bile di tlhoka go sekasekwa.

en: He will also be questioned about the Gupta brothers in light of revelations of gifts and monies some ANC members are alleged to have received from them.
tsn: O tlaa botsolotswa gape ka ga barwa Gupta mabapi le dimpho le ditšhelete tse maloko mangwe a ANC ba di amogetseng go tswa mo go bona.

en: Meanwhile, President Cyril Ramaphosa’s appearance at the Commission of Inquiry into State Capture had tongues wagging on social media as South Africans shared their views on the proceedings in Braamfontein.
tsn: Re santse re le foo, go tlhagelela ga Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa kwa Khomišene ya Dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi mo pusong go tsositse mabarebare mo maranyaneng a tlhaeletsano jaaka Maaaforikaborwa ba abelana dikakanyo tsa bona ka ga tsheko kwa Braamfontein.

en: The alliance partners of the ANC say they hope other members of the ANC will learn from Supra Mahumapelo’s suspension that no one is above the party.
tsn: Mokgatlho wa badirammogo wa ANC wa re ba solofela gore ditokololo tse dingwe tsa ANC di tlaa ithuta go tswa mo go sekegweng ga ga Supra Mahumapelo gore ga go ope yo kwa godimo ga molao wa lekoko.

en: Mahumapelo and the acting provincial secretary of the ANC Women’s League Bitsa Lenkopane have been suspended for five years from the ANC.
tsn: Mahumapelo le mokwaledi wanama o sa tshwere wa porofense, mokwaledi wa mokgatlho wa ANC wa basadi Bitsa Lenkopane, ba emisitswe dingwaga di le tlhano  ANC.
