en: They were both charged with conduct, after allegedly convening a parallel meeting to that of the Interim Provincial Committee in Mareetsane near Mahikeng last year.
tsn: Bobedi jo, bo ne jwa bonwa molato ka maitsholomabe morago ga go tshwara kopano e e tsamaelanang le ya Komiti ya Nakwana ya Porofence (IPC) kwa Mareetsane gaufi le kwa Mafikeng ngogola.

en: Cosatu’s Provincial Secretary, Kopano Konopi, says, We feel that it is high time the ANC becomes decisive on issues of discipline and demonstrates to all its members that discipline is something that must be obeyed in the ANC, and(that)all the resolutions and constitution of the ANC must be respected, including the respect of the leadership that is leading the ANC at the time, irrespective of whether it is the interim leadership or it is the leadership that is elected at the congress.
tsn: Mokwaledi wa Cosatu mo Porofenseng, Kopano Konopi a re o akanya gore ke nako e e maleba ya gore ANC e simolole go lebelela merero ya boitshwaro le go bontsha ditokololo tsotlhe tsa yona gore se ke selo se re tshwanetseng go se obamelwa mo ANC, le gore ditshwetso tsotlhe le molaotheo wa lekoko di tshwanetse go tlotliwa, go akaretsa le boeteledipele jo bo kwa godimo jwa ANC ka nako eo, go sa kgathalesege gore ke boeteledipele jwa nakwana kgotsa ke boeteledipele jo bo tlhophilweng kwa Khonkereseng.

en: We hope that members of the ANC will see that the ANC is serious in instilling discipline in the organisation.
tsn: Re solofela gore maloko a Lekoko la ANC a tlaa bona gore ANC e tiisitse mo go kgaleng maitshwaromabe mo mo mokgatlhong.

en: Sanco’s Provincial Secretary, Packet Seaketso, the decision to suspend the two officials shows nobody is above the organisation.
tsn: Mokwaledi wa SANCO mo porofenseng, Packet Seaketso a re go mo pontsheng jaanong gore ga go ope yo o kwa godimo ga molao wa mokgatlho.

en: We are aware that they have a right to appeal their decision to the highest decision making body, which is the National Executive Committee Disciplinary Committee.
tsn: Re a itse gore ba na le tshwanelo ya go tsenya boikuela jwa bona kwa baokameding ba ditshwetso, e leng Komiting ya Khuduthamaga ya Bosetšhaba (NEC) ya dikgalemo.

en: But the fact of the matter is nobody can do as he pleases or as he wishes in the ANC, without the ANC taking a decision.
tsn: Boammaaruri jwa kgang e ke gore ga go ope yo a ka itirelang boithatelo kgotsa jaaka a eletsa mo ANC, kwa ntle ga ANC go tsaya tshwetso.

en: BREAKING NEWS: Supra Mahumapelo suspended from ANC for 5 years.
tsn: SETLHOGO SA LETSATSI: Supra Mahumapelo o sekegilwe mo ANC dingwaga di le tlhano.

en: Political parties have called on State Capture Commission Chairperson, Deputy Chief Justice, Raymond Zondo not to favour ANC President, Cyril Rampahosa as he makes his appearance.
tsn: Makoko a sepolotiki a biditse kopano le Modulasetulo wa Khomišene ya Dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi mo pusong, Motlatsa Moatlhodimogolo, Raymond Zondo go tseye letlhakore la ga Moporesidente wa ANC, Cyril...... Rampahosa jaaka a tlile go tlhagelela.

en: The parties have vowed to picket for the duration of Ramaphosa’s testimony at the commission.
tsn: Makoko a ikana go tsosolosa ditshupetso nako e Ramaphosa a tla beng a neela bosupi kwa Khomišeneng.

en: Ramaphosa is to continue testifying at the commission in Johannesburg on Thursday.
tsn: Ramaphosa o tlaa tsweletsa go neela bosupi kwa Khomišene kwa Johannesburg ka Labone.

en: DA leader, John Steenhuisen, says Ramaphosa should come clean at the commission.
tsn: Moeteledipele wa DA, John Steenhuisen, a re Ramaphosa o tshwanetse go bua nnete kwa Khomišeneng.

en: I’m hoping to hear a full disclosure about the ANC’s policy of cadre deployment and how it lasted to the very part of enabling the state capture to take place.
tsn: Ke na le tsholofelo ya go utlwa boammaaruri ka botlalo ka ga pholisi ya ANC ya setlhopha sa tlhokomelo ya badiri le ka moo e tsereng karolo go kgontsha dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi go tswa letsholo.

en: Many government departments cannot deliver even on the most basic mandates.
tsn: Bontsi jwa mafapha a puso a retelelwa ke go diragatsa ditaelo tsa bona

en: And cadre deployment part of that people are not put into position on their ability to do their job and serve citizens, but their ability to channel money.
tsn: E bile setlhopha sa tlhokomelo ya badiri jaaka karolo ya setšhaba ga ba a neelwa maemo a fela ka bokgoni jwa bona jwa go dira ditiro le go direla baagi, mme bokgoni jwa bona jwa go dirasa madi.

en: According to Ramaphosa the ANC did not do enough to fight corruption and state capture.
tsn: Go ya ka Ramaphosa, ANC ga e a dira go tlala seatla mo go lwantsheng bosenyi mo pusong.

en: He says it was only in hindsight what was taking place became clear.
tsn: A re go ne ga elwa tlhoko fa se se neng se diragala se sena go tlhagelela mo pepeneneng.

en: In his opening statement, Ramaphosa said he was not at the State Capture Commission to make excuses for the governing party or defend the indefensible.
tsn: Mo puong ya gagwe ya pulomadibogo, Ramaphosa o rile o ne a se teng kwa khomišeneng ya dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi mo pusong go emelela lekoko le le busang kgotsa go ngangisana ka se se sa ngangisegeng.

en: Nevertheless, the ANC maintains that this commission is a necessary part of the broader social effort of ending all forms of state capture and corruption.
tsn: Le fa go ntse jalo, mokgatlho wa ANC o dumela gore Khomišine eno ke karolo e e botlhokwa ya dikakanyo tsa maiteko a go fedisa mefuta yotlhe ya bosenyi mo pusong.

en: Ramaphosa said the party did not take much cognisance when the phenomenon of state capture was first raised by Transport Minister Fikile Mbalula at a 2011 National Executive Committee meeting.
tsn: Ramaphosa o rile lekoko ga le a tla ka malepa a a botlhale fa sebonelo sa bosenyi mo pusong se se tlhagisiwa sa ntlha ke Tonakgolo ya Dipalangwa Fikile Mbalula ka 2011 kwa kopanong ya Komiti ya Khuduthamaga ya Bosetšhaba.

en: Mbalula said he had been informed of his cabinet appointment, by Ajay Gupta, before it took place.
tsn: Mbalula a re o lomilwe tsebe ke Ajay Gupta mabapi le go thapiwa ga gagwe jaaka mokabinete, pele e seo se diragala.

en: He says subsequent interventions by then-Parliamentary Whip, the late Jackson Mthembu and then-Secretary General Gwede Mantashe, were inadequate.
tsn: A re go tsena ga Bapalamente, moswi Jackson Mthembu le mokwaledikakaretso Gwede Mantashe, ga se gone.

en: It had shortcomings in living up to the expectations of the people of South Africa in relation to enforcing accountability and engendering a culture of effective consequence management as the leadership of the ANC duly elected at the 54th Conference.
tsn: Go retelelwa ke go diragatsa ditsholofelo tsa Maaforikaborwa mabapi le tsaya maikarabelo le go tsenya tsamaiso e e sa lekanang ya boeteledipele ya ANC e e tlhophilweng ka khonferense ya dingwagakgolo tsa masomeamatlhano le bone (54th conference) .

en: State Capture Inquiry Commission hears evidence from the President of the ANC, Cyril Ramaphosa.
tsn: Khomišene ya Dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi mo pusong e reetsa bopaki jwa Moporesidente wa ANC, Cyril Ramaphosa.

en: The ANC Disciplinary Committee in the North West has found both former premier Supra Mahumapelo and ANC Women’s League Acting Secretary, Bitsa Lenkopane guilty of misconduct.
tsn: Komiti ya dikgato-kgalemo mo Bokone Bophirima e boneTonakgolo ya maloba Supra Mahumapelo le mokwaledi wa nakwana wa Mokgatlho wa Basadi wa ANC, Lenkopane molato wa maitsholomabe.

en: Chairperson of the ANC Provincial Disciplinary Committee, Wendy Matsemela, says both Mahumapelo and Lenkopane have been suspended from the party for five years.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa Mokgatlho wa ANC ya komiti ya dikgato-kgalemo mo porofenseng, Wend Matsemela a re bobedi jo, Mahumapelo le Lenkopane ba sekegilwe mo lekokong dingwaga di le tlhano.

en: Both the above-mentioned respondents have been found guilty as charged.
tsn: Bobedi jo bo umakilweng fa godimo, bo bonwe molato.

en: The committee, therefore, concluded on the following: That both members are hereby suspended from the ANC for a period of five years with immediate effect.
tsn: Ka jalo. Komiti, e konoseditse mo go tse di latelang: Gore maloko a tlaa sekegiwa mo ANC dingwaga di le tlhano ka ponyo ya leitlho.

en: And that both the respondents must be removed from the lists of public representatives of the ANC.
tsn: Le gore ka bobedi ba tshwanetse go tlosiwa go tswa mo manaaneng a baemedi ba setšhaba a ANC.

en: Mahumapelo and Lenkopane had held a meeting in Mareetsane village in the Ratlou municipality near an event organised by the party’s Interim Provincial Committee.
tsn: Mahumapelo le Lenkopan ba ne ba tshwere kopano kwa Mareetsane mo mmasepaleng wa Ratlou gaufi le tiragalo e e rulagantsweng ke Komoiti ya Nakwana ya lekoko mo Porofenseng.

en: Matsemela says the disciplinary committee has further recommended that both Mahumapelo and Lenkopane, attend a political leadership programme.
tsn: Matsemela a re komiti ya dikgato-kgalemo e ne ya tshitshinya gore bobedi jo Mahumapelo le Lenkopane ba tsenela manaane a boeteledipele jwa sepolotiki.

en: Comrade Supra Mahumapelo (to) undergo a mentorship programme of political leadership under the former president of the ANC and the Republic of South Africa, Comrade Thabo Mbeki for a period of three years.
tsn: Khomoreiti Supra Mahumapelo o tlaa tsenela lenaneo la boeteledipele jwa sepolotiki ka fa tlase ga Moporesitente wa maloba wa ANC le Rephaboliki ya Aforikaborwa, Khomoreiti Thabo Mbeki mo dingwaga di le tharo.

en: Comrade Bitsa Lenkopane, be also placed under a mentorship programme under comrade veteran Barbra Masikela to assist her for a period of five years.
tsn: Khomoreiti Bitsa Lenkopane, o tlaa bewa ka fa tlase ga lenaneo la tataiso ka fa tlase ga Khomoreiti maitemogelo Barbra Masikela go mo thusa dingwaga di le tlhano.

en: Supra Mahumapelo suspended from ANC for 5 years.
tsn: Supra Mahumapelo o emisitswe go tswa go ANC ya dingwaga di le 5.

en: The African National Congress (ANC) did not do enough to fight corruption and state capture, according to party President Cyril Ramaphosa.
tsn: Lekokola lele busang la ANC ga le a dira go tlala seatla go lwantsha bogodu le bosenyi mo pusong, go ya ka Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa.

en: Ramaphosa made this acknowledgment at the State Capture Commission on Wednesday.
tsn: Ramaphosa o amogetse se kwa Khomišeneng ya Dipatlisiso tsa Bosenyi mo pusong ka Laboraro.

en: Questioned about the ANCs development and deployment policy, Ramaphosa defended it saying it is not unique to the party and could not be faulted in principle.
tsn: Dipotso mabapi le ANC ka ga tlhabololo le tiriso  ya pholisi Ramaphosa o dibetse se ka gore ga se tlholo ntšhwa mo lekokong e bile ga se phoso mo molawaneng.

en: The policy has been blamed for breeding conditions for state capture, promoting factionalism, and poor service delivery.
tsn: Pholisi e, e supiwa ka monwana go tlhola maemo a bosenyi mo pusong, go rotloetsa boitirelo le thebolelo e e bokoa ya ditirelo.

en: Cadre deployment cannot be faulted in principle.
tsn: Setlhopha sa tlhokomelo ya badiri se ka se supiwe ka monwana mo molawaneng.

en: It’s a common feature of democratic practice around the world and I think if properly described and not diluted through various other intents and forms, it is a useful process used by governing parties around the world to make sure that the mandate that they are given by the populace is carried out.
tsn: Go ponagalo e e tshwanang le ya temokerasi mo lefatsheng mme ke akanya gore fa go ka tlhalosiwa sentle le go lebelela matlhakore a mangwe a a farologaneng, ke thulaganyo e e mosola e e neng lekoko le le busang le e dirisa mo lefatsheng go netefatsa gore tiro e ba e filweng e a dirwa.

en: But we would concede that there are weaknesses in its practical implementation, that makes the case for greater clarity both within political parties and the state.
tsn: Mme re ka bo re dumetse gore go na le makoa mo go tsenngwa tirisong ga ona, go dira gore kgetse e senoge ka tlhamalalo mo makokong a sepolotiki le mo pusong.

en: On the issue of a number of appointments made to SOE boards by Former President Jacob Zuma, allegedly with the aim of capturing the state, Ramaphosa pleaded ignorance.
tsn: Mo ntlheng ya bathapiwa ba le mmalwa mo botong ya SOE Palo ke Moporesidente wa, maloba Jacob Zuma, e le ka maikaelelo a go senyetsa puso, Ramaphosa a itshela moriti o o tsididi.

en: He said it was possible to make appointments without going through the Deployment Committee as he himself as state president had done in error and some were made before he became party deputy president.
tsn: O rile go ne go kgonega go ka thapiwa kwa ntle ga go dirisa Komiti ya bothapi jaaka le ene e le  Moporesidente wa puso go ne ga dirwa phoso mme tse dingwe di ne di dirilwe pele a nna Motlatsa Mporesidente.

en: Ramaphosa will return to the stand on Thursday to continue his testimony.
tsn: Ramaphosa o tlaa boela kwa kgotleng ka Labone go tswelela ka bosupi jwa gagwe.

en: The policy has often come under fire for the poor levels of service delivery by the ANC government due to some officials being unqualified to perform their work, a situation that Ramaphosa does acknowledge as occurred in some instances.
tsn: Pholisi e setse e tlhaelela mo merusong tebang le thebolelo e e bokoa ya ditirelo tsa lekoko le le busang la ANC ka ntlha ya go retelelwa ga badiri go dira tiro ya bona, maemo a Ramaphosa a a amogelang jaaka nngwe ya mabaka a mangwe gareng ga a mangwe.

en: ANC Deployment Committee plays a recommendation and reactive role.
tsn: Komitoi ya Bothapi ya ANC e tshameka karolo e e kgolo mo go atlenegiseng le go tsereganya.

en: Earlier, Ramaphosa said he is not at the State Capture Commission to make excuses for the governing party or defend the indefensible.
tsn: Le gale, Ramaphosa o ne a re o ne a seo kwa Khomišeneng ya Dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi mo pusong go dira maipato a lekoko le le busang kgotsa go sireletsa ba ba sa tlhokeng tshireletso.

en: He has reiterated the ANC and governments support for the work of the Commission as part of strengthening the country’s democracy.
tsn: O gateletse fa tshegetso ya ANC le puso mo tirong ya Khomišene e le karolo ya go matlafatsa temokerasi mo nageng.

en: Nevertheless, the ANC maintains that this commission is a necessary part of the broader social effort of ending all forms of state capture and corruption, says Ramaphosa.
tsn: Le fa go ntse jalo, mokgatlho wa ANC o dumela gore Khomišine eno ke karolo e e botlhokwa ya dikakanyo tsa maiteko a go fedisa mefuta yotlhe ya bosenyi le bogodu mo pusong go bona le bobodu, ga bua Ramaphosa.

en: Ramaphosa says the party has for a long time recognised the risk presented by the lack of regulation with respect to political funding.
tsn: Ramaphosa a re lekoko le na le nako e e telele go lemoga mathata a a tlisiwang ke tlhokego ya taolo ya matlole a sepolotiki.

en: Ramaphosa says despite the risks, any successful multiparty democracy requires funding in order to meet the needs of the electorate.
tsn: Ramaphosa a re ntle le mathata, Katlego ya makokomantsi mo temokerasing e tlhoka thuso ya matlole go kgona go fitlhelela ditlhokego tsa ditlhopho.

en: He says parties need funding from their own members, from individuals and businesses.
tsn: A re makoko a tlhoka thuso ya matlole go tswa mo go bona, go tswa mo bathong le mo dikgwebong.

en: The ANC President says before the enactment of the Political Funding Act which came into effect on the 1st of April 2021, there were few restrictions on funding which the Act seeks to address.
tsn: Moporesidente wa ANC a re pele ga go tsenngwa tirisong ga Molawana wa tlamelo ka matlole a Sepolotiki e e tsentswe tirisong ka di 1 Moranang 2021, go ne go na le dikgwetlho di le mmalwa tsa matlole tse Molawana o o batlang go di rarabolola.

en: The lack of transparency with respect to political funding increases the potential for corruption and the exercise of improper influence on political activity and government processes.
tsn: Tlhaelo ya go direla dilo mo pepeneneng malebana le matlole a sepolotiki go oketsa ditšhono tsa bosenyi le phokedi ya ditiro tse di sa siamang mo sepolotiking le dithulaganyo tsa puso.

en: It wants to resolve this problem that the ANC resolved at its 54th conference that the ANC should champion the introduction of a comprehensive system of public funding of the representatives of political parties in the different spheres of government and civil society, he adds.
tsn: Go batla go rarabolola bothata jo bo tlhageletseng kwa khonferenseng ya dingwagakgolo tsa masomeamatlhano le bone gore ANC e tshwanetse go tsenya mekgwa e e mešwa ya tsamaiso ya matlole a setšhaba ya baemedi ba mekgatlho ya sepolotiki go ya ka mafapha a a farologaneng a puso le setšhaba.

en: Ramaphosa says the party did not do enough to fight corruption and state capture.
tsn: Ramaphosa a re lekoko ga le a dira go tlala seatla go lwantsha bosenyi mo pusong.

en: He has acknowledged that the party did not take much cognisance when the matter was first raised by Transport Minister Fikile Mbalula at a 2011 National Executive Committee (NEC) meeting.
tsn: O a amogelwa gore lekoko le le sa tsaya botennye thata fa kgetse e ne e le ya ntlha e e tlhagisitsweng ke Tona ya Dipalangwa Fikile Mbalula ka 2011 Komiti ya Khuduthamaga ya Bosetšhaba (NEC).

en: He says although there were subsequent interventions on the issue by then-Parliamentary Whip, the late Jackson Mthembu and then secretary-general Gwede Mantashe, these were inadequate.
tsn: A re le fa go ne go na le ditsereganyo tse di lebaneng Bapalamente, moswi Jackson Mthembu le Mokwaledi Kakaretso Gwede Mantashe, tse di ne di sa siama.

en: It had shortcomings in living up to the expectations of the people of South Africa in relation to enforcing accountability and engendering a culture of effective consequence management.
tsn: Go na le mathata ka go tshela go ditsholofelo tsa Batho ba Aforikaborwa mabapi le go gatelela maikarabelo le mo tsenya mo kotsing mowa wa tsamaiso e e nonofileng ya ntlha.

en: As the leadership of the ANC duly elected at the 54th Conference, we acknowledge these shortcomings as an organisation.
tsn: Jaaka boeteledipele jwa ANC jo bo tlhophilweng ka khonferense ya dingwagakgolo tsa masomeamatlhano le bone, re lemoga ditlhaelo tse jaaka mokgatlho.

en: African National Congress (ANC) president, Cyril Ramaphosa, has told the State Capture Commission of Inquiry that the ANC has, over the course of several years, recognised the existence of corruption within the state, its own ranks and other parts of society.
tsn: Moporesidente wa lekoko la Bosetšhaba ANC Cyril  Ramaphosa o ne a bolelela Khomišene ya Dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi mo pusong gore ya ANC, mo tsamaong ya dingwaga di le mmalwa, e ne ya lemoga fa bosenyi bo le teng mo pusong, mo makaleng a yona le dikarolo tse dingwe tsa setšhaba.

en: He added that the party could, and should, have done more to prevent the abuse of power and resources.
tsn: O gatisa ka gore lekoko le tshwanetse e bile le tshwanelwa ke go ka bo ba tiisitse seatla go thibela tiriso e e botlhaswa ya dithata le didiriswa.

en: Ramaphosa continues with his testimony at the commission on Wednesday afternoon.
tsn: Ramaphosa o tlaa tswelela ka go neela bosupi jwa gagwe kwa Khomišeneng ka Laboraro thapama.

en: In his opening statement to the State Capture Commission, Ramaphosa dealt with the risks of corruption attached to the lack of transparency in the donations and funding political parties receive.
tsn: Mo puong ya gagwe ya pulomadibogo, Ramaphosa o sugane le mathata a bosenyi a a amanang le tlhokego ya sa direleng dilo mo pepeneneng tebang le diketleetso le matlole a makoko a sepolotiki a a amogelang.

en: I said as President in the absence of clear appropriate and realistic guidelines, our leadership contests will continue to play themselves out in the shadows, in conditions of secrecy and mistrust encouraging patronage and factionalism.
tsn: Ke buile jaaka Moporesitente kwa ntle ga dikaelo tse di totang e bile e le tsa boammaaruri, boeteledipele bo dumela go tswelela go ikentsha mo go direleng dilo mo lefifing le mo sephiring le go tlhoka botshepegi mmogo le go rotloetsa tshegetso ya ditirego.

en: Ramaphosa says the issue of state capture has been a matter of great political contestation for several years within the governing party.
tsn: Ramaphosa o bua fa kgang ya bosenyi mo pusong e ntse e le pharela ya bothata jo bogolo mo polotiking dingwaga di le mmalwa mo lekoko le le busang.

en: Ramaphosa’s much anticipated two-part appearance is due to focus on among others his tenure as party Deputy President, as well as his role as the chairperson of the ANC Cadre Deployment Committee.
tsn: Ramaphosa o solofetswe go tlhagisa dikarolo tse pedi gareng gat se dingwe jaaka a kile a nna Motlatsa Moporesitente, gammogo le tiro ya gagwe jaaka modulasetulo wa Komiti ya Setlhopha Bothapi mo ANC.

en: Ramaphosa says the party has taken a number of resolutions to prevent corruption.
tsn: Ramaphosa a re lekoko le latela ditshwetso di le mmalwa go thibela bonweenwee.

en: The ANC has, over the course of several years, recognised the existence of corruption within the state, its own ranks and other parts of society.
tsn: ANC e, mo tsamaong ya dingwaga di le mmalwa, e lemogile go nna teng ga bobodu mo pusong, mo maemong a a farologaneng le dikarolo tse dingwe tsa setšhaba.

en: It has taken a number of resolutions on measures to prevent corruption, including on issues relating to state capture.
tsn: Go tsere ditshwetso di le mmalwa go leka go thibela bonwenwee, go akaretsa le mathata a a amanang le bosenyi mo pusong.

en: We must acknowledge that the issue of state capture has been a matter of great political contestation within the ANC’s differences over whether state capture existed, its extent and form and what should be done about it, adds the President.
tsn: Re tshwanetse go dumela gore ntlha e ya bosenyi mo pusong e sa le e nna pharela ya bothata jo bogolo mo poletiking mo gare ga diharologano tsa ANC go bona gore a bosenyi mo pusong bo teng, bo anama le se se tshwanetseng go dirwa ka ga bona, go gatisa Moporesidente.

en: African National Congress (ANC) President Cyril Ramaphosa says he is not at the State Capture Commission to make excuses for the governing party or defend the indefensible.
tsn: Moresidente Cyril Ramaphosa a re o ne a se teng kwa Khomišeneng ya Dipatlisiso tsa Bosenyi go dira maipato a lekoko le le busang kgotsa go sireletsa ba ba sa tlhokeng tshireletso.

en: The ANC President has begun testifying before the Commission of Inquiry into State Capture.
tsn: Moporesidente wa ANC o simolotse go neelana ka bosupi kwa Khomišeneng ya Dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi mo pusong.

en: Ramaphosa’s much anticipated two-part appearance before the Commission is expected to focus on among others his tenure as party deputy president, including his role as the chairperson of the ANC Cadre Deployment Committee.
tsn: Ramaphosa o solofetswe go tlhagelela fa pele ga Khomišene. Tlhagelelo e,e solofetswe go tlhoma mogopolo mo magareng ga tse dingwe, tiro ya gagwe jaaka Motlatsa Poresidente, go akaretsa tiro ya gagwe jaaka modulasetulo wa Komiti ya Setlhopha sa tiriso ya ANC.

en: Commission Chairperson, Deputy Chief Justice Raymond Zondo, has thanked Ramaphosa for agreeing to testify in Wednesday’s proceedings.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa Khomišene, Motlatsa Moatlhodimogolo Raymond Zondo, o ne a leboga Ramaphosa go dumela go neelana ka bosupi ka Laboraro.

en: Mr President, we are happy that you are here, representing the ruling party.
tsn: Rre Moporesidente, re itumelela gore o fano, o emeletse lekoko le le busang.

en: We are happy that the President of the party is the one who comes to give evidence to the commission.
tsn: Re itumelela gore Moporesitente wa lekoko le le busang ke ena a tlileng go neelana ka bosupi kwa  Khomišeneng.

en: I also want to say that your appearance before this commission is not a result of a decision taken recently, it is a decision that was taken in 2018 as you will remember, says Zondo.
tsn: Gape ke batla go gatisa gore go tlhagelela fa Khomišeneng eno ga se ntlha ya tshwetso e e tserweng e se kgale, ke tshwetso e e tserweng ka 2018 jaaka o tla gakologelwa, ga bua jalo Zondo.

en: Ramaphosa has reiterated the ANC and governments support for the work of the Commission as part of strengthening the country’s democracy.
tsn: Ramaphosa o gatisitse fa tsegetso ya ANC le puso mo tirong ya Khomišene ke karolo ya go matlafatsa temokerasi ya naga.

en: Change of dates for Ramaphosa’s May appearance.
tsn: Go fetolwa ga matlha a go tlhagelela ga ga Ramaphosa ka Motsheganong.

en: Meanwhile, Judge Zondo says Ramaphosass office will be advised on the change of dates in May for the President to appear before the commission.
tsn: Re sa ntse re le foo, Moatlhodi Zondo a re kantoro ya ga Ramaphosa e tla longwa tsebe mabapi le phetogo ya matlha ka Motsheganong gore Moresidente a tlhagelele kwa Khomišeneng.

en: Ramaphosa was due to appear before the commission on the 13th and 14th of May to provide evidence as the President of the country and the Deputy President during the Jacob Zuma administration.
tsn: Ramaphosa o ne a beetswe go tlhagelela kwa Khomišeneng ka di 13 le di 14 tsa Motsheganong go neelana ka bosupi jaaka Moresidente wa naga le Motlatsa Moporesitente Jacob Zuma ka nako ya tsamaiso ya gagwe.

en: Mr President, currently you are due to return to the commission wearing your cap as President of the country in mid-May.
tsn: Rre Moporesidente, gajaana o tlile go tlhagelela kwa khomišeneng jaaka Moporesidente wa naga Motsheganong a le mo gare.

en: But I indicated that we will have to advise your office that those dates will have to be moved towards later in May.
tsn: Mme ke tlhalositse gore re tshwanetse go gakolola kantoro ya gago gore matlha ao a tlaa tshwanelwa ke go atolosiwa Motsheganong a ya fifing.

en: Because there are still a number of witnesses that the commission would still like to hear [from], adds Zondo.
tsn: Ka ntlha ya gore go santse go na le bapaki ba le mmalwa ba Khomišene e ratang go utlwa go tswa mo gho bona, Zondo o gatisa ntlha e.

en: The Commission of Inquiry into State Capture is to hear evidence from the President of the ANC Cyril Ramaphosa.
tsn: Khomišene ya Dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi mo pusong e solofetse go reetsa bosupi go tswa kwa go Moporesidente wa ANC Cyril Ramaphosa.

en: The Democratic Alliance (DA) has outlined their expectations ahead of President Cyril Ramaphosa’s appearance at the Commission of Inquiry into allegations of State Capture on Wednesday, saying they want the African National Congress (ANCs) Cadre Deployment Policy to be addressed.
tsn: Lekoko la DA le thadisitse ditsholofelo go Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa jaaka a tlhagelela kwa Khomišene ya Dipatlisiso ka ditatofatso tsa bosenyi mo pusong ka Laboraro, ba re ba batla gore Lekoko la Bosetšhaba la ANC le akgele ka ga Pholisi ya Setlhopha sa Bothapi.

en: DA leader John Steenhuisen says he will be attending this morning’s sitting of the commission to watch President Ramaphosa’s testimony.
tsn: Moeteledipele wa DA John Steenhuisen a re o tla bo a le teng mo mosong wa kopano ya Khomišene go lebelela Moporesitente Ramaphosa ’a neela bosupi.

en: Steenhuisen says the policy has allowed for state capture to continue for several years.
tsn: Steenhuisen a re pholisi e letlelela bosenyi mo pusong  go tswelela dingwaga di le mmalwa.

en: We would like to get to the bottom of the cadre deployment policy.
tsn: Re rata go lebelela pholisi ya setlhopha sa bothapi ka leitlho le le ntšhotšho.

en: It has hollowed out the state and opened the door for state capture to take place in South Africa.
tsn: O gwaile naga le go bula kgoro ya bosenyi mo pusong go tsayakarolo mo Aforikaborwa.

en: A large part of the problem that we sit with is massive failures such as Eskom, SAA, Denel. Virtually every other SOE in the country is as a result of that policy.
tsn: Karolo e e kgolo ya bothata jo re bolebeletseng fela ke go retelelwa ga Eskom, SAA, Denel. Se se raya gore dikgwetlho tse naga e lebaneng le tsona ke ditiro tsa pholisi eo.

en: Meanwhile, the ANC has reiterated its support for the State Capture Commission ahead of President Ramaphosa’s appearance.
tsn: Re sa ntse re le foo, mokgatlho wa ANC o gateletse tebang le tshegetso ya ona mo Khomišene ya Dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi mo pusong ka ga go tlhagelela ga Moporesitente Ramaphosa.

en: ANC President Cyril Ramaphosa will finally appear before the State Capture Commission later this morning.
tsn: Moporesidente wa ANC Cyril Ramaphosa o tlaa tlhagelela kwa Khomišeneng Dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi mo pusong mo mosong.

en: Ramaphosa’s appearance before commission Chairperson Deputy Chief Justice Raymond Zondo will be in two-parts.
tsn: Go tlhagelela ga ga Ramaphosa kwa Khomišeneng, Motlatsa Moatlhodimogolo Raymond Zondo o tla nna maphatha mabedi.

en: For the next two days, he will testify as the leader of the governing party and next month, will give evidence as the president of the country and the deputy president during the Jacob Zuma administration.
tsn: Mo malatsing a le mabedi a a latelang, o tlaa naya bosupi jaaka moeteledipele wa lekoko le le busang le mo kgweding e e tlang, o tla neela bosupi jaaka Poresidente wa naga le Motlatsa Moporesitente Jacob Zuma ka nako ya tsamaiso ya gagwe.

en: As ANC president, today and tomorrow, Ramaphosa will among others testify on what happened during his tenure as party deputy president, especially on his role as the Chairperson of the ANC Cadre Deployment Committee between 2013 and 2016.
tsn: Jaaka Moporesidente wa ANC, gompieno le ka moso, Ramaphosa o gareng ga ba bangwe o tlaa neela bosupi mabapi le se se diragetseng ka nako ya fa e ne e le Motlatsa Moporesidente, segolobogolo ka ga seabe sa gagwe jaaka modulasetulo wa Komiti ya Setlhopha sa Bothapi sa ANC magareng ga 2013 le 2016.

en: The committee was responsible for, among others, the selection of public representatives, some of whom are said to be at the centre of the state capture.
tsn: E ne e le maikarabelo a komiti go, gareng ga tse dingwe, go tlhopha baemedi ba setšhaba, bangwe ba bona e le ba go kaiwang ba ka nna mo gare ga ditiragalo tsa bosenyi mo pusong.

en: Lobby group, Afriforum had since applied to question Ramaphosa on his role as the chair of the committee.
tsn: Setlhopha sa bangoki, Afriforum se sa le se kopile go botsa Ramaphosa ka ga seabe sa gagwe jaaka modulasetulo wa komiti.

en: And after passing this hurdle, next month President Ramaphosa will face another gruelling cross examination on his role as the country’s second in command.
tsn: Mme morago ga go feta kgwetlho e, mo kgweding e e latelang Ramaphosa o tlile go lebagana le e nngwe e e boima thata ya dipotsolotso mabapi le seabe sa gagwe jaaka moemedi wa bobedi wa taelo.

en: As former deputy president and now president of the country, Ramaphosa will, among others, try to rebut Brian Molefe’s testimony that he had been involved in state capture and the peddling of political influence for personal benefit.
tsn: Jaaka Motlatsamoporesitente wa maloba e bile jaaka Moporesidente wa naga Ramaphosa o tlaa, gareng ga tse ba bangwe, o leka go ganetsa bosupi jwa ga Brian Molefe jwa gore o nnile le seabe mo bosenying le go gweba ka tlhotlheletso ya sepolotiki go oketsa dikgetse tsa gagwe ka matlapa.

en: Molefe said Ramaphosa used his position as the country’s deputy president to protect and secure lucrative coal deals for mining giant Glencore after it gave him a stake and appointed him chairperson.
tsn: Molefe o rile Ramaphosa o dirisa maemo a gagwe jaaka motlatsamoporesidente go sireletsa le go babalela poelo e kgolo ya meepo ya malatlha a Glencore morago yam o modulasetulo.

en: He also said Ramaphosa and Public Enterprises Minister Pravin Gordhan brought back loadshedding at Eskom when they took over in 2018, saying they forced out skilled executives as part of a ploy to collapse the power utility and pave the way for its privatisation.
tsn: O rile gape Ramaphosa le Tonakgolo ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba, Pravin Gordhan ba gakaditse go kgaoga ga motlakase kwa Eskom fa ba ne ba tsaya marapho ka 2018, ba ntshitse bakhuduthamaga ba ba nang le bokgoni jaaka leano la go ya ka karolo ya leano la go phutlhamisa maatla a motlakase le go tlhagolela ditheo tse di ikemetseng tsela.

en: Meanwhile, the ANC has reiterated its support for the State Capture Commission ahead of President Cyril Ramaphosa’s appearance before the commission on Wednesday and Thursday.
tsn: Re sa ntse re le foo, mokgatlho wa ANC o gateletse tshegetso ya yona mo Khomišeneng ya Dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi ka go tlhagelela ga Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa kwa Khomišene ka Laboraro le Labone.

en: ANC National Executive Committee member, Nomvula Mokonyane, says the ANC President knows what he is expected to respond to and will be able to put things into perspective.
tsn: Tokololo ya komiti ya khuduthamaga ya bosetšhaba ya ANC, Nomvula Mokonyane, a re Moporesidente wa ANC o itse se a solofetsweng go se arabela le go baya dilo mo pepeneneng ka mokgwa o o tlhaloganyesegang.

en: The ANC has reiterated its support for the State Capture Commission ahead of President Cyril Ramaphosa’s appearance before the commission on Wednesday.
tsn: ANC e gateletse tshegetso ya yona yakhomišhene ya kgapo-puso pele ga gore moporesitente Cyri7l Ramaphosa a tlhagelele fa pele ga khomišhene ka Laboraro

en: Ramaphosa, who will testify in his capacity as ANC president, is expected to be questioned about his tenure as deputy president of the ANC and the country.
tsn: Ramaphosa yo a tlileng go neela bosupi mo tirong ya gagwe jaaka Moporesidente wa ANC, o solofelwa go botsolotswa ka ga seabe sa gagwe jaaka Motlatsa Moporesidente wa ANC le naga.

en: He is also expected to tell the commission what he knows about the alleged state capture said to have taken place during the Zuma administration.
tsn: Gape o tshwanetse go bolelela Khomišene ka se a se a se itseng ka ga ditatofatso tsa bosenyi mo pusong e e tlhageletseng ka nako ya puso ya ga Zuma.

en: ANC National Executive Committee member, Nomvula Mokonyane, expresses confidence in the leader of the governing party.
tsn: Tokololo ya komiti ya khuduthamaga ya bosetšhaba ya ANC, Nomvula Mokonyane, o tlhalosa ka matsetseleko mo moeteledipeleng wa lekoko le le busang.

en: Mokonyane also touched on the party’s step aside resolution, describing it as a sensitive issue.
tsn: Mokonyane le ena o amile tshwetso ya lekoko ya go sekega maloko, o e tlhalosa e le kgang e e masisi.

en: The resolution stipulates that ANC members who are charged with serious crimes including corruption should step aside until their court cases are finalised.
tsn: Tshwetso e e kaya gore maloko a ANC a a latofadiwang ka bonokwane go akaretswa le bosenyi ba tshwanetse go sekegwa go fitlha kgotlatshekelo e e konosetsa dikgetse tsa bona.

en: Party Secretary-General Ace Magashule is among those expected to step aside by the end of the month.
tsn: Mokwaledikakaretso Ace Magashule ke mongwe wa ba ba lebanweng ke go sekegwa mafelo a kgwedi.

en: Anything that seeks to divide the ANC needs careful management and what is of importance is for us in the leadership of the ANC to reflect on how we manage the implementation of resolutions.
tsn: Sengwe le sengwe se se batlang go aroganya ANC se tshwanetse go tsamaisiwa ka kelotlhoko mme se se botlhokwa mo go rona jaaka baeteledipele ba ANC ke go akanya gore re ya go tsenya jang ditshwetso mo tirisong.

en: This is not the only resolution, there are many other resolutions that we to give our all in dealing with them, says Mokonyane.
tsn: Ga se tharabololo eno fela, go na le tse dingwe tse dintsi tse ba ka di pharang ka tsona go sugana le bona, ga bua Mokonyane.

en: Various ANC stakeholders have asked the party’s NEC to rethink the resolution, with some saying it should be suspended until at least the next ANC national conference or general council.
tsn: Ba beeletsi ba ANC ba ba farologaneng ba kopile Komiti ya Bosetšhaba ya dikgato-kgalemo go lebelela sešwa tshwetso e mabarebare ba reng o tshwanetse go sekegiwa go fitlhelela ka khonferenseng ya Bosetšhaba le Khansele ya kakaretso e e latelang.

en: ANC Women’s League says the Step Aside resolution will further fracture the party:
tsn: Mokgatlho wa Basadi wa ANC wa re tshwetso ya go sekegiwa ga maloko e tlile go etegetsa go thubega ga lekoko.

en: Gauteng ANC Deputy Chairperson and Education MEC, Panyaza Lesufi, has apologised on behalf of the governing party for how it has treated ANC MP, Jacqui Mofokeng.
tsn: Motlatsa-Modulasetulo wa ANC le Tonakgolo ya tsa Thuto mo Gauteng, Panyaza Lesufi, o kopile go inelwa matsogo metsing boemong jwa lekoko le le busang ya ka tsela e ba neng ba tshola Jacqui Mofokeng ka teng.

en: Lesufi says Mofokeng was overlooked by the organisation she served and loved.
tsn: Lesufi a re Mofokeng o ne a ikgatholoswa ke mokgatlho o a o diretseng e bile a o rata.

en: He was speaking at Mofokeng and her daughter Thato’s funeral service in Centurion, south of Pretoria.
tsn: O ne a bua kwa tirelo phitlhong ya ga Mofokeng le morwadie Thato kwa Centurion, borwa jwa Pitori.

en: The former Gauteng MPL passed away at her home last Thursday, a day after her daughter succumbed to COVID-19.
tsn: Mofokoeng o tlhokafaletse kwa ga gagwe Labone o o fetileng, letsatsi morago ga morwadie a sena go tlhaselwa ke Covid-19.

en: Relatives say Mofokeng had recuperated and couldn’t handle the passing of her only child.
tsn: Balosika ba re Mofokeng o ne a fodile mme o ne a seke a kgona go itshokela go tlhokafala ga ngwana wa gagwe wa bofelo.

en: Lesufi described her as an exceptional worker, who got little recognition.
tsn: Lesufi o mo tlhalosa jaaka modiri yo o kgethegileng, yo o a sa tlotlomadiwang.

en: Comrade Jacqui loved this movement but I must declare that this movement also hurt comrade Jacqui.
tsn: Khomoreiti Jacqui o ne a rata mokgatlho o mme ke tshwanetse ke tlhomamisa gore mokgatlho o ga wa tsaya Khomoreiti Jacqui sentle.

en: Her choice to leave the province to go to Cape Town was not an easy choice.
tsn: Tshwetso ya gagwe ya go tswa mo porofenseng go ya kwa Kapa e ne e le tshwetso e e seng bonolo.

en: To her was it was a healing process and to get out of the poisonous situation that continued to undermine her, says the ANC Deputy Gauteng Chairperson.
tsn: Go ya ka ena e ne e le tsela ya go ikhutsa le go tswa mo maemong a a kotsi a a neng a tsweletse go mo nyatsa, ga bua jalo Motlatsamodulasetulo wa Mokgatlho wa ANC kwa Gauteng.

en: Jacqui Mofokeng and daughter laid to rest
tsn: Jacqui Mofokeng le morwadie ba robetse boroko jwa leruri.

en: Mofokeng was also described as a strong advocate for the protection of women and children as well as other vulnerable groups.
tsn: Mofokeng o ne a tlhalosiwa jaaka mmueledi wa segatlhamelamasisi wa tshireletso ya bana le basadi gammogo le makala a mangwe.

en: In Parliament, in a short time she’s been there we’re going to miss her because she was in three committees and she was felt in those three committees.
tsn: Mo Palamenteng, ka nako e e khutshwane nnile teng re tlile go mo tlhologelelwa ka gonne o ne a le mo Dikomiting tse tharo e bile o ne a itsege mo dikomiting tse tharo tseo.

en: Newcomer as she was there of course nobody in police matter would beat Jacqui because she started long time ago.
tsn: Ga go ope yo a neng a ka gaisa Jacqui mo go tsa sepodisi ka ntlha ya fa e sa le a simolotse bogologolo.

en: So really, we’ve lost a woman, a woman we thought was still looking forward to some years helping push Parliament where it can be, said the Speaker of Parliament, Thandi Modise.
tsn: Oriana, re latlhegetswe ke mosadi, mosadi yo re neng re nagana gore re santse re tlaa ithuta mo go ena dingwaga tse dingwe go thusa Palamente, ga bua le Sebui sa Palamente, Thandi Modise.

en: Her family described her as their pillar of strength and a lover of finer things.
tsn: Ba lelapa la gagwe ba mo tlhalosa jaaka pilara ya bone e e molemo thata e bile a rata dilo tse di bonolo.

en: It’s a double take, her and her daughter at the same time and we accept our fate that it’s a COVID environment and were of those who mourn in our country for this carnage, which I hope will stop very soon.
tsn: E maphatha mabedi, ena le morwadie ka nako e le nngwe mme re amogela tlholelo ya rona gore ke tikologo e e dikaganetsweng ke COVID le gore e ne e le bangwe ba ba hutsafetseng mo nageng ya rona ka ntlha ya maso, a ke dumelang gore a tlile go ema mo nakong e e sa fediseng pelo.

en: She was a snappy dresser. She had a bright mind and all her life she’s been fighting gender oppression, family representative, Justice Dikgang Mosekene, said.
tsn: O ne a apara bontle. O ne e le podimatseba e bile mo botshelong jwa gagwe o ntse a lwantsha dikgatelelo tsa bong, lelapa, Moatlhodi Dikgang Mosekene, a rialo.

en: Mofokeng has been laid to rest at the Lyttleton cemetery.
tsn: Mofokeng o robaditswe kwa mabitleng a Lyttleton cemetery.

en: She’s survived by her mother, a brother and sister.
tsn: O tlogela mmaagwe, morwarraagwe le kgaitsadie.

en: Her daughters remains will be cremated on Wednesday.
tsn: Setopo sa ngwana wa gagwe wa mosetsana se tlile  go fisiwa ka Laboraro.

en: Former Mineral Resources Minister, Mosebenzi Zwane has admitted to the State Capture Commission that he appointed two advisers without any knowledge of what they were doing for a living.
tsn: Tona ya maloba ya Diminerale, Mosebenzi Zwane o amogetse kwa Khomišeneng ya Dipatlisiso tsa bosenui mo pusong gore o thapile bagakolodi ba le babedi ntle le kitso ya gore ba ntse ba itshedisa ka eng mo botshelong.

en: He told the commission that Malcolm Mabaso and Kueban Moodley were appointed as his advisers because he could trust them.
tsn: O boleletse Khomišene gore Malcolm Mabaso le Kueban Moodley ba thapilwe jaaka bagakolodi ba gagwe ka gore o ka ba tshepa.

en: Both Mabaso and Moodley were in business with one of the Gupta brother’s business associates, Salim Essa but Zwane insists that he wasn’t aware of their business interests.
tsn: Bobedi jo, Mabaso le Moodley ba ne ba le mo kgwebong le mongwe wa barwa Gupta, Salim Essa mme Zwane o gatisa fa a ne a sa lemoge ka ga kgwebo ya bona.

en: He told the commission that Mabaso was appointed due to his good grasp of legal matters despite not having a legal qualification.
tsn: O boleletse Khomišene gore Mabaso o thapilwe ka ntlha ya kitso ya gagwe mabapi le tse di amanang le molao ntle le thuto ya semolao.

en: Asked what kind of business Mabaso was doing, Zwane responded I think he had done communications, but I can’t remember his proper qualifications.
tsn: O botsitswe gore ke mofuta ofe wa kgwebo e   Mabaso a e dirang, Zwane o fetotse ka gore “ke akanya fa Mabaso a dirile dithuto tsa tlhaeletsano, mme ga ke gopole dithuto tsa gagwe sentle.

en: Zwane has told the State Capture Commission that he had to use the Gupta’s private plane while on an official trip from Switzerland to India because he was sick.
tsn: Zwane o boleletse Khomišene ya Dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi mo pusong gore o ne a tshwanetse go dirisa sefofane sa poraefete sa boGupta mo loetong la semmuso go tswa kwa Switzerland go ya India Ka gonne o ne a lwala.

en: Zwane travelled to India to meet investors despite losing his voice, while on a trip to Switzerland.
tsn: Zwane o tsere loeto go ya kwa India go kopana le babeeletsi kwa ntle ga go latlhegelwa ke lentswe, fa a ne a le mo loetong go ya kwa Switzerland.

en: Deputy Chief Justice Raymond Zondo asked Zwane why he couldn’t cancel his trip if he was sick.
tsn: Motlatsa Moatlhodimogolo Raymond Zondo o botsitse Zwane gore ke eng a ne a sa ikgatolose loeto lwa gagwe fa e le gore o ne a lwala.

en: I didn’t cancel the trip despite not feeling well because it was an issue that will go away tomorrow (sic).
tsn: Ga ke a ikgatolosa loeto ka ntlha ya go ritlanyana gonne e ne e le lebaka le le ka se ikgatolosiweng.

en: EFF leader, Julius Malema, has encouraged all South Africans to fight for the land in order to work it and produce food for the nation.
tsn: Moeteledipele wa EFF Julius Malema, o rotloeditse Maaforikaborwa go lwela lefatshe go kgontsha tiro le go roba dijo tsa setšhaba.

en: Malema was addressing party members at Freedom Day celebrations in Atteridgeville west of Pretoria.
tsn: Malema o ne a bua a ka letsatsi la kgololosego kwa Atteridgeville kwa Bophirima jwa Pitori.

en: He says if freedom is anything to be celebrated, it must mean that all citizens have access to the land.
tsn: A re fa e le gore kgololosego ke nngwe ya tse di tshwanetseng go ketekwa, e kaya gore baagi botlhe ba na le tetla ya lefatshe.

en: He says its uncalled for that 90%of the land is still in the hands of the minority groups in South Africa.
tsn: A re ke matlhabisaditlhong gore diperesente di le masomearobongwe tsa lefatshe di santse di le mo diatleng tsa Basweu mo Aforikaborwa.

en: Yet we are called upon to celebrate Freedom Day landlessness, without food, he added.
tsn: Gajaana re gwetlhiwa go keteka Letsatsi la Kgololosego re sena lefatshe, mo tlalengdijo, a tlaleletsa.

en: Advocate Tembeka Ngcukaitobi talks about land injustice .
tsn: Mmueledi Tembeka Ngcukaitobi o bua ka ga go tlhoka toka mo lefatsheng.

en: On the upcoming election, the EFF leader says while the party is ready, it will take a lot of effort and determination for his party to make it to the top during the upcoming local government elections because of the coronavirus pandemic.
tsn: Mo ditlhophong tse di latelang, moeteledipele wa EFF a re ka lekoko le setse le eme sentle, go tlaa tsaya nako le maikemisetso go ya kwa setlhoeng ka ditlhopho tsa dipusoselegae tse di tlang ka ntlha ya leroborobo la twatsi ya Khorona.

en: Government announced last week that the elections will be taking place on October 27.
tsn: Puso e itsisitse mo bekeng e e fetileng gore ditlhopho di tlaa nna teng ka kgwedi ya Diphalane a tlhola malatsi a le someamabedi le bosupa.

en: Malema had called for the elections to be postponed until 2024, saying that holding the elections this year would deprive opposition parties from campaigning freely and fairly.
tsn: Malema o tshitshintse gore ditlhopho di busediwe kwa morago go fitlha ka ngwaga wa 2024, o kaya fa ditlhopho tsa ngwaga o di tlile go kgoreletsa makokokganetso go tswa letsholo la bontlhopheng sentle le ka tlhamalalo.

en: When we say let’s postpone the elections, we want to see the behaviour of the pandemic, because elections are rallies; elections are door to door.
tsn: Fa re bua ka katoloso ya ditlhopho, re batla go bona mokgwa wa leroborobo, ka gonne ditlhopho ke kopano; ditlhopho ke kotikoti mo malapeng.

en: How can you do elections without door to door?
tsn: O ka dira ditlhopho jang kwa ntle ga go tsena mo malapeng?

en: President Cyril Ramaphosa has reminded South Africans that participating in Local Government Elections will give them an opportunity to get rid of corrupt leaders.
tsn: Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa o gakolotse Maaforikaborwa gore go tsaya karolo mo ditlhopong tsa pusoselegae go tlaa ba naya tšhono ya go tlosa baeteledipele ba dinokwane.

en: He was delivering the keynote address in Botshabelo in the Free State to celebrate Freedom Day.
tsn: O ne a neelana ka puokgolo kwa Botshabelo mo Foreisetata go keteka Letsatsi la Kgololosego.

en: Tuesday marks 27 years since the first democratic elections in South Africa on 27 April 1994.
tsn: Labobedi ke letshwao la dingwaga di le 27 e sale ditlhopho tsa ntlha tsa temokerasi mo Aforikaborwa ka di 27 Moranang 1994.

en: Ramaphosa also says the country’s leaders must use the day to reflect on the missteps that have been taken place over the last 27 years.
tsn: Ramaphosa a re baeteledipele ba naga ba tshwanetse go dirisa letsatsi le go lebelela diphoso tse di dirilweng mo dingwageng di le someamabedi le bosupa tse di fetileng.

en: He says the leaders must understand that the dream of 1994 is yet to be fulfilled.
tsn: A re baeteledipele ba tshwanetse go tlhaloganya gore ponelopele ya 1994 e santse e tshwanetse go diragadiwa.

en: It cannot be after 27 years of our democracy; our people are still being deprived of even the most basic services such as water and sanitation because of poor planning and incompetence of some of us.
tsn: E ka se nne morago ga dingwaga di le 27 tsa temokerasi ya rona; Batho ba rona ba santse ba sokola fela ka ditirelo tsa motheo jaaka metsi le kgeleloleswe e e bokoa ka ntlha ya thulaganyo le bokgoni mo tirong ya rona.

en: Due to mismanagement or corruption of some of us, it cannot be that access to housing, education and decent health care are being undermined because those tasked with service delivery do not care enough.
tsn: Ka ntlha ya tsamaiso e e sokameng kgotsa bosenyi mo bangweng ba rona, go ka sekgonege gore phitlhelelo ya matlo, thuto le boitekanelo di nyefolwe ka gonne ba ba neilweng tiro ya thebolelo ya ditirelo ga ba dire go tlala seatla.

en: The President says the fact that the dream of 1994 has not yet been fulfilled and has led to frustrations among South Africans.
tsn: Moporesidente a re baeteledipele ba tshwanetse go tlhaloganya gore ponelopele ya 1994 e santse e ise e diragadiwe e bile e tlisitse ketsaetsego mo Maaforikaborweng.

en: When we resort to violent demonstrations when we resort to burning, looting and the destruction of property; we are undermining the very cause that we seek to advance.
tsn: Fa re fetogela go dira ditshupetso le tirisodikgoka fa re le mo mathateng, go utswa le tshenyo ya dithoto; re busetsa morago se re eletsang go se tokafatsa.

en: We are also undermining the democracy that our Constitution offers to us.
tsn: Re nyatsa tetla e re e reboletsweng ke Molaotheo wa rona wa temokerasi.

en: Ramaphosa has promised to visit the troubled Winburg in the Free State after the 2021 Freedom Day commemoration was moved from Winburg to Botshabelo.
tsn: Ramaphosa o solofeditse go etela kwa Winburg mo Foreisetata morago ga segopotso sa letsatsi la Kgololosego la 2021 le sena go tlosiwa kwa Winburg go ya Botshabelo.

en: He says the change of plans was for logistical reasons.
tsn: A re go fetola maano a e ne e le gore mabaka a dikarabo.

en: Ramaphosa has committed to visit the area this year to listen to the concerns of the community members.
tsn: Ramaphosa...... e ineetse go etela kgaolo e ya ngwaga o go reetsa matshwenyego a maloko a baagi.

en: As the country commemorates Freedom Day, KwaZulu-Natal Premier Sihle Zikalala has paid tribute to the late struggle icon, Charlotte Maxeke and the first ANC President John Langalibalele Dube.
tsn: Jaaka naga e ikgopotsa Letsatsi la Kgololosego, Tonakgolo ya KwaZulu-Natal Sihle Zikalala o neetse tlotla go mogaka, Charlotte Maxeke le Moporesidente wa ntlha wa ANC John Langalibalele Dube.

en: Zikalala was speaking in Ohlange north of Durban.
tsn: Zikalala o ne a bua kwa Ohlange Bokone jwa Durban.

en: He laid a wreath on the grave of Dube along with the Dube family.
tsn: O beile dikgare mo lebitleng la ga Dube ga mmogo le ba lelapa la ga Dube.

en: He says the two leaders have paved the way for today’s generation to enjoy freedom.
tsn: A re bobedi jo bo tlhagotse tsela e tshika ya gompieno e tlaa itumelelang kgololosego.

en: We came here because this year marks 150 years since the birth of Mme Charlote Maxeke, but it is 150 years since the birth of Baba John Langalibalele Dube.
tsn: Re tlile kwano ka gonne ngwaga o ke wa dingwaga di le lekgolo le masomeamatlhano go tloga ka botsalo jwa ga Mme Charlote Maxeke fela ke dingwaga di le lekgolo le masomeamatlhano go tloga ka botsalo jwa ga Rre John Langalibalele Dube.

en: To us, he is one of those who are the symbol of freedom, he is one of those who are the path finders of our liberation struggle.
tsn: Mo go rona, ke mongwe wa sesupo sa kgololosego, ke mongwe wa ba ba tlhagotseng tsela ya rona ya kgololosego.

en: We are here today knowing quite well that South Africa has attained and achieved a lot under the democratic dispensation.
tsn: Re fa gompieno ka go itse sentle gore Aforikaborwa e dirile le go fitlhelela go le gontsi ka fa tlase ga puso ya temokerasi.

en: Contrary to many things that are said, we are living in a South Africa that enjoys equality and that would not have happened before 1994.
tsn: Go dilo di le dintsi tse di re buileng, re tshela mo nageng e e itumelelang tekatekano e bile seo se ne se ka se diragale pele ga 1994.

en: EFF leader Julius Malema has encouraged all South Africans to fight for the land in order to work it and produce food for the nation.
tsn: Moeteledipele wa EFF Julius Malema o rotloeditse Maaforikaborwa otlhe go lwela lefatshe re ba kgone go dira mo go lona le go ntshetsa setšhaba dijo.

en: Malema is at Atteridgeville in Pretoria, commemorating Freedom Day along with thousands of EFF supporters at the Capital city.
tsn: Malema o kwa atteridgeville kwa Pitori, o keteka Letsatsi la Kgololosego le diketekete tsa balatedi ba EFF mo toropokgolong.

en: He says its uncalled for that 90% of the land is still in the hands of the minority groups in South Africa.
tsn: A re, ga go a siama gore 90% ya lefatshe e be e sa ntse e le mo diatleng tsa ditlhopha tsa palonnye mo Aforikaborwa.

en: The African National Congress (ANC)
tsn: Lekoko la Bosetšhaba le le busang (ANC)

en: Youth League in Limpopo has weighed in on the party’s step aside resolution.
tsn: Mokgatlho wa Bašwa kwa Limpopo o lebelela ka leitlho le le ntšhotšho tshwetso ya lekoko ya go sekegiwa ga maloko.

en: It has called on the ANC National Executive Committee to reconsider the decision, saying it will deepen divisions in the party.
tsn: Go akgetswe fa Komiti ya Khuduthamaga ya Bosetšhaba ya ANC go sekaseka gape tshwetso e, ka gore e tlaa thuba lekoko ka bogare

en: The resolution stipulates that ANC members who are charged with serious crimes, including corruption, should step aside until their court cases are finalised.
tsn: Tshwetso e e kaya gore maloko a ANC a a bonwang molato ka bosenyi jo bo masisi, go akaretsa le bonweenwee, ba tshwanetse go sekegiwa go fitlha go konosediwa dikgetse tsa bona kwa kgotlatshekelo.

en: ANC NEC Members charged with corruption or other serious crimes must step aside within 30 days.
tsn: Maloko a Komiti ya Khuduthamaga ya Bosetšhaba ya dikgalemo ya ANC  a a bonweng molato wa bogodu kgotsa dingwe tsa bonwenwee jo bo masisi ba tshwanetse go sekegiwa mo malatsing a le 30.

en: The leagues spokesperson, Nyiko Bembani, says the resolution is a witch-hunt aimed at eliminating political enemies in the party.
tsn: Sebueledi sa mokgatlho, Nyiko Bembani a re se ke tshwetso e maikaelelo a yona e leng go fedisa manaba a sepolotiki mo lekokong.

en: The ANC Youth League in Limpopo calls on the ANC NEC to carefully consider the possible consequences of the implementation of the step aside principle as it might have far-reaching ramifications on the state of the organisation.
tsn: Mokgatlho wa Bašwa wa ANC kwa Limpopo o ikuela go Komiti Khuduthamaga ya Bosetšhaba go akanya ka kelotlhoko le ka ditlamorago tsa go tsenngwa tirisong ga Molao wa kgato e e kwa thoko jaaka go ka nna le mafaratlhatlha a a boitshegang mo pusong ya mokgatlho.

en: We call on the African National Congress National Executive Committee, a structure of the apex of the organisation, to trickle down the guidelines at the national general council before implementing these guidelines.
tsn: Re ikuela mo Komiti Khuduthamaga ya Bosetšhaba ya Lekoko la Bosetšhaba, thulaganyo ya dintlha tsa mokgatlho, go lebelela dikaelo tse kwa Khansele-kakaretso ya Bosetšhaba pele di tsenngwa tirisong.

en: On Monday, Fezile Dabi regional co-ordinator in the Free State, Reagan Booysens, said the region will interdict the stance on the step aside resolution.
tsn: Ka Mosupologo, Fezile Dabi Morulaganyi wa Kgaolo mo Foreisetata, Reagan Booysens a re kgaolo ga e tle go inyalana le tshwetso ya go sekegwa ga maloko.

en: The region said it had consulted all the ANC branches in the province in making sure that the party’s secretary-general, Ace Magashule, gets the maximum support that  according to Booysens he deserves.
tsn: O rile kgaolo e etetse makalana otlhe a ANC mo porofenseng go netefatseng gore Mokwaledi-Kakaretso, Ace Magashule o amogela tshegetso Booysens a reng o a e tlhoka.

en: ANC Fezile Dabi region says it will interdict NEC if Ace Magashule steps aside.
tsn: Kgaolo ya Fezile Dabi ya ANC ya re e ka se dumalane le Komiti Khuduthamaga ya Bosetšhaba  ya dikgalemo fa Ace Magashule a ka sekegiwa.

en: This comes as the 30-day period during which Magashule must step aside, fast runs out.
tsn: Se se itshupa jaana pakeng ya malatsi a le masomeamararo ya gore  Magashule a sekegiwe ka bonako.

en: Magashule is facing corruption charges among others.
tsn: Magashule o lebanwe ke ditatofatso tsa bonweenwee gareng ga babangwe.

en: Addressing the media in Parys, Booysens said: We are going to interdict that (step aside) thing, we just waiting for the due date and we are going to interdict that decision.
tsn: Booysens o bua le bobegakgang kwa Parys o rile: Re tlile go emisa (tswhetso ya go sekegwa ga maloko), re emetse letlha la teng mme re tlile go emisa tshwetso eo.

en: We know the decisions we took at Nasrec and branches are talking about interdicting, because of the decisions they took in Nasrec.
tsn: Re itse ditshwetso tse re di tsereng kwa Nasrec le makala a a buang ka ga se, ka ntlha ya go ditshwetso tse di tserweng kwa Nasrec.

en: Ekhuruleni ANC wants NEC to rethink the Step Aside resolution.
tsn: ANC kwa Ekhuruleni e batla gore Komiti Khuduthamaga ya Bosetšhaba ya dikgalemo e kakanya sešwa ka tshwetso ya go sekegiwa ga maloko.

en: Nomachule Gigaba made it clear that she would rather not have testified at the State Capture Commission.
tsn: Nomachule Gigaba o totobaditse fa a kampo a se ke a naya bosupi kwa Khominešeneng ya Dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi mo pusong.

en: With her estranged husband Malusi’s failure to have her affidavit declared inadmissible, Nomachule was forced to take the stand.
tsn: Tlhalano ya gagwe le monna wa gagwe o retelelwa ke go nna le maikano a gagwe go ikgatolosiwa, Nomachule o ne a patelesega go tlhagelela.

en: She revealed that Malusi referred to the Guptas as his unofficial advisors when he was Minister of Public Enterprises.
tsn: O supile fa Malusi a ne a leba ba gaGupta jaaka bagakolodi ba gagwe ba e seng ba semmuso ka nako ya fa e ne e le +Tona ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba.

en: He also received cash and various gifts and benefits from the family, including a BMW andR4.5million for their wedding and honeymoon in 2014.
tsn: O ne a amogetse madi le dimpho tse di farologaneng le dipoelo go tswa mo lelapeng, go akaretsa le BMW le didikadike tsa diranta tsa dimilione di lekana 4.5 (R4.5 million) ka lenyalo la bona le hanemoni ka 2014.

en: In an attempt to have Nomachule’s affidavit be found inadmissible, Gigaba’s lawyers had cited marital privilege as a reason why communications between the two should not be aired in public as well as the acrimonious nature of the couples on-going divorce proceedings.
tsn: Ka maiteko a go bona maikano a ga Nomachule a itlhokomolositswe, Babueledi ba kwa ga Gigaba ba tlhagisitse fa ditshwanelo tsa lenyalo e le lebaka le le dirileng gore tlhaeletsano magareng ga bobedi jo seke ya gasagasiwa mo pepeneneng gammogo le kgwetlho e banyalani ba kopanang le yona fa ba tlhalana.

en: Malusi ‘Gigaba’s lawyer Richard Solomons, argued, Communications that took place between Mr and Mrs Gigaba within the marital privilege context should not be aired in public.
tsn: Mmueledi wa ga Malusi Gigaba, Richard solomons, a re, ditlhaeletsano tse di diragetseng magareng ga Rre le Mme Gigaba mo bokaelong jwa ditshwanelo tsa lenyalo ga di a tshwanela go gasiwa mo phatlalatseng.

en: Secondly, we say because the acrimonious nature of the divorce proceedings, there is an inherent risk in the evidence and the veracity of the evidence that she will give and that will impact upon questions of credibility.
tsn: Sa bobedi, re bua jaana ka gonne bosilo jwa tlhalo, bo kotsi mo bosuping le boammaaruri mo bosuping jo a tlileng go bo neela e bile se se tlaa nna le seabe mo boikanyegong.

en: State Capture Inquiry: Malusi Gigaba’s application to cross-examine his estranged wife.
tsn: Dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi mo pusong: Kopo ya ga Malusi Gigaba go botsolotsa mosadi yo a tlhalaneng le ena.

en: Zondo also dismissed Malusi Gigaba’s bid to have proceedings in camera saying he would hear his application to cross examine her at a later stage.
tsn: Zondo gape o itlhokomolositse kopo ya ga Malusi Gigaba ya go botsolotsa mogatse wa maloba nako e e tlang.

en: So, it was a very reluctant Nomachule who took the stand on Monday evening.
tsn: Ka jalo, e ne e se maikemisetso a ga Nomachule go itlhagisa ka Mosupologo thapama.

en: Her lawyer Mpati Qofa read a letter she had addressed to Zondo.
tsn: Mmueledi wa gagwe Mpati Qofa o buisa lekwalo le le neng le lebane Zondo.

en: That is the first part to say I am unhappy with aspects of my affidavit for the reasons I have already announced and then she goes further to say that I come here with absolute respect for the commission and a civic duty I take very seriously.
tsn: Mo karolong ya ntlha ya re ga ke a itumelela pego e ke e ikanetseng ka ntlha ya mabaka a ke setseng ke a begile mme morago ga moo o ne a tswelela go bua gore ke tla fa ka tlotlo ya Khomišene le tiro ya semmuso e ke e tsayang tsia.

en: And she says, that being the case, I am married t to Mr Gigaba still.
tsn: Mme a re, le fa go le jalo, ke santse ke nyetswe ke Rre Gigaba.

en: She testified that a couple of months before Malusi became Public Enterprises Minister in October 2010, he told her that he had been told by Ajay Gupta he would get the position.
tsn: O neile bosupi gore dikgwedi pele Malusi a nna Tona ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba ka kgwedi ya Diphalane 2010, o moreetse a re o lomilwe tsebe ke Aya Gupta gore o ka nna a neelwa maemo.

en: Responding to State Commission Evidence Leader Anton Myburgh, Nomachule says the frequency of his visits to the Gupta family’s Saxonwold home subsequently increased and he referred to the brothers as his unofficial advisors.
tsn: A fetola moeteledipele wa Dipatlisiso tsa Bosenyi mo pusong Anton Myburgh, Nomachule a re go boaboa  ga gagwe kwa ga Gupta kwa sabapong ya Saxonwold  go ne ga oketsega ka bonako e bile o ne a re barwa Gupata ke bagakolodi ba gagwe ba e seng ba semmuso.

en: He would differentiate them from the advisors that he had from the DPE, which I knew his legal advisor and Thami Msomi as well.
tsn: O ne a ka ba farologanya le bagakolodi ba gagwe go tswa kwa DPE, ke ne ke itse mogakolodi wa gagwe wa semolao le Thami Msomi sentle.

en: Asked by Myburg, did he tell you who these unofficial advisors were? Nomachule responded, yes, he told me.
tsn: A botswa ke Myburg, o go boleletse gore bagakolodi b aba gagwe ba e seng ba semolao ke bo mang? Nomachule o fetotse ka gore, ee, o mpoleletse.

en: Myburg further asked, what did he say? to which Nomachule responded, he had responded, It was the Guptas.
tsn: Myburg o tswelela ka go botsa, o ne a reng? Mme Nomachule o ne a re, ke boGupta.

en: Ajay and his brothers which I don’t know all by name.
tsn: Ajay le barwarragwe ba ke sa ba itseng botlhe ka maina.

en: I am only familiar with Ajay more than the other ones.
tsn: Ke itse fela Ajay go feta tse ba bangwe.

en: Nomachule said that Malusi Gigaba had told her that the Gupta brother had advised him about work, about things that they were supposed to do.
tsn: Nomachule o rile gore Malusi Gigaba o ne a mmolelela gore barwa Gupta bam o gakolotse ka tirro, ka ga dilo tse ba ne ba tshwanetse go di dira.

en: She says she was told by her husband that the Guptas did not like then-Eskom-CEO Brian Dames and wanted him replaced.
tsn: A re o ne a boleletswe ke monna wa gagwe gore ba ne ba sa rate CEO ya Eskom Brian Dames e bile ba ne ba batla go mo ntsha.

en: She says this was just one of a number of appointments that Malusi was told to make.
tsn: A re se ke dingwe tsa bothapi tse Malusi a neng a bolelelwa go di dira.

en: He told me that the Guptas did not like him and he did not understand why they did not like him and I think they told him there would be a new restructuring, someone else will move to Eskom, then Brian Dames will leave and I did not know how the process would happen.
tsn: O ne a mpoleletse gore ba ga Gupta ba ne ba sa mo rate mme ga a mpolelela gore goreng ba sa mo rate mme ke akanya gore ba mmoleletse fa go tlaa nna le diphetogo tse di ntšhwa, mongwe o tlaa ya kwa Eskom, Brian Dames o tla tlogela mme ke ne ke sa itse gore go ne ga diragalang.

en: A few months later it happened.
tsn: Morago ga dikgwedi di le mmalwa go diragetse.

en: Nomachule says Malusi received cash, various gifts and benefits from the Guptas over the years including a BMW and millions of rands to pay for the couples 2014 wedding and honeymoon.
tsn: Nomachule a re Malusi o ne a amogela madi le dimpho tse di farologaneng go tswa kwa go ba ga Gupta mo dingwageng tse di fetileng, go akaretsa le BMW le dimilione tsa diranta go duelela lenyalo la balekane ba le boikhutso jwa fa ba sena go nyalana ka 2014.

en: She testified to seeing Malusi collecting bags of cash from the Gupta residence on a number of occasions, echoing the testimony of one of Malusi’s bodyguard in testimony to the commission.
tsn: O neetse bosupi fa a ne a bona Malusi a amogela mekotla ya madi go tswa go ba lelapa la ga Gupta makgetho a le mmalwa, o boeleditse bosupi jwa motlhokomedi wa ga Malusi kwa Khomišeneng.

en: State Capture Inquiry: Commission hears evidence from Nomachule Gigaba.
tsn: Khomišene ya dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi mo pusong, e reeditse bopaki go tswa go Nomachule Gigaba.

en: Nomachule Gigaba continues testifying at the State Capture Inquiry in Johannesburg.
tsn: Nomachule Gigaba o tswelela ka go neel bosupi kwa Khomišene ya Dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi mo pusong kwa Johannesburg.

en: The estranged wife of former Public Enterprises and Finance Minister, Malusi Gigaba, is giving the commission information about her husband’s dealings during his time in office.
tsn: Mosadi wa maloba wa Tona ya maloba ya Dikgwebo le Matlotlo a Setšhaba, Malusi Gigaba o neela Khomišene tshedimosetso ka ga ditiro tsa ga mogatse ka nako ya gagwe mo ofising.

en: She has told the State Capture Commission that her husband regarded the Gupta brothers as his unofficial advisors.
tsn: O boleletse Khomišene ya Dipatlisiso tsa Bosenyi mo pusong gore mogatse o ne a tsaya barwa Gupta jaaka bagakolodi ba gagwe ba e seng ba semolao.

en: Former cabinet minister Malusi Gigaba’s estranged wife, Nomachule, has told the State Capture Commission that a couple of months before her husband became Public Enterprises Minister in October 2010, he mentioned to her that Ajay Gupta told him that he would get the position.
tsn: Mogatse wa maloba wa ga Tona ya maloba ya Khabinete Malusi Gigaba, Nomachule, o boleletse Khomišene ya Dipatlisiso tsa Bosenyi mo pusong gore go dikgwedi pele ga mogatse e nna Tona ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba ka Diphalane 2010, o umakile fa Ajay Gupa a molomile tsebe gore o ka bona maemo a.

en: Noma Gigaba took the stand after Commission Chair, Deputy Chief Justice Raymond Zondo, dismissed her husband’s application to prevent her from testifying.
tsn: Noma Gigaba o ne a tlhagelela morago ga gore Modulasetulo wa Khomišene, Motlatsa Moatlhodimogolo Raymond Zondo a ikgatolose kopo ya monna wa gagwe, go mo thibela gore a seke a neela bosupi.

en: Noma Gigaba received a summons to the inquiry after she declined to appear two weeks ago.
tsn: Noma Gigaba o ne a bidiwa kwa Khomišeneng ya dipatlisiso morago ga gore a gane go tlhagelela mo dibekeng tse pedi tse di fetileng.

en: Her lawyer Mpati Qofa read a letter by Gigaba where she raised her concerns about her treatment at the hands of the Commission evidence leaders, the contents of some of her submissions and her continued marital status.
tsn: Mmueledi wa gagwe Mpati Qofa o buisa lekwalo la ga Gigaba fa a ne a tlhagisa matshwenyego a gagwe mabapi le tsholo ya gagwe kwa baeteledipeleng ba Khomišene ba bopaki, diteng dingwe tsa ditlhagiso tsa gagwe le maemo a lenyalo.

en: Qofa says according to her client, parts of her affidavit to the Commission are inaccurate.
tsn: Qofa a re go ya ka mmuelelwa wa gagwe, o dirile phoso mo maikanong a gagwe kwa Khomišeneng.

en: Her husband, Malusi, tried stopping her from testifying, asking the commission to declare her affidavit inadmissible.
tsn: Monna wa gagwe, Malusi o lekile go mo kganela go neela bosupi, ka go kopa Khomišene go ikgatolosa maikano a gagwe.

en: However, the inquiry dismissed the bid and is due to hear his application to cross-examine Noma at a later stage.
tsn: Le fa go ntse jalo, kopo e ne ya seke ya sekegelwa tsebe le go utlwa ntlha ya gagwe ya kopo ya go botsolotsa Noma mo nakong e e tlang.

en: The State Capture Commission has rejected the application of former cabinet minister Malusi Gigaba that his estranged wife Nomachule’s affidavit be found inadmissible.
tsn: Khomišene ya Dipatlisiso tsa Bosenyi mo pusong e ganne kopo ya ga Tona wa maloba wa Kabinete Malusi Gigaba ya gore maikano a ga mogatse wa maloba Nomachule a ikgatolosiwe.

en: Malusi Gigaba’s lawyers had cited marital privilege as a reason why communications between the two should not be aired in public as well as the acrimonious nature of the couples on-going divorce proceedings.
tsn: Babueledi ba ga Malusi Gibaba ba umakile tshiamelo ya lenyalo jaaka lebaka le le dirang gore tlhaeletsano magareng ga bobedi jo e be e sa tshwanela go gasiwa mo pepeneneng gammogo le mofuta wa tlhalo ya bona e e santseng e tsweletse.

en: The former ministers lawyer Richard Solomons says Nomachule is a reluctant witness as summons have been issued against her to appear before the commission and that her testimony may not be accurate.
tsn: Mmueledi wa maloba wa ditona Richard solomons a re Nomachule ga a mo maemong a go paka jaaka gona le ditaelo kgatlhanong le ena go tlhagelela kwa Khomišeneng le gore bosupi jwa gagwe bo ka se ikanyege.

en: Malusi Gigaba’s bid to have proceedings in camera should Nomachule be allowed to testify was also rejected by Deputy Chief Justice Raymond Zondo.
tsn: Kopo ya ga Malusi Gigaba gore Nomachule a letlelelwego neelana ka bosupi e gannwe ke Motlatsa Moatlhodimogolo Raymond Zondo.

en: An application to cross-examine her will be held at another stage.
tsn: Kopo ya go mmotsolotsa e tlaa tshwarwa nako e e tlang.

en: Communications that took place between Mr and Mrs Gigaba within the marital privilege context should not be aired in public.
tsn: Ditlhaeletsano tse di diragetseng magareng ga rre le mme Gigaba mo teng ga lenyalo la bona, ga di a tshwanela go gasiwa mo phatlalatseng.

en: Nomachule Gigaba is currently testifying.
tsn: Nomachule Gigaba o neela bosupi gajana.

en: Summons were issued against her after she withdrew her scheduled appearance before the commission nearly two weeks ago, citing unhappiness with the conduct of the commission through her lawyers.
tsn: Ditsheko di ne di ne di lebane kgatlhanong le ena morago ga go ikgogela morago ka letlha le le beilweng la go tlhagelela kwa Khomišeneng dibeke tse pedi tse di fetileng, o tlhagisitse boitshwaro jo bo sa siamang jwa Khomišene mo babueleding ba gagwe.

en: She was expected to shed light on her estranged husband’s relations with the controversial Gupta brothers.
tsn: O ne a solofetswe go sedimosa ka ga kamano ya monna wa gagwe wa maloba le barwa Gupta.

en: The Guptas are accused of having influenced some state decisions and securing backroom deals at state-owned companies, among other claims.
tsn: Ba gaGupta ba latofadiwa ka ga tlhotlheletso e ban ang le yona mo ditshwetsong dingwe tsa puso le go nna le ditlamo tse kwa thoko mo ditheong tsa puso.

en: The ANC in the Eastern Cape believes the late party stalwart Steve Tshwete would have been disappointed with state of the sport in country, had he still been alive.
tsn: ANC kwa Kapa Botlhaba, e dumela gore moikanyegi wa lekoko moswi Steve Tshwete o ne a ka swaba nko go feta molomo ka ga maemo a metshameko mo nageng, fa a ne a santse a tshela.

en: Tshwete died on this day 19 years ago and the ANC in the province held a wreath laying ceremony in his honour.
tsn: Tshwete o tlhokafetse mo letsatsing le dingwaga di le some le borobongwe tse di fetileng e bile ANC mo porofenseng e mo beela dikgara go mo naya tlotla.

en: Mr Fix It, as he was affectionately known was the first Minister of Sport and Recreation in a democratic South Africa and was known for spearheading transformation in all sporting codes.
tsn: Rre Fix it (mosiamise), jaaka a ne a itsege thata, ke ena Tona ya Metshameko le Boitapoloso wa ntlha mo Aforikaborwa wa temokerasi e bile o ne a itsege ka go etelela pele le go tlisa diphetogo mo metshamekong.

en: ANC Eastern Cape Chairperson, Oscar Mabuyane, says Tshwete would definitely not be impressed with the quality of the national soccer team’s game.
tsn: Modulasetulo wa ANC kwa Kapa Botlhaba, Oscar Mabuyane a re Tshwete o ka be a sa kgatlhwa ke boleng jwa motshameko wa setlhopha sa bosetšhaba.

en: Definitely, his bones must be turning in his grave.
tsn: Ruri, mowa wa gagwe o tshwanetse wa be o sa robala.

en: You can’t have Bafana Bafana not qualifying in this day and age with all the resources that they are exposed to if you were to compare him with the team of 1996, says Mabuyane.
tsn: Ga go kgonege gore Bafana Bafana ba retelelwe gompieno le mo pakeng e ka didiriswa tsotlhe tse ba nang le tsona fa o ne o ka ba bapisa le setlhopha sa 1996, ga bua jalo Mabuyane.

en: The Tshwete family appreciated the ANC’s gesture.
tsn: Ba lelapa la ga Tshwete ba lebogetse matsapa a ANC.

en: I think my family, my son next to me is happy and we are all happy as a family, his widow, Pam Tshwete said.
tsn: Ke akanya gore ba lelapa la me, morwa wa me fa thoko ga me o itumetse e bile re itumetse rotlhe jaaka lelapa, motlholagadi wa gagwe Pam Tshwete o bua jalo.

en: ANC EC lays wreaths at Steve Tshwetes grave.
tsn: Ba lekoko la ANC ba baya dikgare kwa lebitleng la ga Steve Tshwetes.

en: His son, Mayihlome, added: It represents a great deal for the family, remember I was raised by a mother and a father who always tried to remind us that the ANC doesn’t owe you anything, the ANC is the means for you to serve the people so for the province to do this for us as a family and as a community even though we did not ask for it speaks to the great value that they saw in my father.
tsn: Morwa wa gagwe, Mayihlome, o gatisa ka gore: go kaya go le gontsi mo lelapeng, gopola gore ke godisitswe ke mme le rre yo a neng a sa kgale math emo ganong go re gopotsa gore ANC ga e kolote ope, ANC e raya gore o direla batho. Ka jalo, gore porofense e dire se mo go rona jaaka balelapa le baagi le fa e le gore ga re a le kopa, go bontsha boleng jo bogolo jo bo bonweng mo go rre.

en: The Premier and the chairperson spoke quiet eloquently about having to take some of the principles that my father represented and keep it going in this new generation.
tsn: Tonakgolo e bile e le Modulasetulo o buile ka tšhakgalo ka ga go sala morago melawana e rragwe a neng a tshela ka yona le go e tsweletsa go tswa tshikeng e nngwe go ya go e nngwe.

en: Tshwete was 63 at the time of his passing.
tsn: Tshwete o ne a na le dingwaga di le 63 ka nako ya fa a tlhokafala.

en: He was serving as Minister of Safety and Security under the Mbeki administration.
tsn: O ne a dira jaaka Tona ya Pabalesego le Tshireletso ka fa tlase ga tsamaiso ya ga Mbeki.

en: Tshwete spent 15 years on Robben Island, after being found guilty of belonging to a banned organisation.
tsn: Tshwete ntse dingwaga di le some le botlhano kwa Robben Island, morago ga go bonwa molato wa go nna moagi wa mokgatlho o ileditsweng.

en: Shortly after his release in 1978, he returned home and became a teacher until his was deployed to national government.
tsn: Ka bonakonyana morago ga go gololwa ga gagwe ka 1978, o ne a boela gae mme a nna morutabana go fitlha a thapiwa mo pusong ya bosetšhaba.

en: The late ANC MPL and activist Jacqui Mofokeng has been described as a champion of anti-women abuse campaigns.
tsn: Moswi e bile e ne e le mokgaratlhi wa ANC Jacqui Mofokeng o ne a le mampodi wa matsholo a tshotlakako ya basadi.

en: Mofokeng died at her home last week Thursday, a day after her daughter, Thato, succumbed to COVID-19-related complications.
tsn: Mofokeng o tlhokafaletse kwa legaeng la gagwe mo bekeng e e fetileng, letsatsi morago ga morwadie, Thato, a sena go tlhaselwa ke malwetse a a amanang le Covid-19.

en: ANC Women’s League members were among those in a drive-by memorial service at her home in Pretoria.
tsn: Maloko a Mokgatlho wa Basadi wa ANC ke bangwe ba ba neng ba eteletse pele tirelo ya segopotso kwa lelapeng la gagwe kwa Pitori.

en: Women clad in ANC colours arrived at Mofokeng’s home, chanting struggle songs as they passed by the house to drop off flowers.
tsn: Basadi bna moaparo wa mebala ya ANC ba gorogile kwa ga Mofokeng, baopela dipina tsa kgaratlho jaaka ba ne ba kgabaganya mo ntlong go baya malomo.

en: there’s no evidence or clear sign of a third wave; we still need to remain vigilant.
tsn: Ga go na bosupi kgotsa letshwao la go bontsha lekhubu la  boraro; re sa ntse re tshwanetse go nna kelotlhoko.

en: If we look at the test positivity rate nationally, it is still fairly stable.
tsn: Fa re leba dipalo tsa teko tsa go tshwaetsega ka mogare wa Coravirus mo nageng di santse di tsepame nyana.

en: We currently averaging just under 4% of positive tests and thats a 12% decrease compared to a week ago.
tsn: Jaanong  dipalo tsa diteko tsa go tshwaetsega ka mogare wa Coravirus  tekatekanyo ya  tsona di fela ka fa tlase ga diphesente di le nne  (4) mme se ke phokotsego ya  diphesente di le 12 fa go bapisiwa le beke e e fetileng.

en: Northern Cape is still slightly above 10%.
tsn: Kapa Bokone e sa ntse e le kwa godimonyana ka diphesente di le lesome.

en: In terms of the hospitalisation trend across the country, most provinces are showing a decline except for two provinces; Free State has shown an increase of 19% in the last week and the Northern Cape has also shown a slight increase of 16% compared to a week ago, he says.
tsn: Go ya ka mokgwa wa go ralala naga wa go isiwa bookelong, bontsi jwa diporofense di bontsha kwetlotlase kwa ntle ga diporofense tse pedi; Foreisetata e bontshitse koketsego ya diphesente di le 19 (19%) mo bekeng e e fetileng mme Kapa Bokone le yona e bontshitse tlhatlogonyana ya dipehesente di le 16 (16%) fa go bapisiwa le beke e e fetileng, o ne a bolela jalo.

en: Dr Suliman says while the positivity rate in South Africa is looking good, the country has to wait to see the impact of the Easter holidays.
tsn: Ngaka Suliman a re fa direiti tse diphosethifi mo Aforikaborwa di sa siame, naga ya rona e tshwanetse go emela go bona ditlamorago tsa malatsi a boikhutso a paseka.

en: Its looking quite good this past week, the number of new confirmed across the country is just over 1 000 on average per day and thats a decline of 8% compared to a week ago.
tsn: Go ne go lebega go siame mo bekeng e e fetileng, palo ya dikheisi tse di netefaditsweng go ralala naga di feta sekete ka palogare ka letsatsi mme se ke kwetlotlase ya diphesente di le robedi fa go bapisiwa le beke e e fitileng.

en: The seven-day average of just over 1 000 new cases is in fact the lowest its been since late May 2020.
tsn: Palogare ya go feta sekete sa dikgetse tse dintšhwa, e ile kwa tlase thata go feta ka tsela e e ne ntse ka bofelo jwa Moranang ka 2020.
