en: Embattled former eThekwini mayor Zandile Gumede and 21 other accused are expected to appear before the Durban High Court for a pre-trial hearing Monday.
tsn: Mmeyara wa maloba yo a leng mo matheteng wa eThekwini, Zandile Gumede le  balotafadiwa ba bangwe ba le 21 ba solofelwa go tlhagelela fa pele ga kgotlatshekelokgolo ya Durban ka Mosupologo go nna le kgato tsa theetso pele ga tsheko.

en: The charges stem from 2017 Durban Solid Waste tender amounting to over R400 million.
tsn: Ditatofatso tse, disimolola kwa thendareng ya matlakala ya Durban ya dimilione tsa di ranta di le 400 ka 2017.

en: Spokesperson for Gumedes supporters, Ntando Khuzwayo says although supporters will be out in their numbers they will adhere to COVID-19 regulations.
tsn: Mmueledi wa batshegetsi ba Gumede, Ntando Khuzwayo, a re le fa ba  tshegetsi ba tlaa nna teng ka dipalo tsa bona, ba tlile go obamela melawana COVID-19.

en: Its a pre-trial conference so the parties are in court theyre going to try to reduce disputes before the matter goes to trial so we cannot pre-empt what is going to happen inside the courts but outside we can tell you that were expecting scores of people to come and show their support for Gumede.
tsn: Ke khonferense ya kgato pele ga tsheko, mme jaanong makoko a mo kgotlatshekelong ba tlile go leka go fokotsa dintwa pele kgetse e ya kwa tshekong, ka jalo ga re itse se se tlileng go diragala ka fa gare mme fela kwa ntle ga kgotlatshekelo re ka go bolelela gore re solofetse batho ba le bantsi go tlaa go bontsha tshegetso ya bone mo go Gumede.

en: We also have other provinces who have indicated that they also sending people over to show solidarity to her or the safety and Corbett regulation or going to be adhered to.
tsn: Gape re na le diporofense tse dingwe tse di buileng gore di tlile go romela batho go bontsha seoposengwe mo go ene kgotsa pabalesego le gore ba tlaa latelela melawana ya Covid-19 morago.

en: In March it was reported that according to the indictment, the state listed Robert Abbu, accused number one, amongst the key role players.
tsn: Ka kgwedi ya Mopitlwe, go ne gwa begwa gore go ya ka molato wa tatofatsoe o o tlhabolotsweng, puso e dirile Rober Abbu molatofadiwa wa ntlha mo lenaaneng, gareng ga batsayakarolo ba bangwe.

en: Former supply chain manager at the eThekwini Municipality Sandile Ngcobo, senior African National Congress (ANC)councillor Mondli Mthembu, former eThekwini mayor Zandile Gumede and suspended eThekwini City Manager Sipho Nzuza are also listed as key players in the matter.
tsn: Motsamaise wa maloba wa mokoloko wa dithebolelo wa kwa eThekwini Sandile Ngcobo, le motlhankedimogolo wa African National Congress (ANC) mokhanselara Mondli Mthembu, le mmeyara wa maloba wa eThekwini Zandile Gumede, le Motsamaisi wa Toropo ya eThekwini yo a sekegilweng Sipho Nzuza le bona ba kwadilwe mo lenaaneng la batsayakarolo mo kgannyeng eno.

en: Details contained in the indictment state that Abbu, in 2017, was appointed by Nzuza as Head of Special Projects without following proper procedures, a position that the state alleges had not previously existed.
tsn: Dintlha tse di leng mo molatong wa tatofatso o o tlhabolotsweng,  di tlhagisa gore ka 2017  Abbu, ka 2017, o ne a tlhomiwa ke Nzuza jaaka tlhogo ya diporojeke tse di kgethegileng kwa ntle ga go latela dithulaganyo tse di siameng, phatlhatiro e e puso e reng e ne e se teng kwa mathomong.

en: And that Nzuza was instructed by Gumede to do so.
tsn: Le gore Nzuza o ne a laetswe go dira jalo ke Gumede.

en: The state further notes that shortly after his appointment, Abbu requested to deviate from the formal process of the municipality to invite quotations from suppliers for the new DSW contract.
tsn: Puso ya re ka bonako fela morago ga go tlhomiwa ga gagwe Abbu o ne akopa go tswa mo tsamaisong e e tlwaelegileng ya tsamaiso ya mmasepala mme go kopa dikhoteišene go tswa batlameding ba bašwa ba konteraka ya DSW.

en: The state said that it intends to rely on the cellphone records of Gumede, Mthembu and Abbu detailing frequent communications, where the alleged Durban Solid Waste tender decisions were made.
tsn: Puso ya re, ikaeletse go ikaega ka direkoto tsa diselefounu tsa Gumede, Mthembu le Abbu tse di tlhalosang tlhaeletsano  magareng ga bona, e mo go belaelwang gore ditshwetso tsa thendara ya matlakala ya Durban di dirilweng.

en: It is believed that the cellphone records will link Gumede with some service providers who are also accused in the case.
tsn: Go dumelwa gore direkoto tsa diselefounu di tlaa golaganya Gumede le batlamedi ba ditirelo ba ba latofadiwang mo kgetseng e.

en: The indictment further alleges that Gumede, Nzuza and several councillors received illicit payments during the new DSW contract.
tsn: Tatofatso e tswelapele ka go latofatsa, Gumede, Nzuza le bakhanselara ba le mmalwa ka go amogela dituelo tse di seng mo molaong ka nako ya konteraka e ntšhwa ya DSW.

en: The papers also revealed that a sum of about a R100 000 was transferred into the bank account of the African National Congress in the eThekwini Region, allegedly in favour of Gumede.
tsn: Dipampiri le tsona di bontshitse gore palogotlhe e ka nna ka R100 000 e fetiseditswe mo akhaontong ya African National Congress e e kwa kgaolong ya eThekwini, gatwe e diragetse mo leineng la Gumede.

en: As the debate on the latest developments at South African Airways (SAA) continues to take place  political parties have mixed views on the public-private partnership which saw SAA owning 49% of the company and Takatso Consortium taking the 51% stake.
tsn: Jaaka dingangisano ka ditiragalo tsa kwa South African Airways (SAA) di tswelela go tsaya karalo, makoko a dipolotiki a na le dikakanyo tse difarologaneng ka semphato sa puso le poraefete, e e reng  ba SAA ba tlaa nna le diphesente di le 49 tsa setlamo mme Takatso Consortium ya tsaya diphesente di le 51 tsa setheo sa yona.

en: Some raised questions that politically exposed individuals like Jabu Moleketi and Popo Molefe had influence in Takatso Consortium being appointed as the private equity partner.
tsn: Bangwe ba buditse dipotso tse di tlhagisitseng batho jaaka bo Jabu Moleketi le bo Popo Molefe e leng batho ba ba nnileng le tlhotlheletso mo go tlhopheng Tekatso Consortium go nna molekane wa tekatekano ya poraefete.

en: Minister of Public Enterprises Pravin Gordhan has refuted any allegations that African National Congress (ANC) aligned businessmen influenced the deal.
tsn: Tona ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba Pravin Gordan o ganeditse ditatofatso tsa African National Congress tsa gore bo borrakgwebo ba lolamisitsweng ba nnile le seabe na na le mo ntlheng e.

en: Minister Gordhan has hindered too shrouded these agreements in complete secrecy but very serious questions remain now that he has made a very general announcement, how these agreements tie in crucially to the PMFA requirements, who benefits from the agreements and particurlary ANC cadres and the conflict of lift.
tsn: Tona Gordhan o dirile ka thata gore  ditumalano tse  di dira gale ka maemong a sephiri e fela dipotso tse di masisi thata jaanong di a re o ne a dira kitsiso ka kakaretso, gore ditumalano tse di amana thata jaang le ditlhokego tsa PMFA, e e amogang go tswa mo ditumalanong tse mme tota tota setlhpha sa cadre sa ANC mme kgotlhang ya teng e o keditswe.

en: There are many questions here, says Chaleb Cachalia, Democratic Alliance.
tsn: Go na le dipotso di le dintsi, go bolela jalo Chaleb Cachalia, wa Democratic Alliance.

en: SAA private sector ownership deal raising concerns
tsn: Lephata la SAA la poraefete e tlhagisa matshwenyego.

en: The Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF) have a standing resolution that SOEs must be squarely in the hands of the government.
tsn: Economic Freedom Fighters (EFF) ba na le tharabololo ya leruri ya gore di SOE’s di tshwanetse go nna le tlhomamo mo diatleng tsa Puso.

en: Eskom is collapsing.
tsn: Eskom e ya wa.

en: Where are you?
tsn: O fa kae?

en: Denel is collapsing where are you?
tsn: Denel e ya wa, o fa kae?

en: And SAA is dead.
tsn: Le SAA e wele.

en: SA Express is gone.
tsn: SA Express go fedile ka yone.

en: Mango is gone and yet Pravin is declared the best minister by white owned minister.
tsn: Mango le yone go ile fela yalo ka yone, mme Pravin o bonwa e le Tona e siameng ke tona ya baweu.

en: If it was Gigaba, there would be marches, says Julius Malema, EFF leader.
tsn: Fa e ka bo e le Gigaba, go ne go tlile go  nna le megwanto, ga bua Julius Malema, moeteledipele wa EFF.

en: The IFPs Inkosi Mzamo Buthelezi says the party supports governments move to partially sell SAA shares in order to protect taxpayers money from being used further to bail out the airline.
tsn: Inkosi Mzamo Buthelezi wa lekoko la IFP, a re lekoko le tshegetsa puso ka gore e rekisa dišere tse dingwe tsa SAA go sireletsa madi a baduedi ba lekgetho gore a se ka a dirisiwa go thusa go ntsha setheo sa difofane mo mathateng.

en: The IFP welcomes the sale of SAA with 51% equity partner, this a very for tax payers.
tsn: IFP e amogela thekiso ya diphesente di 51 tsa SAA  semphato sa tekatekano, se se thata mo go baduela lekgetho .

en: This is a step in the right direction that government has taken this bold decision in addressing SOEs.
tsn: E ke kgato e e siameng e e tserweng ke puso  ya bogatlhamelamasisi mo go samaganeng di SOEs.

en: We call for close attention on Takatso Consortium, says Buthelezi.
tsn: Re ikuela go nna lebiwe ka kelotlhoko Takatso Consortium, a re Buthelezi.

en: The political landscape divided over the sale of 51% of South African Airways to Takatso Consortium
tsn: Lemorago la sepolotiki le kgaogantswe ka bogare ka ntlha ya thekiso ya diphesente di le 51 tsa ya South African Airways go Takatso Consortium.

en: Political Analyst, Khaya Sithole says this is a matter of waiting and see how things will turn out at SAA moving forward.
tsn: Mosekaseki wa dipolotiki, Khaya Sithole a re kgetse e, e batla re eme mme re kgone go bona gore tlaa tlhagang eng kwa SAA go gatela pele.

en: Talking about what are the possible further challenges that SAA could find itself facing going forward  this after this purchase by Takatso Consortium, says Sithole.
tsn: Go buiwa kadikgwetlho tse di ka diragalang  tse SAA e ka iphitlhela e lebagane le tsona kwa pele, morago ga go rekisetsa Takatso Consortium, a re yalo Sithole.

en: Attempts to get a view from the ANC were unsuccessful.
tsn: Maiteko a go leka go bua le ba ANC ga atlega.

en: However the governing party has a standing resolution of public-private partnerships in order to rescue failing state-owned enterprises like SAA and power utility Eskom.
tsn: Le fa go le jalo ya lekoko le le busang le na le tharabololo ya leruri ya ditheo tsa setšhaba le tsa go golola tsa dikgwebo tsa puso jaaka SAA le maatla a tiriso ya Eskom.

en: SAA, Takatso consortium partnership |Holomisa: UDM wants to know who is funding who?
tsn: SAA, Takatso consortium Holomisa: UDM e batla go itse gore mang a tlamelang yo mongwe ka motlole?

en: One South Africa Movement leader, Mmusi Maimane has confirmed that he has been invited by former Deputy Chief Justice Dikgang Moseneke to participate in the Inquiry into Ensuring Free and Fair Local Government Elections during COVID-19.
tsn: Moeteledipele wa One South African Movement, Mmusi Maimane o boletes gore o laleditswe ke Motlatsa Moatlhodimogolo Dikgang Moseneke go tsaya karolo mo go netefatseng gore go nna le  ditlhopho tse di siameng ka nako ya ditlhopho tsa dipusoselegae covid-19.

en: The inquiry will look at whether or not the upcoming local government elections should take place.
tsn: Tsheko ya dipatlisiso e tlile go lebelela gore a Ditlhopho tsa Pusoselegae tse di tlang di tlaa diragala kgotsa nnyaa di ka se diragale.

en: Other issues concerning the elections will also be under the spotlight.
tsn: Dintlha tse dingwe tse di amanang le ditlhopho le tsone di tlile go nna mo lebaleng.

en: One SA is in favour of the elections taking place in October this year.
tsn: One SA  ya re e batla gore ditlhopho di tsaye karolo ka Diphalane monongwaga.

en: Some political parties have voiced their concerns over the elections taking place during the COVID-19 pandemic.
tsn: Makoko a mangwe a sepolotiki a tlhagisiwa matshwenyego a bona ka gore ditlhophodi tseye karolo ka nako ya leroborobo la COVID-19.

en: @MmusiMaimane: Weve registered an independent candidate association that will be a custodian of all independent candidates standing for elections.
tsn: MmusiMaimane: Weve e kwadisitse ntlhopheng yo o ikemetseng wa tlileng go nna motlhokomedi wa botlhe ba ba ikemetseng mo ditlhophong.

en: One Movement South Africa unveils its plans ahead of municipal elections
tsn: One Movement  South Africa e begile dithulaganyo tsa yone pele ga ditlhopho tsa mmasepala.

en: Maimane spoke to the media outside of the Constitutional Court on Friday as the country marked a year since an order to Parliament  that the country’s electoral system must be changed to allow independent candidates to participate in National and Provincial elections.
tsn: Maimane o ne a bua le babegadikgang kwa ntle ga Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo ka Labotlhano jaaka e le ngwaga go ntshitswe taelo gore Palamente e fetole tsamaiso ya  ditlhopho tsa naga gore ba ba ikemetseng ba kgone go tsaya karolo mo ditlhophong tsa bosetšhaba le tsa porofense.

en: He says the elections must go ahead.
tsn: A re ditlhopho di tshwanetse go tswelela.

en: We want to be able to make written submissions and we want to make oral submissions.
tsn: Re batla go kgona go dira ditlhagiso tse di kwadilweng mme re batla go dira ditlhagiso tsa molomo.

en: I got confirmation from Justice Moseneke to say, they have invited us now, formally to come and do that.
tsn: Ke fitlhetse molaetsa go tswa go Justice Moseneke, a bua gore, re laleditswe semmuso go tlaa go dira jalo.

en: So we are awaiting our date, to be able to come and achieve both those things.
tsn: Ka jalo re emetse letsatsi la rona, gore re tle re kgone go fitlhelela dilo tseo tse pedi.

en: Our submissions are done, says Maimane.
tsn: Re feditse ka ditlhagiso tsa rona, ga rialo Maimane.

en: LGE 2021 | IEC says its ready for 2021 municipal elections
tsn: LGE 202 | IEC ya re ipaakanyeditse ditlhopho tsa 2021 tsa mmasepala

en: A member of the African National Congress Youth League (ANCYL) in KwaZulu-Natal has taken legal action against ANC Deputy Secretary-General Jessie Duarte and the National Youth Task Team(NYTT).
tsn: Tokololo ya African National Congress Youth League (ANCYL) wa kwa,  KwaZulu-Natal o tsere dikgato tsa semolao kgatlhanong le Motlatsa Mokwaledi-Kakaretso  wa ANC Jessie Duarte le National Youth Task Team (NYTT).

en: 32-year-old Qiniso Matinisa from oThongathi, north of Durban, says Duarte and the NYTT have allowed people over the age of 35 to remain in the youth leagues provincial structures.
tsn: Qiniso Matinisa wa dingwaga di le 32, go tswa mo oThongathi, bokone jwa Durban, a re Duarte le NYTT ba letleletse batho ba ba fetang dingwaga di le 35 go nna mo ditheong tsa bašwa tsa mafapha a porofense.

en: In court papers, Matinisa says all youth league structures, including those in provinces, lapsed some years ago and that there are some members of the structures who are now older than 35.
tsn: Mo dipamiring tsa kwa kgotlatshekelo, Matinisa a re, go ditheo tsotlhe tsa bašwa mo diporofenseng tseo, go fedile ka tsone dingwaga di le mmalwa tsa go feta mme go sa na le ditokololo tse dingwe tsa ditheo tseo tsa dingwaga tsa go feta 35.

en: Provinces have a leadership whose term of office lapsed.
tsn: Diporofense di na le boeteledipele ba paka ya go feta.

en: Secondly, they have members older than 35 years, but theyre presiding over the youth league.
tsn: Sa bobedi, ba na le ditokololo tsa dingwaga tsa go feta 35, e fela ba ntse ba eteletse ditheo tsa bašwa kwa pele.

en: That’s where I’m asking ANC clarity of how can you say people over 35 must excuse themselves in NYTT, but when it comes to provinces you don’t do the same.
tsn: Ke ka mo ke botsang ANC gore e tlhalose gore, goreng bare batho ba ba fetang 35 ba tswe mo NYTT, mme fa go tliwa mo diporofenseng ga ba dire jalo?

en: Efforts to get a comment from the ANC were unsuccessful.
tsn: Maiteko a go bona ditshwaelo go tswa ANC a ne a sa atlega.

en: The matter is expected to be heard in the South Gauteng High Court on 18 August 2021.
tsn: Kgetse e solofetswe gp reediwa mo kgotlatshekelokgolo ya Gauteng ka di 18 Phatwe 2021.

en: The 8th regional elective conference of the African National Congress (ANC) in the Mopani region in Limpopo has been postponed from this weekend to next weekend.
tsn: Khonferense ya Borobedi ya ditlhopho tsa dikgaolo tsa African National Congress (ANC) kwa kgaolong ya Mopani mo Limpopo e buseditswe morago go tswa mo mafelong a beke e go ya mafelong a beke e e tlang.

en: The conference was scheduled to start on Friday.
tsn: Khonferense e ne e rulaganyeditswe go simolola ka Labotlhano.

en: ANC in the Mopanis regional Spokesperson, Sonia Ngobeni, says the conference has been postponed to finalize the adjudication of an appeal process and clear a verification report.
tsn: Mmueledi wa ANC wa kgaolo ya Mopani, Sonia Ngobeni, a re khonferense e buseditswe morago go feleletsa boatlhodi ba thulaganyo ya boikuelo le go phumula pegelo.

en: Our 8th regional conference was scheduled for the 11th to the 13th of this month.
tsn: Khonferense ya rona ya borobedi e ne e rulaganyeditswe go simolola ka di 11 go fitlha ka di 13 tsa kgwedi e.

en: The conference has been postponed to the 18th until the 20th of June because of minor issues that have to be finalized.
tsn: Khonferense e buseditswe morago go simolola ka di 18 go fitlha ka di 20 Seetebosigo ka ntlha ya dintlha tse di nnye tse di tshwanetseng go konosediwa.

en: One of the adjudication of appeal processes was not concluded, says Ngobeni.
tsn: Nngwe ya dikatlholo tsa thulaganyo ya boikuelo, ga gwa tseiwa tshwetso ka ga yone,  ga bolela jalo Ngobeni.

en: Its almost a month since the second phase of theCOVID-19 vaccination campaign started on 17 May.
tsn: E setse e le kgwedi fa e sale go simolotswe ka kgato ya bobedi ya letsholo la go entelwa COVID-19 le simolotswe ka di 17 Motsheganong.

en: Members of Parliament over the age of 60 are among the 5 million people in this category who qualify to be vaccinated.
tsn: Maloko a Palamente a dingwaga tsa go feta 60 a mo gare ga setlhopha sa batho ba le dimilione di le tlhano ba ba tshwanetseng go entiwa.

en: The Deputy Speaker of the National Assembly, Lechesa Tsenoli, and Health Committee Chairperson Sibongiseni Dhlomo have been encouraging other MPs over the age of 60 to register to be vaccinated.
tsn: Motlatsa Mmusakgotla wa Kokoano Bosetšhaba, Lechesa Tsenoli,  le modulasetulo wa komiti ya boitekanelo Sibongiseni Dhlomo bane ba ntse ba rotloetsa ditokololo tse dingwe  tsa palamente  ba dingwaga tsa go feta 50 go ya go  ikwadisetsa go entiwa.

en: On Monday, Dhlomo had his chance to receive his first dose in his home town of Mbumbulu in KwaZulu-Natal.
tsn: Ka Mosupologo, Dhlomo o nnile le sebaaka sa go amogela moento wa gagwe wa ntlha kwa Motseng wa gabo wa Mbumbulu kwa, KwaZulu-Natal.

en: I got vaccinated with the Pfizer vaccine on the 7th of June and today on the 11th of June, I am doing oversight visit in Gauteng.
tsn: Ke entilwe ka moento wa Pfizer k di 7 tsa Seetebosigo mme gompieno ka di 11 tsa Seetebosigo, ke a go etela kwa Gauteng.

en: I feel ok.
tsn: Ke ikutlwa ke siame.

en: I have never had any side effects.
tsn: Ga ke ise ke nne le ditlamorago

en: Even on the same day of my vaccination, I drove myself home.
tsn: Tota le ka letsatsi la ntlha la me la go entiwa, ke kgweditse go ya kwa gae.

en: I am encouraging all those who are 60 years and above to go for all those life-saving interventions by the Department of Health.
tsn: Ke rotloetsa batho botlhe ba dingwaga di le 60 le go feta, go ya kwa dikopanong tsa Lefapha la Boitekanelo tsa go bolaka matshelo.

en: Dhlomo is encouraging those who experience side effects from the vaccine to act quickly.
tsn: Dhlomo o rotloetsa batho ba ba nnang maitemogelo a ditlamorago tse di bakwang ke moento gore ba batle thuso ka bonako .

en: If you do feel any symptoms of dizziness, tiredness, itchiness of the body, report those as soon as you can.
tsn: Fa o utlwa o kare o nna le matshao jaaka sedidi, molapo, gobaba mo mmeleng, a bege ka bonako.  ikutlwa le matshwao a motsikitlelo, tiredness, itchiness tsa mmele, go bega ba ka bonako jaaka o kgona.

en: Otherwise, I feeling great.
tsn: Kwa ntle ga mo go, ke ikutlwa ke siame.

en: I am visiting sights here in Gauteng.
tsn: Ke e tela mafelo mo Gauteng.

en: I am actually happy that I got vaccinated in the most rural part of Kwazulu Natal called Mbumbulu.
tsn: Ke itumetse tota gore ke amogetse moento wa me mo karolong e nngwe ya motse legae wa KwaZulu-Natal Natal o o bidiwang Mbumbulu.

en: And we are grateful to the Department that continues to give us support, even in other rural parts of the country despite the challenges of this vaccine.
tsn: Mme re leboga Lefapha le le tswelangpele ka go re ema nokeng, tota le fa dikarolong tse dingwe tsa magaeng tsa naga le fa gona le dikgwetlho tsa moento o.

en: Go for it; you will be saved.
tsn: E ya go e tsaya, o tlaa sireletsega.

en: Tsenoli was vaccinated at a Cape Town hospital on Wednesday morning.
tsn: Tsenoli o entilwe kwa bookelong kwa Kapa ka Laboraro mo mosong.

en: Today is my second morning following getting the vaccination, and I am feeling great.
tsn: Gompieno ke letsatsi la me la bobedi mo mosong morago ga go tlhabiwa ka moento, mme ke ikutlwa ke siame.

en: I went there confident that I could handle a needle, which is one thing that I dont fear.
tsn: Ke ile kwa teng ke na le maikemisetso a gore ke tlaa emela lemao, ka e le sengwe se ke sa se tshabeng.

en: I do acupuncture, so the needle does not scare me anyway.
tsn: Ke dira acupuncture, ka jalo lemao ga le ntshose.

en: So, its been great that the Department of Health has been rolling out this programme in the way it does throughout the country.
tsn: Ka jalo, go a itumedisa gore Lefapha la Boitekanelo le ntse le dira lenaneo le ka tsela e le ntseng le dira ka teng go ralala naga.

en: And that I personally have now gotten it, has somewhat lifted my confidence.
tsn: Mme ka gore ke setse ke amogetse moento wame, se se dirile gore ke nne le  boikanyo.

en: I didn’t actually realise that I was anxious to get it.
tsn: Tota ke ne ke sa lemoge gore ke ne ke tlhobaelwa go e fitlhela.

en: Now that I got it I feel upbeat and its been great.
tsn: Jaanong ka gore ke e fitlhetse, ke ikutlwa ke na le tsholofelo mme go ntse go itumedisa.

en: I haven’t felt anything untoward that I cant handle.
tsn: Ga ke iseke ke utlwi sepe se se sa siamang se ke sa kgoneng go se kgotlhelela.

en: The Deputy Speaker says he is happy to contribute towards the much-needed population immunity in the fight against COVID-19.
tsn: Motlatsa Mmusakgotla a re o itumeletse go nna le seabe mo tshoutong e e tlhokegang thata ya setšhaba kgatlhanong le ntwa ya covid-19.

en: I wish others can have the courage to go ahead and do it as well.
tsn: Ke eletsa gore batho ba ka nna le bopelokgale jwa go tswelela mme ba tlhabe moento.

en: It is necessary to at least take the first step as a preventative step, so that the second one when it comes, must add to the immunity my body requires to withstand any attack on the virus.
tsn: Go botlhokwa go ka tsaya kgato ya ntlha jaaka e le kgato ya go thibela gore fa kgato ya bobedi e fitlha, o tshwanetse go oketsa tshouto ke se ka tlhoka go emelana le tlhaselo ka mogare.

en: At my age, I need my health to be the best it can be and I guess also that I contribute to general immunity in the population.
tsn: Ka dingwaga tsa me, ke tlhoka go itekanela thata mme ke tshepa se se ka thusa mo tshoutong ya setšhaba  ka kakaretso.

en: Tsenoli says he is one of the high-risk vulnerable groups.
tsn: Tsenoli a re ke o mongwe wa setlhopha sa batho ba boitekanelo ba bona bo leng bokoa.

en: I do have comorbidity
tsn: Ga ka itekanela mo mmeleng.

en: but I am glad that some of the colleagues have done so too.
tsn: Mme ke itumelela gore bangwe ba baridimmogo ba me ba dirile jalo.

en: A friend also sent me a message from Durban.
tsn: Tsala enngwe ya me e e tswang kwa Durban eng rometse molaetsa.

en: He went to the church in the neighbourhood which was used as a base.
tsn: O ile kwa kerekeng mo motseng e e neng e dirisiwa jaaka motheo.

en: He too was very excited when he sent me the message and appreciated the settings in the province in Umlazi in different places for the over 60, to be able to go and get their injections next to where they live.
tsn: O ne a itumetse thata fa a ne ang nromela molaetsa mme a re o itumelela tsamaiso ya mafelo a a farologaneng a go entwa mo porofenseng mo Umlazi mo batho ba gofeta dingwaga di feta 60 ba yang teng, go fitlhela meento ya bona teng gaufi le mo ba nnang teng.

en: Its a great initiative, I think.
tsn: Ke akanya gore ke tongamaano e e  siameng.

en: It makes for the necessity to combat the disease so that we can get as close to living our normal lives as we can.
tsn: Go botlhokwa go lwantsha bolwetse gore re tle re kgone go ka tswela pele ka matshelo a rona gape jaaka re ne re tlwaetse.

en: However, we need to be patient.
tsn: Le gale, re tshwanetse go nna pelotelele.

en: This requires as many of us to (vaccinate).
tsn: Se se tlhoka gore bontsi jwa rona re (entiwe).

en: Tsenoli also reflected on those who knowingly spread the coronavirus.
tsn: Tsenoli o buile gape ka bao ba ba phasalatsang coronavirus.

en: Two people were fired.
tsn: Batho ba le babedi ba ne ba kobiwa ke batlhankedi.

en: Their case was that they knowingly went to places of work with COVID-19 and therefore this was dangerous to other people they worked with.
tsn: Kgetse ya bona e ne e le gore ba ile kwa mafelo tirong ba ntse ba itse gore ba na le Covid-19 mme se se ne e sele kotsi go batho ba bangwe ba ne ba dira le bona.

en: The court found against them and so decided that the employer was within their right to fire them.
tsn: Kgotlatshekelo e ne ya ba fitlhela ba le molato mme ya bona se se dirileng ke bathapi se le mo molaong.

en: So we have to be conscious that there are consequences for acting irresponsibly when we do know we have COVID to go and join crowds and other places where we should not be and thus spreading the virus.
tsn: Ka jalo re tshwanetse go tlhokomela gore go na le ditlamorago fa o se na maikarabelo o itse gore o na le COVID mme o ya kwa mafelong a a matshwititshwiti le mafelo a re sa tshwanelang go yak wa go o ne mme re phatlhalatsa mogare.

en: Its dangerous, its not worth it.
tsn: E kotsi, ga e busetse sepe.

en: Not all of us have the health ability to withstand disease and so we place many people at risk.
tsn: Ga se botlhe ba re nang le boitekanelo jwa go fenya bolwetse jo mme ka jalo re baya batho ba le bantsi mo kotsing.

en: Its a simple human action when we comply with the restrictions of staying out of crowds and limiting any interaction with a broad big numbers of people.
tsn: Yona ke kgato e e bonolo ya batho fa re ka obamela ditaolo tsa go se ye kwa matshwititshwiting a batho le go lekanyetsa dikgonagano tsa dipalo tse dikgolo tsa batho.

en: It is also appropriate that we sanitise, wash our hands and ensure that we keep our masks,- covering our noses which is not what usually happens in certain instances.
tsn: Gape go botlhokwa gore re dirise sebolayamegare, re tlhape diatla tsa rona le go netefatsa gore re apere dimaseke tsa rona, - tse di bipang dinko tsa rona ka ge e se ka gale e diragala mo mabakeng a a rileng.

en: But largely many people do comply and its great.
tsn: Mme ke batho ba le bantsi ba ba latelang melao e mme go gontle.

en: DA National Spokesperson Siviwe Gwarube says some of the partys 23 MPs who are over the age of 60 have also been vaccinated.
tsn: Mmueledi wa Bosetšhaba wa DA Siviwe Gwarube a re maloko a mangwe go tswa mo malokong a le 23 a lekoko ba ba fetang dingwaga di le 60 ba entilwe.

en: Many of them are looking forward to getting their jabs and they are looking forward to leading by example by getting their jabs.
tsn: Bontsi jwa bona ba itumeletse go fitlhela meento ya bone mme ba labile go etelelapele ka go tlhoma bokao ka go bona meento.

en: A number of them have already had their first jab and will be waiting to get their second jabs as part of the vaccinations process.
tsn: Palo e e rileng ya bona e setse e bone moento wa ntlha mme ba tlile go emela moento wa bobedi wa bone jaaka e le karolo ya thulaganyo ya meento.

en: It is once again disappointing that the vaccination process is not as fast as it should be, simply because we know that it is the only way that we can cushion ourselves against the impact of the third wave and we encourage all people who are over the age of 60, who are health care-workers to get their vaccinations as quickly as possible as quickly as they can.
tsn: Gwa swabisa gape gore tsamaiso ya meento ga e tsamaye ka bonako jaaka go ne go tshwanetse , fela ka gore re a itse gore ke yone fela tsela ya gore re ka itshireletsa kgatlhanong le kgato ya boraro ya leroborobo mme re rotloetsa batho botlhe ba ba dingwaga tse di fetang 60, ba e leng badiri ba pholo go bona meento ka bonako jo bo kgonagalang.

en: Other Members of Parliament over the age of 60 who have registered to be vaccinated, include United Democratic Movement (UDM) leader Bantu Holomisa, Congress of the People (Cope) leader, Mosioua Lekota and former Inkatha Freedom Party (IFP) leader Prince Mangosuthu Buthelezi.
tsn: Ditokololo tse dingwe tsa palamente ba dingwaga tsa go feta 60 ba ba kwadisitsweng go entiwa, ba akaretsa moeteledipele wa United Democratic Movement (UDM) Bantu Holomisa, moeteledipele wa Congress of the People (Cope) Mosioua Lekota, le moeteledipele wa maloba wa Inkatha Freedom Party, Prince Mangosuthu Buthelezi.

en: Holomisa says he is still waiting to receive his notification.
tsn: Holomisa a re o santse a letile go amogela kitsiso ya gagwe.

en: I confirm that I did register for vaccination last month.
tsn: Ke a netefatsa gore ke kwadiseditse go entiwa mo kgweding e e fetileng.

en: But up to date, nobody has contacted me to advise me as to when must I go for vaccination.
tsn: Fela go fitlha jaanong, ga gona ope yo o nkitsiseng gore ke tshwanetse go ya kae go ka fitlhela moento wa me.

en: Remember that people my age have been declared endangered species but the government is failing us.
tsn: Gakologelwa gore batho ba dingwaga tsa me ba re, re batho ba ba leng mo kotsing, mme puso ga e re sireletse.

en: I dont know whether we should organise a Toyi-Toyi so that they can hear us as people over 60 years because this is a government that normally listens when people burn tyres and Toyi-Toyi.
tsn: Ga ke itse gore a re tshwanetse go rulaganya Toyi-Toyi gore ba tle ba kgone go re utlwa jaaka batho ba ba fetang dingwaga di le 60 ka gonne puso e ka tlwaelo, e reetsa fela batho ba tukisa dithaere le go toyi-toya.

en: Maybe we should consider that.
tsn: Gongwe re tshwanetse go tsaya tsia seo.

en: Lekota says he has also not yet received any notification and Prince Buthelezis office says he has not yet been vaccinated.
tsn: Lekota a re le ena ga ise a amogele kitsiso e fe, le ba ofisi ya Prince Buthelezis ba re ga a ise a amogele meonto.

en: 92-year-old Buthelezi has fully recovered after testing positive for COVID-19 last year.
tsn: Buthelezi yo dingwaga di le 92, o fodile sentle morago ga gore teko ya gagwe ya Covid-19 e re o na le mogare wa Covid-19 mo ngwageng o o fetileng.

en: The Democratic Alliance (DA) says it is finalising a Private Members Bill to amend the Referendums Act to enable Premiers to call a provincial referendum on crucial service delivery issues.
tsn: Democratic Alliance (DA) ya re e feleletsa molaotlhomo wa tsa Poraefete go fetola Molao wa Ikatlholelosetšhaba gore Ditonakgolo di kgone go bitsa referantamo tsa diporofense ka ga merero e e botlhokwa ya thebolelo ya ditirelo.

en: The DA is finalising a Bill to amend the Referendums Act to give effect to the Constitutional powers of Premiers to call a provincial referendum.
tsn: DA e feleletsa molaotlhomo go fetola Molao wa Ikatlholelosetšhaba gore Ditonakgolo di kgone go tsamaisa bitsa referantamo tsa diporofense.

en: Greater devolution of powers to Provinces is necessary for better policing, rails and electricity generation.
tsn: Kwelotlsae ya tlhotlhwa e kgolo ya go laola mo di diporofenseng e botlhokwa  mo go tsamaiseng botoka, sepodisi, diterena le motlakase

en: Party Chief Whip Natasha Mazzone says in its current form, the Referendums Act only allows for the President to call a referendum.
tsn: Moemedimogolo wa Lekoko Natasha Mazzone a re mo melaoteong ya bona ya jaanong, Molao wa Ikatlholelosetšhaba, e letlelela fela Moporesidente go bitsa referantamo.

en: She says the draft Bill seeks to address this omission.
tsn: A re kakanyetso ya Molao e batla go bua ka tlhokomogo e.

en: Mazzone says an amendment will enable Premiers to ensure that their residents can make their voices heard on important issues.
tsn: Mazzone a re tlhabololo e tlaa dira gore Botonakgolo ba netefatsa gore baagi ba kgona go bua mme ba utlwa ka ga dintlha tse di botlhokwa.

en: The DA says the government has failed in addressing issues such as rail transport, police deployment and electricity generation.
tsn: DA ya re puso e reteletswe ke go lebagana le mathata a diporo tsa diterena, tlhomelo ya sepodisi le tsamaiso ya motlakase.

en: Public Enterprises Minister Pravin Gordhan has announced Takatso Consortium as the new strategic equity partner for South African Airways.
tsn: Tonakgolo ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba Pravin Gordhan o begile gore Takatso Consortium ke semphato tomaganong sa tekatekano mo South African Airways.

en: Takatso will own 51% of the restructured airline, while the government will hold a 49% stake.
tsn: Takatso e tlaa nna le diphesente di 51 tsa setheo sa difofane se se fetotsweng, fa puso e tlaa nna le diphesente di 49 tsa beng.

en: The government says it will not be putting any more money into the new airline.
tsn: Puso ya re ga e kitla e ntsha madi a mantsi mo setheong se sešwa sa difofane.

en: Takatso will invest just over R3-billion in the new SAA.
tsn: Takatso e tlile go beeletsa madi a kana ka dibilione di le tharo tsa diranta  (R3-billion) go SAA e ntšhwa.

en: Gordhan says government will have a 33% representation in the airlines management while the operational capability will come from SAA staff and the Takatso Consortium.
tsn: Gordhan a re puso e tlaa nna kemedi e kana ka diphesente di le 33 mo bolaoding jwa setheo sa difofane fa tiragatso ya bokgoni e tlaa tswa mo go badiring ba SAA le Takatso consortium.

en: He says a memorandum of understanding between government and Takatso has been signed.
tsn: A re memorantamo wa tumalano magareng ga puso le Takatso setse o saenilwe.

en: Public Enterprises Minister Pravin Gordhan announces equity partner for SAA.
tsn: Tonakgolo ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba, Pravin Gordhan o bega semphato tomaganong sa tekatekano sa SAA.

en: The Democratic Alliance (DA) has raised concerns about the partnership between Takatso Consortium and the South African Airways.
tsn: Ba Democratic Alliance (DA) ba tsositse matshwenyego ka ga tirisanommogo fa gare ga Takatso Consortium le bulela South African Airways.

en: DAs Alf Lees says it remains to be seen how this will work out.
tsn: Alf Lees wa DA a re seno se tlaa tshwanelwa ke go emelwa gore se bonwe gore a se tlaa tswelapele.

en: Interesting thing is that it appears that the 51% shareholding is being gifted to this particular consortium at no cost to the consortium.
tsn: Selo se se makatsang ke gore go lebega e kare diphesente di le 51 tsa beng badišere bo filwe bona ba consortium ka go se nne le ditshenyegelo tse di duetsweng mo setheong.

en: In other words, they are giving it free and we would ask the question as to how come this particular consortium is given a gift of 51% of the shares at SAA when it hasn’t been a public call for a request for proposals.
tsn: Ka fa letlhakoreng le le nngwe, ba e neela tsona mahala mme re ka botsa potso ya gore go tlaa jang gore consortuim eno e nelwe mpho ya diphesente di le 51 tsa dišere tsa SAA go ise go dirwe kopo ya ditshitshinyo tsa setšhaba.

en: The Freedom Front Plus (FF+) says they have been advocating for the privatisation of SAA.FF+ member of Parliament, Wouter Wessels, says this is a good move even though there are concerns.
tsn: Ba Freedom Front Plus (FF +) ba re ba ntse ba tshegetsa kgang ya gore SAA e diriwe setheo sa poraefete. Tokololo ya Palamente ya FF+, Wouter Wessels, a re e ke  kgato e e siameng le fa e le gore go na le matshwenyego.

en: In order for the taxpayer to no longer foot the bill for this failed airline, the bailout should stop.
tsn: Gore baduelalekgetho ba sa tlhole ba duela sekoloto sa setheo sa difofane, go duela go, go tshwanetse go khutla.

en: We do, however, question this specific partnership, the amount of money and we also have to question if they would be a further need for guarantees to get the airline flying again.
tsn: Le fa go ntse jalo, re belaela semphato se, palo ya madi mme tshwanetse go botsa gape Potso ya gore a go tlile go nna le tlhokego ya go netefatsa gore a na setheo sa difofane se tlilego fofa gape.

en: That would be unacceptable as government debt is out of control.
tsn: Seo se ke sa amogelesege jaaka sekoloto sa puso se le kwa ntle ga taolo.

en: Gidon Norvick of Takatso Consortium says the due diligence which will be done on the new SAA in the coming weeks will also include an evaluation of the airlines subsidiaries to assess their viability.
tsn: Gidon Norvick wa dipatlisiso tsa direkoto tsa ditšhelete tsa Takatso consortium a re patlisiso ya direkoto tsa ditšhelete  e tlile go dirwa mo SAA e ntšhwa mo dibekeng tse di tlang mme e tlaa akaretsa le tshekatsheko ya ditlhophana tsa setheo sa difofane go lekola bokgoni jwa bone.

en: Takatso is also expected to discuss the details of an employee share scheme aimed at ensuring that employees also have a stake in the new business.
tsn: Takatso e solofetswe gape go bua ka dintlha tsa thulaganyo ya dišere tsa badiri e ikaelelang go netefatsa gore badiredi ba na le seabe mo kgwebo e ntšhwa.

en: Desmond Latham on SAAs decision to use incoming capital to boost its subsidiaries:
tsn: Desmond Latham ka tshwetso ya go dirisa madi a a tlang mo  SAA go ka tiisa nonofo mo ditlhopheng tse di dirisanang le SAA:

en: It is understood that the chairperson of the board of the new SAA and the majority of the executive team will be South African.
tsn: Go dumelwa gore Modulasetulo wa Boto e ntšhwa ya SAA le Dikhuduthamaga tsa setlhopha e tlile go nna le ma Aforikaborwa a mantsi.

en: We’ve got all the insight and knowledge and the national interest that government brings.
tsn: Re na tshedimosetso le kitso yotlhe lle kgatlhego ya bosetšhaba e puso e tlang ka yona.

en: We’ve got the capital, financial insight and African experience that Harith has and from a Global point of view, we have an incredible depth of experience in the airline industry.
tsn: Re na le matlotlo, ditšhelete le tshedimosetso le maitemogelo a Seaforika harith go tswa mo ntlheng ya kgolokwe ya lefatshe, re na le maitemogelo a a tseneletseng thata mo intaseteri ya ditheo tsa difofane.

en: We’ve got a lot to do and its certainly keeping us up at night.
tsn: Go gontsi go re tshwanetseng go go dira mme seo se dira gore re dire ka thata.

en: We’ve got to figure out which routes to fly, we’ve got to figure out what planes we want to fly, we’ve got to understand the subsidiaries of SAA a lot more than we currently do, Novick elaborates.
tsn: Re tshwanetse go itse gore re a go fofa mo ditseleng tse dife,  re tshwanetse go itse gore re batla go fofisa difofane tse dife, re tshwanetswe go tlhaloganya ditlhophana tsa setheo sa difofane tsa SAA thata go feta ka fa re itseng jaana,  Novick o a lotolotsa.

en: One analyst says the partial privatisation of the troubled national carrier is an important step in the economic reform process.
tsn: Mosekaseki mongwe a re go dira karolo engwe ya bosetšhaba e e nang le mathata kgato ya poraefete ke kgato e e botlhokwa mo tsamaisong ya go tlhabolola ikonomi.

en: The South African Cabin Crew Association (SACCA) says while its happy that the new deal would help create jobs in the sector, it has a lot of unanswered questions about its members at SAA and at subsidiaries like Mango and SAA Technical.
tsn: South African Cabin Crew (SACCA) ya re la fa e itumeletse gore semphato se se tlaa kgona go thusa go tlhola ditiro mo lephateng, e na le dipotso tse dintsi tse di sa arabiwang ka ga maloko a yone kwa SAA le kwa ditlhophana tsa setheo jaaka Mango le tsa Setegeniki sa SAA.

en: SACCAs Christopher Shabangu says, We really, as labour, have to be involved and understand what is going on  these are the people that have lost everything.
tsn: Christopher Shabangu wa SACCA a re, tota jaaka re le ba bodiridi, re tshwanetse go nna le seabe le go tlhaloganya gore go diragala eng mo, ba ke batho ba latlhegetswe ke sengwe le sengwe.

en: Additional reporting by Naledi Ngcobo.
tsn: Tlaleletso ya go bega ka Naledi Ngcobo.

en: Congress of the People (COPE) leader Mosioua Lekota says he has been to the Electoral Commission (IEC), participating in the inquiry led by former Deputy Chief Justice Dikgang Moseneke on whether or not the country is ready to conduct local government elections (LGE) under the coronavirus period.
tsn: Moeteledipele wa Congress of the People (COPE)  Mosioua Lekota a re o tswa kwa Khomišine ya Ditlhopho (IEC), e e neng e eteletswepele ke Motlatsa Moatlhodimogolo Dikgang Moseneke mo go yona neng go buiwa gore Ee naga ipaankantse kgotsa nnyaa naga ga e a siama go ka dira ditlhopho tsa dipusoselegae (Local Government Elecetions “LGE”) mo nakong ya coronavirus.

en: Lekota says, according to the Constitution of the country, every five years there must be local government elections and that cant be ignored.
tsn: Lekota a re, go ya ka Molaotheo wa naga ya rona, mo dingwageng di le tlhano go tshwanetse ga nna le ditlhopho tsa dipusoselegae mme seo re ka se ikgatholose sona.

en: He adds that lack of service delivery at the municipality level leaves South Africans with no choice but to head to the polls for the much-needed change.
tsn: O ne a oketsa ka gore tlhaelo ya thebolo ya ditirelo mo memasepaleng e dira gore Maaforikaborwa a se a nna le kgeto mme ba ye go dira ditlhopho tse di ka tlhokegang go ka bona diphetogo.

en: The COPE leader spoke to the media outside of the Constitutional Court, as the country marks a year since an order to Parliament that the countrys electoral system must be changed to allow independent candidates to participate in National and Provincial elections.
tsn: Moeteledipele wa COPE o bua le babegakgang kwa ntle ga Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo, jaaka e le ngwaga naga fa e sa le go nna le taelo ya go tswa kwa Palamenteng gore tsamaiso ya ditlhopho e tshwanetse go fetolwa gore le ba ba ikemetseng ba kgone go tsaya karolo mo ditlhophong tsa Bosetšhaba le tsa Porofense.

en: Five years of this current government has passed.
tsn: Dingwaga di le tlhano tsa mmuso wa jaanong e fetile.

en: We must now go and give the people an opportunity to elect who they want, who is going to be capable of correcting the conditions under which they live in.
tsn: Jaanong re tshwanetse go naya batho tšhono ya go tlhopha batho ba ba ba batlang, ba ba tlileng go nna le bokgoni jwa go siamisa maemo a a ka fa tlase a ba tshelang mo go lona.

en: I was personally part of the meeting of the IEC and I did say that we must go and vote.
tsn: Ke ne ke nna karolo ya kopano ya IEC mme ke rile re tshwanetse go ya ro bouta.

en: Meanwhile, answering questions in the National Council of Provinces (NCOP) on Thursday, President Cyril Ramaphosa appealed to South Africans to give the Electoral Commission and the Moseneke Inquiry time to determine whether the conditions are conducive for free and fair elections this year.
tsn: Re sa ntse re le foo, Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa a ntse araba dipotso ka mo Khanseleng ya Bosetšhaba ya Diporofense (National Council of Provinces ‘NCOP’) ka Labone, o kopile Maaforikaborwa go neela Khomišene ya Ditlhopho le Moseneke wa Dipatlisiso nako ya go bona gore a maemo a asiametse le go lokola go ka dira ditlhopho tse di siameng ngwaga ono.

en: He said no other date has been determined for holding the elections other than October 27 which he announced earlier this year.
tsn: O rile ga gona letlha le le tlhophilweng go ka tshwara ditlhopho kwa ntleng ga di 27 tsa Diphalane mo go itsisiwe kwa tshimologong ya ngwaga ono.

en: President Ramaphosa suggested that at this stage, there is no reason to believe that the date for local government elections would be shifted.
tsn: Moporesitente Ramaphosa o tshitshinya gore ka nako e, ga go na lebaka la go dumela gore letlha la ditlhopho tsa dipusoselegae le tla fetolwa.

en: -Additional reporting Zalene Merrington
tsn: Tlaleletso ya go bega ka Zalene Merrington

en: In the video below the IEC launches the 2021 Municipal Elections:
tsn: Mo bidiong e e fa tlase IEC e tlhoma Ditlhopho tsa Mmasepala tsa 2021:

en: The National Director of Public Prosecutions, Shamila Batohi says they require financial evidence from the United Arab Emirates of members of the Gupta family who are wanted in South Africa on charges of corruption, money laundering and fraud.
tsn: Mokaedi wa Bosetšhaba wa Botšhutšhisi jwa Setšhaba, Shamila Batohi a re ba tlhoka bopaki jwa madi go tswa mo go malokong a United Arab Emirates a lelapa la Gupta ba batlegang mo Aforikaborwa mabapi le ditiro tsa bobodu, tsamaiso e e seng ya semolao ya madi le bonweenwee.

en: The NPAs Investigating Directorate issued warrants of arrests for the Guptas last week and asked Interpol for assistance to get them deported to South Africa.
tsn: Bokaedi ba Dipatlisiso ba NPA ba ntshitshe ditaelo tsa tshwaro ya di Gupta mo bekeng e e fetileng mme e kopile Interpol  gore e ba thuse ka go ba tshwara mme ba kgone go busetswa mo Aforikaborwa.

en: The Guptas are believed to have fled to the UAE in early 2018 as criminal investigations for alleged corruption accelerated.
tsn: Go dumelwa gore diGuptas di tshabetse kwa go UAE mo tshimologong ya 2018 fa dipatlisiso tsa bosenyi le bobodu, di simologa.

en: Batohi says the suspects bank records will help them with their investigation into the corruption they committed in South Africa.
tsn: Batohi a re direkoto tsa babelaelwa di tlile go ba thusa ka dipatlisiso tsa bonwenwe jo ba bodirileng mo Aforikaborwa.

en: She says there will be legal processes with regards to the extradition.
tsn: A re go tlile go nna le dithulaganyo tsa semolao go amana le pusetsogae ya basenyi.

en: Hopefully once that happens there would be legal processes with regard to the extradition of those persons.
tsn: Re solofela gore fa se se diragala go tlaa nna le dithulaganyo tsa semolao mabapi le pusetsogae ya basenyi bao.

en: To put it very very simply that is essentially what it means.
tsn: Go baya fela ke gore ka nnete ntse jalo

en: It means Interpol working to assisting and tracing these persons and the whereabouts have been established work with the local authority to effect the arrest.
tsn: Se se kaya gore Interpol e thusa ka go batla le go sala morago batho ba mme ba dirisana le sepodisi sa pusoselegae gore batle ba kgone go a tshwara.

en: The Gupta name has become synonymous with accusations of state capture in SA.
tsn: Leina le la Gupta le fetogile go nna lekaelagongwe la ditatofatso tsa state capture puso mo Aforikaborwa.

en: The family faces allegations of corruption at parastatals and provincial governments, to the tune of around R49 billion.
tsn: Balelapa ba lebane le ditatofatso tsa bobodu mekgatlhong le dipuso tsa diporofense, ka madi akana ka billione di le 49 tsa diranta.

en: Ratification of treaties
tsn: Tumelano ya semmuso

en: Earlier on Friday, Justice and Correctional Services Minister Ronald Lamola said the UAE is not cooperating with South Africa, in accordance with the extradition treaty ratified by the two countries.
tsn: Go sa le gale ka Labotlhano, Tonakgolo ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopolo, Ronald Lamola o rile UAE ga e dirisane le Aforikaborwa, go ya ka tumelano ya pusetsogae ya bosenyi ya tumelano ya dinaga tse pedi.

en: The agreement between South Africa and the UAE on extradition and legal assistance in criminal matters was signed in 2018.
tsn: Tumalano magareng ga Aforikaborwa le EAU ka pusetsogae ya bosenyi le thuso ya semolao mo tsa bogodu e ne ya saeniwa ka 2018.

en: Lamola says South Africa will continue to pursue this matter until justice is served.
tsn: Lamola a re Aforikaborwa e tlile go tswelapele ka go tsweletsa morero o go fitlhela toka e diragala .

en: Irrespective of the fact that both South Africa and the UAE ratified this convention, regrettably we have to date not experienced a level of appreciation and cooperation which is required in terms of the convention in the fight against corruption from the UAE.
tsn: Go sa kgathalasege gore Aforikaborwa le UAE ba sainile tumelano e, ka maswabi, re tshwanetse go simolola ka letlha la kamogelo le le nang le tirisanommogo e e tlhokegang go ya ka tumelano mo ntweng kgatlhanong le Bobodu ba UAE.

en: However, we will continue to pursue our counterparts through diplomatic channels in order to reach the desired levels of cooperation to enable our law enforcement agencies to bring to justice persons of interest of any investigations they are pursuing.
tsn: Le fa go ntse jalo, re tlile go tswelapele ka go batla thuso go balekane ba bone ka thuso ya mosele wa badipolomate gore ba kgone go fitlhelela maemo a a tlhokegang go kgontsha tirisano ya ditheo tsa rona tsa tiragatso ya molao di kgone go tshwara basenyi ba ba latofadiwang ka dipatlisiso tse ba di setseng morago.

en: Minister of Justice and Correctional Services Ronald Lamola to update the nation on ratification of treaties regarding extradition and mutual legal assistance between SA and the United Arab Emirates.
tsn: Tonakgolo ya Bosiamisi le Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo Ronald Lamola o tlile go bua le setšhaba mabapi le tumelano ya go sainiwa ya pusetsogae ya basenyi malebana le tumelano ya thuso ya semolao e e magareng ga Aforikaborwa le United Arab Emirates.

en: Mineral Resources and Energy Minister Gwede Mantashe says government has noted that load shedding presents a massive risk to the economy.
tsn: Tonakgolo ya Dimenerale le Maatla Gwede Mantashe re puso e e lemogile gore kgaogo ya motlakase e tlisa kotsi e kgolo mo ikonoming.

en: The Minister says crucial steps had to be followed on the path to better energy supply.
tsn: Tonakgolo ya re dikgato tse di masisi di tshwanetse go latelwa gore go kgone go nna le tlamelo e e botoka ya motlakase.

en: President Cyril Ramaphosa announced a partial liberalisation of the energy sector on Thursday, lifting governments limit on self-generation of power from one megawatt to 100 megawatts.
tsn: Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa o buile ka kitsiso le kgololo ya lephata la maatla ka Labone, go Lekanyetsa Maatla a puso mo self-generation megawatt go tswa mo go nngwe ya dimekawate di le 100.

en: Mantashe says the achievement of energy security is one of the key economic interventions in the recovery and reconstruction plan but concedes that its long overdue.
tsn: Mantashe a re diphitlhelelo tsa tshireletso ya maatla ke tsereganyo e e botlhokwa ya nonoo ya ikonomi le maano a kagosešwa mme concedes gore bogologolo.

en: Im interested in Eskom recovering, developing its capacity and doing well.
tsn: Ke na le kgatlhego mo go boneng Eskom e nonofa mme e tlhabolola bokgoni jwa yone le go dira sentle.

en: Now when you run entities you must have rules and there will be chaos if you break these rules.
tsn: Jaanong fa o tsamaisa ditlamo o tshwanetse go nna le melao mme go tlaa nna le tlhakatlhakano fa go sa obamelwe melao e.

en: That is why we took long engagement(s).
tsn: Ke ka moo re tsere nako e telele ka dipuisano.

en: When the President was twisting my arm l had to concede because you are a Minister, people who have ideas must put their ideas before you and your team reaches a particular determination, says Mantashe.
tsn: Fa Poresidente a kgatelela ka gore ke dumele ka ntlha ya gore ke Tonakgolo, o tshwanetse go baya dikakanyo tse batho ba nang le tsona pele mme badirammogo ba gago ba tshwanetse go fitlhelela tshwetso e e rileng, a re yalo Mantashe.

en: Mantashe was speaking on the SABCs The Watchdog programme hosted by Vuyo Mvoko:
tsn: Mantashe ne a bua mo lenaneong la SABC la The Watchdog le le tshwerweng ke Vuyo Mvoko:

en: Meanwhile, Business Unity South Africa (BUSA) president Sipho Pityana says companies are willing to work with labour, government and civil society to assist in moving South Africa out of the energy crisis it currently faces.
tsn: Re sa ntse re le foo, Moporesidente wa  Business Unity South Africa (BUSA) Sipho Pityana a re ditlamo di ba batla go dira le badiri, puso le setšhaba ka go thusa gore Aforikaborwa e tswe ka fa gare ga mathata a e lebaneng le one a motlakase go na jaana.

en: Pityana was responding to President Ramaphosas announcement of a partial liberalisation of the energy sector.
tsn: Pityana o ne a tsibogela se se buileng ke Moporesitente Ramaphosa ka kitsiso ya kgololo ya maatla.

en: Eskom is expected to continue with Stage three load shedding until the end of this week.
tsn: Eskom e solofetswe go tswelapele ka kgato ya boraro ya kgaogo ya motlakase go fitlha mafelo a beke e.

en: The video below looks at the amendment to Schedule 2 of the Electricity Regulations Act:
tsn: Bidio e e fa tlase e lebelela tlhabololo ya mametlelelo ya bobedi (2) ya Melawana ya motlakase:

en: The challenge to the rules of the National Assembly by which heads of Chapter Nine institutions can be removed from office has entered a new phase.
tsn: Kgwetlho ya melawana ya Kokoano Bosetšhaba e e latelang theo ya Kgaolo ya Borobongwe e ka tlosiwa mo tirong e mo paka e ntšhwa.

en: Following a challenge by the Public Protector which was heard from Monday to Wednesday, the Western Cape High Court has started hearing a challenge by the group, Democracy In Action (DIA).
tsn: Go latela kgwetlho ya Mosireletsi wa setšhaba e e neng e simolotse ka Mosupologo go fitlha Laboraro, Kgotlhatshekelokgolo ya Kapa Bophirima e setse e simolotse go utlwa kgwetlho ya setlhopha sa, Democracy In Action (DIA).

en: The DIA has introduced a new challenge that was not raised by the Public Protector.
tsn: DIA e tlhagisitse kgwetlho e ntšhwa e e sa tlhagisiwang ke Mosireletsi wa Setšhaba.

en: They say the new rules are unconstitutional because they did not involve public participation.
tsn: Ba re melawana e mentšhwa ga e mo molaotheong ka gonne ga ba akaretsa botsayakarolo jwa setšhaba.

en: The DIA has been openly supporting the Public Protector in her legal troubles.
tsn: DIA e ntse e tshegetsa Mosireletsi wa Setšhaba ka mathata a semolao.

en: The organisation has already raised thousands of rands to help her cover some of the personal costs imposed by courts.
tsn: Mokgatlho o setse o tlhagisitse diketekete tsa diranta go mo thusa go duelela dingwe tsa ditshenyegelo tsa gagwe tse di lebisitsweng ke dikgotlatshekelo.

en: Their legal representative, Advocate Vuyani Ngalwana, says the making of the rules is a law making process and should, therefore, have been canvassed with a wide range of South Africans.
tsn: Moemedi wa bone wa semolao, Vuyani Ngalwana, a re go dira Melawana ke tiragatso ya molao mme ka jalo, e ne e tshwanetse, go itsisiwe bontsi jwa Aforikaborwa a a farologaneng.

en: DIA is arguing that Parliament has no power to pass rule:
tsn: DIA ya re Palamente ga e na maatla a go fetisa molao o:

en: Like the Public Protector earlier this week, the DIA has also argued that the appointment of a judge by the Speaker was unconstitutional.
tsn: Jaaka Mosireletsi wa Setšhaba lea buile ka gale mo tshimologong ya beke e, DIA e buile le yona kgatlhanong le go tlhomiwa ga moatlhodi ka mmusakgotla go ne go se ka fa Molaotheong.

en: Based on the rules, Speaker Thandi Modise had appointed a panel of experts led by retired Judge Bess Nkabinde to advise her on whether there were grounds for a parliamentary investigation.
tsn: Go ikaegilwe ka melao e, Mmusakgotla Thandi Modise o tlhomile setlhopha sa baitseanape se se eteletsweng pele ke Moatlhodi yo o rotseng tiro Bess Nkabinde go mo gakolola ka gore a go ne go na le mabaka a patlisiso ya Palamente.

en: Ngalwana says the Speaker has no such authority.
tsn: Ngalwana a re Mmusakgotla ga ana botšhotšhisi jo bo ntseng jalo.

en: He says the department has not been successful to secure the shortfall from National Treasury.
tsn: A re lefapha ga le ise le atlege go bona bokana bo bo tlhokiwang go tswa go letlotlo la setšhaba.

en: Mthethwa was addressing the media in Pretoria in response to concerns raised by artists over the stimulus package.
tsn: Mthethwa o ne a bua le bobegakgang kwa Pretoria ka go tsibogela matshwenyego a a tlhagisitsweng ke batswerentshi ka ntlha ya matlole.

en: Management was not doing things alone.
tsn: Batsamaisi ba ne ba sa dire dilo ka bobona.

en: An oversight body was there and people have to answer to that in particular.
tsn: Bookamedi bo ne bo le teng mme batho ba tshwanetse go arabela seo

en: In the past few weeks while this whole thing was unfolding, we’ve been trying to see where we can get additional funds to cover the short fall, because, ladies and gentlemen, the problem R300 million is the shortfall.
tsn: Mo dibekeng di le mmalwa tse di fetileng fa kgang e ntse e tsweletse, re ntse re leka go bona fa re ka kgona go bona matlole a a okeditsweng go tlaleletsa, ka gonne, bomme le borre, bothata ke gore go tlhaela madi a a kanang ka dimiilione di le R300.

en: As the minister ultimately responsible, I want to issue an unconditional apology to the sector as whole for being let down by our entities in this instance by the National Arts Council and in the process, exposing the most vulnerable sector in our society during this period of COVID-19, the Minister says.
tsn: Jaaka Tona e kwa bofelong e tsayang maikarabelo, ke batla go kopa maitshwarelo go lekala lotlhe ka go swabisiwa ke khansele ya bosetšhaba ya botsweretshi, mme mo go yona ntlha eo, re tlhagise gape le lekala le le sa sireletsegang mo setšhabeng sa rona mo nakong e ya covid-19. Go bua tona.

en: Mthethwa says there will also be a review of payments.
tsn: Mthethwa a re go tlaa nna gape le tshekatsheko ya dituelo.

en: This includes those who’ve received multiple funds for their companies.
tsn: Seno se akaretsa ba ba amogetseng madi kwa ditlamong tsa bona.

en: Kwaito legend, Arthur Mafokate, was accused of claiming funds using multiple companies, but refutes the allegations.
tsn: Naledi ya mmino wa Kwaito, Arthur Mafokate o ne a latofadiwa ka go ntsha matlole a dirisa ditlamo tse dintsi tse di farologaneng, mme o ganetsane le ditatofatso.

en: Mthethwa hopes the review will assist in addressing the shortfall.
tsn: Mthethwa o solofela gore thadiso e tlaa thusa mo go samaganeng le madi a a tlhaelang.

en: There is a process of investigating duplications, or of people who may be in a process or possibility of getting more within their area.
tsn: Go na le thulaganyo ya go batlisisa dipoeletso, kgotsa ya batho ba ba ka nnang mo thulaganyong kgotsa kgonagalo ya go bona madi a mantsi mo mafelong a bona.

en: Because of the adjustments which are being done with regards to the shortfall, a lot of things are being reviewed even people who have been promised to get money from multi sources, he explains.
tsn: Ka ntlha ya diphetogo tse dirwang ka ntlha ya tlhaelo ya madi, dilo di le dintsi di a sekasekiwang le batho ba ba ntseng ba solofeditswe go bona madi go tswa mo metsweding e e farologaneng, o a tlhalosa.

en: Acting Director General in the Sport, Arts and Culture Department, Vusithemba Ndima, says 505 beneficiaries have been paid up to now from the R300 million thats at the centre of the artists anger.
tsn: Mokaedi wa nama-o-sa-tshwere mo Lefapheng la Metshameko, Botsweretshi le Setso, Vusithemba Ndima, a re baamogeladitshiamelo ba 505, ba duetswe go fitlha jaanong, go tswa mo dimilioneng di le 300 , e leng yona e leng magareng ga tšhakgalo ya batsweretshi.

en: Ndima says a further 315 applications are being processed and payments will be made by the end of this week.
tsn: Ndima a re dikopo di le 315 di a baankanngwa mme dituelo di tlaa dirwa ka mafelo a beke.

en: He was also addressing the media in Pretoria.
tsn: Gape o ne a bua le bobegakgang kwa Pretoria.

en: This week they’ve received about 318 that will be paid in the next three days.
tsn: Mo bekeng eno ba amogetse bokana ka 318, tse di tlaa duelwang mo malatsing a le mararo a a latelang.

en: That will then say numerically we will have paid 823 beneficiaries.
tsn: Seo se tlaa kaya gore, fa re ya ka tatelano ya dipalo, re tlaa bo re duetse batho ba le 823.

en: And the balance that will be left will 385.
tsn: Mme madi a a tlabong a saletse kwa morago ke 385.

en: I just thought that it’s very important that we clarify that despite all the trails that we going through work is continuing, says the acting DG.
tsn: Ke ne ke akanya gore go botlhokwa thata gore re netefatse gore, le fa re lebane le dikgwetlho, tiro e a tswelela, go bua Mokaedi-kakaretso wa nama-o-sa-tshwere

en: Artists vow to continue with sit-in over COVID-19 relief fund.
tsn: Batsweretshi bai kana go tswelela pele ka go dula koo ka ntlha ya  matlole a COVID-19.

en: Its a premise so unexpected, so curious, that it just might have enticed audiences to watch Nobody, a revenge thriller that sees an otherwise unassuming Odenkirk (Breaking Bad, Better Call Saul) kick ass and take names.
tsn: Ke sengwe se se neng se sa solofelwa, se se dirang gore batho ba nne le kgatlhego ya go itse, mo e leng gore e ka tswa e ngokile babogedi go lebelela Nobody, e e leng baesekopo ya ipusolosetso, e mo go yona re bonang Odenkirk (Breaking Bad, Better Call Saul) a dira dikgagamatso mme a tsaya maina.

en: Nobody debuted atop domestic box office charts, generating $6.7 million from 2,460 venues.
tsn: Nobody e tlhageletse lwantlha kwa maemong a a kwa godimo mo ditšhateng tsa Box Office, mme ya dira dimilione di le $6.7 milione go tswa kwa mafelong a le 2,460.

en: Its a solid but not stellar start as movie theaters in Los Angeles and around the country begin to reopen in earnest.
tsn: Ke tshimologo e e tsepameng mme e le kwa tlase jaaka mafelo a bobogelo kwa Los Angeles le go ralala naga a simolola go bula gape ka botswapelo.

en: Directed by Ilya Naishuller, Nobody was well received by critics and audiences.
tsn: Jaaka e ne e tsamaisiwa ke Naishuller, Nobody e amogetswe sentle thata ke batshwayadiphoso le babogedi.

en: It centers on a mild-mannered suburban dad who goes into vigilante mode after someone breaks into his house.
tsn: E ikaegile ka rre wa kwa toropong, yo o nang le maitseo a a mo magareng, yo o itseelang molao mo matsogong morago ga gore mongwe a mo thubele kwa ntlong ya gagwe.

en: At the international box office, Nobody added another $5 million, boosting its worldwide haul to $11.7 million.
tsn: Kwa Box Office ya boditšhabatšhaba, Nobody e tsentse dimilione di le $5, e oketsa palo ya yona ya lefatshe ka bophara go ya go dimilione di le $11.7.

en: With solid word-of-mouth and without notable competition, Nobody is primed to stick around on the big screen before Universal puts the film on premium video-on-demand in a matter of weeks.
tsn: Ka puo ya molomo fela, kwa ntle ga kgaisano e e bonagalang, Nobody e lebeletswe go nna e le teng kwa bobogelong pele ga Universal e baya filimi e maemong a dibio tse di lebelelwang thata mo sebakeng sa dibeke.

en: The budget was $16 million, so it shouldn’t be difficult to get out of the red.
tsn: Tekanyetsokabo e ne e le dimilione di le $16, ka jalo ga go a tshwanela go nna boima go e ntsha mo mathateng.

en: Though Nobody easily topped box office charts in the US, the film was hardly the biggest winner of the weekend.
tsn: Le fa Nobody e tsere maemo a a kwa godimo a ditšhate tsa Box Office kwa US, filimi e, e ne e se yona mofenyi yo mogolo wa  mafelo a beke.

en: Outside of North America, Godzilla vs. Kong kicked off internationally with a massive $121 million from 28 countries.
tsn: Kwa ntle ga Bokone jwa Amerika, Godzilla vs. Kong e simolotse kwa dinageng di sele ka dimilione di le $121 go tswa kwa dinageng di le 28.

en: The Warner Bros. movie pitting the iconic monsters against each other in the matchup for the ages had an especially impressive start in China, where it amassed $70.3 million over the three-day stretch.
tsn: Filimi ya The Warner Bros, e e neng e tsenya dilalome tse pedi tse mo kgaisanong, e nnile le tshimologo e e itumedisang thata kwa China, koo e kokoantseng dimilione di le  $70.3 mo pakeng ya malatsi a mararo.

en: Ticket sales for Godzilla vs. Kong, a co-production with Legendary Entertainment, mark the biggest opening weekend in China for a non-local film.
tsn: Dithekiso tsa ditekethe tsa Godzilla vs. Kong, ntshokuno e e kopanetsweng le Legendary Entertainment, di tshwaya pulo e kgolo ya mafelo a beke kwa China, ya filimi e e seng ya koo.

en: That could bode well as the film gears up to open in the US on Wednesday in theaters and on HBO Max.
tsn: Tseo di ka tsamaelana sentle jaaka filimi e, e ipaakanyetsa go bula kwa US ka Laboraro kwa mafelong a bobogelo le mo HBO Max.

en: Aside from Godzilla vs. Kong (March 31) and another Warners title, video game adaptation Mortal Kombat (April 16), domestic movie theater marquees will be light on new releases in early spring.
tsn: Kwa ntle ga Godzilla vs.Kong (Mopitlwe 31) le setlhogo se sengwe sa Warners, motshameko wa dibidio, Adaptation Mortal Kombat (Moranang 16), bobogelo jwa difilimi tsa selegae di tlaa iketlela kgololo e ntšhwa ka tshimologo ya dikgakologo.

en: that’s because Disney majorly overhauled its film calendar last week, delaying or amending plans for several titles, including Black Widow, Emma Stones Cruella, Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings, Pixars Luca.
tsn: Seo ke ka ntlha ya gore Disney e diegisitse khalendara ya yona ya difilimi thata mo bekeng e e fetileng, go diegisa kgotsa go fetola maano a ditlhogo di le mmalwa, go akaretsa Black Widow, Emma Stones, Cruella, Shang-Chi le The Legend of the Ten Rings, Pixars Luca.

en: In perhaps the biggest blow to cinema operators, Black Widow was pushed from May 7 to July 9.
tsn: Mo se gongwe e leng go gatelelwa ga batsamaisi ba mafelo a bobogelo, Black Widow e tlositswe go di 7 tsa kgwedi ya Motsheganong go ya di 9 tsa kgwedi ya Phukwi.

en: The Marvel superhero adventure will premiere simultaneously in theaters and on Disney Plus for a premium $30 rental fee.
tsn: Filimi ya Marvel superhero e tlaa tshamekiwa ka nako e le nngwe kwa mafelong a bobogelo le mo Disney Plus ka rente ya madi a a kanang ka $30.

en: Cruella, an origin story for the 101 Dalmatians villain, will similarly launch theatrically and on the company’s streaming platform when it arrives on May 28.
tsn: Cruella, kgang  ya masenyeletsa wa 101 Dalmatians, le yona e tlaa thangkgololwa kwa mafelong a bogogelo mo polatefomong ya mafatlharatlha fa e goroga ka di 28 tsa kgwedi ya Motsheganong.

en: Disney has tested several hybrid strategies amid the pandemic, most recently with the animated adventure Raya and the Last Dragon.
tsn: Disney e lekile maano a le mmalwa a a farologaneng ka nako ya leroborobo, sešweng jaana ka filimi ya dikhathunu ya Raya le ya Last Dragon.

en: The animated adventure, currently in theaters, slipped to second place on box office charts with $3.5 million in its fourth weekend of release.
tsn: Filimi ya dikhathunu, e ga jaana e leng kwa mafelong a bobogelo, e tsene mo maemong a bobedi mo ditšhateng tsa Box Office ka dimilione di le $3.5 mo kgololong ya yona ya bone ya mafelo a beke.

en: So far the film, which is also available to Disney Plus subscribers on Premier Access, has made $28 million in US theaters and $82 million globally.
tsn: Go fitlha ga jaana filimi e, e e leng teng go badirisi ba Disney Plus e dirile dimilione di le $28 kwa mafelong a bobogelo a kwa US le dimilione di le $82 lefatshe ka bophara.

en: Tom and Jerry came in third place with $2.5 million from 2,464 locations.
tsn: Tom & Jerry e ne e le mo maemong a boraro ka dimilione di le $2.5 go tswa kwa mafelong a a farologaneng a le dimilione di le 2,464.

en: After five weeks in theaters, the Warner Bros. live-action-animated hybrid has amassed $37 million.
tsn: Morago ga dibeke di le tlhano kwa mafelong a bobogelo, mofuta wa filimi ya dikhathunu ya The Warner Bros e fitlheletse dimilione di le  $37.

en: At No. 4, Lionsgate’s sci-fi fantasy film Chaos Walking pulled in $1.18 million for a domestic tally of $11.3 million.
tsn: Mo legatong la bone, filimi ya go ijesa ditoro ya Lionsgate, Chaos Walking, e tsentse dimilione di le $1.18 milione tsa rekoto ya palogotlhe ya dimilione di le $11.3.

en: The Courier, a Cold War drama led by Benedict Cumberbatch and Rachel Brosnahan, rounded out the top five with $1 million, bringing its overall ticket sales to $3.4 million.
tsn: The Courier, terama ya ntwa e e setlhogo e e eteletsweng pele ke Benedict Cumberbatch le Rachel Brosnahan, di fitlhile kwa go tse tlhano tse di kwa godimo ka milione e le $1 e e tlisitseng kakaretso ya dithekiso tsa ditekethe go dimilione di le $3.4.

en: Human Rights violations against those who live with disabilities have resulted in the establishment of the Zozibini Nangamso Foundation for the physically challenged in the Eastern Cape.
tsn: Kgatako ya ditshwanelo tsa botho kgatlhanong le batho ba ba tshelang ka bogole, e feleleditse e dirile gore go tlhomiwe setheo sa Zozibini Nangamso sa ba ba golafetseng mo mmeleng kwa Kapa Botlhaba.

en: The foundation, which has been established by youth, aims to address challenges such as discrimination, sexual and physical abuse, inaccessibility of buildings and public transport for people living with disabilities in the OR Tambo district.
tsn: Setheo se se tlhomilweng ke bašwa se, e ikaelela go samagana le dikgwetlho tse di tshwanang le kgethololo, Tshotlako ya thobalano le ya mo mmeleng, go palelwa ke go dirisa dikago le dipalangwa tsa botlhe ga batho ba ba tshelang ka bogole mo sedikeng sa OR Tambo.

en: Access to government services is another major challenge facing this population.
tsn: Phitlhelelo ya ditirelo tsa puso ke kgwetlho e nngwe e kgolo e baagi ba lebaneng le yona.

en: Ill-treatment of people living with disabilities is still rife especially in rural areas such as the OR Tambo and Alfred Nzo Districts.
tsn: Go sa tsholwe sentle ga batho ba ba tshelang ka bogole go santse go le kwa godimo, segolobogolo mo mafelong a magae jaaka dikgaolo tsa OR Tambo le Alfred Nzo.

en: Access to education, sexual abuse, and misuse of their social grant are some of the challenges facing those living with disabilities.
tsn: Phitlhelelo ya thuto, tshotlako ka thobalano, le tiriso e e botlhaswa ya madi a loago, ke dingwe tsa dikgwetlho tse di lebaganeng le ba ba tshelang ka bogole.

en: The establishment of Zozibini Nangamso Foundation for the Physically Challenged seeks to fight for the rights of this neglected population.
tsn: Tlhomo ya setheo sa Zozibini Nangamso sa ba ba tshelang ka bogole, se batla go lwela ditshwanelo tsa batho ba ba ikgatholositsweng.

en: Founder Sisona Mditshane says, I have an experience.
tsn: Mosimolodi Sisona Mditshane a re,  ke na le maitemogelo.

en: I have been discriminated against at school even by the older people telling me that I have one eye and all that.
tsn: Ke ntse ke kgethololwa kwa sekolong, le ke batsofe tota ba mpolela gore ke na le leitlho le lengwe.

en: So, I feel like if I create this foundation can bring back the confidence of the people who are disabled.
tsn: Ka jalo, ke ikutlwa ekare fa ke bula setheo se, ke tla kgona go busetsa go itshepa ga batho ba ba nang le bogole.

en: And I can bring back the confidence to know that they are capable of doing anything with the disability or not.
tsn: Mme nka  busetsa go itshepa ga bona le go itse gore ba ka kgona go dira sengwe le sengwe, ba na le bogole kgotsa ba se na jona.

en: Wheelchair-bound Zebron Ntsiba says accessing government buildings and using public transport is a challenge for him.
tsn: Zebron Ntsiba yo o tsamayang ka setulo sa maotwana a re, go tsena kwa dikagong tsa puso le go dirisa dipalangwa tsa botlhe ke kgwetlho mo go ene.

en: Our main challenge is inaccessible buildings here in Mthatha.
tsn: Kgwetlho ya rona e kgolo ke go fithilela dikago tse di mo Mthatha.

en: We cannot go to the second or third floor.
tsn: Re ka se kgone go ya kwa folorong ya bobedi kgotsa ya boraro.

en: That is when you realise that really you are disabled because you cannot go to the offices.
tsn: Ke teng fa o lemogang gone gore tota o tshela ka bogole ka ntlha fa o ka se kgone go etela dikantoro.

en: Activist Pinky Mkhathala says rejection at home and at workplaces remains a pain for most people living with disabilities.
tsn: Molweladiphetogo Pinky Mkhathala a re, go se amogelwe ga mo gae le kwa mafelong a tiro, go botlhoko go bontsi jwa batho ba ba tshelang ka bogole.

en: We are even rejected by our own families.
tsn: Re itatolwa le ke ba malapa a rona tota.

en: Sometimes, if you are physically challenged, you feel more pain when people do not want to take us as the people with disabilities.
tsn: Ka dinako tse dingwe, Fa o tshela ka bogole, o utlwa botlhoko fa batho ba sa batle go nna le rona jaaka batho ba ba nang le bogole .

en: We ask the government at least to help us not to sit at home doing nothing, but to have a job.
tsn: Re kopa puso go re thusa gore re seke ra nna kwa gae re sa dire sepe , mme re nne le ditiro.

en: Because if we apply for jobs, they do not even recognise us.
tsn: Ka ntlha ya gore fa re fa tsenya dikopo tsa ditiro, ga ba re lemoge le eseng.

en: Social Development MEC, Siphokazi Mani-Lusithi has applauded the foundation for advocating for the rights of those living with disabilities.
tsn: MEC wa Tlhabololo ya Loago Siphokazi Mani-Lusithi o akgotse setheo se ka go lwela ditshwanelo tsa ba ba tshelang ka bogole.

en: People living with disabilities want the government to put into practice what is enshrined in the constitution in terms of recognising them.
tsn: Batho ba ba tshelang ka bogole ba batla gore puso e tsenye tirisong se se akarediwang mo Molaotheong mo ntlheng ya kamogelo ya bona.

en: They feel excluded in many government programmes, especially those living in rural areas.
tsn: Ba ikutlwa ba kgapetswe kwa thoko mo mananeong a mantsi a puso, segolobogolo ba ba tshelang mo mafelong a magae.

en: About 50km outside South Africa’s biggest city, Johannesburg, lies one of the most important sites in human prehistory: the Cradle of Humankind.
tsn: Dikilometarata di le 50 kwa ntle ga toropo e kgolo mo Aforikaborwa, Johannesburg, go ntse lengwe la mafelo a a botlhokwa thata mo hisetoring ya botho: Cradle of Humankind.

en: Here, at sites like the Sterkfontein Caves, Swartkrans, Drimolen and Kromdraai, researchers have unearthed amazing fossil evidence from the Plio-Pleistocene (the last five million years).
tsn: Fano, mo mafelong a a tshwanang le Sterkfontein Caves, Swartkrans, Drimolen le Kromdraai , babatlisisi ba  bone bopaki jo bo makatsang thata jwa fosele , go tswa go Plio Pleistocene (dingwaga di le dimilione di le tlhano tse di fetileng).

en: It is especially famous for the discovery of fossilised hominin ancient human remains.
tsn: E tumileng thata ka thibololo ya marapo a batho ba bogolololo ba Homonini ba ba tlhokafetseng.

en: But there is a more recent and largely neglected layer to the landscape’s history.
tsn: Mme go na le boalo jwa sešweng jo bo itlhokomolositsweng jwa history ya naga.

en: My colleagues and I set out to investigate some archaeological traces found in part of the Cradle of Humankind.
tsn: Nna le badirimmogo ka nna ke ikaelela go batlisisa dingwe tsa dithuto ya boithutamarope tse di fitlhelwang mo karolong ya Cradle of Humankind.

en: We focused on a stone-walled structure on a hill known as Driefontein; the name also given to the site we studied.
tsn: Re tlhomile mogopolo mo leboteng le le agilweng ka matlapa mo thoteng e e itsegeng jaaka Driefontein; Leina le le neetsweng lefelo le re ithutileng ka lona.

en: Our findings suggest that the Driefontein stone-walled structure was a residential area.
tsn: Diphitlhelelo tsa rona di supa gore lebota le le agilweng ka matlapa la Driefontein, e ne e le lefelo la baagi.

en: It appears similar to settlements found elsewhere in South Africa’s North West province and parts of Botswana dating to between AD 1450 and 1700, though certain features possibly suggest a later date.
tsn: Le lebega go tshwana le mafelo a a fitlhelwang mo Porofenseng ya Bokone Bophirima mo Aforikaborwa le dikarolo tsa Botswana,  magareng ga AD 1450 le 1700, le fa e le gore diponagalo tse dingwe di tlhagisa letlha le le kwa morago.

en: These findings place the settlements occupation broadly within the Tswana period.
tsn: Diphitlhelelo tse di baya tseo ya tulo mo nakong ya Batswana.

en: This refers to roughly the last 500 years of history when Tswana communities, a southern African ethnic group, arose.
tsn: Se se bontsha dingwaga tse di ka nnang tse 500 tsa hisetori, fa ditšhaba tsa Batswana, setlhopha sa morafe wa Borwa jwa Aforika, se ne se simolola go nna teng

en: While the prehistoric sequence of the Cradle of Humankind operates at several levels spanning a very long period of time, a disproportionate amount of resources have been allocated to studies concerning human evolution and early stone tool technologies.
tsn: Fa tatelano ya tshimologo ya hisetori ya Cradle of Humankind e direla mo dikgatong di le mmalwa tsa sebaka sa paka ya nako e telele, palo e e sa lekalekaneng ya didirisiwa e abetswe dithuto tse di mabapi le phetogo ya batho le didiriswa tsa dithekenoloji ya matlapa.

en: While this has global significance, our work is important, too, because it sheds light on heritage traces that reveal much about people’s daily lives.
tsn: Le fa se se le botlhokwa lefatshe ka bophara, tiro ya rona e botlhokwa go feta, ka gonne e ruta batho ka ga boswa jo bo  senolang go le gontsi ka ga matshelo a batho a letsatsi le letsatsi.

en: It also helps us understand local, traumatic pasts which involved colonial oppression, land dispossession and racial policies.
tsn: Gape e re thusa go tlhaloganya maikutlo a a botlhoko a selegae, a a akaretsang kgatelelo ya bokolone, go tseelwa lefatshe le dipholisi tsa semorafe.

en: Cultural remains such as those found at Driefontein allow archaeology to peel back historical discourse to reveal people’s pasts that are not preserved in any other way.
tsn: Marapo a a tshwanang le a a fitlhetsweng kwa Driefontein a letla akhioloji go boela morago kwa hisetoring le go senola dilo tsa batho tse di fetileng, tse di sa sirelediwang ka tsela epe.

en: Our work at the settlement involved an intensive mapping programme conducted over four successive visits.
tsn: Tiro ya rona kwa tulong e, e akaretsa go nna le seabe mo lenaneong la go rulaganya ka kelotlhoko e e tseneletseng le le dirilweng mo diketelong di le nne tsa go latelana.

en: Initially we determined the overall size of the settlement, in order to plan our field programme, and then we examined the layout of the homesteads dry-packed stone-walled architecture.
